title: Wish - Shopping Made Fun
description:
Style doesn’t have to be expensive.
Wish is a mobile shopping app that lets you shop over 100 million high-quality items at 60-90% off!

HOW IS WISH SO AFFORDABLE?
Wish connects shoppers directly to over 100 million manufacturers, so shoppers can find affordable goods. There’s no middle man, so prices are lower and the quality is the same as what you’d get at the mall.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE
We take your security seriously and process your purchases securely.

JOIN 500+ MILLION USERS
Over 500+ million people use Wish to shop affordable goods. So skip the shopping mall and find lower prices on Wish.

REVIEWS, VIDEOS & PHOTOS
Read through customer reviews, view photos, and watch videos of their purchases to find the best deals. 

TRACKING
Track your purchases.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
If you have questions about your order, reach our customer service easily through the app. Our customer service responds quickly.

30-DAY RETURN POLICY
Plus, if it’s not perfect, we have a 30-day return policy.

SAVE ON BRANDS
We now offer brands at affordable prices on Wish Outlet. Find discounted Apple, Samsonite, Burberry, Coach, Michael Kors, Ray Ban, Fossil, Guess, Tommy Hilfiger, Champion, Sperry and more!

5-7 DAY SHIPPING
Get faster shipping with Wish Express! Items with the Wish Express truck icon arrive at your door in 5-7 days.

SAVE BIGGER
Spin Blitz Buy to win more savings. When you spin Blitz Buy, you win access to extra discounts.

EARN REWARDS
Collect points with each purchase and redeem them for reward coupons.

60-90% OFF THESE CATEGORIES
Find discounts on trendy fashion, shoes, gadgets, kitchen tools, home goods, kids items, beauty, jewelry, watches, accessories, and more.

SKIP THE MALL, SHOP ON YOUR PHONE FOR....
Trendy womens fashion: dresses, jackets, bottoms, tops, sweaters, athleisure, swimwear, lingerie...

Quality mens fashion: jackets, sweaters, jeans, shirts, button-up tops, workout wear, underwear...

Accessories: hats, socks, scarves, belts, jewelry, watches, gym bags, travel bags, purses, backpacks...

Electronics: fitness trackers, cameras, drones, phone cases, battery packs, headphones, gadgets...

Beauty: brushes, skincare, perfume, lipstick, eyeshadow, foundation...

Shoes: sneakers, running shoes, boots, sandals, heels...

Home Goods: kitchen tools, cookware, knives, trendy home decor, lights, sheets, furniture...

Kids: clothes, toys, school supplies, baby gear...

Sports: exercise gear, weights, soccer, basketball, mens workout clothes, women’s athleisure...

Auto: organizers, cleaners, phone chargers...

WISH and the W logo are trademarks of ContextLogic Inc., registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and in other countries. All rights reserved.

summary: 🧼😷Get access to face masks, toiletries, hand sanitizer & more! 🧻🧽
comments: Buttons on app aren't very responsive. You have to tap them many times/refresh phone 4 them to take desired action. When app finally returns;sometimes it's where you left off on their list, most of times you have to re-scroll & occasionally it will take to a whole new list. Many times prices listed is not what is charged. Amount difference is minimal but still incorrect. Nice feature of able to check delivery charges before checking out. It has to many sex toys & pot paraphernalia.

Decent app... but there should be an option to not store credit card info without having to manually delete it every time. And also to remove stored info/searches/things other people viewed that you don't want showing up as items of interest. Some photos are misleading or of two different products, but the reviews and item specifications often clarify things. Would give 3.5 stars if an option.

My previous review stands until the logout issue is corrected. When I logout & someone is able to open the app & place an order without logging back in, that is not account security nor is it Wish taking my account security seriously. Wish is great, but the app sucks. It won't let you logout so it continuosly uses data. It says you're logged out, but you aren't. That's dangerous with my account information stored in your app. I will not be using the app any longer & will only use the website

Great prices, be careful, I may have gotten a bit carried away at first but have regained some self control and have slowed down purchases. Over 40 items in a weekend totaling about $300. All of which aren't needed really. But I still like this app alot.!!!!!!!

Just be careful. Details of the phones and tablets pc in this Apps was confusing or inaccurate. For example; one tablet pc, the dealer writes very good impression on its main picture. But when you read carefully on the product descriptions, you found it contradicting. I can assume that the 'product descriptions' columns is not more than a 'copy paste' details from other items/product. May be those items are from a lazy dealer or scammer. WISH should looks carefully onto this problem.

title: Amazon Shopping - Search, Find, Ship, and Save
description:
Product Features

* Customers are able to shop millions of products on any of Amazon's sites around the world from a single app
*Use Alexa to help you shop—just use your voice to search for products on Amazon, track your orders, and reorder your favorite items. Tap the microphone icon and say “where’s my stuff?” to access open orders. Reorder products by saying “reorder paper towels” or “buy more batteries”.
* Take advantage of 1-Click ordering, customer support, Wish Lists, create or find a baby or wedding registry, order tracking, and more
* Scan product barcodes and images to compare prices and check availability using Scan It
* Check out Gold Box Deals - including the Deal of the Day and Lightning Deals, and get automatically notified when new deals become available
* Send and share links to products via email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter, and more
* Sign-up for automatic shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives
* Buy with confidence, knowing that all transactions are securely processed


Product Description

The Amazon Shopping app lets you shop millions of products and manage your Amazon orders from anywhere. Browse, shop by department, compare prices, read reviews, share products with friends, and check the status of your orders.
Compare prices and availability by typing in your search, scanning a barcode or an image with your camera, or using your voice. Never miss a deal with easy access to Lightning Deals and the Deal of the Day. You can also sign-up for shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives. You have full access to your Shopping Cart, Wish Lists, payment and Prime shipping options, Subscribe & Save order history, and 1-Click settings, just like on the full Amazon.com site. All Amazon Shopping app purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers to encrypt and safeguard your personal information.


Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 5.0 or higher and a rear-facing camera. The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.

developerAddress:
Amazon Mobile LLC
500 9th Avenue N,
Seattle, WA 98109
recentChanges: AmazonSmile customers can now generate donations for their favorite charity. Just open Settings from the menu and tap AmazonSmile.
comments: Honestly, the mobile app is in need of some remade menus and UIs, but it works okay right now. I get really slow loading times; If you also get that, go into system settings, apps, find this app, then storage, and press 'clear cache'. It stores way too much, and having to do this every month or so is annoying. It doesn't look like it'll get fixed. The actual service of Amazon is great, incredibly convenient and consumer-friendly in loads of ways. I would recommend it to buy things

Its a great place to shop but I wish organizing your shopping cart into different lists was a lot easier. I cannot stress how boring and stressful it is to- especially if you have a lot of items in your cart- scroll all the way down and then click on each item one by one. One misclick and you could be sent all the way back to the top of your cart.

It was good, you would go in shop around now its just all about prime video and music. When paying its unsafe in my opinion I went to settings to ask for permission before purchase, that doesn't work you can just go in and buy something without ever entering a password or anything.

You took away the "hold and drag to a list" feature. That is my favorite feature while shopping. You need to bring it back. Its now very frustrating and time consuming when you have to add items to a list now. Smh...who ever had the idea to change this was not thinking clearly...

This App is terrible! It constantly hangs up for several seconds when trying to add filters or look at product images regardless of connection speed or device. I expect more from a company whose annual revenue is in the billions. The app should flow like water when navigating through its many menus and options with little to no lag or delay. They also need to add a filter to only list in stock items.

title: Walmart Shopping & Grocery
description:
Our award-winning shopping app helps you save time and money. 

Shop anytime, anywhere 

Millions of items available with free delivery or store pickup.  

Easily re-order favorite items purchased online or in-store with just a few taps.  

Order, transfer, and track prescriptions and refills. 

Find, create, and manage a baby registry. 

Transfer money without the long wait or the paperwork with Express Money Services.  

Free delivery on eligible orders $35 and up. 

Smart in-store shopping 

Save time shopping at your local Walmart with store assistant.  

Use Walmart Pay for touch-free checkout.  

Quickly locate items and Rollbacks with store maps.  

Create and share shopping lists.  

  Fresh groceries and more 

Choose grocery delivery or curbside pickup. 

Reserve a time that best works for you. 

We’ll do the groceries shopping. 

No markups or hidden fees. 

   

Do Not Sell My Personal Information 

 Please scroll down to the footer of our Privacy Policy below to find the "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link.  

https://corporate.walmart.com/privacy-security

summary: Shop the whole store and more!
recentChanges: Get the new Walmart app. Now that we’ve moved Grocery into the Walmart App, everything's in one place. Order your weekly groceries & plenty more—choose curbside pickup or delivery to your door. And shop millions of items online.
comments: This new app update Sucks eggs.. It's horrible horrible. You use to be able to type in the item or product you want and it will give you the Isle letter, number and location of the item. It use to tell you if the item is at a location or outta stock. Now with the update, it don't tell you shyt ! You're back to asking the associates, 😑, who don't usually know where everything is.and give you bogus directions, bless them tho. Update and put this feature back in the app, I'll re-rate again

The app has potential but there's a lot of work to do. The app is well built with good and responsive UI, but it crashes from time to time. The inventory and logistics are terrible. There's pick up from store option but many stores don't know what they have or not have. If you order shipping online, 10 items can come in in 10 different shipments. And remember to filter out 3rd party vendors, there's no quality control and prices are all over the place.

Still needs some attention. Things need to be fixed. No option for deleting all or multiple items from saved list at one time. App runs very slow and shuts down. We should also be able to order as many items as we wish. Someone needs to double check before sending items. I placed an order in the past and received wrong item 3 times. App continously freezes up and cannot get the saved items to even open let alone remove!! ☹☹ All items purchased in store should be available for curbside pickup.

I loved this app, until recently when they decided to mess with it. Now it doesn't work and can't even scan for prices. It always reads "not in stock" when I'm standing right in front of the item at the store and they indeed ARE in stock. Also a nuisance that now it asks you to select if you're shopping online or at your store, when it used to detect what store location I was at every time.

Shopping is wonderful, however since updating to this new app it will not allow me to check on as requested. Today is Saturday May 2, 2020 and yet again the app will not allow me to check in. Phone # needs updating, so needed to flag down someone again. However, I still like the intended process. Today is now May 5th and I get an email that my order is ready but your new app STILl Will NOT let me check in. Please fix.

title: Shop: delivery & order tracker
description:
Meet Shop, your new shopping assistant.

* Featured on NBC's Today Show, TechCrunch, and Lifehacker! *

TRACK BETTER
Follow every delivery with map tracking and real time updates from cart to home. No need to copy and paste, Shop is on it.

PAY BETTER
Shop Pay is a thoughtful way to pay at over a million independent online shops. Shop remembers and protects your personal info for a lightning-fast checkout experience.

SHOP BETTER
Shop makes it easy to find and support independent businesses in your area while you're at home. Tell Shop the stores you like for a personalized interface, deals, trending items, and recommendations you’ll love. View current and past orders, receipts, return policies, and contact shops in a tap.

Bet you didn’t know shopping could be this good.

---

CONTACT

Have a question or just want to say hello? Contact us at help@shop.app or @shop on Twitter.

recentChanges:
Shop has Arrived.

Arrive just got better. Meet Shop, your new shopping assistant.

TRACK BETTER
Get real-time notifications for all your deliveries.

PAY BETTER
Fill carts, not forms, and checkout lightning fast every time you use Shop Pay. Available at all your favorite independent online shops.

SHOP BETTER
Follow your favorite shops for recommendations you'll love.
comments: I used Arrive for tons of packages and never once had a problem, but ever since the redesign to Shop this app is having some issues to say the least. It does not allow for easy adding of new packages, and packages can no longer be added just as an order number. The packages that have tracking numbers sometimes do not have a map to clearly see where it is, or the map can only be seen through a weird way, and it is not easily seen on the package's page.

I like that I can see all my future deliveries in one place. However, this app needs a lot of work. I have two main problems with this app... First off, I get delivery notifications hours AFTER a package has actually been delivered. Second, it'll randomly list items that had already been delivered months ago as "in transit". Uninstalling.

This app was fantastic when it was arrive. Since the "update" it's just become basically useless. I wanted this app to track my packages and archive orders that were delivered but now it's grouped all my orders into one including ones that are already delivered and ones still in transit. I cant even separate orders that I placed yesterday from orders I placed months ago...... pretty frustrating. Also not being able to move around the map or zoom in and out (as it was before). Annoying.

So updating my review since the app name and functionality changed. Arrive was good. Shop is bad. You took out so much of the good functionality of the app. Not being able to see the names I called the package on the main screen...bad. No swipe to archive...bad. Having to go three screens deep to see something I used to be able to do in one...bad. Not sure who approved this to go out but you took a good app and made it so bad that if it doesn't change, I'm considering uninstalling it.

When this app was Arrive it was FANTASTIC but now that they switched over to the new ‘Shop’ it’s ABSOLUTE GARBAGE. It is no longer intuitive, half the time it doesn’t grab tracking from emails, and rarely names them anymore. I feel embarrassed that I recommended this app to friends now that it’s so terrible. This app was a life saver when I first found it and now it’s a nightmare and makes more work for me instead of making things easier. PLEASE GIVE US BACK THE OLD VERSION THAT WORKED!!!!!!!

title: Wayfair - Shop All Things Home
description:
Wayfair offers a zillion things home. Shop the largest selection of home furniture and décor across all styles and price points. Explore unique and exclusive products, or shop for the best bargain through our daily sales on everything from bedding sets and curtains to desks, pillows, and tables. With the Wayfair app for Android, you can find your next great bargain through app-exclusive sales, and explore the largest online catalog of home furniture and décor—whether you’re searching for something contemporary, antique, rustic, or coastal. 

Find exactly what you’re looking for among zillions of high-quality products—whether it’s bedding and rugs for your bedroom, or décor and furniture to spruce up your kitchen, patio, or bedroom. 

- Shop every style of home furniture for all tastes, including antique, contemporary, traditional, or your own eclectic style 

- Browse new, limited-time sales that launch daily at 12PM EST to find a great bargain on our high-quality items 

- Build a wedding registry that works for you and your guests

- Enjoy Free Shipping on orders over $49 

- Save and share your favorite furniture and décor items through Wayfair Idea Boards, where you can store your bathroom remodel ideas, living room concepts, patio plans, favorite beds and bedding sets, and much more

- Use Augmented Reality (AR) to see life-sized versions of products in any space using our "View in Room 3D" feature

- Find furniture to add style to any room, including your kitchen, bedroom, living room, patio, outdoor space, kid’s room, game room, and more

- Explore décor for every style, whether you need chic bedding sets, contemporary pillows, rustic coffee tables, traditional rugs, antique desks, or eclectic chairs

- Browse various curated collections to design your dream—be it a modern and contemporary bedroom, a creative and eclectic lounge, or an antique and rustic patio

- Shop seamlessly using our app-optimized Checkout 

- Tackle any ambitious remodel project with ease. Our zillions of options will allow you to remodel bathrooms, kitchens, and beyond (all at the perfect price)

New features roll out every week! Check the “What’s New” section to see our latest and greatest in furniture and décor. From unbelievable deals on beds to incredible discounts on desks, tables, and curtains, there will always be a bargain to excite you.

Don’t have an account with Wayfair.com? Sign up now using the app to access our great features, high-quality products, and more!
Whether you want to remodel an entire house or find that one item that tops off your look, shopping for your home has never been so easy and enjoyable.

recentChanges: Thanks for using the Wayfair app to shop everything home! We regularly bring updates to our app that make shopping easier and more fun than ever. As exciting new features become available, we'll let you know right in the app.
comments: The app for just shopping is great, but you can't use the 'view in your room' feature. It used to be so awesome where you could view the object in a photo wherever you wanted and now it doesn't hardly work at all and it's unrealistic. I miss that feature from Wayfair, it was so handy and worked so well. The 3D viewing feature is terrible. It never picks up where I want to put it. I used to use the feature they had before pretty much on a daily basis.

It has a few hiccups, and they happen at random times. Navigating can become a little hard and confusing at times. I like being able to scroll through products and if I click on an item to look at it and then go back, I want the page to be where I left off and it sometimes jumps back all the way to the top of the page and I have to go back through all of those items I had just scrolled through and it's tiring, so I usually just give up and when that happens, I'm not making a purchase.
This app runs extremely slow. Homepage and searches take a long time to load. In some cases they don't load at all. I love Wayfair but shopping on this app is a challenge.
Doe not let you navigate easily. I used it twice. Each time it automatically purchased items i only had in cart to compare. It was then very hard to cancel the purchases.

This is honestly one of the most user friendly apps I've ever used. Selecting and tracking your items is a cake walk, the UI is nice to look at and Wayfair is just great as a whole. Great job, dev team!

title: eBay: Online Shopping Deals - Buy, Sell, and Save
description:
Buy, sell and save with the eBay app! Shop deals - or list items you want to sell - in just a few seconds, straight from your phone. From home and garden to tech, fitness, and more, get the best deals every time with eBay.

Whether you’re setting up your home office or need equipment for those fitness workouts, we’ve got huge savings on millions of items. Download now to start exploring unmissable deals.

Come on in and take a look!

Buy and sell on the go - 5 reasons you’ll love the eBay app:
→ Save money with shopping deals at your fingertips
→ Clothes, sneakers, tech, and furniture: Do all your shopping online
→ Buy top brands in electronics, tech and phones
→ Sell items with ease: Simply scan the barcode & list
→ Used cars & parts: Buy and sell safely & securely

Buy and sell securely with your favourite shopping app. Browse millions of listings and find clothes, trading cards, certified refurbished tech, cars, watches, on-trend sneakers or stylish furniture for your home. 

HOME & GARDEN
• Save money on garden furniture, home office setup and kitchen appliances
• Shop for DIY tools & supplies for your garden

SPORTS & WORKOUTS

• Buy the latest shoes, running gear & more from leading sports brands

TECH and ELECTRONICS
• Save money on top brands like Sony or Samsung
• Buy your next TV, laptop or mobile phone in just a few steps

SELL IN SECONDS - MAKE MONEY ON THE GO
• Clothes, sneakers, cars, watches, tech - you can sell almost anything with eBay
• Get your listing online in under a minute!

• Shop for the freshest trends in women’s, men’s and kid’s fashion
• Discover shopping savings on clothes, fitness wear, shoes, watches & accessories

Take the eBay marketplace with you wherever you are. Discover shopping deals and savings, shop the best brands at amazing prices or bid on an auction on the go - just download to your phone or mobile device now!

Your feedback & suggestions are really important to us. Get in touch on Twitter @askebay or

title: Mercari: The Selling App
description:
NOT USING IT? SELL IT. SHIP IT. GET PAID.

This is Mercari. The fast and easy way to sell (or buy) almost anything. Fashion to toys. Sporting goods to electronics. All the brands you know and love. Got stuff you don’t use, never used or simply outgrew? Sell it.

SELLING IS FAST & EASY.
* List in minutes. Just take a few photos, add a description and set your price.
* Listings are free. Flat 10% selling fee only charged when your sale completes.

NO MEETUPS
* All items ship.
* Printable shipping label emailed to you when your item sells. Just print and ship.

UP TO 70% OFF. ALL THE BRANDS YOU LOVE.
* Great stuff. New and used.
* Over 150,000 items for women, men, kids and home added each day.
* Free shipping on millions of items.

WE’VE GOT YOUR BACK.
* Money Back Guarantee. Receive your item as described. Or your money back.
* 24 hour customer support.

developerAddress: 東京都港区六本木6-10-1 六本木ヒルズ森タワー 18F
recentChanges: Bugs were squashed and performance was improved. Keep the feedback coming—we're listening and working on your suggestions.
comments: Greatest app ever! You can get the best deals ever at super low prices on just about everything! I've managed to get my entire summer wardrobe from shorts to tops and sandals for a very small fraction of the retail price of maybe 2 pieces! Love this app and all the sellers are so kind and price things reasonably for us that can't afford to shop, shop, shop to get good deals! Thanks to all the people that I have purchased from and thanks to Mercari for making shopping so easy and fast!

Not many options to buy. Pages load so SLOW. HATE how we cannot filter out certain words. Lots of games are CASE ONLY and I can't do a "-case" on the search bar to remove those. Hate having to select For Sale every time so it removes all the Sold items from the search results. No filtering options to ALLOW the possibility of local meets. I get it.. You want to be "different". Other apps do both ship AND meet options . You need flexibility to gain more of an audience.

Hands-down the best selling and buying app! Easy to use interface, sales galore, and way more than just clothing. By far the easiest to use buying/selling app. I feel like I'm actually buying from real people, instead of shady companies. I haven't used it to sell yet, but from a buyer's standpoint it's like a huge digital yard sale, I love it!

It's seriously addictive. Normally I download apps for sites like this and end up deleting them by the end of the day. Not Mercari! I've literally bought something every day! Everyone is very nice, most items are reasonably priced, and Mercari themselves are fast to respond. At some point I'm probably going to need the site to crash so I'll stop buying stuff.

I love everything about the app except for its constant crashing. Sometimes I can go a few minutes, maybe even 10, without it crashing. But other times the app crashes so quickly, I barely have time to scroll down before the app shuts down. This app is basically unusable a lot of the time as a result. Please fix this issue! Otherwise, I absolutely love it.

title: Nike
description:
Your Own Personal Nike Shop
• Shopping – The best Nike products selected just for you, with free shipping on every order.
• Member Profile – Easily track your activity, orders and purchase history, and enjoy receipt-free returns.

NikePlus Unlocks
• Reserved for You - Shoes we think you'll want, set aside for you on launch day. 
• Exclusive Shop – Products designed and created  exclusively for members within the Nike App. Innovations, collaborations and upgraded materials. 
• Nike Experts - Available on-demand to NikePlus Members. A team of Nike Experts to help you track down or recommend the perfect product from sport to style. 

Expert Advice from the World’s Greatest Athletes, Personal Trainers, and Coaches
• News Feed – A customized feed with content tailored to your interests, delivered daily by Nike athletes and experts. 
• Training & Coaching – Expert advice delivered by Nike athletes, coaches and personal trainers. 
• Daily Recommendations – The gear and apparel you need for your favorite sports, activities and more. 

Special Events
• Nike Events – Reserve spots at the best events Nike has to offer, from New York to Los Angeles.

Check the Latest Trends
• Seasonal Gear – Go shopping for this season’s must have looks with access to gear in your size.
• New Style Trends – Discover new ways to wear your favorite Nike products with the world’s top stylists.
• Nike Editors – See what products the editors recommend and this week’s top picks for shoes and clothing.

No matter which sports you follow, we've got you covered:
• Running
• Basketball
• Lifestyle
• Football
• Soccer
• Skateboarding
• Golf
• Baseball

Get instant access to the latest in shoes and clothing reserved for your, and get invitations to special Nike events before anyone else. Go shopping for all Nike products with The Nike App.

Download now.

title: OfferUp - Buy. Sell. Offer Up
description:
Buy. Sell. Simple.

Join the largest mobile marketplace for local buyers and sellers! 

OfferUp makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads and garage sales -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your community or neighborhood with people you can trust.

How it works:

• Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your items for sale in 30 seconds. 
• Find great deals and discounts on clothes, shoes, furniture, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
• Use reputation features like ratings and profiles to see who you’re dealing with and build trust. 
• Shop local items for sale with thousands of new postings daily. 
• Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app. 
• Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page. 
• Browse items by image and sort by category or location. 
• Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country. 
• Skip the garage sale! OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally.

Fun facts about OfferUp:

1. With OfferUp you can easily sell anything like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics and home goods.
2. OfferUp shows you what’s selling nearby, right in your neighborhood. 
3. Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4. OfferUp is better than a garage sale; shop anything you want at a discount, right on your phone or tablet.

Be part of the community: 

We’re making local buying and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you’re joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood.

comments: Has several glitches. Important, that this should create a notification noise or alert every time there is a message. It doesn't even tell me! So I miss out on sales. This app has potential, and reaches to many local shoppers. What about those that don't respond to listings after 6 months? Ratings are good, my favorite thing about selling here.

This app has alot of potential but its not there. For starters i cant tell you when offer up was last updated because the ui looks exactly the same as it has for the past 3 years. Second when you search something you can scroll through ads that are a few years old and its inconvenient to find something you want for a good price to find out its a 2 year old ad. And finally making it extremely confusing on how to delete ads which put the nail in the coffin for me as it has been left in the dust.

Used to love this app, but lately I'm getting frustrated with it to the point where I'm considering closing my account and uninstalling it for good. I've experienced the same issues as countless others are voicing here. The developers need to listen to these kinds of feedback and make some changes or else people will get fed up and go elsewhere.

Not compatible with Android device's (Anymore). If a seller has more then 19 offers, I can not view anymore then that. I've never had this issue before on any android device. OfferUp refused to help. After awhile they just ignored my situation. Come to find out, when on an Apple device I do not have the issue I'm having. I logged onto my with Android device and the problem continued.

This app use to be amazing. Now anytime I post a offer its suddenly missing without explanation. I get all these error messages. If you log out and try to log back in all you get is more error messages. Basically locking you out of your account! So frustrating for those of us trying to save money or make money especially in the times where job security has gone out the window! What is the point of even having this app installed on your phone! *I listed a canopy for sale! And it's been removed!

title: letgo: Buy & Sell Used Stuff, Cars, Furniture
description:
🏆 letgo is Google Play Editor's choice
Join one of the biggest marketplace apps! Install our selling and shopping app to start trading up secondhand items in the mobile marketplace!

letgo is a go-to marketplace app to sell your stuff and find the best offers on secondhand finds like used cars, secondhand electronics, and used video games!

Find the best deals on preowned items today! Even better than buying in secondhand shops or an online thrift store!

Find the best offers online on secondhand items that you actually need, and make the best offers to sell your used items and earn money! 

Looking to buy home goods and vintage furniture? Seeking used video games or secondhand electronics or a used car? Get used items and vintage stuff on letgo! 🎉

letgo is the perfect online marketplace to buy and sell locally! No need to visit a used car dealership or thrift store to find the best local deals on used items and vintage stuff! Here you’ll find a wide selection of like-new products, from used cars for sale, home goods, used electronics, vintage clothes, used furniture, used books, used vehicles, exercise equipment, retro games and electronics, to houses and apartments for rent or sale. It’s everything you can wish for!

letgo is one of the biggest and fastest growing app to buy and sell locally. Over 100 million downloads and 200 million listings! Here's why tens of millions of people are buying and selling on letgo:

MILLIONS OF LISTINGS
• USED CARS - Think of us as your used car dealership. Whether you are looking for a used toyota, a pre owned ford or an old chevrolet, we’ll help you find the best used car for you. Explore used cars for sale, used trucks, used suv, used motorcycles, dirt bikes, and many more.
• HOUSING - Looking to sell your property or into real estate investing? Find and list properties like: apartments, houses for sale, studios for sale and other real estate!  
• SELL ELECTRONICS - Used PS4 and other used video games, used electronics, used laptops, used computers, used smartphones and much more.
• Shop for the best deals on anything you need in an online garage sale. From used furniture, dresses, shoes and watches, to vintage books, used toys, used laptops a new iPhone or Samsung Galaxy, a secondhand car and even real estate for sale or rent! You can even find listings for free stuff!
• Find and offer barter deals or services at affordable prices.

FAST AND CUTTING-EDGE
• List items in seconds, as effortlessly as taking a photo. letgo's the only app with advanced technology that automatically titles and categorizes your listing, whether you’re selling a used iPhone or a used car! Find the best deals at letgo today.
• Make money selling your like-new items. It’s safe and easy.

FUN, SIMPLE AND INTUITIVE

* Buying a used car or selling your used car? We’ve made it even easier to buy and sell used cars, SUVs, trucks, motorcycles and other vehicles. Find your dream car on letgo - at a fraction of the price!
 
Download letgo and start selling your stuff, shopping for the best brands and finding discount deals on anything from fashion, electronics and used cars!

comments: I like to look at second hand stuff People have really cool things. The only scary part is some people are dirty and false leading and can tell you it works or whatever but until you actually get home and try the product out to find out its not what they said it was or doesnt have what it says or is totally broken which has happened. And you try to contact them they have the option to ignore and blick you and get away with it. That's what has happened to me before. Its not good to be scandleous

Been using this app for a long time. Here recently it's coming up just showing load errors. Not letting me to browse past the first page. I've uninstalled this app and reinstalled it hoping it would fix the issue. It worked for about 15 mins. I then went back into the app and it went right back to the same issues. Hope they fix this issue I really like the function of this app.

For some reason, the app will no longer allows your search results to work. (Error messages, stuck on only a handful of results) I have uninstalled and reloaded to app. Worked for 1 day and same problem came back. I plan to use other apps until this issue is resolved. I genuinely liked this app. I will use it again once the problem is fixed.

I've been using the app for a while now. Its finally starting to show issues. I cant search or load any other pages without a popup at the bottom saying oops an error has occured. I cant even load messages. This had happened at a bad time as I was trying to make a deal with someone. Overall good if this issue is fixed. Edit. They fixed the issue. Thank you guys. Now I have one of my dream dirtbikes! 5 stars

Crashing since recent update. Whenever I try to view the map on an ad or change the distance on my search, the app crashes. Sometimes I get a popup window notification about it crashing, sometimes it just crashes and other times it crashes and restarts. Also when I set geographical limits, I get stuff that's 30+ miles away instead of 10 miles.

title: Target
description:
Now the Target app can help you have a more rewarding Target run! Introducing Target Circle, which gives you access to hundreds of deals, a birthday gift and the chance to support your community.

Plan your next Target run by checking out Target Circle offers, the Weekly Ad and item availability all in one place. Then streamline your run with store maps and aisle locations, and scan item barcodes for prices, reviews and available deals.

Wallet is the fastest, easiest way to pay and save in store. With one scan, you can pay with your credit or debit RedCard and redeem Target Circle offers, gift cards and Target Circle earnings.
descriptionHTML:
Now the Target app can help you have a more rewarding Target run! Introducing Target Circle, which gives you access to hundreds of deals, a birthday gift and the chance to support your community.

Plan your next Target run by checking out Target Circle offers, the Weekly Ad and item availability all in one place. Then streamline your run with store maps and aisle locations, and scan item barcodes for prices, reviews and available deals.

Wallet is the fastest, easiest way to pay and save in store. With one scan, you can pay with your credit or debit RedCard and redeem Target Circle offers, gift cards and Target Circle earnings.
summary: Plan, shop and save with the Target App, now with Target Circle.
recentChanges: We're constantly fixing bugs and making changes to improve your experience. Turn on your updates to stay on top of our latest and greatest.
comments: The target app for me is very smooth and easy to use and navigate. My RedCard debit card is integrated (after linking to my account) and the 5% discount and free shipping are right there in the card before final checkout, so you know what's going on. Lastly, if you're doing curbside pickup, it's different than regular in-store pick-up, so keep that in mind and finalize order accordingly

Not user friendly, this app needs so much work. It's not convenient to check out. There's so many questions even though my information is saved. I have to go back and get my card out all over again. What's the point of having the information saved if it's going to so ask twice to verify everything. It's just not convenient online shopping. I want to click on my others and check out hassle free like Amazon.

The features are not intuitive to use, especially when you have to scan items for discounts as you shop (when physically in the store), then transfer that info to the cashier. Why do we also have to enter our phone numbers at the register? As for online ordering (for pick-up), it's really irritating to see "offer available" next to something placed in the shopping cart, without the ability to actually see what offer I might be missing. Clicking on it doesn't link to any information.

Pretty bad app. 1) Can't choose quantity before adding to the cart. Have to go into the cart and then increase quantity. For each item! 2) No simple add to cart button on the item details page. Have to choose pick up or deliver it instead. No need to make me choose this on every item. I can decide it on the checkout page. 3) No clear error messages shown, only a warning sign shows up without explaining what's wrong. Overall, too much effort on the user to figure the app out.

It's not a easy and doesn't function as well as I would like. When click the "in stock" button, it does not show only in sock items, it shows all items still, and when you open the details of the item, it then says "temporarily out if stock" or "available at another store". Neither of those are helpful I think they need to make it more accurate, especially for the in person or drive up pick up.

title: The Home Depot
description:
It’s a good time to be a doer.

DIY IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND
Save time with The Home Depot app. Shop over one million products and find the info you need most. 

SNAP A PICTURE, FIND WHAT YOU NEED
Don’t know what something’s called? Just snap a picture and let our Image Search feature tell you.

A GPS FOR YOUR SHOPPING LIST
Use the Product Locator to find what you’re looking for and check store inventory. We'll take you to the exact aisle and bay.

MAKE INFORMED BUYING DECISIONS 
Get Ratings & Reviews in a matter of seconds. Use the barcode reader to scan an item and read what other customers have to say. 

DO MORE WITH AN ACCOUNT
Signing up is quick and free. Get access to real-time order tracking info, view purchase history, enable instant checkout and more.

SHOP SPECIAL BUYS & VIEW LOCAL AD
Look for a new Special Buy on the app home screen each day. Plus, check out your local ad for all the latest from your Home Depot.

Privacy Policy  - https://www.homedepot.com/c/Privacy_Security
Do Not Sell My Personal Information  - https://www.homedepot.com/c/exercise_my_privacy_rights

We want to hear from you – email us at apphelp@homedepot.com and let us know how we are doing.

title: SHEIN-Fashion Shopping Online
description:
SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform with a distinct tone focusing on women's fashion. No matter what the current fashion trend is, Shein.com is sure to follow it or even lead it. With all the categories like women's clothing, men's clothing, kids' clothing, shoes and accessories, and 20,000+ styles including dresses, blouses, swimwear and T-shirts, SHEIN is a one-stop destination for fashionistas. Shopping becomes even more enjoyable with the new SHEIN mobile app. Welcome to the incredible world of SHEIN--available in your pocket and at your fingertips.

We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Features:
Save you more
-Get an extra 10% off on your first order
-Free shipping for orders over $49 & free returns for all orders
-Get up to 80% off every day with Flash Deals
-Sale alerts and promotional emails
Securely ordering and paying
-Ordering process is risk-free
-Secure payment via PayPal or credit card
-7/24 customer service and Live chat service
SHEIN gals exclusive perks
-500+ daily new arrivals
-Styling tips, ratings and reviews to inspire you.
-Keep up with your friends' latest activities in Timeline

Contact us:
URL: us.shein.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/sheinus/
Instagram: www.instagram.com/shein_us/
Email: dispute@shein.com

recentChanges:
1. Added a translate function for comments, so now you can read every comment
2. Return/exchange function optimized, so you can shop stress-free
3. You may now change the delivery address after placing an order (before it has been shipped). No need to contact customer service!
comments: LOVE this app. It makes shopping easy and fun (especially the flash sales.) They now have Afterpay on the app, instead of having to log in on the website to access it. They provide a USPS tracking number for ALL of your orders, as well as messenger notifications, and don't stop updating the status after it's been shipped (like WISH.) You get points for reviews and shopping (1 point = $0.01), which really helps once you stack them up for a large haul. Have not and any issues with this app. 10/10!

I very much enjoy this app. It's great for cheap fashion. Shopping and ordering are super easy, there's so much to offer that I find myself just scrolling as if it were a social media page. They offer coupons all the time and a point system when you order and review. As for returns, I'm sure it's easy but I've been had to return anything. Happy shopping!

I love this app! I wouldn't have though I'd fine clothes I like and would fit but they do! They have such a good range of clothes and styles. I've never been disappointed with what I've bought, one thing I would say it always check to material as some item are made from a material you wouldn't expect it to be and therefore may not fit how you want it to, having said that I always check so I've never been surprised and unhappy with what I've received. Homeware also has a good range 👍👍

I love this app. It's so easy to navigate and when you put something in your basket it automatically shows you similar options. There is so much variety. The quality is usually good, but the best thing is that its cheap enough to buy something you might only wear a couple of times. The only downfall is I spend too much money here with at least one order per month!

The SHEIN shopping experience is mostly 99% positive, some details but nothing important, most of the time you get your merchandise in perfect condition, the clothes are of good quality and super cute at times beautiful and other wonderful I really love it! Whenever I ask for something I am anxious and when it finally arrives, I find what I expected and it makes me extremely happy yeiiiii 🤗.

title: Alibaba.com - Leading online B2B Trade Marketplace
description:
The Alibaba.com app is a leading wholesale mobile marketplace for global trade. Buy products from suppliers around the world, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Buy & Pay with confidence
Alibaba Trade Assurance fully covers your purchases when suppliers do not meet the product quality and delivery schedule specified in the agreed contract. 

Customized products
Suppliers have years of experience in customizing products, fulfilling the demands from sellers on Amazon, eBay, wish, etsy, mercari, lazada, etc.

Easy sourcing
Browse millions of products from industry-wide categories. Post Request for Quotations (RFQs) and receive price quotes quickly. 

Fast shipping 
Alibaba partners with major freight forwarders to provide sea, air & land shipping solutions with on time delivery , tracking information and fair pricing.

Popular Categories
Alibaba.com covers a wide range of popular categories including hot and trending consumer products, also features industrial and raw materials categories 

Product quality under control
Chose Alibaba.com's Inspection Service, making sure orders meet the quality standards specified in your contract.

Discount & Promotions
Pick the best deals from factories offering discounts and promotions.

Stay in the loop
Buyers on the Alibaba.com app can follow their favorite suppliers to stay up to date on new products and promotions.

Languages & currencies supported
Alibaba.com supports 16 popular languages and 140 more local currencies. 
Now you can use Alibaba Real-time Translator to communicate with sellers in mother tongue.

recentChanges:
Various performance updates and upgrades, including:
1. "Reorder" option added to orders buyers have placed before
2. New entry point providing access to all industry home pages added below the search bar
3. More user-friendly search results with branded suppliers being listed higher when buyers search for a brand name

comments: This app shows a variety of items searched but in some other apps it doesn't. And its even very cool.but the problem is that when you want to order something it shows that you have to order minimun 100 items then only your order will be placed and its very baddddd.😠😠😠😠😠😭😭😭🤪😵
App are very good but price tag shows Difference between original price and app prices , Product Description should be more Clear . Need to Remove fake Supplier .
This is an amazing place of opertunity and discovery! Just be sure to check out the users guide early on in your adventures!
It's a amazing app.same time supplier also very good and always reply fast for your quire's.a professional platform for all kind of business related People.
Amazing products! A little difficult to order, however, in my opinion.

title: Sam's Club
description:
Get more out of your membership on the Sam’s Club app.

The Sam’s Club app helps members save time and make the most of every shopping minute.  Find everything you need including shop online, Club Pickup, Scan and Go, pharmacy and free shipping for Plus members. Check out great prices and shopping discounts with Shocking Values and Instant Savings on wholesale items, and if you’re a Plus member, monitor your Cash Rewards. Let the tabs at the bottom of the screen move you easily between Home, Scan and Go, Account and More.

Scan and Go 
Beat the checkout lines with everyone’s favorite feature. Scan items as you shop, pay from the app and save time.

Access your membership card
Quickly find your membership card in your account. Easily pull up your club membership information.

Club Pickup
Shop online, schedule a free pickup time that works best for you, and we’ll have your groceries ready and loaded for you when you arrive.

Your Lists 
The easiest and most organized way to shop online. Easily reorder your favorite grocery shopping list directly from the app.

Pharmacy 
Save time. Refill and transfer your prescriptions right in the app and manage prescriptions for the whole family. It all adds up to a more convenient way to get your health needs covered.


Shipping
Shop and ship. Easily arrange to have your wholesale bulk items shipped to your home. Free shipping is available to our Plus members.

Download the app and get started saving today. 

Do Not Sell My Personal Information (Effective 1/1/2020)  
You can find instructions on how to submit a "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" request in the “What Are Your California Privacy Rights?” section of our Privacy Policy starting on January 1, 2020. https://corporate.samsclub.com/sams-club-privacy-policy

recentChanges: You can now see the hours for your club’s services. We’ve also made enhancements across the app to make things faster and easier – and cleaned up some bugs along the way.
comments: The Scan and Go function of the app was very easy to use and super simple. It was convenient and I didn't have to wait in line to checkout. I scanned the barcode of each product I placed in my cart. It provided a running total and I was able to checkout using the app. The people greeter at the exit scanned the QR code from my phone and verified an item and I exited the store. Also if this is too simply say..."I really enjoyed using this function of the app".

Love, love the Sam's Club app! Scan as I go, no waiting in line; when it is time to check out I show my phone and cart to the Exit ckerk and they scan the barcode from the app and away I go. Thanks alot Sam's Club. Still loving this app! Saves so much time and keeps us contact free in this crazy way of Covid-19. Only had one time that the app didn't work and I had to go through the line. Guess the system was just overwhelmed when Covid-19 first started. Other than that the app has worked fine.

I am having the same problem with the app as I am with the website! It claims items are in stock online & lets you add them to your cart. I added 2 items to my cart, I went to check out & it tells me that 1 of the items are out of stock so, I proceed to check out with the other. I selected the card & checked out, then a window pops up telling me that I can't check out because the item is not in stock. This is ridiculous! I'm paying to shop at your store & you dont have a decent prgm set up!!

Scan option no longer works on galaxy s9 plus. I have updated, reinstalled, factory reset my phone the whole lot. It is incredibly frustrating. The app is useless to me without the scan option. I keep looking for a working update but have yet to find one. This has been an issue all year. I'm reconsidering my business membership all together. With a small business and a large family, my local grocery store seems to be more able to accommodate and keep up with technology.

Time Saver!!! With everything so crowded and crazy. This app is a must. We were in and out in no time while the lines for checkout where extremely long. This app, scan and go, is faster than self checkout, a huge time saver. Thank you Sam's Club for making me enjoy shopping in your store even better.

title: Instacart Shopper: Earn Money
description:
BE A HOUSEHOLD HERO
From families to seniors, make someone's day, every day by delivering groceries and everyday essentials when they need them the most.

FLEXIBILITY TO MEET YOUR NEEDS
Earn with Instacart while balancing work and life. Shop and/or deliver on your own schedule. 

CHOOSE YOUR PERSONAL PATH
Be your own boss or develop a career path as an employee — it’s up to you. Get started as a full-service shopper and shop and deliver fresh groceries to customers’ doors, or sign up as an in-store shopper and shop for groceries in-store, working with a great team and growing your career with Instacart.

GET PAID FAST
Get paid weekly. Full service shoppers cash out every day with Instant Cashout.
descriptionHTML:
BE A HOUSEHOLD HERO
From families to seniors, make someone's day, every day by delivering groceries and everyday essentials when they need them the most.

FLEXIBILITY TO MEET YOUR NEEDS
Earn with Instacart while balancing work and life. Shop and/or deliver on your own schedule.

CHOOSE YOUR PERSONAL PATH
Be your own boss or develop a career path as an employee — it’s up to you. Get started as a full-service shopper and shop and deliver fresh groceries to customers’ doors, or sign up as an in-store shopper and shop for groceries in-store, working with a great team and growing your career with Instacart.

GET PAID FAST
Get paid weekly. Full service shoppers cash out every day with Instant Cashout.
summary: Become an Instacart shopper. Make money shopping groceries in your spare time.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I've had to uninstall and reinstall this app so many times in hopes that something would be fixed. When it works, it's a great way to make some money (when bots aren't stealing the orders). But it RARELY works. For example, I'm in SF and visited Oakland a few days ago. Ever since, I'm only shown batches/orders in Oakland when my GPS should clearly tell them I'm no longer in Oakland, I'm in SF. There's too much miscommunication between Google Maps and this app. And tech support has never helped.

I don't know if it's the high volume of people now using the app but it rarely works properly, always connection issues I'm constantly refreshing and foreclosing the app. I used to get batch after batch, it was great! Now there's very little batches, batches 40 mins away or the batches come in faster than you can possibly grab them. Please fix these issues!!! I understand the system got hacked but still Instacart used to be great, now it's just a headache!

No support available when there is an issue. There are bugs with the app on a daily basis, but today they added a COVID questionnaire that has messed up the works. The COVID questionnaire is popping up when I try to view batches. I answer no and then click submit then an INCOMPLETE verify screen pops up. It doesn't show the complete paragraph and there is no button to verify my answers. There is no way to verify, and without verifying it won't let me get batches. I am stuck page with no help.

When it does work, it works... which is seldom as you use it throughout the day. Always crashes, freezes, or lags the farther you go into the store from the entrance. So technically, it is working at its own glacier pace. Help directory doesn't answer anyting and directs you to shoppers support. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE IN ANY COMPANY GUARANTEED. If issue is of any urgency or requires work on their part, plan to waste 45mins to 3 hrs.. just so they understand issue..if they don't disconnect first

App is a little glitchy at times... Sometimes I need to take multiple pictures of my drop offs n even then I'm not sure they go through? Also, there's no driver support except through email. Their phone number has been deactivated. Really? However, when you cash out...I got it within less than a minute to my debit card so that's awesome 👍

title: Kroger
description:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Kroger app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Kroger Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:

- Shop Pickup or Delivery right from the app!

- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your online order.

- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.

- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.

- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.

- Refill your Kroger Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.

- Check your fuel points.

- Use our locator to find the closest Kroger store or fuel center.

- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.

- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.

To use the Kroger app, you'll need a Kroger digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!

summary: Save with Kroger! Coupons, ads, rewards, find stores & shopping list in one app!
recentChanges:
We’re working around the clock to ensure our services and products are available to you. Here are some release highlights:

- March fuel points extended until May 31!
- Log in to your account with your Apple ID.
- Get paid to shop with Cash Back, our newest Way to Save!
- Temporary quantity restrictions displayed for certain high-demand products.

We value your feedback. If you need help or have a suggestion, please contact our Customer Service Center at 1-800-576-4377.
comments: Liked the old version better. The new version looks cleaner but I can't search by category. It was nice to select "produce" and be able to just scroll and pick what I need. Not to mention the possibility of upselling that they lose by taking away the ability to aimlessly browse. PLEASE BRING IT BACK

This update now requires extra taps to get to coupons. Pickup and delivery offers are still shown, even when they're supposed to be filtered out. When using the barcode scanner to find the price of an item, this latest update had turned the sound and vibration back on, I want a silent app. I do enjoy the dark mode.

Update 4/19 could login for a few days, now can't login again. Fix your app! I can login to the website no problem. Every time I open the app & go through the login process, it closes and comes back to the login screen. I even went through the process of uninstalling and re-downloading/installing the app - same problem. Please fix the app or roll back to the previous version -- this one has usability issues. As in you can't use it at all.

I have long used the Kroger app. It has improved over time and gotten better. The latest iteration is, however horrible. I have to log in each time I open it after getting an invalid credentials notice. Today it refused to recognize the password I have used for years and I was forced to create a new one. I finally managed to log in. I understand security, but that's silly.

Very convenient and easy to use! My only complaint is there is no ability to sort/filter items by price or sale. Maybe in the future, and it would also be nice if there was rating options so I can be influenced to buy less expensive or better brands

title: Lowe's
description:
Doing It Right for Less is Just a Tap Away.

HOME IMPROVEMENT AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

Whether you’re a Pro or a have a DIY project on your mind, you can search and shop thousands of products like kitchen appliances, paint, lumber, tools, outdoor power equipment, grills, outdoor furniture, flooring and more— anytime when you’re on the go. We’ve also included larger, zoomable images and 360° spins so you can see every last detail.

WHAT YOU NEED- FASTER

We have clearly marked aisle and bay information right on the list page, so you know right where to go when you’re in a store. Plus, check the “in-stock” box to only view items that are available for pick up. If it’s not there, no problem. Check other stores with just a tap.

STORE FINDER

Locate the store that’s nearest to you along with the phone number, address, directions and drive time estimates. Then, select your choice to get accurate inventory, product locations and pricing*.

*Remember to allow location services to get the most optimized experience possible.

WEEKLY DEALS

We’ve always got great deals. Check the weekly ad for your selected Lowe’s store right on your phone. View the flyer page by page or by department, it’s that easy.

CUSTOMER RATINGS AND REVIEWS

Read what others are saying. See reviews and star ratings for thousands of products. Plus, you can write your own reviews and upload images right in the Lowe’s app.

COMMUNITY Q & A

Before you buy, make sure a product is right for you. Ask questions and get answers directly from manufacturers or previous customers. You can also browse questions or answer ones for others.

FAVORITE LISTS

Add any product to your Saved Items List and never forget what you need again. Tap the heart on any product page, scan a barcode in the store, or add notes to your list—no sign in required.

CUSTOM WIDGETS

Access your Saved List or mylowes card from a custom widget to shop and checkout without having to open the app.

ORDER HISTORY & DIGITAL RECEIPTS

We make paper receipts a thing of the past. Search order history for specific items you’ve purchased and access entire transactions right on your phone.

ANDROID WEAR OPTIMIZED

Add your virtual mylowes card to your digital wallet and find your closest Lowe’s store. Keep track of your Saved List or start a new one by staying, “Hey Google, start a Saved List.”

Access your Saved List or mylowes card from a custom widget to shop and checkout without having to open the app.

ORDER HISTORY & DIGITAL RECEIPTS

We make paper receipts a thing of the past. Search order history for specific items you’ve purchased and access entire transactions right on your phone.

ANDROID WEAR OPTIMIZED

Add your virtual mylowes card to your digital wallet and find your closest Lowe’s store. Keep track of your Saved List or start a new one by staying, “Hey Google, start a Saved List.”
summary: Conveniently shop, locate stores, & manage your MyLowe’s account from anywhere.
recentChanges:
Enhanced Cart and Checkout
We’ve optimized our Cart and Checkout experience to be faster than ever, so you save more time. We’re rolling this out over time, so keep your eyes open for big Cart and Checkout changes!

Mobile Check In
Now, when you choose Store Pickup, you can let us know you’re headed to the store! We’ll be ready when you arrive to get you in and out, fast. We’re rolling this out over time as well.
comments: I like that the Lowe's app provides several images, offers a selection of other similar items and makes it easy for me to save the item(s) as I browse so I can go back in later if I don't have time to finish my virtual shopping. It's also nice that it lets me know where to find the item(s) in store in case I need to make a mad dash to pick something up immediately.

Ok look. You guys need to sort out your app. It does not work right with your login servers or something. If the app doesn't kick some kind of false error when logging in, it freaks out and forgets about the login info when trying to check out with a purchase. honestly do better to have the app act as a shortcut to your actual website rather than having a standalone app. I'm u installing and just using the browser for the foreseeable future. Supremely frustrating.

The backend developer team at Lowes sucks. Their regex checking sucks... I cannot believe that they limit my password size to 12 characters. That alone caused me more issues than anything else. It also kept erroring out saying my password was incorrect even when it was correct such that I had to reset my password each time, yet I couldn't use the same password as before. And to top it off, my purchase never reached the backend because of an "unknown error". I finally resolved to buying in-store.

The app and website both will not allow me to check out now. The app gets in a loop when I try to checkout and keeps asking me to log in and then sends me back to my cart where I again select checkout and it asks me to log in again... Repeat. The website just never completes when I get to the final order selection. I guess I will just have to order from Home Depot.

Couldn't check out. Added a bunch of stuff to the cart. Went to check out securely and it lost everything. It had me login again. Everything was there...fortunately. But when I tried again...no luck. What good is an app that won't let you purchase the items? Galaxy s7 phone... Should have just gone with Home Depot in the first place.

title: AliExpress - Smarter Shopping, Better Living
description:
Ever wanted to shop everything in one place, at one time? We’ve created just the app for you! With thousands of brands and millions of items at an incredible value, AliExpress is the go-to app for those in the know. 

Shop what’s new & now from home to health, tech to toys and sports to shoes (plus the hottest fashion around) every day. And, let’s not forget all our deals! From flash & super deals to coupons and more, you can get the best items at the best prices in a swipe.

There are countless reasons to love shopping on the AliExpress app but here are some of our favorites:

• Millions of trendy and unique items
• Easy Search – So you can find what you want quickly
• Image Search - Find what you're looking for easily and quickly using images. Take a picture of the item you want or upload a photo to find an exact match or items similar to what you're looking for.   
• Coupons, discounts, flash & super deals so you’ll always get the best price
• Free shipping on over 75% of our items
• Order management & automatic shipment notifications
• Buyer Protection on all your purchases
• Secure online payments
• Personalized feeds, with items picked especially for you

Language Support
We’re global, so our app is too! We support English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Bahasa Indonesian, Thai, Italian, German, French, Hebrew, Korean, Polish, Dutch, Arabic, Vietnamese, Japanese and Ukrainian.

Currency Support
Our app currently supports 8 different currencies for payment (Euros, US Dollars, Canadian Dollars, Australian Dollars, Japanese Yen, British Sterling, Russian Rubles and Swedish Krona), plus another 6 currencies for browsing (Brazilian Real, Indian Rupee, Ukrainian Hryvnia, Indonesia Rupiah, Mexican Peso and Turkish Lira).

Tell Us What You Think
Like us? Love us? Can't get enough of the AliExpress app? Let us know! We'd love to hear your thoughts. Plus, if you see any areas for improvement while using our app, tell us that, too! We take all feedback seriously and use it for constant improvement. Drop us a line in the app by tapping "More" then "App Suggestion".

developerAddress: NO.699 WANGSHANG ROAD,BINJIANG DISTRICT,HANGZHOU,ZHEJIANG,CHINA
recentChanges:
General improvements and bug fixes.
Thanks to everyone for all your great feedback and suggestions. Keep it coming! If you find a bug or an issue, then tell us about it. Remember to mention specifically what the problem is and where it happens.
comments: I love browsing on Ali Express. I only dock a star because I wish there was a better search, such as needing a way to exclude products with certain words. For instance: "MTB wheelset -disc" should return mountain bike wheel listings that don't mention disc brakes, but there is no way to do this on the app. Most modern search engines have more advanced features.

Unfortunately it's not possible to rate below one star ! This app is garbage, so complicated to use. I have been trying to add my bank card for weeks and it's still not working. My email was verified but any time I try to buy something aliexpress blocks the payment! Even when I tried to go through the security questions I couldn't submit?! Wait what !??? It seems to me that this app doesn't want my money. This is ridiculous. The easiest part in all apps is payment f*** option, here it's not. Bs

It displays a wide range of goods and products for your needs and offers good discounts during the sales season for most items. Communication responses with sellers are quick and fast for enquiries and clarifications Purchased items received without any problems so far. Reliable support team is very prompt in advising delivery status via email messages. The tracking system in the app is very useful re delivery status of the package.

The overall app experience seems good but sometimes when we are seeing any product and then click on back button and then again open that product it takes lot of time to load the proper page and the page does not get loaded despite of app restarting, and when we close the app from task manager and again open it then it works fine. This is the bug i am experiencing from the past few weeks. Hope the team will get it fixed soon.

I really like the fact that almost everything can be found and purchased here, but to those in Africa a lot of people want to buy but do not have the credit cards, so i think if you can integrate your payment system to include mobile money payments, it will not only make the end user comfortable but it will also make you maximise your sales.

title: Chewy - Where Pet Lovers Shop
description:
Chewy just made shopping for your pet easier. Swipe, slide and tap your way through 1000+ brands of your favorite pet food and supplies. Shop your favorites, manage your Autoship, track your order status, easily get access to our 24/7 pet experts, plus so much more. It’s everything you love about Chewy.com, now in a convenient app.

CHEWY.COM
• An easier, more convenient way to shop for your pet, online and on your smartphone
• More than 1000 top brands of pet food and supplies
• FREE 1–2 day shipping on orders over $49
• Prices you’ll love on your favorite pet food and supplies
• Friendly, knowledgeable customer service team available 24/7

AUTOSHIP
• Get pet food and supplies automatically shipped to your door
• Change or update your order anytime
• Easily change how often orders ship and cancel anytime
• Save an extra 5% on every shipment of select brands
• Sign up today and get additional savings off your first Autoship order

summary: Chewy - Where Pet Lovers Shop
recentChanges:
- Fleas, ticks, bugs -- no thanks. We comb through the app on the regular to check for snags in performance and keep things running smoothly!
- Got feedback? Give us a bark, meow or chirp! We'd love to hear it at app-feedback@chewy.com.
comments: I like this app, first time using it. I hope everything goes well. We shall see. I'm a little leary if putting my banking info out there, but in hopes of everything going smoothly we shall see! During this time with the current situation our country is facing I find it more convenient to shop online for my "kids", instead of having to go out. Plus, nearby stores DONT have certain things they need!!

Chewy makes it super easy for me to get what I need for my dog delivered right to my house (I live farther away from a pet store) They always have great deals on everything I'm looking for, better than what I can find at the store, and so many options and brands to pick from its easy to try out new things and find what my dog really likes. I also really reccomend using their RX if you have a dog that constantly takes medication (and they carry it)

It just seems so seamless when shopping online with CHEWY! So glad I discovered this app! It saves me the drive, plus, I don't have to worry about forgetting to pick up the dog food and running out! Can't tell you how many times my poor dog has run out, causing me to stumble out to a store at an inconvenient time.

My pets and I Love Chewy! It is affordable, and much easier then going to the store. I order my dog DJ's meds through them as well. And it is so much more convenient. My vet just receives a fax and my vet approves the prescription and I have his meds within a few days. I have 2 small dogs, 1 cat, and 3 birds. I have disabilities (PTSD) and it really helps alot because I don't like going to stores, or out either. So it really helps me alot. I recommend Chewy to everyone I know. Thank You Chewy!!

I love using this app. Because I have autoship orders, as soon as I open the app, I can see when my shipments are due to be processed. From there I can choose to ship immediately, postpone, or skip a shipment, or just leave it as is. I can also add to or delete an item from each shipment, as well as change payment info if needed. Finding what I need is also simple as is purchasing and checking out. This app makes the whole process easy.

title: Fetch Rewards: Shop, Snap, Win
description:
Fetch Rewards is shopping made more rewarding and waaay easier. That’s it. That’s what we do. Any questions?

Ok, ok, a little more about us: Fetch Rewards is a mobile savings and gift cards earning app that rewards you for the purchases you already make. Just snap pictures of your receipts to win gift cards and watch the rewards roll in. Life is complicated enough, so we do the legwork and bring the savings to you. No more cutting coupons and no long wait for rewards like with other shopping rewards apps. Just shop, scan, and save. It’s that easy (being the easiest way to save is kind of our thing). 

💅 Treat yo’self! Swap points for gift cards at hundreds of popular stores.🧖

With this shopping and gift cards app, shoppers can redeem their reward points right away. Go from scanning to saving money in seconds. Check back for weekly special offers and deals to earn extra points. You can earn Amazon gift cards and redeem points for rewards to pamper yourself as low as $3, so you’re not waiting to earn enough points to cash out. 

Trade points for a free cup of coffee, a night out, or a gift for someone. It’s up to you! Within seconds of scanning your receipts, you’ll have points in your account to swap for gift cards in your wallet. Redeem rewards for hundreds of gift cards to popular stores, including:

-- Target
-- Amazon
-- Walmart
-- Best Buy
-- Chipotle
-- Home Depot
-- CVS
-- Old Navy
-- Panera
-- and more

🛒 Shop smart. Fetch Rewards serves up rewards on groceries from any store (yes, we mean ANY)!

You’ll earn money back on your grocery shop every time you purchase one of thousands of participating products. You can submit grocery receipts from ANY store where you buy grocery and household items to win gift cards.

Save on the things you already buy, every time you buy them. No moving targets. 

Upload receipts from:

- Local grocery stores
- Chain grocery stores
- Liquor stores*
- Convenience stores
- Gas Stations
- Drugstores
- Big Box and Club Membership stores
- Pet stores
- Hardware stores

*Please note that discounts on alcohol are not available in states where it’s prohibited by law or for anyone under the age of 21

🤳 Grab your phone and snap a picture of any grocery receipt to earn free gift cards - fast and easy! 

Points are quite literally in your pocket. Get out your phone, take a pic of your grocery receipt, and you’ll instantly earn money on thousands of popular products. The more receipts you scan, the more grocery shopping rewards you earn, and the more money you save. Pretty sweet deal, right? No coupons necessary because Fetch Rewards automatically delivers those savings. Earn gift cards for big retailers like Amazon in an instant.

Didn’t get around to scanning your receipt right after shopping? No worries, you have up to 14 days AFTER the purchase date on the receipt to scan. Have a super long receipt? Don’t sweat it, you can upload multiple images per receipt. With the Fetch Rewards shopping app, it’s easy to earn money back on thousands of popular products.

🎮Level-up on your grocery shopping
In addition to offering quick and easy savings, the Fetch Rewards shopping app also features helpful tools to plan your grocery list, find inspiration for your next recipe, and track your grocery budget.

-- Shopping History - Track where you shop and how much you spend.
-- Shopping List - Build and manage your grocery list. Don’t forget essential ingredients again!
-- Recipe Inspiration - Want to cook something fancy for a special someone? Search our recipe library for thousands of recipes.
-- Digital Recipe Box - Save your favorite recipes to your digital recipe box and add the ingredients to your shopping list.

💰Download the Fetch Rewards savings app today to start earning rewards and winning gift cards immediately! Experience how easy it is to become a saving star. The quickest and easiest way to save money when you grocery shop
