recentChanges: Thought snapping receipts and getting rewards couldn't get any easier? Think again. This latest version offers smoother, faster receipt-processing so you can get to the good stuff (earning rewards!) sooner.
comments: Up until about 2-3 weeks ago I had ABSOLUTELY NO PROBLEMS at all with this app. All of a sudden I'm having nothing but trouble and problems after trouble and problems. It seems that this app is having problems reading my receipts and specifically the store and establishment names where there was NO PROBLEM before. And none of my recent receipts are from any different stores than what I was shopping at before . And EVERY ONE OF MY RECEIPTS ARE CLEAR AS A BELL AND COMPLETELY UNWRINKLED. Here it is

This app is fantastic! It wasn't hard to understand and its does everything so far in a timely manner! Plus it is fun. I try to go to a store and get as many items that are on the list as possible, I make it a game. What would be awesome though is to give us a game. Like on Inbox Dollars when u go to a store u can hit your scanner on your phone and they have specific things that u have to find and scan , for points, at the store, it's fun. And fetch should do that.

I love this app, simply scan your receipt from any grocery/gas station at any point within 2 weeks of purchase and you get points regardless of what you buy. Dont have an ads problem with it yet and it has not crashed at all in my first 3 weeks of using it. *(Only problem is that i wish there were more choices to earn big points other than the 1-n-done.) Because of this i think it deserves my 5 stars! Keep up the good work.

Great idea, and I thought it was fine at first. But now it constantly freezes, does not record full receipts. I finally just gave up. Will uninstall. Two months ago, I uninstalled this app. Got an email yesterday reminding me I had 2500 points to spend. Figured I'd give it another shot. Figured maybe with so many complaints about camera freezing up, maybe they took heed and fixed it. Nope! Just tried scanning a receipt. Kept freezing up. Uninstalling again, staying uninstalled.

app runs slowly 5/2/20 Update Still runs slowly. For what should take a few minutes to upload receipts, took 10+ minutes today. The camera paused or locked up 80% of the time, after going to another app and coming back, it paused on the splash screen. I had to do a force stop to recover. It burned 10% of my power in 10 minutes. Logout takes 4 taps plus a scroll. All of this time is not worth the minimal benefit for me. I will be uninstalling after reaching the next reward level.

title: Etsy: Buy Custom, Handmade, and Unique Goods
description:
Shop millions of one-of-a-kind items and find the perfect thing for you. With the Etsy app, you can easily explore our global marketplace of handmade, vintage, and creative goods. It features curated collections of inspiring gifts for him or her, unique wedding ideas, and handmade jewelry. And personalized recommendations for stylish jewelry, art, clothing, and furniture will also help you find exactly what you need (or really, really want). Join our 29+ million members around the world and get something that’s truly special. 
 
The whole world of Etsy is in the app:
- Save items and shops as favorites to revisit them later
- Get notified the minute an order ships
- Talk directly to shop owners to get all of your questions answered
- Explore curated recommendations tailored to your taste
- Check out swiftly and securely using our full suite of payment options, including Android Pay
- Discover upcoming events and nearby stores featuring Etsy sellers
- Now available in English, German, French, Dutch, Italian, Spanish, and Japanese

If you have an Etsy shop, our free Sell on Etsy app has all of the tools you need to manage your shop: process orders, add listings, view your shop stats and more.

Visit our support page: http://www.etsy.com/help/ 
Report problems with the app: https://www.etsy.com/teams/7720/bugs/discuss/ 
Get site status updates: http://etsystatus.com/ 

About Etsy
Etsy is a marketplace where people around the world connect to make, sell and buy unique goods. Our mission is to reimagine commerce in ways that build a more fulfilling and lasting world.

recentChanges:
Some additional polish, to make your Etsy experience even smoother.

Loving Etsy?
Share the love by giving us a review on the Play Store!

Having issues?
Visit etsy.com/help
comments: Honestly I prefer to just use my browser over the app. Ever since they tried to make the "create a label", what they called "easier", it's been a huge problem. Some customers need their item sent to a different address or the address is incomplete/wrong, however entering a new address is close to impossible. Not a problem if sending via FedEx. Also, it does not let you scroll down to delete more than 1 label. Please fix this!! It's very annoying.

When I need ANYTHING, I always shop ETSY first...& last (because their search system is easy & efficient!)! I not only find what I'm looking for, I end up with lots of choices & usually some new ideas! For over 15 years & I've always loved what I purchased...whether for a gift, my home, or myself! I'm disabled and bedridden...I don't "shop" anywhere else online! (Even before I became bedridden!) These shop owners make what they sell & give a very personal touch! I LOVE ETSY & YOU WILL TOO!😊

This is a site wide issue. I've tried to purchase things through the app and the website but when it comes to adding my card it says that the information is wrong or incomplete when its not. I know I'm not the only on that has had this issue so please resolve it... I'd like to be able support individuals and artist especially during these times.

Careful! This app doesn't do everything that you need to be able to do for your Etsy account. Its ealry 2000s vibes insists making key changes (postal address, cc nbs) on a "desktop" version, without telling you that that's the only way to do it. Very unfortunate. Made me lose two items. Thank God I love the sellers. Coz I certainly don't love the app.

The app was working perfectly fine before these recent updates and changes now shops are more difficult to search through thanks to everything being seperated and now i can no longer search shop lists or created lists it just shows my own every time instead. If something isn't broke you shouldn't try to fix it. There was nothing wrong with the previous format.

title: Best Buy
description:
Everything Best Buy, on the go. Find stores, deals, reviews and the lowest prices on the hottest tech.

See all the hottest deals.
Check out the Deal of the Day, our current Top Deals, special sale events and Best Buy Outlet finds, all in the app.  

Easy access to your My Best Buy® account.
Make updates to your account, check your rewards status, pay your credit card bill and more.

Ratings and 5-star reviews.
Find out what people are saying about a product before you buy. 

Identify the perfect TV for your space.
Use the app to test out which TV size fits your space with our new augmented reality (AR) feature. 

Keep us in the loop.
Use the app to let our Blue Shirts know when you’re on your way to pick up your order. And we’ll have it ready when you arrive. 

Account Services
Take advantage of up-to-the minute Geek Squad coverage information, repair order statuses and upcoming appointment reminders.

Scan while you shop.
Scan QR or bar codes to get product details and compare features while you shop.

Find your store.
Get store hours, locations and services. Or, browse products available near you.

Check out with Best Buy Pay.
Enjoy the easiest, most rewarding way to pay at Best Buy, exclusively for My Best Buy® Cardmembers.

summary: Learn, shop and save, all in one place.
recentChanges: This release includes bug fixes and other enhancements that improve the Best Buy shopping experience. Some users may see a new file storage permission. This is needed for PDF downloads for some of our service agreements. Thanks for shopping with us!
comments: App runs like hot garbage, the best buy splash screen does not go away even though everything in the background has loaded. Meaning if you tap randomly on the big blue best buy splash screen you can actually open the product links on the home page but you can't see the actual products. I don't know what's going on with best buy but right now is not the time to have a broken store app.

Online ordering and pickup worked really well. Pickup was surprisingly easy and quick. One thing I would recommend is making it a little easier to search and find results for other pickup locations. Unless I missed something, it just lists all nearby stores whether it has item in stock or not and you have to scroll through them to find one.

App now crashes every time I attempt to log in. Has worked flawlessly for years and I can still log in via browser just fine, so it's not on my end. Then again, with my GCU ending next month I think it's Best if I Buy elsewhere now and uninstall.

Its use to work real well now it crashes and freezes all the time im about to uninstall until they fix their network or whatever they need to do. I love the store itself but the app sucks right now of late.
New update as at 4/26/2020 doesn't work. It freezes on my phone. It used to work perfectly. Why update the app to make it worse? Please, fix it. Thanks.

recentChanges: We've updated our Weekly Ad design to help improve your browsing experience. We've also fixed a few bugs and made some performance improvements.
comments: How do you even create an account if the verification text comes in with the code, the app goes back to the beginning and then you have to request yet another phone verification code. You will never be able to enter the code, even with copy/paste if the app goes back to the Name Screen. After 11 tries, the best solution is uninstall and moving on. Eliminate that at the beginning and you may have more users.

It doesn't let you change your phone number if someone else had already registered it. Why can't they send you a confirmation text like every other app to confirm it's your #? Half of the products don't load images and it's very slow. Called customer support and the rep could barely speak English, put me on hold for 10 minutes and never asked me what my phone number was and could barely understand his English and then he went silent....this is absolutely ridiculous

Ive had all kinds of problems with this app so far. It tells me a certain location has an item in stock and i get there to find out that its not. They shopping list has been showing all items as zero and as of today i haven't been able to do anything at all on the whole app. fix quickly please

I can't even create an account. I go through all of these steps verify my phone number enter my email address and when I click on the last stepit just keeps coming up with an error saying sorry an unexpected error has occurred try again!

All coupons need to be available on the app and the website for both types of people who let's say, can only use the browser and not the app due to storage space. Tired of seeing certain coupons only available on the app. Not ok.

title: Walmart Grocery
description:
Now download the new Walmart App! Shop fresh groceries & millions of other items all in one app.   

Let us do the grocery shopping and delivery for you! 
 
Shop for groceries at the same low, in-store prices you’d get from your local Walmart with an online order. No mark-ups! Order groceries shipped direct to your home, including fresh produce, whole organic food items and market specialty products, from your device, and choose a pickup time that works for you. We’ll alert you when your order’s ready, reminding you to check in before you head to the store. We’ll even load your fresh groceries into your car. It couldn’t be more convenient. 

 
Are my options for grocery foods limited? 
 
Not at all! Shop Walmart to check off your whole weekly grocery list for market fresh produce, baked goods, quality meats and pantry staples – everything you’d expect from Walmart grocery stores. A trained associate hand selects the items from your grocery list order, and your groceries are kept in a temperature-controlled environment until pickup so your perishables are handled in a safe way.

What’s the cost? 
 
Pickup is a free service! Some locations offer Express options, for a small fee. Grocery delivery is also available in some areas, for a reasonable delivery service fee. Open a Walmart Credit Card and earn 3% cash back on all your purchases, or apply for your own prepaid credit card with our Walmart MoneyCard. 
 
 
Is pickup available to me? 
 
Search the nearest Walmart location, or enter your zip code to check availability. 
 
 
How does it work? 
 
Create an account, reserve a pickup or grocery delivery time that’s convenient for you and build your basket by shopping our wide selection of online groceries. Save your favorites for future orders – it’s so easy! We’ll alert you when your pickup order is ready. Use the app to check in, and we’ll have fresh groceries waiting to load into your car once you arrive. It’s like having your own Walmart personal shopper for online grocery shopping! 
 
Key features 

• Add items from the app and check out from another device 
• Browse aisles by department or search by brand or item type - find thousands of items, including fresh produce, baked goods, whole organic food items, market specialty products, fresh to order quality meats and pantry staples! 
• Fast reordering on your prime time items with "favorites" 
• Convenient pickup and delivery times. 
• No mark-ups or hidden fees 
 
Do Not Sell My Personal Information 
 
Please scroll down to the footer of our Privacy Policy below to find the "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link 
https://corporate.walmart.com/privacy-security

recentChanges:
• How fast would you like your groceries?
We're delivering express orders in as little as an hour to over a dozen American cities. Not fast enough? Pickup orders can be ready in 30 minutes!
• This version contains new features to allow customers to exercise their rights under the CCPA starting 1/1/2020.
comments: Useless. Half of the things I normally buy are in-store purchase only, for reasons nobody can really explain to me. God forbid I have preference for a brand-name item that I KNOW I can find in the store near my house - this app wants none of that. Walmart uses this app to push their in-store brands, and doesn't provide a complete selection, forcing you to go inside the location to get them. And if I have to go in the store anyway, there's really no point in using the app to begin with.

Works ok but is not clear that you've checked in. No button or anything to acknowledge my choices, not confirmation from the page I'm on. It does recognize you've arrived, but clicking that multiple times removes the selections I previously made, adding to the confusion. I did eventually see a notification that I had checked in successfully, but then I could not get it to go away until I restarted my phone.

I love this app because I've always avoided the stores even before the quarantine. So the people with the negative feedback as of late must not be considering the overhaul, I.e. crashes. And yes you HAVE to check out once you've reserved a time, it tells you that; there ARE other people waiting to do the same. My advice is to do pick up couples days in advance, that way you can reserve, add items over time and then check out the day before. Thank you Walmart! You have always made my life easier!

So frustrating! Trying to checkout but it keeps going in circles once I pick my payment method and checkout it goes right back to picking th payment method again. This is not the first time it has don't this. I have done everything short of uninstalling to fix this problem... Please fix it

This used to be a wonderful app. For the last 3 weeks app is crashing, cant add items, can't schedule a pick up, if I am lucky enough to get a time slot it will not let me cash out then I lose my time slot bc I only have an hour to check out and it will not let me! Orders that i have been able to pick up, the pickup process is a joke. App crashes when you get to the store, associated do not know when you are there. Have never been able to check into parking spot #. Very disappointed lately.

title: Joom. Stay at home.
description:
Shop deals and save on thousands of fashion accessories, clothes, and lifestyle products and get FREE delivery - with Joom. From low price accessories for the home, jewelry or even a special gift, we add brand new offers every day! 

Browse products like womens clothing, fashion, jewelry, fashion accessories and more! We have all the low price offers you need. You don’t even need to register to save money when you buy products, plus delivery is absolutely FREE! Shop deals on low price fashion and join the discounted fun today! 

Shopping that’s fast, fun, FREE and made for you! And this is how it works: 

• Buy products and other low price fashion items with FREE worldwide delivery - wherever you are you’ll never be hit with hidden costs
• Jewelry, womens clothing, gift ideas and more! Choose from thousands of low price offers that we add to every day
• From clothes to jewelry to car accessories, collect points every time you buy products or buy offers - that means you can shop and save even more!
• Browse products and read reviews - see real customer views and rate products yourself so you know you’re always shopping for the best
• Shopping for low price accessories, gift ideas or simply want to buy products for yourself? Create your own customized feed by following other accounts and save on low price fashion and low price accessories

Browse products and buy offers easily with Joom. You can shop deals from categories like men's fashion accessories, womens clothing, low price accessories and more. Or simply search whatever you’re looking for from our huge list and then check real reviews before you buy offers. Discover new clothes, gift ideas and shop deals all based on your most recent buys - it couldn’t be more simple! 

YOU CAN EVEN PLAY GAMES FOR A CHANCE TO WIN AN ADDITIONAL DISCOUNT ON LOW PRICE FASHION PRODUCTS AND OTHER SELECTED ITEMS! 

Joom only features qualified sellers with high-quality products. We want you to be totally happy when you buy offers from us, so if you change your mind and want your money back, Joom will give you a full refund.

Browse products, get shopping and save - download Joom for FREE now!

comments: Great items for sale. Some are brilliant quality items. Fun items like a raffle type game that you can purchase something for 10p or guess the price where you can get discount on top of the reasonable prices. Just be aware that the items are being posted from China or thereabouts so you have to wait for delivery, which considering they don't charge for is something you don't mind too much. If there is a problem with an item they are brilliant at refunds so win win.

Great prices. Always delivered so far. You just need to pay a bit more attention to the wording/pictured objects as sometimes they are (mostly unintentionally) misleading, like they show you a picture of 6 of the same item but you are actually paying for 1 item only.

I like what they have and the prices, but sadly, a lot of the stuff is for smaller sizes. Theres a few for bigger/curvy folks, but hardly enough to let me keep the app as a lot of the stuff I liked was only about 100/124cm bust size. If you're petit, then this app is amazing for you.
So far so good ,love the way they keep you updated,love that you can pretty much find everything that you need ,that you cant always find on ebay
Great app! Made a couple of purchases. My items arrived when it said they would on time with no damage and I am happy with it.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: This app used to be great. It was the first inexpensive shopping experience I've had with an app. The new format is not great. I think they need more categories. They really should include the shipping in the price. And I am sick of getting notifications every 20 minutes about a product I was interested in. I'm sure there is a setting I can change, but I'm deleting the app which is much easier.

Common sense is the name of the game here. Obviously look at the description of the item, check the shipping (most of the items are free shipping but some items do the whole "$1 item with $30 shipping"), make sure you check other sources to find the best price, note that shipping is a 1-2 month span. That's all I can think of. Like other people say, it's mostly Wish trinkets like dog tags and rings. They have a phone or two that gets bid up the ass but that's it. Recap: Research = Save time/muns

Love this app!! I am disabled...I can spend several hours a day going thru the items available to bid on. At least it gives me something to do for awhile and I can bid on and win some pretty awesome things LOL!! Plus, most things ship free. This app is a win win!!

This app is appaling. Ive used it for a while, if the item dosnt arrive you have to wait 60 days before they can refund you. Credit dissapears from the account itself, mines dissapeared so many times and if a items not arrived correctly then if you want to refund, they will send you the credit to post back in tophatter credit which you cant even use. So you have to pay the postage back to. Please save your self ... i wish they would fix these issues and stop taking money from tophatter credit

It is fun to find things that you wouldn't normally have thought of or would have found anywhere else. The orders arrive quickly and sometimes you can get extremely good deals with quality items that you wouldn't normally be able to afford. Seems like everyday there are different products so it makes it exciting to browse and you look forward to visiting it from day to day!

title: BJ's Wholesale Club
description:
The BJ’s App has everything you need to make the most of your Membership. Enter In-Club Mode when you visit a Club to access that location’s helpful mobile features.
 
•	Add-to-Card Coupons
o	Browse and add coupons directly to your Membership Card (no scissors required). Your clipped savings will be applied automatically at checkout.
 
•	BJ's Gas® 
o	Check BJ's Gas regular and premium gas prices for any location -- so you can pump up the savings and fill up for less.
 
•	Find-a-Club
o	Get directions, Club hours, Club features, BJ’s Tire Center hours and Optical Department information for the Club nearest you.
 
•	 Deli Pre-Order
o	Pre-order BJ’s deli items and platters straight from the app. (Available in select clubs only.)
 
•	Free In-Club Pickup
o	Let us do the shopping for you. Place an order for pickup in just 2 hours.*
 
•	ExpressPay
o	No need to wait in a checkout line. Easily shop, scan your item’s barcode, pay within the app, and go! (Available in select clubs only.)
 
•	BJ’s Stocked
o	Get select items shipped to your home in 2 days with BJ’s Stocked.
 
•	Same-Day Delivery
o	Get Same-Day Grocery Delivery on select items in as little as 2 hours.
 
•	Featured Recipes
o	Browse recipes, view videos, shop ingredients and add them directly to your Same-Day Delivery cart.
 
•	Reload
o	View the products you've recently purchased in-Club or via Same-Day Delivery and easily Reload them to your cart. 
 
•	Access Membership Information
o	One-click access to all your Membership details, My Rewards, order history, track challenges or scan your Membership card. 

*Orders placed 2 hours prior to Club closing or later will be available our next business day. Visit BJs.com/PickUp for details.

recentChanges: New barcode search mode tool allows you to scan an item and view that item’s product image, name, and any star reviews associated with that item. You will also be able to view applicable BJ’s Smart Saver recipes and offers available for that item on screen while your camera is active. Members can experience an easier shopping experience with minor bug fixes.

title: ROSEGAL-Shopping Fashion & Clothing
description:
With RoseGal app, you can shop any merchandise you like at anytime and anywhere. You can also interact with over 10,000,000+ fans to share your shopping experience. Keep your fingers on the pulse & gain inexpensive products.

Main features about RoseGal app:
 - App exclusive deals price: single product up to $5 off
 - New users gift: first order 10% off coupon and 20 R points for downloading Rosegal app and register
- Order bonus: 10% off coupon will be given for each paid order
- Style Gallery: share your shopping experience, win opportunity to get up to 500 R points (worth 10 US dollars )
 - Check-in activity: sign in to get 10 R points per day. Sign in consecutively to win 500 R points (worth US$ 10) and US$ 5 cash coupon
- App-Only product: some products are only available on app
 
Key facts about RoseGal:
 - Fast FREE flat rate shipping worldwide
 - Over 200+ daily new arrivals
- 7/24 after-sales customer service and live chat service
 - Ultra-low-priced products, the average product price is less than US$20

Whether you are looking for a perfect outfit for a date, a casual look in your daily life or a vintage style to show yourself, RoseGal online shop, a fast growing global online fashion store, can offer you hundreds of styles of the best Women’s and Men's fashion, plus size, dresses, swimwear, bikini, tops, American flag, lingerie, leggings, bras, underwear, shoes, sandals, flats, led shoes, hair, bags, hats, beauty, sunglasses, watches, jewelry, keyring, rings, earrings, body jewelry, Men’s clothing, shorts, shirts, pants, jeans, blazers, tie dye, and so on to choose from, even a home decor or a fidget spinner to create a warm home atmosphere. With thousands of iconic styles, vintage clothing, and affordable product lines, we are confident you will find your unique fashion product to add to your wardrobe. Choose an outfit you like, not just one that fits your budget.
RoseGal provides all users with more cost-effective goods. Download our app and become our user, RoseGal will impress you!

Choose an outfit you like, not just one that fits your budget.
RoseGal provides all users with more cost-effective goods. Download our app and become our user, RoseGal will impress you!

comments: I am new to this app. But added cuz I love the website. All my items so far have been true to size. Be sure you always check the measurements, before you choose the size... and i haven't hadany issues with deals as long as you also read the fine print, most deals are limited time.
New to app, but love the clothes on the website! It is always so hard to find cute clothes in my size, and this site has so many! Made my first order today, we shall see how it goes! So excited!
Love the clothes sometimes the size is a hit and miss but most of the time its right on.
So much variety at a great price, lots of discount opportunities. Easy to navigate well organized app!

Get useless messages on promotions early hours of the morning. Messages all day every day on promotions you cannot even get plus the items are not as pictured. Not as nice. Not as described and never NEVER get a return address you get a voucher of 0.05 % of your purchase. Do not download this app you will be disapoitnted

title: DealDash: Bid, Save, Win & Shop Deals and Auctions
description:
Top 5 reasons to download the app & save money with Deal Dash

1) Save up to 99% on your favorite brands & products
2) Win Electronics, Gift Cards, Home Items, Jewelry, Beauty, Apparel, Holiday Vacation Stays, Tools and more
3) Always free shipping, no reserve prices
4) Only brand new items with original manufacturer’s warranty
5) Everything sells from DealDash or trusted partner stock - untrusted third party sellers are NOT allowed to sell on DealDash

Bid & save on online auctions for warehouse deals, closeout auctions, manufacturer stock, overstock surplus, wholesale offers and more.

Upcoming featured Auctions:

Apple iPhone X 256 GB Model
KitchenAid Mixers
Apple Macbooks
PlayStation 4 (PS4) Bundles
Gift Cards to Walmart, Target and more
… plus tens of thousands of other auctions every month!

DealDash has been in business for soon 10 years, selling top name brands at deeply discounted prices.

We serve more than 15,000,000 registered shoppers and hold an A+ Rating at the Better Business Bureau.

How Does DealDash Work?

1. Browse Auctions - All items sold on DealDash are brand new and come with manufacturer warranties. DealDash works directly with leading retailers and brands and sells items from their own or their trusted partners' warehouse stock.

2. Buy Bids - Bids allow you to participate in the auctions that enable you to save money on best-selling brand name items. You’re can purchase bids in a variety of different pack sizes. Bids can be usually purchased for less than $0.20 each.

3. Start Bidding - All auctions start at $0.00. Each bid placed adds one penny to the final price of the item. Each bid restarts the timer to 10 seconds to allow a chance for someone else to place a bid. All items are guaranteed to sell! There are never reserve prices and the items can go for as low as 99% off.

4. Win & Save Up to 99% - When no more bids are placed, the last bidder wins the auction. The winner gets the item for the discounted price and shipping is always FREE. Just like in a regular auction with no reserves, the excitement comes from the fact that any bid can be the last one!

5. What Happens If You Don’t Win? - Don’t worry! When you don’t win you can get all your bids back if you buy the item at its ‘Buy It Now & Get Your Bids Back’ price listed in the auction.

DealDash has been featured in the Financial Times, CNBC, Huffington Post and holds the highest A+ Rating at the Better Business Bureau.

Need any help with our Auctions? We’re happy to help 7 days a week! 

Get in touch with our customer service team by writing to community@dealdash.com.

00100 Helsinki, Finland
recentChanges: Internal improvements. Happy bidding!
comments: I have played on Deal Dash for over 10 years and have experienced many good and bad matters. First the good... I have won many items and enjoyed playing because playing helped me relax and manage my PTSD. It gave me the opportunity to share many items with family, friends and others in need, especially those serving in the military. I have stayed true to the policy of not selling the things I have won and have NEVER accepted a penny for anything I have won. I must also commend the customer support department, it is one of the best I have every experienced with any company. Th the credit of Deal Dash they offer a wide variety of items for the players to choose from. Now the bad... Being a player for such a long time, I've been able to see the site evolve and unfortunately one major problem are players that prevent others from winning more of the better prizes and bully those who dare to challenge them while playing. It's a matter the company should vest more time to resolve or at least set up game changes to prevent the poor actions of a few discourage others from playing. I'm willing to assist if asked for positive input. Another sour note is team playing and while it isn't as obvious to many players, being a long timer I know those that do so. And like most things in life you got good and bad. In spite of these issues I still will rate the company with 5 stars because as said earlier it's helped me help many others and has been worth every penny spent.

It's not free.. first off you gotta buy bids.. then you gotta bid like 30 or 40 bids on ONE item.. IFF you're lucky to win something... you pre-bid on something and so is EVERYONE else.. chances are, someone else wins and if you do win, let it be known its going to be so much more than you're hoping to pay!! All I have to say.. you're buying more bids than what you win.. If there's a ton of people that want the same item, there's no point because theres always someone who prebid more than u

Needs more variety of products, and be able to buy as many bids as we like, for instance,,, if we want 2 bids, a 300 bid package, or 72 bids,, we should be able to buy as many as we like...(and from one business owner to another,, the lower amount of bids someone buys, the higher price they are).. example: 299 bids and below are 29 cents, 300 is 13 cents each, 301 to 499 are 24 cents each, 500 is 12 cents each, etc etc.... thank you dealdash!!!!

DO NOT INSTALL!! This takes your money without giving anything. It is probably the worst app out there. There are "bots" that bet so you never win and only waste your money. I wish I never fell into this trap. DONT DO IT.

The bids are too expensive, some of the items were great, except the jewelry and homemade items, aside from the junk, most of the items used to be worth trying to win, unfortunately that's why I won't be coming back.

title: thredUP | Shop & Sell Women’s & Kids’ Clothing
description:
thredUP isn't your typical thrift store, they're the best shopping app for buying & selling women's and kids' clothes! Get up to 50% off your first thredUP order today and enjoy:
🛍️Over 35,000 brands, from Gap to Gucci. 
💸Up to 90% off est. retail.
😱1,000+ arrivals EVERY DAY. 
🌎Guilt-free sustainable shopping.
👌Easy returns & free shipping with orders over $79.
💳Payment via Paypal, Google Pay, Affirm, and credit card.

🛒SHOP UP TO 90% OFF
You'll never buy retail again. Score womenswear, accessories, maternity, and kids' clothing from your fave brands for way, way less. thredUP offers high-quality secondhand clothes from Free People, Madewell, Anthropologie, Coach, Nike, Lululemon, Zara, Nordstrom Rack, Louis Vuitton, and MORE! 

✨SELL YOUR CLOTHES
thredUP's Clean Out service is hands down the EASIEST way to sell or donate your clothes. thredUP does ALL the work, YOU get cash or credit. Here's how it works:
1. Order a Clean Out Kit or FREE shipping label on thredUP's selling app 
2. Fill a bag with pre-loved clothes and send it back. 
3. Relax! We inspect, photograph, list, and ship items for you.

🌎CHOOSE USED FOR THE PLANET
There's enough amazing clothes on the planet, let's wear them. To date, thredUP has upcycled over 100M items so far and they're just getting started. Join thredUP's community of fashion lovers who are committed to a more sustainable future by giving clothes a second life! 

💬THE BUZZ ABOUT US
"The App for the Responsible Shopper" - Elle
"The Easiest Way To Practice Sustainable Fashion" - Forbes
"Your favorite brands at a crazy reduced price." - Seventeen

FROM SHOPPERS LIKE YOU
★★★★ "I just started using thredUP, and I'm absolutely addicted. The selection is HUUUGE, the prices are SUPER reasonable, as are the shipping rates (I'm looking at you, Poshmark)." - Jenna G. 
★★★★ "This is where I get 95% of my clothes from. Not Your Daughter Jean's, Splendid, Lululemon Athletica, they have a great selection of high end brands for such a great deal." - Alexandra S. 
★★★★ "I’ve been buying and selling with thredUP for over two years. As an eco-conscious, budget-friendly, fashion enthusiast this is the best digital option for buying ‘used’ clothes from a company. Compared to PoshMark or eBay, I have much more confidence in the quality of clothes I buy with thredUp since they go through inspections AND they have a great return policy! Win-win." - K.M.A
★★★★ "The ease of using this app was mindblowing! I set the filters to the category, sizes, styles, and even sale percentages! And up pops whatever matches what I chose!" - Adell H. 
★★★★ "love love love this app. it always works and I love sending my clothes here to sell. it's such an easy process. and you can use your credit to buy more clothes. perfect!" - Melissa Z. 
★★★★ “I refuse to spend full price on name brand clothes for my kids. With jeans costing 50-80$ a pair there’s just no way I’d spend that on a pair of pants they’ll probably grow out of in a few months. The clothes I find on thredUP are such great quality and great prices. Love the variety.” -  jen-loves-brad

title: Walgreens
description:
Pharmacy & Health
- Refill prescriptions in seconds by scanning your barcode
- Manage your medications with Pill Reminder*
- Set friendly Rx Alerts for refills and pickups
- Skip the waiting room with a video chat via Live Doctor Consultation**
- Easily refill and check prescription status for you and your family

Photo
- Print photos right from your device, Facebook, Instagram and more
- Create personalized folded photo cards
- Customize décor items including canvas prints and magnets
- Enjoy Same Day Pickup on tons of great photo products

Savings & Rewards
- Browse the Weekly Ad anytime, anywhere
- Clip coupons and save instantly at checkout with Balance® Rewards
- Track your Balance® Rewards points*** and save at the register
- Earn Balance Rewards for healthy choices®

Shopping
- Shop products at home or on the go 
- Find your nearest Walgreens with Store Locator
- Use in store to save while you shop

Wondering why we have certain permissions? Mystery solved!
- Location: Find nearby stores and enable In-Store Savings
- Storage: Access photos stored on your device that you want to print or share
- Camera: Take photos and to use features that require scanning
- Flashlight: Enhance the lighting in scanning features
- Control vibration: Indicate that a scan is complete 
- Microphone: Speak to a doctor in Live Doctor Consultation 
- Prevent phone from sleeping: Keep screen from dimming during a Live Doctor 
Consultation
- Change audio settings: Control the volume during a Live Doctor Consultation
- Bluetooth: See relevant deals, get quick access to your Balance® Rewards account and more

The Walgreens App is free to download, but specified rates from your wireless provider and other fees as noted in your Walgreens account agreement(s) still apply.

* Pill Reminder only available on phone
**Available in select states
*** Due to state and federal laws, points cannot be earned on some items. Points will not be awarded to anyone who currently is or was at any time in the 6 months prior to purchasing Pharmacy Items covered by Medicare, Medicaid, Tricare or any other government-funded healthcare program. Pharmacy Items must be purchased at participating Walgreens Drugstore, Rxpress, Duane Reade, or Walgreens Pharmacy locations ("Participating Stores") to earn points. Excludes Pharmacy Items purchased from AR, NJ or NY pharmacies and prescriptions transferred to a Participating Store located in AL, MS, OR or PR. See Balance Rewards terms and conditions for full details.

Bug fixes and performance enhancements
Questions? Comments? We want to hear them! http://bit.ly/1QhIUbv
comments: This app has more issues than any other I use on a regular basis. It rarely works like it's supposed to. Lots of delays and errors and telling me to try again later. It's infuriating. I have a family of 7 with several medically complex people on multiple meds, so I need this app almost daily. If it worked, it would be great, but as it is, I really DISLIKE it.

Sometimes it works for checking and submitting my prescription refills and sometimes not, I have a lot of problems with it, and it has nothing to do with my phone. I have a new phone, I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app and still have the same issues with it, all my other apps on my phone work perfectly, not this one, I have called their customer service of course they couldn't do anything, very frustrated with this. UPDATE-I CALLED YOUR PHONE # THEY WERE NO HELP!!!

Awful update, can't use it anymore. I log in, check - yes, I have a preferred store set in my profile, go, choose a bunch of photos, wait wait wait for them to load... Then the app wants to use my location to find a store for me, only, it won't. It is stuck there. I have photos to print, got a recommendation?

This app has problems and so does Walgreens! 6 months ago I received a new prescription for Xanax. The app asked ME if I wanted to put it on auto refill so I chose to use it. For 6 months it filled it automatically. Every month it filled it early. At the end of 6 months I had 10 extra pills. Then it locked me out when I called the pharmacy they were No help. I didn't need anything I just wanted to see if the new prescription was still on auto fill. They told me This drug can't be on auto fill?

This app keeps logging you off and then you can't log back in. The verification process doesn't work and you have to uninstall and reinstall the app. Despite this problem being reported multiple times, Walgreens won't fix it. All they do is reply with pat answers ("Oh no. We are so sorry...). Despite the convenience the app provides, it becoming almost unusable.

title: Amazon Assistant
description:
Amazon Assistant helps you make better decisions wherever you shop online by comparing products from Amazon as you shop on retailer websites. Keep an eye out for product and price comparisons that can save you time and money.

* 11/9 Added support for Chrome on all Android phones and tablets with OS 6.0 or greater!

Features: 

- Product Comparison: discover related Amazon offers as you shop on retailer websites from the following browsers: Chrome, Samsung Internet and Dolphin. 

- Image Search: share images of products and barcodes with the Amazon Assistant app to compare prices and check availability. You can share images from browsers, photo galleries, and other apps. 

- Recent Finds: launch the app to view recently matched Amazon offers.

By installing you are agreeing to the Conditions of Use located at www.amazon.com/gp/BIT/TOU.

This app uses Accessibility services.

comments: The app permissions are always modified without my permission. For this reason, i deactivate it. Help keep my device secure, do not open the gate. Jesse E
Great app for assisting with shopping needs!
SUCKS!!! It tells me to add my browser (Chrome), But when I TRIED to add it (turn on permissions) for Chrome....NOTTA!! NOTHING!!! ZIPPITY DO FREAKING DA FREAKING 'A'!!!!!
Great shortcut to shop at Amazon. The Assitant browse any product same as the website or app.
Its really been a pleasure to even have this technology especially where it can help you do all sorts of cool stuff.

title: Costco Wholesale
description:
The Costco Mobile App is the easiest way to save time and money on the go. We've completely re-thought our mobile app and made it easier for members to access the incredible values found only at Costco.

• New! Your membership card is now available on the Costco app. Enter the warehouse and begin checkout at the register by using the Digital Membership Card on your phone.

• SAVINGS: With the Costco Mobile App you'll always have the latest warehouse savings right on your device.

• SHOP: Members can shop Costco.com’s unique, expanded selection, offering thousands of items not found at your local warehouse, delivered straight to your door.

• WAREHOUSE INFO: See details about your nearest Costco including hours of operation and holiday hours, and navigate straight to the warehouse.

• SHOPPING LIST: Keep track of the items you want to pick up on your next trip to Costco.

• PHOTOS: Order prints, wall décor or photo gifts anywhere, anytime. 

• PHARMACY: Order prescription refills & check status on prescriptions. Get refill reminders, track your medications, manage family accounts, transfer prescriptions, and find a Costco pharmacy.

• FEEDBACK: Costco is always looking for ways to improve your experience.  Tap Feedback and tell us what you think of our mobile app, website or warehouse.

recentChanges: - Bug fixes and performance enhancements
comments: It doesn't seem to do much :-( I guess it's still being developed. One can't place an order for pick up with the app, nor can we add items to our shopping list while browsing. Actually the app's shopping list seems to be completely different from the website one I have on my computer. If it says an item is $5 off I can't tell if that's a coupon I need to save for later, an automatic saving in the store for which I don't need the app, or am I supposed to just show the ad during checkout?

We happen to have both Sam's and Costco right now. Compared to its competitor Sam's Club: 1. Doesn't support scan and go. This has been a big relief at Sam's. No queues baby. 2. Can' find in the app the items available in the club. We bought naan several times at the C but this can't be found in the app. While I thought S doesn't carry it I found it in the app. Guess I need to look at the shelf more closely next time.

When it works, it's relatively useful. More often than not, app requires a sign in to display the member card, but never accept the sign in. I have to delete & reinstall it in order to get the member card to display. I'm on my 5th reinstall to work around this annoying glitch. I think carrying a physical card might be a tad bit easier. Costco should be embarrassed to have this released with this problem.

App has lots of bugs that haven't been fixed with any updates. Will sign you out every time you go out of app, even if still running in background. So you have to sign back in every time which will leave you on a different page than what you were on. Also unable to buy or renew memberships on app or website. Keeps giving error. Called customer service and still hasn't been fixed. I'm trying to give you money and you won't let me

The only good part of the app is the digital membership card. To the people not able to login: make sure you change region to your country. It defaults to US and will not allow you to login. The app is kinda stupid for doing this and not making it clear. I had to turn on location and then set a home Wearhouse, then it offered me the region change.

title: Poshmark - Buy & Sell Fashion
description:
Poshmark is the leading marketplace to buy and sell fashion.

***Shop over 5,000 brands in every size—including plus size, petites and juniors— at up to 70% off retail
***Sell and turn your closet into cash. List your items for free!

Poshmark is the #1 online consignment solution to to sell your unwanted clothing and buy new things you love, providing an alternative to consignment stores that only offer pennies on the dollar. 1 in 50 American women have their closets open for sale on Poshmark—you could be next!

PARTY
Party on the go, no matter where you are! Join the thousands of women who come together every day to participate in our themed virtual Posh Parties. You can browse, buy, and even list with your friends. With a wide variety of themes and brands, there's a Posh Party for everyone!

comments: On top of the high fees they can't seem to get a better update on uploading more than one photo and cropping. It's stupid to go through the trouble of creating a whole new listing to provide extra photos. Now I'm adding the fact that I have to wait 3 hours to press ship on an item to protect the buyer from an "accidental purchase" 3 hours to be able to ship an item?!! That's insane!! Why not ask the buyer upon making purchase if it's even an accidental purchase if not they can proceed to buy?!

WOW. I have never been this happy to have my opinion proven wrong! My first experience with this app (which was colored by some neg reviews and comments) wasn't great, but once I made the decision to buckle down and do it right (e.g. get to know the app, take lots of good pics, price things reasonably, etc.) I was really, truly blown away by how GREAT this app is!! I've used a half dozen other sites, but I sold more on Poshmark in the first 24 hours than I've sold over the past MONTH! Luv it!

Love this app and site!! I've been looking for some very specific items, and found them right away on Posh! Also like that they have items other than clothing and shoes. My Go-To site for first check of something I'm looking for (sometimes even before Amazon!! 🙊).

I really like poshmark! It took me a while to figure out how the bundles and shipping worked, but I have already gotten a couple of great deals! This is way better than Kijiji, Letgo and a lot of the other selling sites!

I love this app! Great deals on designer, vintage or handmade items & clothing. Use the code GROOVYGLAM to get $10.00 credit when you sign up. Easy to list if you want to sell. You can make good money if you are active. No listing fee to sellers but 20% commission fee once an item sells. The return policy is fair to sellers and buyers. Worst issue is customer service doesn't have a direct phone line & you have to email them for issues. They usually respond within 24hrs.

title: Klarna | Smoooth shopping
description:
SHOP NOW. PAY LATER.
In the Klarna app, you can choose to pay later in 4 installments, interest-free. This gives you the chance to get what you love now and make your payments more manageable over time. It also allows you to try before you buy and make hassle-free returns, without taking money out of your pocket in the meantime.

SHOP MORE, GET MORE.
The more you use the option to pay later in 4 installments with Klarna and pay back on time, the more purchasing power you unlock. As well as exclusive deals and offers, of course!

ACCESS THE BEST DEALS AND DROPS.
Never pay too much for the stuff you love again. In the Klarna app you can find weekly deals and discounts for thousands of different products. The deals tab will always update as soon as another deal from our retailer network goes live.

SHOP EVERYWHERE IN ONE APP.
The Klarna app gives you a better way to discover, browse, and shop the stuff you love. Whether you’re looking for fashion, furniture or home electronics, you can check out any online merchant in our one-stop shopping portal and choose to pay later in 4 interest-free transactions. Use your debit or credit card or your bank account.

CREATE WISH LISTS.
Keep track of what you love. Browse online stores, pin your favorites, and share your saved items with friends. All in one app.

GET PRICE DROP ALERTS.
Never pay full price again. When you set up price-drop notifications in our app, you’ll be the first to know when your favorite products go on sale.

ALL YOUR ORDERS IN ONE PLACE.
Love being organized? When you shop with Klarna, you get a complete overview of all your purchases, invoices and payments.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something through our app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after your order has been placed.

SOME OF OUR PARTNERS.
Amazon, Walmart, Foot Locker, Target, Macys, Nike, Ticketmaster, Best Buy, Shein, Nordstrom, Sephora, H&M, American Eagle, ASOS, Wayfair, Finish Line and Forever 21, Overstock, Wing, Dish, Indigo, PC, Aurora, Lenovo, Riptide, Sonos, Element, Givenchy, Gravity, Muse, Togos, Tomorrow, Godspeed, Kylia, Mar, Mood, Onewheel, Pangea, Plank, Precision, Puffy, Snooze, Black Crows, Crumble, Idle, Molecule, Wacom, Adirondack.

STAY SAFE.
Shopping for bargains is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login is as simple as it is secure – with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN. We are at your service in our chat in the app.

Try smoooth shopping in the Klarna app. It’s a game changer.

recentChanges:
All your shopping in one app. We have tweaked some details and made smoooth improvements on already smart features. Turn on automatic updates and you will never miss the latest and smooothest version.

Problems? No problems.
Our in-app chat is always open. We solve your problems 24/7.
comments: I made one purchase and paid it off in one payment. I tried to make another purchase and I couldn't. Uninstalled appt and then reinstalled it. Tried to make another purchase and it said my spending limit was 90$. I tried to make a purchase for 56$ and it said my ghost card was not approved. I heard good things about this app from my daughter. I will be deleting today and deal with afterpay. I never had a problem with afterpay and I usually pay everything off after 2 weeks. I'm done.

Honestly, I used klarna for a TV and TV stand almost 8 months ago. It worked very well and after I paid for it. I try to create another ghost for purchase recently and it didn't work. This wasn't the first time. Updated the app and Uninstall and install the app. This is super annoying. I refer to this app to my sister earlier when I got my TV. She tried it and paid all the payments on time even she can't get a ghost card. This is stupid. I'll stick to afterpay. Ppl don't try this app.

After less than a year of good use of this app, I had to delete it. It may have had a bug or a virus that contaminated my main phone, leading to fac reset, and buying a new device altogether due to damage. Upon using it on a different device and getting a similar outcome leading to another device getting contaminated, I had to delete it again. Rumor is that the company is closing, so i'm guessing that's the reason for these lack of dev maintenance.

I've made already several successful purchases through out the year in many amounts in the same website. All of a sudden it's declining as well as saying the address is different than on my card when I never changed anything. Credit is fine and everything for the soft pull. Customer service only copy's and pastes whats already on the site. No emotion, pure laziness. They wanted me to screenshot them the issue even though you can't because of security policy. What a complete Joke.

Check credit score still ok. Lots of purchases paid them back minus one. Not sure if a knew automated system but its faulty and glitch. Based on other people post same problem same response from Klarna we are having problem with automated system . We haven't in the past. What is really going on? All good things come to end time to delete app. I just had to purchase my product . It was good while it lasted. As stated in will not even qualify me for what system say I'm eligible for. Its cool.

title: DHgate - online wholesale stores
description:
The DHgate shopping app allows free access to the DHgate wholesale marketplace on the go – connecting you directly to wholesale sellers and getting you cheap prices.

The DHgate app provides one-stop solution for your online purchasing, from international logistics and payment, to internet finance and customer services. DHgate app features over a million Chinese wholesalers, 40 million products for sale and has amassed 10 million buyers from 230 countries and regions.

We provide cost effective all-in-one solution for your business. We enable anyone to buy and sell products in wholesale price globally by providing secure payment services, logistics solutions, escrow protection services, and internet financing.

With a variety of over 20 million products in categories ranging from electronics to wedding dresses and from cosmetics to furniture – you’ll never miss what you’re looking for. Simply tell the app whether you’re buying for wholesale or personal use, choose your favorite categories and receive personalized discounts and recommendations.

DHgate Shopping APP Features:
• Secure, organized and reliable mobile platform.
• Shop directly from sellers and enjoy lower-than-retail prices.
• Check daily deals to find new discount products every day.
• Make purchases individually or in bulk (for additional discounts).
• Filter and customize to find the perfect product.
• Get smart product recommendations based on preferences and browsing history.
• Read customer reviews for insight on any product.
• Pay using innovative and easy payment options.
• Ship using worldwide delivery on most products.
• Scan QR codes to jump straight to a product’s page.
• Shop at the $1.99 store for the best discounts.
• Join the VIP club to receive exclusive benefits including 24/7 customer support and more.
• Redeem seasonal promotions for coupons on all your favorite seasonal items.

Whether you’re an entrepreneur making a bottom line or just a savvy consumer looking for the best deals, the DHgate app offers the value you need at the prices you want.

Quick Facts for DHgate Shopping APP
• Approximately 1.2 million sellers globally
• 10 million enterprise and individual buyers from over 230 countries and regions 
• 33 million wholesale and retail product listingsA transaction every 3 seconds
• Multilingual Sales: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish


Download DHgate app and discover the best prices on clothes, electronics, shoes and more!"

recentChanges: 1. Bug fixed.
comments: I've been trying to search for things and the actual department will show up and then the search results show nothing. Getting frustrated. But if I need a mask the app makes sure to show me millions of results.... Oy. I'm going to try to use the site online and see if there's a difference. 🤦🏼‍♀️

The bug is fixed and the app no longer randomly closes. But since then I ran into an issue with a seller not sending out my package that I had bought way before this covid 19 situation and dh gate has done nothing to resolve the issue. I'm finding that they don't really seem to care about the customer. They are seriously one of the worst companies to work with when it comes to getting a refund back.

New Update: It seems the developers finally managed to fix app. Updated review: The developer pushed a "fix" that has now made this app useless. It used to crash so much that I didn't think it could get any worse. Apparently the developer took that as a challenge and managed to make it completely useless now. This app crashes within 30 seconds of opening it and continues in a reboot - crash cycle until you close it down. Helen Keller out for a Sunday drive would crash less than this app does.

Basically a shopping mall made up of dozens of different sellers, happy with about 75 to 80 percent of my purchases, but their customer service is somewhat robotic and unhelpful dealing with issues, plus frustratingly unable or unwilling to communicate directly with sellers. Bit of a language barrier. Beware tracking info. It is not always accurate.

They must hire 10 year olds to develop their app. I just wasted 45 minutes of my life trying to figure out how to add a different credit card so I could purchase their item. You would think it would be under the title "My Credit Cards," but nope, you have to delete the card you have, go in and try to purchase the item at which point since there is no card, it will then ask you for credit card information. What is absolute waste of time.

comments: Love this app! It's affordable and lots of new stuff each week. Really cute items of clothing and my favorite is the home/stationary items along with the bags and shoes! All super trendy, affordable and cute. It does take a little bit for shipping about 14 days but that's better than a lot of other websites.

Great App. Beautiful collection, colorful and easy to navigate interface, and reliable shipping. Could go without the points, shipping is a little lengthy, and the sizes are different for most clothes, but the prices are nice enough to make me overlook those downsides lol. Would and have recommended in real life.

Wowww this app is amazing. I downloaded Shein before I found ROMWE and now all I use is ROMWE. I love their clothes selection, and wow! The design of the app is so aesthetic with the colours palette and I love how they portray the clothes. Also, the prices are so affordable. Also shipping is pretty fast!! Cant wait to get my summer clothes from here. The only problem I had is that it wouldn't register my school email for the student discount but thats really it! Thanks for the quality clothes :)

I love this app! It works great at delivering good quality stuff. I've never personally ordered anything other than clothing and a necklace, so I'm not sure how well shoes, bags, or other things ship, but from my clothing experience, they should ship well. I would DEFINITELY recommend this app! The stuff usually arrives within about three weeks and is in tip-top shape. The prices are very good, and I feel comfortable shopping online with this app.

Where do I even begin! This app is amazing! There is a variety of options and picks outfits or items based on previously bought items! And the prices are so affordable, I couldn't ask for anything more! I cant say this enough this app is truly amazing!!

title: Ibotta: Cash Back Savings, Rewards & Coupons App
description:
Ibotta is a free app that gives you real cash back on every purchase, online or in-store. Earn cash
back every time you shop for essentials, groceries and more. Join Ibotta today and get a $20
welcome bonus!

Save money with Ibotta: simply check the app before you shop to seamlessly earn cash back on
thousands of leading brands and retailers, including grocery stores and online retailers. No
coupon, rebate, or promo codes are necessary, so you can shop for the things you need without
hassle.

Earn cash back instantly with our new Pay with Ibotta feature. Shop and use Pay with Ibotta to pay
for your purchases right from the app, then earn cash back on your entire purchase, instantly.

Ibotta isn’t your average coupon app. You can earn real cash whenever you go shopping, no
matter what you need or why. Unlike most coupon apps, Ibotta lets you grow your savings — shop
for essentials at your local grocery store or shop online to treat yourself and you'll see cash back
in your account.

Money-saving is easy when you get rewarded with cash back every time you shop, no matter how
your lifestyle changes. Download the free app now to earn a $20 welcome bonus and start saving.


HOW IBOTTA WORKS:
1. Find money-saving offers – Before you go shopping, find and add offers in the app for things
you want to buy.
2. Go shopping – Shop at your local stores, online, and on apps
3. Redeem offers – Upload your receipt or link your loyalty card for instant cash back.
4. Get cash back – Watch your savings grow! When you’re ready, withdraw your cash earnings via
PayPal or your choice of a variety of gift cards.
Ibotta is the easiest way to save money every time you shop.


WHY IBOTTA?
- Our money-saving app is free and easy to use
- No coupons, mail-in rebates, or promo codes
- Save money and earn real cash back
- Earn cash rewards at over 500,000 brands and retailers


SAVE MONEY WITH IBOTTA
- Our average user earns $150+ a year by using Ibotta
- Earn cash back on every shopping trip
- Without cutting coupons, you can find grocery deals to earn cash back at your favorite
supermarkets, and grocery stores.
- Ibotta helps you save money for all the things that matter, from family expenses to daily essentials.


MONEY SAVING OFFERS AT ALL YOUR FAVORITE STORES:
- Walmart
- Uber
- Safeway
- Drizly
- Hotels.com
- CVS
- Target
- Kroger
- DoorDash

recentChanges: Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.
comments: Used to be good, especially when they linked your loyalty card and purchases were automatically registered. Now that's over and half the time even if you have a qualified purchase, the app refuses to recognize the barcode. Waste of time Update: Just got an email threat to start charging an "account maintenance fee" if I don't cancel my account or start using it again. Unreal. Stay far away from this company.

Was good but going downhill. For the past 2 days, the app has been crashing on startup (Android). So I can't even use it. The choices in coupons lately have been substandard in my opinion. Also, I wish they're was an option to upload online orders and get credit. With Coronavirus, I've mostly been shopping online. If I was a new user, I'd score the app 1 star but because it performed well for me in the past, I gave it 3 stars.

I have been using this app for several years. I enjoy it. I probably get about $100/ year in rebates; more then any other rebate or points app I've ever used. That being said, it is the biggest pain in the neck. It constantly freezes or won't open and you have to log in from a mobile device. I don't think I've ever received a valid response to an issue from customer service. It's very annoying at times.

It's rare to find coupons for any of the products that I normally purchase. I'm certainly not going to buy products I don't normally buy just because there's a coupon for it. Lately, this app has refused to open. I see the intro screen, and then a black screen. I keep closing all apps, reopening it, and seeing the black screen. This app is becoming increasingly frustrating and not worth my time.

It's great, but sometimes will not work when you want to pay for your items for example at Walmart. When I was out of state l tried to pay "in store" at many approved sites and the app did not work. You lose out on that cash when that happens. Also I wish it would let you scan the receipt from all stores. If my husband goes to Fareway for example, he doesn't want to mess with the app etc, so it would be nice to be able to scan the receipt at home.

title: JOANN - Shopping & Crafts
description:
Shop in the app, join our rewards program, shop the weekly ad, get coupons and personalized deals, or browse thousands of projects for inspiration. Express your creativity & share your own DIY projects. 

FIND YOUR HAPPY PLACE

SHOP WITH EASE
* Browse and search thousands of products
* Get product details
* Scan product barcodes
* Ship to your home or pick up in store

GET REWARDS CRAFTED JUST FOR YOU
* Enjoy our free JOANN Smiles program and we'll send you personalized rewards, coupons and offers.
* Present and scan your JOANN Smiles Reward code barcode at checkout to track your purchases and earn more rewards.
* Take advantage of bonus discount days, birthday rewards, and other special surprises along the way.

SAVE MONEY
* Receive exclusive, app only coupons to use in-store or online
* Browse and shop weekly ads. Now, view weekly ads with pinch and zoom.

FIND AND SHARE INSPIRATION
* Browse projects or create your own how-to project to share with the #handmadewithjoann community.
* Share your Story with the Joann community. Explain how and why you live a handmade life.
* Create your own shopping list and begin your next project
Browse our class catalog to learn something new

JOANN is the nation’s leading fabric and craft retailer with a great product selection, knowledgeable customer service, and class offerings for all ages. Download the latest JOANN app and be part of a community of people who love to make things with their hands, hearts and minds.

recentChanges:
Be sure to select your home store location to stay updated on store hours and important information to make buying online and picking up in-store purchases easier.

comments: Apps alright. Deals are good. Only complaint is the email list frequency for ads when you sign up. I get emails daily sometimes 2x a day. When signing up it automatically sets your email to this OVERKILL amount of advertising. Its ridiculous and unnecessary. I shouldn't have to go into settings just to adjust amount of emails to decent level. Emails everday multiple times a day is uncalled for and boardline harassment.

Really needs improvement. While it tells you items are in stock the reality is they are not to many items get canceled in orders because the app takes to long to update with current stock numbers. There needs to be a way for customers to cancel orders and not have to wait 4 days of not picking up the order. Claiming money in accounts are on hold is a lie, I always get charged for items that are canceled and have to go into a store to get a refund. Processing and filling orders takes way to long.

I have successfully used this app and then recently 5/2, it just keeps shutting down when going to items in cart and checkout. Couldn't order, missed discount! The search engine is a pain and many functions don't work properly in trying to navigate (wish list & others) and not being able to use this app during store closure is most frustrating. Shopping takes forever when you can't see whats at your local store for free pickup. Lots of great fabrics but not available locally or online. SAD!

As much as I love JoAnn, this app is the definition of glitch. It is always down. The checkout buttons and features are usually broken. I have several items in my cart and I can't even press the "proceed to check" button. I have 20 items in my shopping cart and it says my subtotal is $0 with a $3 discount being applied. What????!! I also have to search very hard to locate items because basic keywords do not match up. I could go on. Several updates need to be made

Overall works fairly well. When ordering online, however, leaves something to be desired. You can't always tell what's really available and putting items in the cart sometimes takes a long time before you realize the warehouse is out of what you want. Or, when you are looking for a specific thread (like serger cone threads) the "computer" doesn't know what you mean. Then you are on a wild goose chase trying to figure out how to communicate your need. So, not s five.

title: VENUS: Unique Women's Clothing & Swimwear App
description:
The VENUS app offers quick and easy online shopping options where you can find new fashion that empowers and inspires your everyday style. From fashion basics and beyond, we offer a wide variety of unique clothing and swimwear styles designed with you in mind. We believe in the beauty of individuality and expressing yourself, so go ahead and get that outfit you’ve been eyeing – it’s your style, your rules!

Shop women’s fashion faves, from one-of-a-kind tops to jumpsuits, dresses, swimwear and more, you’ll feel comfortable and confident in all season long!

Best part? You don’t even have to leave home, and your shopping experience will be fast and easy – and full of style inspiration.

Download the VENUS app today, and be first in line to browse all our new products, collections, and sales.

What’s in store when shopping the VENUS app:

Easy Online Shopping: Fast and easy search to find your favorite products

Secure Payment Options: Your information’s safe with us

Always On Updates: Don't miss out on new products, big sales, or promotions

Style Inspiration: New trends and outfit inspo delivered straight to your mobile device

Like the VENUS app?

We’d love to hear feedback on your shopping experience! Let us know by leaving a rating.

Anything we can change?

We are always improving our app and want to know what we could change to provide a better shopping experience for you.

Please send an email with your suggestion to: android@venus.com

---------------------------------------------------------

More about VENUS:

VENUS is a women's clothing retailer specializing in fashion and swimwear. We strive to create, uncover and design fashion & swimwear experiences that get you noticed.

It may be that dress you can't take your eyes off.

It could be the swimsuit that makes you finally feel ready for the beach.

Or, it might be a pair of shoes that tops off your weekend look.

No matter what it is or how it moves you, we know that it matters.

At VENUS, we believe style is empowering.

It can get you noticed for a look that’s uniquely yours. Set the tempo for your day. Help you conquer the task. Make you feel your best. And your best is what we want to bring out. We celebrate what makes you you by creating collections that reflect the trends and our times.

By helping you tell your story through fashion, swimwear, and accessories that are unique, unexpected, and inspiring to people around you. And while we believe our styles, accessories, and collections are one of a kind, we know that they only shine because of you.

Happy Shopping
VENUS

comments: Other than the brutal lagginess, the only other major flaw I perpetually run into is that every time I add an item to my wish list, it sends me directly to my wishlist. It ought to simply add it without taking me to another page. (Because hitting the back button is a nightmare also and sends you back to the top of the category list you were looking at.)

Easy to use, better than the website. One thing that would frustrated me on the website was if I clicked on an item to view, when it was time to click back it would not save my place and I would have to start from the top again. I have not experienced that in the App at all.. Thank goodness.

I haven't figured out how to move an item from my "cart/bag" to my "favorites/wish list"...is that a thing? Or do I have to just delete it from the cart and add it to the list? This is my only issue. I love the website and the app makes shopping way to easy!😄👍

Very thorough. This app gives me no issues!! Get on hits logo, do what I need to do, if I'm going to purchase it I click on it and has a code and I never have a problem with it codes, it tracks it for you couldn't be better! Very satisfied
I love these styles! It's a got a little of every kind of style you love to look for!

title: Box Tops for Education™
description:
No more clipping. No more sending Box Tops to school. All you need is your phone. With the Box Tops for Education app, you can turn your everyday receipts into cash for your school. Here’s how:

 - BUY the Box Tops products you already know and love
 - SCAN your receipt so that your Box Tops purchases are recognized
 - EARN cash for your school, based on your eligible purchases

Twice a year, your school will receive a check and can use that cash to buy whatever it needs!

Super-charge your earnings with special bonus offers shown in the app. No need to pre-select or opt-in for these bonus offers, and you can stack as many as you like. Just buy the eligible products, scan your receipt, and watch the earnings stack up!

And, in case you didn’t already know, here are some of the many Box Tops products that are probably already in your pantry: Cheerios®, Lucky Charms®, Cinnamon Toast Crunch®, Nature Valley®, Totino’s®, Old El Paso ®, Annie’s®, Yoplait®, Fiber One®, Chex®, Paper Mate®, Nestlé® Pure Life®, Lysol®, Boise® and more. Just look for the Box Tops label on the package. For a complete list of participating products, visit BTFE.com.

Psssst, just one last tip for you. Still seeing the traditional Box Tops clips on products you’ve bought? Most participating brands are allowing you to “double dip” by clipping unexpired traditional Box Tops to send to school AND scanning your receipt for double earnings!

Over the last 23 years, more than 70,000 K-8 schools across the U.S. have earned over $913 million through the Box Tops for Education program. With the new Box Tops app, you can be a part of the next evolution of the program – strengthening our schools for generations to come.
