title: Afterpay - Shop Now, Pay Later
description:
Buy what you want today, get it today, make four equal payments every 2 weeks. The Afterpay app makes it easier than ever to shop and pay with Afterpay.

MANAGE YOUR ORDERS AND MAKE PAYMENTS
View all your current and past Afterpay orders, payments and payment history. Make your payments directly in the app quickly and simply!

FIND RETAILERS 
Visit the Store Directory to browse all the latest stores and get shopping inspiration.
descriptionHTML:
Buy what you want today, get it today, make four equal payments every 2 weeks. The Afterpay app makes it easier than ever to shop and pay with Afterpay.

MANAGE YOUR ORDERS AND MAKE PAYMENTS
View all your current and past Afterpay orders, payments and payment history. Make your payments directly in the app quickly and simply!

FIND RETAILERS
Visit the Store Directory to browse all the latest stores and get shopping inspiration.
summary:
Life doesn’t wait, Afterpay It!
Shop Now. Enjoy Now. Pay it in 4.
recentChanges:
Thanks for using the Afterpay app! We’re always improving it, make sure you update regularly.

Loving it? Please let us know by leaving us a review in the Google Play Store!

In this release:
- We have had to update some parts of the app, which means that the app is only supported on devices running Android 4.4 and above.
- We've fixed some minor visual issues.
comments: Loved it at first. Super simple and really convenient. I made about 5 orders, all under 20 dollars, through Afterpay and paid them all off on time. Then one day my order was declined. I reached out and got nothing but generic responses. Basically they'll just cut off your spending with no explanation. I don't know what the logic is but it's ridiculous, and customer service is full of excuses and attitude.

I really enjoy the simplicity of this app. I have seen more complex apps that have more issues running all the features. I have yet to run into any problems and the organization of the app is easy to navigate. I do wish that the categories for online retailers were able to be broken down to what you're searching for and hopefully as it grows there will be some way to incorporate items.

I love this app and have been using it for a while - probably too much lol. However, my recent experience was upsetting and I'm ready to uninstall this app. I made an online purchase to a retailer who only offers store credit for online returns - that part I don't mind. I still had 2 payments left and even though I returned the item & no longer have it in my possession at all, I'm still on the hook for those payments. NOWHERE is that expressed on Afterpay's website - very deceiving!!!

Love this convenient way to pay. Uses your credit card to spread the payments over several weeks or months. You don't owe interest if you don't miss the small payment.. Very convenient for small purchases.. I really like this and they let you know days in advance when payments are due...

Afterpay is a fantastic idea! I am so glad it is here, and I am able to use it. I don't have the best of credit, Plus I don't like using credit cards, so this really helps me out. I am a just and blown away that there is no charge for this! There's only a charge if you don't pay your payments on time. And I love that there is no penalty for early pay off. And I love that I get my items right away, I don't have to wait until it's paid off. Thank you so much afterpay, for texting reminders!

title: Boost Perks
description: Boost Perks gives you access to special deals, exclusive perks and chances to win one-of-a-kind experiences—and it’s all included as part of your Boost service.
descriptionHTML: Boost Perks gives you access to special deals, exclusive perks and chances to win one-of-a-kind experiences—and it’s all included as part of your Boost service.
summary: Boost Perks gives you access to special deals, exclusive perks, and more.
developerAddress:
6200 Sprint Parkway
Overland Park, KS 66251
recentChanges: Internal updates
comments: Been with boost for over 7 years. With 2 small stints of other carriers i always came back for convenience, quality and super great service from the local stores. They are always finding solutions to my problems b4 it's a serious issue. Way to go sprint! To the other carrier users... I know where I'm at, where you at?!?!

Unable to access - keep getting message " this is not a valid phone number". This is only one of the issues I have been having, along with the phone itself (discontinued galaxy refine). Spent over a week offline after the last tower update... they kept saying the towers were still down. Finally found a boost store that had a service rep who knew how to 'fix' the J7 issue -- not recognized as a valid phone on the network. He had 'fixed' over 12 other J7 refines that day.

I love being with Boost I've been a loyal customer for years sinces 1999 when I had my first phone. And that was a Nokia phone when I had to buy prepaid cards to activate my phone now it total different. Boost mobile has been everygood to me and the serves has been great for me all these year never complained a it or anything.

Good amount of perks. But I'm still so angry with Boost as a customer service company that I am seeing RED. I LOVE THE phone I bought but I didn't get any deals. The local service Rep wiped out over half of my Cloud saved photos while transferring them and by the hand of God I can't figure out how in the hell he could have done that unless it was purposely. In one month here in Houston I traveled to 7 different satellite stores and was met by the exact type of person Male or female after
Love it easy to navigate, and i can do everything, i mean i can change my plan or pay my bill i can even check my usage on data.. Love love it..

comments: Seems ok but i dont know of theres any way to actually view how this works. Is it actually free? Do I.... or can I.... stack up points or whatever im rewarded with? Again not sure how it works. If we pay the bill on time and full amount and no issues... is that how it works? What do you actually get and how would it stack of it does? I just logged in and got a $5 gift card. Can i expected to get more and if so.. how?

It's great when it works! For the longest time I never had any rewards even when I knew they were available. They just didn't show up for me. I finally decided to uninstall and reinstall the app and it finally worked! I was able to redeem a reward without any issues. Yay!

Check the app about twice a month to see if they have a free movie rental on Fandango or a this month was a 5$ Amazon gift card. There are lots of discounts on specific sites and products and usually a free sweepstakes that you never win. It's okay but these rewards are not at all competitive with t mobiles rewards.

Dont bother! The cashback rewards offers do not result in cashback. I have 2 offers I have been waiting for for 6 months...merchants say it is not their responsibility...Sprint Rewards customer service doesnt take/return calls. Big waste of time!! The response from Sprint re: the cash back redemption is true however my review was about the amount of time and effort it has taken getting the actual cash back in the Rewards account...

My Sprint Rewards is absolutely awesome. There are some really cool rewards every month I can always look forward to. Some cool new surprises too! It's a great incentive to join Sprint in addition to their service.

comments: No contact for issue. Delivered 1/2 order; the rest "processing" for days.Targeted ship date passed, no notification. Attempted contact result: weird text system, uses alphabetical symbols to navigate. Response: We're currently experiencing unusually high messaging volume...try again later. Got through, waited hours for reply, then: Thank you for your patience. Our business hours have ended for the day. We will return at 9 AM ET. We will respond as quickly as possible tomorrow. Nothing today.
This app is horrible. It doesn't allow you to edit/enter or delete a credit card. I'm so furiously frustrated with this. I would give it negative stars if I could.

Editing information. I can't edit my payment information and cust. Serv. Closed due to Covid19. And, text messages looks to be automated, not an actual person. This is really stressing me out. Where's the help.

Impossible to navigate to even the most basic of categories. You have to use their dumb categories of "rustic" or "traditional". You can't just see office chairs. At best, you can see office chairs that are "New arrivals". Giving up and using the website.
Had to log back in every time I opened the app. Couldn't buy anything with the app. Kept saying there were problems. Turned around and bout the items on Amazon and deleted app. Waste of storage

title: Victoria’s Secret
description:
Welcome to the Victoria's Secret app. Your on-the-go destination for all things sexy.

NEW! GET A FREE PANTY WITH PURCHASE
It’s our way of saying hello! Just sign in & tap Offers, if you’re a new subscriber.

GET INSIDE ACCESS
The Victoria’s Secret app brings you exclusive Angel moments, sneak peeks & the scoop on in-store events, plus behind-the-scenes access to the Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show.

EFFORTLESS SHOPPING, NOW WITH YOUR DIGITAL WALLET
We’ve made it easier than ever to manage your Gift & E-Gift Cards and save all your in-store & online offers in one place.

NEVER MISS AN OFFER
Access the latest in-store & online offers—anytime, anywhere. Plus, get first dibs on exclusive, app-only deals.

summary: The Sexiest Bras, Lingerie & Fashion
recentChanges:
We want our app to work better & faster for you, so we're updating it as often as possible. Check back regularly for more fixes & features, including app-exclusive offers!

If you love what you see, rate us! Any Q's? Tap on Customer Service under our MORE tab.
comments: Haven't used the app in awhile, and logging in today I see there's no longer a 'love' list? Am I just not seeing it or did it really disappear? When I spend online, it's typically a very large order (seasonal shopper.) It takes a couple of days to get my shopping bag together and the love list really helps organize my entire purchase. Please bring it back or let me know where it's moved to. Thanks!

I like the app but it constantly closes and then I lose everything in my cart. Makes me not want to purchase because I have to re-add every single item to my cart every 10 minutes. I had 13 items in my cart and had to re-add twice and lost it again. I was almost done with check out when the app closed and I lost everything. I'm not even ordering anymore at this point cause I'm tired of searching the same items again and again.
It's still primarily just a shortcut to the website, but they've improved the pages refreshing every time you leave the app! 🙂 So that's nice. Ah. And bring back the love list!
The app doesn't let you lock your phone or navigate to another app without losing your search. If you've applied filters and you're three pages into a list of items, good luck finding your way back

Definitely agree that the love list should come back. I never give feedback. It's that important. Almost every website has it you can make different collections in certain websites. We just want one list. One for clothes and one for beauty items would be nice but I'll take anything.

title: CVS/pharmacy
description:
Staying healthy. Saving time. Spending less. The CVS Pharmacy® app makes them all easier. Here’s how:  

Checking out. Easier.
•	Save with ExtraCare® and pick up prescriptions with a single scan (just tap “Show Card”).
•	Enjoy 1-tap Rx checkout after the first time you prepay for your prescription.

Saving money. Easier.
•	Get app-only deals and access all of your offers and rewards when you link your ExtraCare® card. 
•	Make sure you never miss a deal by opting in to notifications. Get photo and prescription updates too. 
•	Plan out your shopping and saving with the weekly ad for your local store.

Getting prescriptions. Easier. 
•	Pay for your medications and have them delivered.
•	Prepay for your prescriptions then show your barcode for more private pickup. (Turn landscape to sign.)
•	Order refills, check their status and see your prescription history.
•	Check drug interactions and information. 

Caring for your health. Easier. 
•	Video chat with a health care provider 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
•	Find nearby MinuteClinic® for general care and clinical services.  
•	View wait times and schedule a clinic visit (restrictions apply). 
•	Check available health care services and insurance coverage.

Printing photos. Easier. 
•	Order prints and more from your device and online albums for same-day pickup (select stores and products).  

To access all of these great features, please be sure your device is running the latest OS. We support Android versions 5.0 and higher. 

Please note: Continued use of GPS running in background can decrease battery life.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and Minor Performance Improvements
comments: Used to be a great app. Now you can't check store availability for any products. When checking what products are available for a coupon, I'll scroll then get to the point where I can't see more and it's just timing out. Oh and tried multiple times to filter by price and it WOULD NOT do it. Applied it over and over, hoping I'd be able to see products I want. But app has previous issue. Was hoping that if it's going to stop scrolling, at least I won't be seeing the $40 face creams.

Login problem. Tried using finger scanner and inputting password manually, and neither worked. I keep getting a 'Server down' message. ALSO: Google Play Protect window keeps popping up. At first got a message informing me that CVS app was protected. I wasn't sure if that was causing my login issue, so I disabled it. Now every time I relaunch the CVS app, that Play Protect window pops up asking me if I want to enable it. I even deleted/reinstalled the CVS app. Still no change. VERY frustrating.

I only use this app to order refills. That being said, the pharmacy part of this app is the only part I have knowledge about. In the regards it works perfect. I can see when my meds are next due for refill, refill them from the app, and then get notified when they're filled so I can pick them up.

Awkward UI. If the app is telling me my login session is expired, the next thing the app should do is go to the login page. Sometimes I feel like this app is giving me a run around! When I'm looking at the details for a prescription, if I navigate back it should bring me to where I was last, not to the top of the list of prescriptions. Try harder please!

Photo app frustrating, I spent a lot of time choosing the photos I wanted to pick to print. this took forever because the uploaded photos don't actually show you have to click them one by one to decide if it's a photo you want. I added them to the cart and the app crashed losing everything I did. I gave it benefit of the doubt and while I was annoyed decide to try again this time it crashed before even getting to the cart. What a waste of time I might as well go to Walgreens at this point.

title: Kohl's - Online Shopping Deals, Coupons & Rewards
description:
Get online shopping deals, discounts and rewards with the Kohl’s app! From fashion to beauty, home furniture, clothing, shoes, electronics and more, you can access amazing shopping deals and manage your Kohl’s account on the go.
 
Discounts, coupons and rewards make the Kohl’s app your go-to online shopping tool. It’s packed with features to help you find the best deals, manage payments easily, and browse online and in store. 
 
Here are 5 reasons users love our online shopping app: 
 
1. Kohl’s Wallet – all offers, rewards and coupons in one place!
2. Shop online or in store – use the app as a price scanner, or browse deals on the go.
3.Kohl's Pay - We're giving you a simpler checkout with all your offers & Kohl's Cash loaded into one QR code.
4. Shopping deals on everything - Beauty, home, clothing, shoes, furniture, electronics & more!
5. Kohl’s Cash reminders- We’ll remind you when your rewards are about to expire, so you never miss a deal again.
 
And there’s more! With FREE SHIPPING, amazing shopping deals and FREE STORE PICKUP, the Kohl’s app helps you shop with ease – and save money!
 
Our features include:
 
KOHL’S WALLET 
 
Save some serious money with Kohl’s Wallet. It keeps all your rewards, coupons, discounts, and offers in one place – no more paper and no more forgetting! Plus, we’ll remind you to use them before they expire, so you don’t miss out!
 
SHOP ONLINE OR IN STORE
 
 
Shop your local store’s inventory, or use the app in store as a price scanner. Can’t find what you’re looking for in store? Buy it on the app while you’re in store and get FREE shipping.
 
KOHL'S PAY
 
Kohl's Pay is now quicker and easier. Quickly select all your coupons, discounts, savings offers, rewards and Kohl's Cash to load into a single scan QR code and breeze through checkout.
 
MY KOHL'S CHARGE
 
Payments just got a lot easier. The app keeps you signed in so you can quickly and easily check your Kohl's Charge balance and make payments.
 
SHOP KOHL’S AMAZING RANGE
 
From furniture to beauty, clothing, shoes, home and electronics, you can shop everything and more on the Kohl’s app! 
 
YES2YOU REWARDS
 
Track your points and progress toward your next $5 reward.
 
Download the Kohl’s app today and discover our huge range of fantastic products and amazing deals. From beauty to furniture, fashion and toys, you’ll be sure to find something you love at an awesome price!

recentChanges: We're always improving things behind the scenes to give you the best Kohl's App experience possible.
comments: The app is overall good but it is missing a huge feature. SAVE FOR LATER or FAVORITES...I find a lot of things that I want to purchase but cant afford to purchase all at once so I have to just hope I can remember them or find them next time. There has been more times than I can count that I have had tons of stuff in my cart but couldn't afford it all so I had to go in and remove every item out of my cart except for the one I was buying at that moment. Please add that feature

Downloaded it a day or two ago, did some shopping and went to checkout today. When I clicked on my cart to check out, it just shows a blank white page no matter what I do. It shows the number of items but nothing else. Cool...guess I'll uninstall the app and try again. It was great and easy to use until I couldn't check out.

I dislike this app so much! Everytime I attempt to use it whether it's for shopping or paying my Kohl's charge it makes me create an all new password. I can't begin to tell you how annoying that is! I know user error is a real thing, but that isn't the case here because I write the password down on my notepad on my phone and update it each time I have to change it. It really should be much easier and so therefore I hardly use it, until I absolutely have to in order to pay my credit card bill.

Very easy to navigate. The only problem that I have is that when I'm looking @ an item and then I filter, for example, whether it's available for store pickup it will say yes bu then when I add it to my cart the app will prompt to pickup at another location. Otherwise, I enjoy shopping from the app a whole ton more than I do @ my local Kohl's. They have accused me of shoplifting 3 times now!!It even happened after I pointed out how the thieves were able steal the item LP was unable figure out.

Your app needs updated bad. All of the pictures of the clothing is blury on scroll. Have to click on the item, then click on the picture to inhance. .. also i have tried four times to create an account so that i can start making a feiw list, would not let me create one so I will not be shopping through your store app. Another note, your birthday calendar needs to be simplified. Hope I can use the app in the feuture. Thank you for your time.

title: Foot Locker: Sneakers, clothes & culture
description:
Calling all sneakerheads! The Foot Locker App is your link to FLX rewards, classic kicks, hot launches and more.

Join FLX and get rewarded
• Earn points across all of our brands
• Free standard shipping with no minimum
• Redeem XPoints in the rewards center for exclusive products, experiences and even gift cards
• Receive a special birthday gift
• Take advantage of member-only sales and events
• Access to special gift with purchase promotions
• Receive Head Starts on many of the latest releases just by being an FLX member!
• Plus, as you move up in status you will receive even more rewards

Get Dibs on new releases
• Keep track of all your reservations with the new My Releases feature
• Receive Head Starts just for being an FLX member, join today to improve your odds at scoring a reservation
• Know what's next with the Release Calendar
• Get notifications on hot new releases before others by opting in to push notifications

Shop
• For the latest heat in footwear and clothing
• Browse your brand: Jordan, Nike, adidas, Reebok, and more
• Find your nearest shop with the Store Locator
• Scan your credit card right in the app to streamline the checkout process
• Access My Account to save your payment and shipping info for faster checkout.
• Learn all about the latest in sneaker culture and sneaker news

Shop Foot Locker anytime, anywhere!

111 S 1st Ave
Wausau WI, 54401
recentChanges: We've made some style improvements to the app and squashed some bugs but Foot Locker still has the latest, greatest sneakers, apparel and accessories.  Respect the drip!
comments: So the entire time I used the app I would get error messages but they would just say "null" and never reload. I re-downloaded the app like 4 times and still the same thing over and over and over. Definetly needs to be some work done on this app.

Terrible app. Navigating is a nuisance. It's slow and finicky. It also keeps logging me out and removing my payment options on my account. In the 'upcoming releases' section, it never gives you any info other than date/time and an option to locate store. The whole point is for people to be able to purchase directly from the app (online), not to go to the nearest store using your location data. Overall, just a very poorly made app. Use a desktop browser instead to make your purchases.
Just stays loading... and finally a message stating "wrong client for this refresh token" what does that even mean?!😤
App is terrible. Anytime a big shoe drops the app crashed and you can't even use it. It's garbage. Only reason to have it is for the reward points if you buy lots of shoes.

Updated to flx points now i have points for things i would never want. On top of that, i can log into the app, keep getting an invalid refresh error message. Just like your footaction app, expect with different issues. Also, it won't show where upcoming launches are dropping. Nice update 👍

title: Macy's
description:
he latest version of the Macy’s Android app is better than ever! Whether you’re shopping styles for him, her, kids or your home, use the Macy’s app to shop our entire site—anytime, anywhere. Don’t forget to manage your Star Rewards account on the go so you can take advantage of special offers, in-store savings and more! Plus, check prices, stay organized with Lists & use our photo-based Snap & Shop feature to find what you’re looking for instantly. 

 

SHOP LIKE AN ALL-STAR: 

- Enable notifications for order updates, early access to new collections & exclusive deals. 

- See furniture in your space virtually before you buy. 

- Snap a pic of something you’d like to shop & find it or something similar.  

-New! Take our Style Inspo quiz to get daily fashion recs in your Style Feed.  

USE STORE MODE:
- Check out faster with Scan & Pay—just scan items in store, pay on the spot & go!
- Scan bar codes to check prices, read reviews and see more colors & sizes—even order online!
- Get easy access to weekly catalogs, your store’s directory & more! 

MANAGE YOUR STAR REWARDS: 
- Check your available Star Money and see how close you are to your next reward! 
- Track your Star Rewards spend and loyalty status anytime, anywhere.

MANAGE YOUR MACY’S CREDIT CARD: 
- Easily check your account balance.
- Schedule & make payments right from the app! 

CHECK OUT FASTER WITH WALLET: 
- Find all your Macy’s offers, all in one place. Use them online & in-store.
- Check out faster with the best offer, every time.
- Manage your payment info in a secure spot. 

CREATE LISTS & GET FASHION ADVICE: 
- Collect your faves in one place! Just tap “Add to List.” You can create a list for every occasion!
-Now you can create style boards & share them with friends—only on the app!
- Get alerts whenever the price drops on one of your items!  
- Make a style board for any occasion, share it with friends & get their feedback!

developerAddress: 680 Folsom St San Francisco CA 94107
recentChanges: This version includes new features such as My Stylist (available in limited locations soon), an updated integration with PayPal, and bug fixes. Be sure to download the newest version today & keep shopping with Macy’s!
comments: I like the price check tool. Pay as I go. It's be cool if I could pull up my card when I leave it at home. Sometimes when you're browsing and you apply filters, you can't scroll further down even though there are clearly more results to view. I agree with another review that if you back out of viewing a product to go back to your search results it'll send you back to the beginning.

This app was great. The only reason I gave it four stars because when I was purchasing I was missing something and it would not let me check out. It did not tell me what I was missing, it just would not process it. I strongly thought about just not making the purchase but kept combing through and eventually figured out what I was missing. Other than that, great app!

Quite possibly the worst Android shopping app I've ever experienced. I only suffered this because Macy's website never once worked for me using different browsers and different computers. So, I give it 1 star only because it somewhat functions whereas I could never once connect to their website. Returning to search results after cart add is horrible. App crashes, losses/forgets logon, the PayPal interface doesn't work. After submitting an order with app, Macy's canceled it w/o explanation.

With Good Internet Connection. This App is an Easy and Great Way to Go Shopping for Every Need, Gifts! Of Everyone's Desire. My Needs are Met, at Macy's Beautiful Display of Clothing and Accessories. At this time of History's Great Plague and Pandemic Ordeal. It's a Great Convenient to Shop, having fast and Safe Delivery Services. Thank you for Quality Price and Service. I wish you all Well and God's Peace and Safekeeping. Happy Month of May!♡☆☆☆☆☆♡

I enjoy the app more now. It has improved over the last few months. It use to glitch while scrolling, causing it to go to the top after you would scroll far down the page. It was a nuisance. Very few glitches these days.. and I enjoy the trending section on the home page.

descriptionHTML:
Ebates is now Rakuten! Enjoy the same Cash Back deals, savings, coupons, promo codes and amazing rewards on your online shopping, the same as you did before. Save money, earn rewards and shop at all your favorite stores. Come on in! ✨

Shopping with Rakuten for the first time? You’ll also get a $10 Welcome Bonus! Get ready to unlock amazing savings!

Fancy dining out? You can get Cash Back on 10,000+ restaurants too!

💰Cash Back shopping is easy – sign up for a FREE account today with Rakuten and start saving money!

Earn Rakuten rewards and save money everywhere you shop. Get the best deals, browse 2,500+ stores AND earn Cash Back when you shop at stores like Walmart, ride Lyft, or get food delivery with Grubhub, or Caviar.

💰Cash Back shopping: 5 reasons you’ll love the Rakuten rewards app 💵
→ Shop smart & save money: Earn up to 40% Cash Back
→ Cash Back Stores: eBay, Walmart, Amazon, Sephora, Lyft, StubHub & many more!
→ Save money: Get notifications for the latest shopping deals, savings, promo codes & coupons
→ Cash Back your life: Earn Cash Back rewards on clothes, beauty, dining, travel, hotels, tickets and even gift cards!
→ Earn rewards on the brands you love: Nike, Samsung, Sephora and more.

RESTAURANT COUPONS, DEALS & CASH BACK 🍴🍲
Everyone’s got to eat, and it’s a lot more fun when someone else does the cooking! Shop with Rakuten Dining and get Cash Back at over 10,000 restaurants only on the Rakuten App.

CASH BACK ON LYFT RIDES & FOOD DELIVERY 🚕 🍔
• Earn rewards on every Lyft ride & get $20 Cash Back when you take your first-ever ride through Rakuten.
• Get Cash Back on every single order from Grubhub, Domino’s, Postmates & Caviar.

CASH BACK SHOPPING & COUPONS 💰
• Shop via the app to earn Cash Back on your shopping - you can also get exclusive deals, coupons and promo codes
• Earn Cash Back rewards & get paid via PayPal or check

STORES & BRANDS 🛒
• Promo codes help you get huge savings at stores like Walmart, Macy's, Sephora, Kohl's and many more!
• Save money on top brands like Nike, Samsung, and Levi’s.

GIFT CARDS & CASH BACK 🎁
• Buy gift cards for someone special & get Cash Back.
• Hotel room or new clothes? Redeem gift cards on whatever you want.

TRAVEL & VACATION ✈🌴😎
• Earn money when you book your vacations! Save on travel, hotels & car rentals.
• Get Cash Back with Expedia, Hotels.com, Orbitz, Travelocity and many more!

MOVIE TICKETS, CONCERTS & ENTERTAINMENT
• Get Cash Back with Fandango, Atom Tickets, Stubhub, SeatGeek and many more.

REFER FRIENDS & EARN $25 🙋🙌
Get $25 for every friend who signs up and shops on Rakuten. There’s no limit on how much you can earn.

IN-STORE CASH BACK 💵
• Earning Cash Back in-store is easy. Simply add your credit card to the app, link the offers of the stores where you shop, and pay with your linked card.
• Cash Back will then automatically be added to your account.
• Get in-store Cash Back at Sephora, JCPenney, Bed Bath & Beyond, Cost Plus World Market & more.

Download the Rakuten app now to discover how much you can save on your shopping!

Stay in touch for exclusive deals and giveaways:

Website: www.rakuten.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/rakuten
Instagram: www.instagram.com/rakuten
Twitter: www.twitter.com/rakutenus
Pinterest: www.pinterest.com/rakuten
summary: Get rewards, Cash Back and promo codes on all your shopping - save on the go!

Rakuten Rewards
800 Concar Drive
San Mateo, CA
94402
recentChanges:
- Ebates is now Rakuten! We’ve changed our name, logo and app icon, but everything else stays exactly the same:
- Same Services: You can still shop at more than 2,500 stores and get Cash Back rewards.
- Same Account: Your Cash Back and your account details are unchanged and as secure as ever.
- Same Team: Our top-rated Member Services team is still here to help.

title: Shop Samsung
description:
The Best Way to Shop Samsung
* See how a TV or Appliance looks in your home using your phone's camera with our Augmented Reality experience.**
* Discover Samsung's latest offerings in mobile phones, accessories, televisions, home theater, smartwatches, home appliances, notebooks, Chromebooks, tablets, smart home and more.
* Find the product for you with tailored recommendations.
* Get exclusive offers ONLY available on the app.
* Checkout is quick and easy with flexible payment options, including Samsung Pay** and Samsung Financing.***
* Earn Samsung Rewards points with purchase of select Samsung products.
* Track your order with notification updates.  When it arrives, register your new product right from the app.
* Free shipping and easy online returns.

Pay over Time with Samsung Financing*** 
How It works: 
1) Fill your cart: add at least $250 worth of Samsung products to your cart and select "Pay Over Time" at checkout.
2) Review your plan: Apply for credit, find out if you've been approved in seconds, then simply check out. If approved, you'll pay $0 at purchase.
3) Pay over time: Receive monthly billing statements with plan details and due dates for your low monthly payments.
4) Keep using it: Samsung Financing is a revolving credit line, so you can apply once and keep using it on any future Samsung.com purchases.

Get Rewarded with Samsung Rewards 
How It works:
1) Enroll - Log in to your Samsung account and accept the Samsung Rewards terms & conditions. 
2) Earn - After making a purchase, check your Samsung Rewards point balance on Menu > My Rewards screen, 15 days after your product delivery.
3) Redeem - Go to Menu > My Rewards and redeem your points in the Samsung Rewards catalog, accessed through Samsung Pay app (on Samsung devices) or SamsungRewards.com.

Learn more about Samsung's latest products:
* The Galaxy S10, Galaxy Note9, and Galaxy S9 smartphones -- discover a world without limits.
* The new Galaxy Watch -- everything you need on your wrist and you can leave your phone behind.
* The latest QLED TVs featuring exclusive Quantum Dot Technology that turn light into perfect color, achieving 100% color volume. That means color doesn't fade, even in the brightest scenes.
* The Frame TV -- the most beautiful TV you've never seen.
* Make your kitchen the center of your home. With the Family Hub, you can shop for food, organize your family's schedules and even entertain - all right from your fridge.
* Meet the all-new Chef Collection: refrigerators, ranges, ovens, cooktops, hoods and dishwashers - The perfect blend of chef-inspired design, innovative technology and ultimate flexibility-thoughtfully crafted for your kitchen.
* Gear IconX earbuds let you enjoy the freedom of wireless.
* The POWERbot robotic vacuum -- Powerful long-lasting suction provides optimal cleaning, while smart technology allows you to control your POWERbot from your smartphone.
* SmartThings -- the easiest way to turn your home into a smart home.
* Innovative Samsung accessories such as the DeX Pad and DeX Station, Fast Charging Stand, LED Wallet Cover, Gear VR, Gear 360, and more.

Start Shopping!
Learn more: 
http://www.samsung.com/us/explore/shop-samsung-app/

* Limited time offer. Subject to availability. Open the app for details, and to see devices eligible for trade-in.
** Compatible devices only.  Samsung Pay is available with select cards from participating banks on Samsung devices.
*** Subject to credit approval. Terms apply. Open the app for details.

developerAddress:

recentChanges:
Get our Work from Home essentials - Laptop, Monitors, Phones, Buds+ and TVs and more with special offers.
Discover a new way to TV with Samsung Access. You’ll get the latest TV and the best customer care all for one low monthly payment plus limited time access to great content.
Get the Galaxy S20 5G from $11.11/mo for 36 months or $399.99 with eligible trade-in, or take advantage of our 50% buy-back guaranteeΨ.
Plus, get free overnight shipping. Terms & Conditions apply, details in the app
comments: DO NOT 'Shop Samsung'. Quality is down, boasting way up along with ridiculous pricing. The app quality equals the low build-quality of far too many late model Samsung products! Until recently my personal top-10 list of all high-performance A/V name- plates had Samsung continuously strong...with some exceptions, the name has fallen rather dramatically, sadly. Yet too many others have slipped as well and as long as the CONSUMER continues to allow low build-quality this situation will INCREASE!!
Easy to use and find things. The only downside is when an item is out of stock it will show it on the website where as on the app it will just disappear. Other than that, it's a great app.

Only available in landscape which makes it difficult to view on phones. Won't allow me to rotate to portrait... But only way to shop samsung is with app so I dealt with it. Wish I didn't have to... Stupid way to force it to landscape mode for phones...
Excellent app that makes shopping for anything Samsung nice and easy. It has everything: phones, appliances, TVs, and the accessories. Fast and easy.

After update, I'm unable to sign into my account through Shop Samsung app. I can only access my Samsung account through Chrome browser or desktop browser. They need to fix. I've contacted Samsung several times through chat & email without success to resolve this issue.

title: Groupon - Shop Deals, Discounts & Coupons
description:
Download Groupon and save up to 70% on the things you need every day. Find great deals on all the best stuff to eat, see, and do near you and around the world.

Save on everything you’re looking for. Whether you’re craving a new restaurant in town, or daydreaming about tropical travel, a daily replenishment of deals delivers all the discounts you like.

Every deal is available to use immediately, so you’re never more than a few taps away from a relaxing massage, tickets to the night’s hottest event, or a great pizza joint.

With the Groupon app you can:
•  Get promo codes and special savings alerts for deals near you, instantly on your mobile device
•  Buy and redeem Groupon deals directly from your mobile device, no need to print vouchers or clip coupons
•  Read customer reviews and write your own
•  Share deals with friends and family

And there’s more:
•  Instantly redeem on-demand deals on food, fun, fashion, and wellness, without having to print a voucher
•  Get up to 30% cash back at participating Groupon+ restaurants
•  Travel to exotic destinations and stay at the fanciest hotels with Groupon Getaways
•  Shop for fun themed collections for holidays and events

Put down the coupon book and pick up the Groupon Android app—your ticket to explore the best your city has to offer at savings of up to 70% off.

Need help? Contact us at https://www.groupon.com/customer_support

recentChanges: Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app. Our updates include many new features, improvements and bug fixes.
comments: Can not contact customer service. Was supposed to be refunded to my card for an item but instead was given groupon bucks. And there is no way to contact them to figure it out Everytime I use this app I have problems.

I always get a good deal on Groupon. No matter if it is a photo book, and oil change, dinner or a massage. I can usually find anything that I'm going to pay for anyway on Groupon with a deal. I'm always a sucker for a deal!
Wow! Great deals at great prices on items that I really want. I have purchased 2 on-line classes and I saved hundreds of dollars on both of them. It is never too late to start learning.

I have ordered a variety of items from groupon and have been very pleased each time. although I cannot speak on trips or hotel/ vacation packages. On individual items its wonderful. I will continue to order when I see something grab my attention. thank you Groupon
They have really good deals and prices plus shipping is reasonable. The site is very easy to use and well illustrated.

title: adidas
description:
JOIN HOMETEAM
In times like these, it's about being creative with how we take care of not only each other, but ourselves - keeping our hearts, bodies and minds healthy. Find out more about hometeam by downloading the adidas app.

YOUR ADIDAS - MORE THAN A SHOPPING APP
The home of sport and sneakers, the adidas app puts you closer to the action with instant access to sneaker drops, seasonal fashion releases, and the sports, clothes and gear that fit your personal style. Athlete inspiration, stories, and app exclusives at your fingertips. The best of adidas, curated for you.      

ADIDAS CREATORS CLUB: GET REWARDED
Unlock the best of adidas with the Creators Club membership program. Earn points by completing your profile, making purchases and leaving reviews. Start at the Challenger level and use your points to level up and unlock exclusive rewards. The world of adidas is at your fingertips. 

What's in it for you? 
- Access to limited edition drops, members-only products, invitations to special events, exclusive offers and more great rewards.
- Creators Club Exclusives: Get exclusive access to shop and vote on members-only sneakers, apparel and more.

ONE ADIDAS APP. ALL THE BENEFITS
 Those that hear about it first, wear it first. From athlete news, clothing collaborations and hype drops, you can discover it all in the adidas app.

- Get news on latest sneakers  
- Shop newest adidas releases 
- Gain access to special offers, rewards, gifts & gear 
- Get alerts when your favorite adidas sneakers & clothes go on sale
- Track orders and purchase history for easy returns

 GET IT FIRST, BE FASHION FORWARD
Love shoes? App in hand, be the first to shop sneaker collaborations and the newest releases to take your look to the next level. And the more you use the adidas app, the quicker you’ll get access to the sports technologies, fashion and stories that inspire you—whether that’s giving your running regime an Ultraboost, the newest NMD release, a classic Stan Smith, a retro Gazelle, or the shoes that will launch your sneakerhead status.

VISUAL SEARCH FOR FASTER FINDS
 There is also a brand-new way to get your hands on the coolest adidas products. See shoes or an outfit you like? Upload a photo of the shoes or shirt you have your eye on, then watch as a list of matching or similar items appear.

SHOP THE BEST, OWN YOUR SPORT 
Running, training, soccer, basketball, or skateboarding? The adidas app has what you need and more. Whether you’re putting time in on the football pitch, the track, court or the gym, find inspiration from adidas creators like Lionel Messi, James Harden and Kylie Jenner, as well as the right shoes and clothes for your favorite sport.   Don’t want to miss out? Opt-in to instant notifications to get the latest performance stories that matter to you. From running and performance shoes to the latest in soccer; experience the innovative Boost technology or shop the legendary Nemeziz or Predator soccer cleats. Find all the gear you need to own your sport. 

ADIDAS ORIGINALS. EFFORTLESS SPORT STYLE
Adjusting to your preferences as you go, the adidas app allows you to easily build your own 3-Stripes style. And if style is your sport, Originals clothing draws from the storied adidas archives to shape the looks of today. With clothing lines for men, women and kids, adidas keeps it fresh season after season. 

DISCOVER MORE IN THE ADIDAS APP
Whether you’re looking for a new Ultraboost running shoe, the latest pair of NMDs or looking for inspiration at your fingertips, the adidas app is the place to be. Download now to get all adidas has to offer.

recentChanges:
In this global health crisis, we all need to do our part. Every action matters, and working as a team, we can make a big impact for those who need it the most.

From April 18th - May 16th, 2020, adidas and Reebok will donate an additional $2 for every item purchased over $20 from our online sites or mobile apps to the COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund.

title: Safeway Delivery & Pick Up
description:
Download the Safeway Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Safeway. Sign in with your existing Safeway account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.
 
Safeway Delivery & Pick Up App is convenient, easy and will save you time with these features:
- Delivery - Choose a time when you want your groceries delivered to your doorstep
- Drive Up & Go (Pick Up) - Drive up to your Safeway store, park, call and we'll bring your groceries to you
- Flexible delivery and pick up times – groceries on your schedule
- Shop fast from your previous in-store and online purchases
- Make special requests to your Personal Shopper (e.g. pick green bananas)
- Save money with hundreds of clippable coupons
- Exclusive online savings – easily find new weekly deals that matter most to you
descriptionHTML:
Download the Safeway Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Safeway. Sign in with your existing Safeway account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.

Safeway Delivery & Pick Up App is convenient, easy and will save you time with these features:
- Delivery - Choose a time when you want your groceries delivered to your doorstep
- Drive Up & Go (Pick Up) - Drive up to your Safeway store, park, call and we'll bring your groceries to you
- Flexible delivery and pick up times – groceries on your schedule
- Shop fast from your previous in-store and online purchases
- Make special requests to your Personal Shopper (e.g. pick green bananas)
- Save money with hundreds of clippable coupons
- Exclusive online savings – easily find new weekly deals that matter most to you
summary: Order groceries any place, any time
recentChanges: Bug fixes & minor improvements
comments: It's very convenient reducing the amount of time I need to shop in the store. There are quite a few items that the store has that isn't in the app. Like the hashbrown patties for example. You need to be very specific or the app may not show you the item you need if it's on the app at all. Just a suggestion but what about adding pre made simple dinner recipes with a list of items. You can just add them to your cart instead adding every single item you need or editing them to your liking.

This app feels glitchy and unpolished. The worst bug occured when searches would reveal no data, I had to reinstall the app. Another annoying feature is how the search function doesn't remember your preference. Used to displaying from least to highest price? You will have to input that each time. The last seemingly unpolished aspect is how your last order items are displayed on the homepage even if they're unavailable. A real tease The delivery pickup was smooth, but this app glitches too much

Excellent shopping app! The Search menu is so helpful with a wide variety of search categories. Since Covid-19 the app has been further updated to show "No Longer Available" items. The delivery drivers are wonderful, always arriving within my selected time window; friendly, smiling & polite.

This is a really useful and convenient service that has saved me a lot of time for only a few extra dollars in my grocery budget. The reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I have had minor issues with some of my orders. For example, I have received cucumbers and lettuce instead of zucchini and cabbage. Or there have been instances where some of the items indicated as purchased on the receipt have not arrived. However, overall, this is a great app that provides a great service.

This refuses to add my purchases. The just for you list is rather confusing. and you can't see the current weekly ad here. I have tried to search for purchases I have made previously and they don't seem to be available. Unless a future update makes some major changes, I won't be able to use this app.

title: Used Cars Nearby
description:
Buying or selling a used car should be easy. It is easy with Used Cars by cPro.

Posting is free and takes less than a minute. Snap a photo, briefly describe your car, and... that's it.

Free messaging connects buyers and sellers, allows you to set up a meeting point, and have a test drive. 

Thousands of used cars that cost thousands less than at a dealership.

Simple. Easy. Free.
descriptionHTML:

Posting is free and takes less than a minute. Snap a photo, briefly describe your car, and... that's it.

Free messaging connects buyers and sellers, allows you to set up a meeting point, and have a test drive.

Thousands of used cars that cost thousands less than at a dealership.

Simple. Easy. Free.
summary: Used cars for sale by owner around you.
developerAddress:
Escargot Studios, LLC
3422 Old Capitol Trail #631
Wilmington, DE 19808
recentChanges: Introducing Stories. Share your car search experience with others or highlight your car for sale listing.
comments: This app is great so far. Even though all i can do is look and wish i had any dependable vehicle. If u want to find out who your true friends are go without a vehicle for awhile & you'll see just who will come contact you about giving u a ride. Even if you offer to pay for their gas.
Of all the vehicles that have interested me there have been none that respond to my bids, strange. Either im doing something wrong or this site is broken.
I was happy to see how efficient they made the experience of looking for a car. As we know that's not always the case for people like me..... Low income. So thank you very much 😊
So far so great...nice to find even more options on top of apps like craigslist and FB marketplace
It's got a great deal of features and is quite easy to use.

title: Forever 21 - The Latest Fashion & Clothing
description:
Welcome to the incredible world of Forever 21 – in your pocket and at your fingertips.

Features:

- APP EXCLUSIVE PROMOTIONS - Get exclusive access to sales and discounts first!

- FIT RATING - Runs small? Runs large? Runs true to size? Now you can read and leave sizing feedback on all clothing items. 

- SHOP: Explore, browse, swipe to view more images and buy on the go!

- FIND & SAVE: Search by category, size, color, price, or browse our trend edits. Save your faves to wishlist with just a click.

- BARCODE SCAN: Need another size? Looking for more info? Just scan an item’s barcode to get details, read reviews, and share your finds with your bestie.

- EASY CHECKOUT: Feeling lazy? Try using our new camera card scanner to add a new credit card in just a few seconds!

- SOCIAL: Connect with the Forever 21 community through Facebook and Instagram, and use #F21xME to find and share style inspirations.

- FIND A STORE: Lost without Forever 21? Use the store locator to find nearby stores, get directions, and find out which brands are available at each store.

Oh, and we genuinely love hearing your feedback. We’re always improving and constantly updating our app to make shopping easier for you! Shoot us an email at mobileapp@forever21.com to leave a comment, report an issue, or make a suggestion.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the incredible world of Forever 21 – in your pocket and at your fingertips.

Features:

- APP EXCLUSIVE PROMOTIONS - Get exclusive access to sales and discounts first!

- FIT RATING - Runs small? Runs large? Runs true to size? Now you can read and leave sizing feedback on all clothing items.

- SHOP: Explore, browse, swipe to view more images and buy on the go!

- FIND & SAVE: Search by category, size, color, price, or browse our trend edits. Save your faves to wishlist with just a click.

- BARCODE SCAN: Need another size? Looking for more info? Just scan an item’s barcode to get details, read reviews, and share your finds with your bestie.

- EASY CHECKOUT: Feeling lazy? Try using our new camera card scanner to add a new credit card in just a few seconds!

- SOCIAL: Connect with the Forever 21 community through Facebook and Instagram, and use #F21xME to find and share style inspirations.

- FIND A STORE: Lost without Forever 21? Use the store locator to find nearby stores, get directions, and find out which brands are available at each store.

Oh, and we genuinely love hearing your feedback. We’re always improving and constantly updating our app to make shopping easier for you! Shoot us an email at mobileapp@forever21.com to leave a comment, report an issue, or make a suggestion.
summary: The Forever 21 app is your source for style inspo & shopping latest fashions.

3880 N. Mission Rd.
Los Angeles, CA 90031

title: Floryday: Women Fashion Store
description:
With a collection of over 4,000 trendy items and 50+ new arrivals daily, Floryday can definitely make you a fashion icon even with limited budgets. Our products (including dresses, shoes, coats and bags) are sold worldwide and we have millions of fans on social media. With our Floryday app you can shop trendy dresses anytime and anywhere. Come join us now!

Floryday provides high-quality clothes and shoes at fantastic prices. Flash sales feature the most popular styles and trends in women’s fashion and accessories. Each item has been handpicked by someone with a keen eye for the latest trends, highest quality and best workmanship. 

Features include:
-Over 50 new arrivals in clothes, shoes and bags every day!
-Snap up dresses at a low price for limited time!
-Enjoy the latest styles up to 70% OFF!
-You can also enjoy worldwide FREE SHIPPING over US $100!

Payment & Delivery
-Various payment methods for you to choose from
-Fast and reliable shipping for your order(s)
-Easy to track your order online

Don’t wait or hesitate. Join us to explore and find a brand new world full of fashion.

Feel free to contact us via http://www.floryday.com/contact-us.html and voice out your suggestions about our app, or send your feedback to service@floryday.com.

comments: Was looking for a special occasion dress when I stumbled upon this site and saw the most perfect dress at such a reasonable price. I've ordered and delivery took 41 days! The dress is gorgeous however the swim suit wasn't but can't return. The handbag was advised unable to supply due to shortage of materials. Refunded to my bank about a week later. The app itself is ok but not brilliant. It's not as user friendly as some, but adequate as long as you've time to look through loads of items.
It is really an amzing app that i have never found before. You can get points on every single click. Really having fun with it.
Love this app. Its easy to use, great clothes decent shipping time and very reasonably priced

Check out is impossible! I just want to ise PayPal and it asks you to log in, everytime it says my password is incorrect. Yet i can log into my PayPal via the PayPal webpage and app with no password issues. I already get weary abput companies like this being scammers and im pretty much ready to delete this accout
This is a great app ! Good quality and fast shipping. Good prices

title: Zulily: A new store every day
description:
Shop Zulily for amazing savings on big brands you love and boutique brands you haven’t met yet. 

This is fun shopping at its finest. Each day, we deliver a new store chock-full of unique finds you never knew you needed, plus essentials for the people and places in your life: trendy clothes and shoes for kids and adults, home décor, beauty products and so much more. Best of all? You’ll enjoy up to 70% off prices every day. If you don’t mind waiting a little longer for shipping, you can really save a bundle!


New sales begin at 6am PT every morning and typically last three days, so when you see something fabulous, you’ve gotta get it before it’s gone! Whether you’re leveling up your health game or reorganizing that junk drawer (hey – everybody’s got one), we’re here to help you get on track. We reinvent our store daily, so you always have an opportunity to find what you’re after – and cool, unexpected items too. Get the app so you don’t miss out.

Here are just a few great things you’ll find every day:

On-trend women’s apparel for every season: tunics, casual dresses, tanks and tees, work dresses, kimonos, denim, sweaters, cardigans, coats and jackets, activewear, jewelry, scarves, hats, European fashions, bras and intimates, loungewear, athleisure, designer glasses and sunglasses, handbags

Shoes for every outfit: boots and booties, wedges and pumps, flats, leather loafers, fashion sandals, stylish sneakers, running shoes, walking shoes, orthopedic footwear, rain boots, snow boots, western boots, clogs, men’s work boots, men’s dress shoes and men’s sneakers

Home and office essentials: quilts, bedding, bathroom textiles and towels, sheets, pillows, kitchenware, cookbooks, storage and organization, dishes and mugs, pots and pans, kitchen appliances, home décor and entertaining essentials, pet beds and toys, indoor and outdoor furniture, DIY and craft supplies, gift wrap, party supplies, stationery, office organization, planners, food, snacks and drinks

Everything kids and babies need: Graphic tees and jeans, hoodies and jackets, activewear, pajamas, dresswear, coats, boots, sandals, sneakers, hats and scarves, rain gear, toys and games, books and school supplies, outdoor toys, puzzles, car seats, car seat covers, babyproofing gear, cloth diapers, feeding supplies, bedding, bedroom décor and playroom furniture

Beauty and wellness products: luxury skincare, makeup, designer cosmetics and fragrance, lotions and soaps, salon-quality haircare and nail polish, aromatherapy, essential oils, workout gear and yoga mats, healthy snacks and vitamins and supplements

Maternity essentials: maternity bottoms, nursing bras, maternity dresses, convertible tops, nursing covers and sleepwear

An important privacy note: Signing in signals your agreement with zulily’s Terms & Conditions and Privacy Practices.

https://www.zulily.com/terms-conditions
https://www.zulily.com/privacy-practices

recentChanges:
Bug fixes.

Keep submitting feedback about our app — we're always listening! Happy shopping.

-Zulily
comments: Love Zulily but the app needs work. It won't let you check your orders, shows you multiple items when scrolling through the items and when you click on an item to view and click back to the list you have to start all over at the top! If these were fixed it would make a huge difference!

Zulily site has became incredibly ridiculous and stupid! Very disappointed in the recent change that now requires you to login to simply look at to browse and look at items. I will NOT EVER login to the Zulily site to look at items or to simply look at the catalog of items. If this is not resolved quickly I will uninstall the Zulily app and never shop with Zulily again. Before the change I would only login when placing orders & paying for items, NOT to simply browse for items offered.

Awful App. It won't let me sign in. No matter what I do I can't sign in. I've tried resetting my password even though I know the password is correct and it won't even send me the link. This app needs major updating. Uninstalling because it's just a waste.
Major issues with the app since the last update. Can't see my orders or access account information any more. Please fix asap. This version is cumbersome and problematic.

Too may bugs! Can't check my order history, the search results are a joke. The return shipping is ridiculous. The filters are too broad. While scrolling through items its shows the same item multiple times.

title: AfterShip Package Tracker
description:
Download AfterShip Android package tracker app to track all your online orders and shipments!

Free Package Tracker - UPS, FedEx, DHL, USPS, DPD, TNT & 600+ Carriers Tracking

Track 600+ Carriers for FREE!
• Free tracking 
• Free push notifications
• No ads 
• Auto-detect courier
• Easy copy / paste tracking number
• Easy-to-share tracking links

Free Push Notifications:
• Info Received - Courier receives the order from shipper
• In Transit - Shipment is picked up
• Out for Delivery - Shipment is about to deliver soon
• Delivered - Shipment is delivered
• Failed Attempt - Courier tried to deliver but failed
• Exception - Any delivery alerts

recentChanges: Guest Mode
comments: OK tracking app. My two main problem is that it will alert me one or two hours after an item is out for delivery, and several times, the alert came after the package was delivered. My other problem is that it detects nearly everything in my clipboard when I open the app. Numbers or words that are not tracking numbers. Between these two issues. I find the app lacking for my needs.

So far I like this app. I haven't had it long but I do have several deliveries, sometimes daily. I don't have to do anything, the app sends me updated tracking via notifications. Updates seem to be more current than the actual carrier's. I get tracking on some packages that I otherwise wouldn't have at all. Worldwide tracking.

Love it! The only thing I don't like is it is lagging behind a little it says something will be delivered today but really it's the following or it says delivery is expected 1 day, but its actually expected in 2 days. I think the update may have caused it, but other than that the app is great!!

I love this app. I can keep /almost/ all my tracking information in one place and receive notifications about updates. The only complaint I have is that when I enter a tracking number from something coming from overseas I get asked for an account number and traking key. Which I'm not sure it could be, and I can't track the package.

App has tracked about 99% of my packages! Works great, & saves all your past shipments etc 👌 *Edited because it's definitely NOT 99% of the time. Too many times it's entered the wrong one automatically - let alone not been able to identify it. Also, the auto- add clipboard thing isn't working anymore BUT! This app is still worth having for the majority that it does find. My solution is to just have two tracking apps side by side for the few it misses now :)

title: Affirm
description:
There’s cash, there’s plastic...and then there’s Affirm. 

The Affirm app lets you shop stress-free at any store and make payments over time—with no late fees, penalties, or hidden costs of any kind. Using the app is easy: Find your favorite store, fill your cart, then choose the payment plan you like best. Complete your purchase online or at a physical store with Apple Pay or Google Pay. Checking your eligibility only takes a moment and won’t affect your credit score.

USE THE AFFIRM APP TO:

•  Buy now and pay over time at almost any store
•  Get exclusive offers as low as 0% APR
•  Manage your account and make payments

ABOUT AFFIRM

We’re here to help you say yes to more of the things you love, while staying true to your financially responsible self. That’s why we’ll never charge you late fees, penalties, or hidden costs of any kind.

summary: Split purchases into easy monthly payments
developerAddress:
Affirm, Inc.
650 California St.
FL 12
San Francisco, CA, 94108
recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: I can't really speak much on the app itself. I only just started using it about a month ago and my first payment isn't even due yet. I'm having a weird glitch though. I'll be on my phone doing something else in another app and the affirm app will flash on my screen for half a second like it's trying to load/open. I'm considering deleting due to it causing me concerns of potential hacking.

I use the app for miscellaneous items. Comes in handy for emergencies or items you may want immediately with the ease of paying overtime. Buy what you can afford. Maintain your budget, while not being blown up with crazy interest rates. Does not reflect on-time payments on your credit report so it won't help your score. But that's a given since the app does not put hard inquires on your score either. Highly recommend for responsible shoppers.

Was great, but something chaged. I have all bills paid off, 780 credit score, have never been late or missed payments. This showed me as being able to get $3500 three weeks ago, then it dropped to 1800, then 850, now it says 180. I haven't bought anything. I don't owe anyone anything. Weird, that it just decided to do that. I checked my credit from all three credit reports, and all is good, and the same it had been. This latest update doesn't even show your limit on the main page anymore. Ohwell

This app is super easy to use and convenient. The only thing that would make it MORE convenient would be partnerships with brick and mortars to accept Affirm in store. I tried to use the app at a massage salon and had to do alot of explaining because I paid online but they wanted to see the card when I arrived. I felt like I looked shady explaining the concept. I can't speak to what would be involved in making that work so I appreciate the available business model. I highly recommend Affirm.

not bad ar all. ive used it twice. once for a Drone and once for furniture. Update: 11\7\19. I have purchased sofas, drones, e scooters. Pretty much anything I want. I like the choice of 3, 6 or 12 payments options. Update April 2020: I have used this app for 4 purchases, 1 was almost 2K. But now during Covid they stop giving me credit despite paying off 3 of the 4 loans and having no issues. Not right that all of a sudden I dont qualify but I did before and nothing has changed on my end. SMH

title: PetSmart
description:
At PetSmart, we know being a pet parent is one of life’s most rewarding experiences. It also raises many questions! So, we’ve built our app to be a valued resource for every step of your journey as a pet parent. You’ll find helpful articles, products, services bookings and can shop for all your pet needs in one place.

•         With in-app shopping, you can get all your pet essentials in one place. In a rush? Get your order in 1 hour with buy online pick up in store.
•         Sign up for our Treats loyalty program. You’ll earn points every time your shop & you can manage your account through the app.
•         Get your pet looking fresh with in-app salon booking, appointment management & easy rebooking
•         Check Doggie Day Camp availability
•         Make & manage PetsHotel reservations
•         Play Treat Trail – connect treats, earn points & get coupons
•         Tailor the app experience to your entire pet family with personalized offers & content
With a store locator, helpful resources, in-app shopping, services bookings, informative articles & videos, the PetSmart App is a great resource for a great life with your best friend!

summary: The PetSmart App is a resource at every step of your pet parent journey.
recentChanges: Now you can skip the register & pay for your pet’s grooming appointment via the app! Also, order your vet-authorized diets for select stores. Plus, we’ve made some other enhancements & squashed a few bugs!
comments: Doesn't work for me. I like PetSmart, but I have lost count of the number of times I've tried to use this app, over the past week. Only once did I get a confirmation # to indicate an order had been placed, but that's where it ended because a couple of days later, I was told by their Customer Service that the confirmation # didn't exist. Now when I select something it doesn't go into the cart, even though that part of the app worked before.

This app is great until you try to purchase something for online pick up. Also, it doesn't give you a chance, if you're an employee, to get you employee discount. I put items in my cart, and everything goes smoothly until I get to the step where I'm supposed to review my order before purchasing it, and later picking it up at the store. The button saying to review my order stays gray. It doesn't let me get past that point to finish my purchase.

Useless when you can't take anything out of your cart!!!! You can add all you want to the cart, but you can't remove anything! The 'remove' is overlapping the description of the items, so when you click on it, it seems like its gonna work, but then it doesnt! Such a colossal waste of time, considering I set up my whole profile and played the game to get coupons---which there is no way to add coupon to order either! Don't bother with this app, just order online

Update: they fixed the issue and now items will delete from check out if needed. They responded fairly quickly and fixed the issue within a day. Was able to get items that I needed. ----------------------------------------> It won't let me delete an item out of my cart. Making me buy an item that was in my cart but no longer need. Will just have to go elsewhere to buy what I need. Everytime I hit remove it stays up but says $nan.and still adds up in my total payment. Not worth the hassle.

This app doesn't work most of the time! It WILL NOT allow me to purchase Authority Indoor Kitten Chicken Entree Pate, 3oz wet cat food. Not at all, nor online! And, most of the time the cart doesn't work, just buffers. When it does work, it tries to force me to use PayPal instead of my credit card. Also, the app doesn't have favorites like the online. The 'games' tho cute, you can only use the coupons inside the store. So what's the point of an app? Worst app of any retail app I've ever used.

title: Ace Hardware
description:
Welcome to the helpful place right on your smartphone. Take your Ace Hardware shopping and rewards experience to the next level and get a $5 bonus* available the day after you download the app.

HOME
See your Ace Rewards status and take advantage of your monthly offers. Then, check out exclusive home improvement tips and additional ways to earn points.

REWARDS
Get your rewards faster and earn points in more ways. Track your points easily and invite your friends to get 1,000 bonus points. See recommended items to get you to your next reward and how close you are to Premier status.

MY STORE
Locate your preferred store and contact it easily with one click calling and mapping capabilities. Check out your store's local ad, hours, services, brands and events.

SHOPPING
Shop thousands of products like grills, power tools, and home improvement products. Then, choose how to get them, certain products are assembled, delivered, or available to pick up in store.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
- Access your Rewards and offers in one place and add them to your digital wallet with ease
- See your purchase history to easily reference products
- Your inbox will house all your past notifications in case you missed them
- Store other purchases in My Products to easily access warranty, additional parts, or paint colors and sheens.

When you download the Ace Hardware mobile app, you are agreeing to the following:
Ace Rewards Terms & Conditions https://www.acehardware.com/customer-service?page=ace-rewards

Mobile App Terms & Conditions https://www.acehardware.com/customer-service?page=terms-of-use 

Privacy Policy -https://www.acehardware.com/customer-service?page=privacy-policy

Download the mobile app for more information.
*Bonus Terms and Exclusions: Bonus Coupon will be available the day after an Ace Rewards member downloads the mobile app. Subtotal must meet or exceed $5.00, otherwise discount will not apply. Bonus Coupon valid in store or on acehardware.com. Not valid on sale, discounted and clearance priced merchandise, rental, in-store services, Ace gift cards, city stickers, city/municipality required lawn/trash bags and garbage tags, lumber and building materials, fuel, previously purchased merchandise, water heaters, grills, power tools, power equipment, on the following branded products: Weber®, Nest, STIHL®, Toro®, YETI®, Traeger and Big Green Egg and other items that each participating store may designate, or in conjunction with any other coupon, excluding Rewards. Discount allocated across all qualifying items. Any purchase minimum is calculated before applying Reward redemption and before tax. No change will be given if discount exceeds remaining balance. Coupon may not be sold or transferred. Void if photocopied or duplicated. No cash value. Coupon cannot be replaced if merchandise is returned. Additional exclusions may apply. See store for details.
Shop thousands of products like grills, power tools, and home improvement products. Then, choose how to get them, certain products are assembled, delivered, or available to pick up in store.

Not valid on sale, discounted and clearance priced merchandise, rental, in-store services, Ace gift cards, city stickers, city/municipality required lawn/trash bags and garbage tags, lumber and building materials, fuel, previously purchased merchandise, water heaters, grills, power tools, power equipment, on the following branded products: Weber®, Nest, STIHL®, Toro®, YETI®, Traeger and Big Green Egg and other items that each participating store may designate, or in conjunction with any other coupon, excluding Rewards. comments: Just keeps crashing every time I open it. At first, there were a few times it stayed on long enough for me to click a button or scroll down the home screen a bit, but mostly it crashes as it's loading my points on the initial screen. I have tried hard closing the app. I have tried shutting my phone down. It just doesn't work. At all.

Looks like the dev team has taken everyone's feedback to heart, because this app is great! I love my local Ace stores and am a frequent shopper who has been waiting for this for years. The only minor fault I have is that the fiery coal pic on the main page is a little distracting and I might suggest just replacing it with a plain stock photo of a store. I will be using this app on a weekly basis. Thank you!

I like the app. It needs a shopping list though. I can see all of my past purchases and I don't have to remember coupons. There is a wish list option when looking at items but I have no idea where the wish list is at. Good app if you shop at ACE Hardware

Updated: I tried once again to log after the response from the developers, and it works great. ------------- Just downloaded the app after receiving an email from Ace. Every time I try to log in, it just goes back to the login screen. I am able to log in via the website with no issue.

I previously wrote a review about the app being buggy. The developer responded that there was unusually high usage of the app that day. I finally gave up on the software when I couldn't even link to my long-held rewards account. I loaded the app again today and have had a better experience so far - although the app insists that you enter a 10-digit rewards number when every rewards card I have received has an 11-digit member number. Just leave off the last digit.

comments: Like it, easy to use the only problem is having to scroll past some items 5-8 times before finding the coupon you want. I probably scrolled past 200 items before coming across the 20% off coupon. Finding the coupon for the small tarp took even longer. By the time I found the tarp coupon I'd seen the same moving blanket and welders at least 9 or 10 times. Having a cart to put the coupons in is really convenient. Then I take screenshots, crop them and text the coupons to friends and family.

Just downloaded it a few hours ago. So far, I absolutely love it. I used to always laugh at my parents for cutting coupons out of the Sunday paper and was embarrassed when they used them at the store and I was there. Jokes on me apparently. If you actually keep track of everything you do from day to day that saves even $ .05, you would be stunned at how much you actually save just by using scissors, or downloading an app, or even molest a billy goat for a fair ride. Its all about the ☺.

I have found this app to be a very easy & convenient way to save money when shopping at harbor freight tools. I found the cart super handy for having all the coupons ready before going to the register. The customers in line behind seemed to appreciate the app as well. It made for smooth transaction without fumbling around looking for coupons...after using this app for over a year, it has saved me hundreds.

Awesome app...one request ..pinch to zoom in and out of the coupons? Easier to read that way...but otherwise GREAT looking app so far! Awesome to be able to save coupons to a cart, organized by coupon expiration date. Also great to be able to copy the barcode to paste into the HF website for purchase. Another awesome feature...it will notify you when a coupon is about to expire. Love it so far! Great work! Cheers! A blessed Easter to all in this bizarre quarantine time.

Use this app every time I go to harbor freight. I also get the catalog and mailers and this app is always up to date plus while in store I search the item number of an item I am wanting to purchase and more often then not there is a discount. Then just put it in the cart and it is easy to scan the coupons at the register.
