comments: I'm sick of IOS being the only app to get regular updates. The home menu takes forever to refresh, my orders never show up on the designated screen. I can't changed my shipping preferences ( like overnight or 2-3 day shipping). There are a lot of bugs. The notifications are hit or miss because one release I'll be notified and the next release I won't even though I'll have it set for 15 minutes before release. Pleeeaaasseeeee fixxxxx this app like how you guys stay on it for iPhone users 😒

Horrible have to uninstall and reinstall to have any real updates and that's if I'm lucky because that sometimes doesn't even work. No history on purchases. Have missed many shoes because no notification if I'm waiting for the button to let me buy the shoes and by the time it finally pops up it quickly changes to sold out or goes straight to sold out bugs need to seriously get worked on

One day the app works fine, the next day it doesn't. Super inconsistent and it has been this way for YEARS. Its never the same issue, there is always something not working correctly. Today I was stuck on a loading icon for multiple minutes over 3 attempts while trying to get an exclusive release. Of course the shoe sold out while I was waiting so I never even had a chance. A few days ago I had no problem checking out for a release. Such garbage.

BUSTED. I have to log out and log back in to this app every few days or so to even see upcoming releases! It doesn't have any purchases that I've made other than maybe 2 of them? So I don't know if it has my points and status up to date. I've been LUCKY to get any drops, and I'm pretty sure the app has cost me at least 3 of them too. Please fix, I need my sneaks.

Very frustrating, as others mentioned the app doesn't work correctly when there is an important drop. Sometimes, at 10am EST the "coming soon" button automatically changes to "sold out" or it will say there is a temporary error and boot me out of my account. The idea behind this app is great but is exicuted very poorly. I have noticed it seems to work slightly better on the iOS version which is also frustrating. Pretty surprised that it has been like this for so long and nothing has been done...

title: Shipt: Same Day Delivery
description:
Shipt brings the store to your door with same-day delivery on grocery products, household essentials, beauty supplies, and more.

Shop from neighborhood retailers and a professional shopper will handpick and deliver your order, exactly how you want it. And with delivery in as soon as an hour, Shipt saves you time – whether you’re planning a special lunch or dinner, or just need a fresh snack.

Browse millions of fresh grocery products, household essentials, alcohol items like beer, wine, and spirits,* and more from stores you trust like CVS, Harris Teeter, H-E-B, Meijer, Petco, Target, and more.

Schedule same-day delivery, pay, and tip – all in the app.

Leave special grocery instructions so your shopper gets exactly what you need, like a perfectly ripe avocados and other produce favorites.

Get access to member-exclusive savings and shop with rewards programs, including mPerks and Costco memberships to save even more.

Save time and place orders easily with go-to grocery lists and favorite items, from breakfast to dessert – members save an average of 8 hours a month using Shipt.

Enjoy free same-day delivery on orders over $35.

Have a question? Our 24/7 hour support team is ready to help.

See how easy it is to shop online and get same-day delivery on grocery items and more – download the app to try today!

*Alcohol availability varies by location. You must be 21+ with a valid ID to order or receive alcohol. Shipt credits do not count toward alcohol purchases.

title: Amazon for Tablets
description:
With the Amazon app for Android tablets you can easily search across Amazon’s catalog of millions of products to quickly find what you are looking for, browse and shop by department, and check out lightning deals and deals of the day.  Product detail pages provide useful product information and allow you to read and write product reviews or share products with friends.

Enjoy features built especially for tablets, including a fun new way to set aside items – press and hold on any product image and fling it to the bottom of the screen. The items are saved in a tray that is available to you throughout the entire app, making it easy for you to get to your set aside items with one tap.

All purchases made on the Amazon app for Android Tablets are routed through Amazon's secure servers just as they are on the web.  And just like the web experience, Android app customers enjoy the same functionalities of the Amazon Shopping Cart, Wish Lists, order history, payment and Amazon Prime member shipping options, and 1-Click settings.  Customers are able to shop any of Amazon's sites around the world from a single app.

** The current release supports Android tablets that are 7" to 10" with resolutions from 600x1024 to 1600x2560 with Android OS 5.0 and up.

Permissions:
On Android devices with GPS, we access location information only so that we can provide customers with the option to send packages to a nearby Amazon Locker (a feature only available in the US and UK currently).  On Android devices with both WiFi and cellular radios, we access the phone only to determine which radio to use depending on the strength of signal. On WiFi only products, this permission isn't applicable, but Android's security model requires us to ask on all installations. In order to securely send and receive push notifications on your device (should you choose to do so), we need to use the following permissions: "Receive data from Internet" and "Prevent tablet from sleeping". We require “Read Contacts” permission to make it easier for you to find and invite friends from your phone address book.

* Microphone access: search Amazon catalogue of products using your voice.

* Install Shortcut & Read Settings: Used to create a shortcut icon for Amazon Cash if customers choose to have one.

comments: This update is terrible. Previous versions concentrated on things that could be bought from the store - recommended items and the such like. It now very much focused towards the various services you can subscribe to - i'm not interested in subscribing to any of your services

Downward scroll and selection is not working on homepage. When you try selecting anything on homepage the app crashes and restarts. And then the viscous cycle continues. If you get past the home page it works fine.
This app used to be great, now it will not even open a page without stopping. Will have to use my phone or go online. Terrible

Used to work well - not so good now. I've used this app on all the tablets I've had and, up until recently, never had a problem. Over the past few weeks, the basket section has become barely usable. You can add things and order them, but if you want to see your "saved for later" items or delete/save for later something you have in your basket, you can't. If you want to edit your basket, you need to access via computer - not always practical. Search etc. seems to work OK. The layout is fine.
It gets slower and slower. Trying to change size,colour or add to my wish list and it simply dies.

Pretty cool and tons of coupons. Good looking app and looking forward to saving some money with the coupon codes.

GOAT is the global platform for style. 

Discover the largest selection of sneakers as well as luxury and streetwear designer fashion, including just dropped, sold out and future releases–all in one place. Now shipping to over 164 countries.

Shop over a million listings of sneakers, apparel and accessories from the world’s emerging, contemporary, and designer fashion brands, including Nike, Air Jordan, adidas, Yeezy, Off-White, Comme des Garcons, Acne Studios, Gucci and more.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: I definitely prefer ordering from here over StockX, but man does the app itself get worse with every update, specifically in regards to the on-feet pictures. Now when you click on an image, it's zoomed in to fill the screen & you can't zoom out. Also, when you upload an on-foot image yourself for a shoe that had no pictures uploaded previously, it doesn't even show up unless a second image gets added. The ability to delete an image also seems to have gone missing. This app definitely needs work.

After last update the "Want" section is not showing full list any more! Most of the shoes in this list disappeared even if when you find them via search at upper left of screen the Want button is black! I've tried to sort them again, but as I add more shoes at the end of list start to disappear again!

Good app although with the exception of the 3% fee StockX is much better. Pretty annoying that you can't check previous sales history for whatever size shoe you're looking at. Makes it difficult to gauge the market effectively. Honestly i only use the app because it doesn't charge the 3% buyer's fee and has excellent pictures of the product but if stockX got rid of their 3% fee I would go right back to them because of the information provided about the product and dollar increase bid ability.

One thing that disappoints me about this app is that for some reason i can't see what dates a certain shoe sold for and how much. It makes it a bit difficult to determine a reasonable price to list the shoe based on condition. Im using an android im not sure if thats the reason why, but please add this feature to androids. I know iphones are able to do this, but why can't androids ?

So Much for Air Max Day Constant "Json" crashing, can't even get the app to open. This happened on black friday too, completely unacceptable. EDIT: 3 Day "Thank You" sale Again, what a joke. The app says drops update at 10 AM Pacific (1 PM Eastern). I hopped on a early only to see the days drops were already listed and gone, well before they should have even shown up.

title: Family Dollar
description:
Our App makes it even easier to save at Family Dollar, with quick access to deals and Smart Coupons, sneak peeks at new offers, and our new SmartSpins game. 

Download the Family Dollar App for the easiest way to save:
 
• Enjoy instant access to Smart Coupons
• Play SmartSpins, our new game, to win Smart Coupons. Every spin wins!
• Browse the weekly ad anytime, anywhere
• Scan products to find offers
• Easily find the nearest Family Dollar
 
Best of all, you’ll earn a spin to play SmartSpins every time you shop when you scan the app barcode or enter your phone number at checkout. Every spin wins a Smart Coupon! To redeem Smart Coupons, simply scan the app barcode or enter your phone number at checkout. Easy to use, easy to save, easy to win!

For feedback or technical issues please visit: 
https://www.familydollar.com/corporate/our-company/contactus

The Family Dollar app is the easiest way to get great savings and coupons for top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts, toys, and more. Get sneak peeks at our circular to find our best sales, bargains, and deals on top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts and toys when you’re planning a shopping trip to your neighborhood Family Dollar store. With our digital coupon app, you have instant access to savings, and no need to go online to look for offers. Plus, you can play our app game, SmartSpins, to win Smart Coupons. Clip Smart Coupons right in the app for the greatest deals. You can also scan products to check for Smart Coupons discounts, then clip the coupons to save, and redeem at checkout next time you go shopping. That way, you won’t miss any of our great offers on top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts, toys, and more. We know that our shoppers need good deals and easy ways to find bargains that stretch every dollar. With the Family Dollar digital coupon app, we offer convenient access to easy-to-use Smart Coupons, with savings that fit your budget. You can find and clip Smart Coupons for all your favorite brands. And you’ll win savings with SmartSpins, our app game. Whether you’re shopping for top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts or toys, Family Dollar is your store for great sales, bargains and savings on everything you need, with low prices that fit in your budget. Smart shoppers know they can find great bargains, savings and sales at Family Dollar. We understand that you have a tight budget, that you are shopping for deals and bargains, so we offer the savings and discounts you appreciate. Now, with our digital coupon app, it’s even easier for you to save, with instant access to coupons and discounts, plus our new app game where you can win savings every time you play. No need for paper coupons anymore: with the app, you clip digital Smart Coupons and redeem right at the register using just your app barcode or phone number. You’ll get deals and coupons tailored the way you shop. And we make it easy to clip, easy to use, easy to save on your favorite top name brand groceries, snacks, cleaners, health and beauty products, clothes, gifts, and toys.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Awful. This whole app is awful. Everything loads so slow, it is so easy to clip something that you didn't mean to. Notifications for smart spins are often late and glitched. The store staff are never able to help when this app glitches and coupons don't come off, they can't do anything. I hate this app! I hate Family Dollar so much. I tried to give them a chance. I really did.

It's great to save on items.. that is, when coupons actually work. Often times coupons that match up to the items don't come off or coupons won't load onto a person's app, but will appear on other people's accounts. There's usually always issues with the barcode scanner and smart spins. Oh and there's a group of people (usually the smart couponers) find a way to sign up as an employee to get the employee discounts.. do y'all make sure they verify

The app is good when ur able to use the coupons. I would say 5 out of 10 the coupon I do have don't apply to the items I purchased. I even read the fine print and then I scan to make sure and it always says don't apply to this item and it's real frustrating. why is it when I put my number in the system it never works when a certain person rings me up? I went back and told her that my number didn't go through and she tells me to contact main office. But when I went back in to buy something it wor

Very disappointed in this app. 9× outta 10, a smart coupon will show an item is eligible when checking with the app- but once u get to the register and get ur final price, they do NOT come off and by then it's too late to do anything about it. It makes it very hard for people new to using coupons. It turns them away from even trying. Also- when u earn free spins for coupons, the coupons are for items NO ONE rly buys. It should go based on your past purchases or a simple $? Off $?! Horrible!

This app is ok. Coupons seem to be all for products that aren't in stock right now, like toilet paper. You win spins by purchases, but the prizes are the same coupons that are available in the coupon list. Which is kind of lame. Maybe make actual prizes, free soda here and there or something.

title: 1800Flowers: Same-Day Flowers & Gifts Delivery
description:
1-800-Flowers: Send Flowers, Bouquets, & Gifts 

Fresh flower delivery is easy with the 1-800-Flowers app. Send flowers, plants and gifts anywhere or anytime while on the go in just a few easy clicks. From gorgeous flower arrangements to the perfect anniversary roses and centerpieces, gourmet cookies, chocolate covered strawberries, and many other gifts, there is something for everyone. Whether sending flowers in the United States or around the world, we deliver gifts and smiles to 195 countries! 

- 100% Smile Guarantee: Blooms are the best quality and always arrive fresh. 

- Flower types: We offer roses, carnations, tulips, sunflowers, orchids, lilies, daisies, and many more. 

- Quick & Secure Flower Delivery: Experience streamlined browsing and a secure checkout. 

- With same day flower delivery, you will never miss another important occasion! 

We cover all gifting occasions including, but not limited to: 

· Birthday: No matter their age, birthday flowers are sure to brighten their day! Send timeless birthday flower arrangements from our most popular floral designs or even one of our truly unique arrangements to make their day even more special.

· Love and Romance: Whether your sweetie lives with you or across the world, send romantic flowers to shower them with love. 

· Sympathy: Convey your deepest condolences during a difficult time by using our “White Glove” service to send funeral flowers or sympathy gifts to the home. 

· Special Occasions: We offer gifts including but not limited to: Christmas, New Years, Hanukkah, Thanksgiving, Easter, Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day and many other important occasions. 

· Congratulations: Whether you’re celebrating graduation, a new job, promotion, first home or retirement, our fresh flowers and gifts are the perfect way to say, “you did it!” 

· Just Because: Sometimes you don’t need a reason to send a smile, send one just because they’re awesome. Our same day, “just because” flowers and gifts are sure to brighten anyone’s day! 
· Thank You: When words are just not enough, show your appreciation and gratitude with a beautiful bouquet they will never forget. 

· Wedding Flowers: Wedding flowers are easy to order online. Get ready for your special day with our breathtaking bridal bouquets, centerpieces, corsages and boutonnieres. 

So, whether you are saying, “Happy Birthday,” “Congratulations,” “I Love You,” “Happy Valentine’s Day” or anything else in between, we have an arrangement that is perfect for you! Send flowers to that someone special today! Every flower delivery includes our 100% smile guarantee! Our caring service team is ready to help you with your order and welcomes your feedback! 

** Meet Our Family of Gift Brands: Harry and David, Cheryl’s Cookies, Fruit Bouquets by 1800Flowers, 1800Baskets, The Popcorn Factory, Wolferman’s, Stockyards, Simply Chocolate, Personalization Universe & Goodsey**

title: StockX - Buy & Sell Sneakers, Streetwear + More
description:
StockX is the safest and fastest way to buy and sell authentic sneakers, shoes, streetwear, watches, collectibles, and handbags. Every product from brands like Nike, Adidas, Jordan, Supreme New York, Palace, Yeezy, and Off White is authenticated for free by our team of specialists, so the quality and legitimacy is 100% guaranteed. 

Featured in: ESPN, The New York Times, WSJ, Forbes, TechCrunch, Yahoo Finance, CNN, GQ, BBC, The Daily Show, Hypebeast, Bleacher Report, Highsnobiety...and many more.

How it Works:
-StockX functions like a stock market, where sellers place asks and buyers place bids. When a bid and ask meet, the sale is executed, automatically and instantaneously. 

Buy and Sell with Confidence:
-Sellers send items to StockX for verification by our team of experts, ensuring buyers receive authentic products and sellers never need to worry about chargebacks. Have peace of mind knowing that you are buying legit products from Nike, Adidas, Jordan, Supreme, Bape, Yeezy, Vans, Rolex, Gucci, Louis Vuitton and many other respected brands.

Buy and Sell with Intelligence:
-StockX gives you access to real-time market data, so you know that the price you buy and sell for is fair. Look no further when you want to find out how much your latest pair of rare Jordans go for on the market.

Track Your Portfolio:
-Upload your collection of sneakers, watches or handbags, and track changes in its value. Do you own a pair of grailed Supreme x Nike sneakers and want to know its current market value? StockX is your answer.

Items You Can Buy or Sell:

Sneakers: New deadstock condition sneakers including Adidas Yeezys, NMD, Ultra Boost, Retro Jordans, Nike, Vans, Converse, Puma, Reebok shoes and more.

Streetwear: Supreme, BAPE, Off White, Kith and Palace apparel, including box logo tees, hoodies, jerseys, hats and accessories

Luxury Handbags: Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Hermes and Chanel handbags. All handbags are pre-owned in excellent condition.

Luxury Watches: Brands including Rolex, Omega, Cartier, Breitling, Patek Philippe. All watches are pre-owned in excellent condition.

Collectibles: Kaws, Murakami, Supreme accessories, Bearbricks, trading cards and much more.

**First purchase offer: $50 off handbags, $300 off watches.**

recentChanges:
v4.9.14

You know the drill. This latest update makes the StockX app you love better than ever, with new performance upgrades and bug fixes.
comments: Never have I had a more infuriating app. It crashes contantly (running on Samsung S8+), which logs me out each crash, cannot load my sell history, and fails to load images properly so I cannot see things in the FAQ. Great experience selling on a computer, I'll pass on the app for now. Update April 17 2020: App does not reflect accurate prices if it is not updated. This is ridiculous and makes me not want to use the platform.

The app is okay however, recently I have encountered a problem. Every time I submit and ask, another ask at £1 lower than mine appears. Then it tells me I am not the lowest ask. I then delete my ask and that one that was £1 below me magically disappears. I even tried submitting an ask about £70 less than the next ask. As soon as I submit then an ask with £1 less than mine appears. It is so frustrating - please sort it out. Selling with stockx is very straightforward usually.

Gave up after the 10th time I've entered my CC and shipping info only to have it enter it again this morning because it fails to save. GAVE UP other apps aren't as much of a hassle and they take way less when you sell. It made me rethink this whole experience. Dev: I have listed my issue please do not ask me to email you with my problem I have just written about...

Terrible Android Experience - It never fails after an update the ease of use is gone. Either it won't load or you can't log in etc. Hands down one of the most problematic apps on my device, and I've been fighting with it for a couple years now.

The application in it's is pretty cool. I love ordering from here. The product is always legit. However, the application doesn't allow me to log in like it use to. I literally have to log in on a computer in order for my information to be recognized.

title: Finish Line - Status

Get access to everything at all times with the Finish Line mobile app. Get in on the latest sneaker drops, keep tabs on your Status points and rewards, shop your favorite brands and more.

title: Menards®
description:
Download the Menards® Mobile App today to shop, access your account and take advantage of helpful and convenient tools!

Save BIG Money ® anywhere you go!

•	Apply for, view or make payments on your Menards® Big Card account in the Credit Center
•	Quickly check your Menards® gift card balances
•	Find all the information you need and shop smart with Buying Guides
•	Scan barcodes to see product details fast
AUGMENTED REALITY
Augmented Reality is an innovative feature allowing you to visualize a wide variety of Menards® products in your home before you buy. You can save and compare your options until you find the perfect product to complement your home’s existing decor.

WEEKLY ADS
View Menards® flyers full-screen and shop our deals with ease. It's as easy as browsing the weekly specials in your local newspaper.

GIFT REGISTRY
Take advantage of the Gift Registry Center to easily find or manage registries.

MY LISTS
Keep all your project, wish and shopping lists organized. Create and edit lists to help make your projects and shopping experience faster, easier and more convenient.

ORDER TRACKER
Keep an eye on the shipping progress of your store and online orders.

STORE DETAILS
Find all of the store information you need to plan your trip to any Menards® store location.

PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
Stay in the know with notifications pushed directly to your device. You can receive notifications on order statuses, new weekly flyers and flash sales, and events happening online and in-store.

PRODUCT CALCULATORS
Estimate the amount of a variety of products you will need for your project with handy product calculators.

RAY’S LIST
Browse Ray’s List to score the best bargain deals for unclaimed special orders, store display models, slightly dinged and dented products, and clearance merchandise.

HOW-TO VIDEOS
Learn how to complete a variety of projects with our large archive of How-To Videos.

comments: Great app but has terrible flaws with passwords and glitches. I have to change my password everytime I want to utilize anything personalized like the shopping cart or when I buy something... its incredibly frustrating. Meanwhile, the app shows I'm logged in with all my info. After a couple of attempts with my password I get locked out of my account. I save every password to an app, I know for sure I am using the correct password, as this is the only app I have this issue with.

**PLEASE!!! Fix the shopping cart. It was adjusting quantities on its own. Now shopping cart items don't save. It's useless as is. Menards is great. App, not so much. Item quantities multiply in the shopping cart. If I add 5 items, for example, and don't clear them within a couple days, soon are 10, then 40, then 400! Search engine is too broad. Entering a specific item description can bring up hundreds of items from different departments that have nothing to do with the description I entered.

Unreliable shopping cart. You can easily spend an hour or more putting project pieces together and adding them to your cart, only to find that when you go to your cart it is empty. Everything gone. You then have to start over from scratch. Also if you are logged into your account on a computer and the app, the shopping carts don't link up.. Aside from a faulty app, the processing fees at menards are rather high just to have them pull for pickup. Will adjust my review when this is fixed.

The app works ok, but product search results are far better on the website. I search for an item on the website & forgot to add it to my list. Searched for same product on the app & it wasn't there. I searched the website, found it & added it to my list. The product shows up when clicked on from my list in the app, but if you search it through the app using the Menards SKU or product model number it says not found. If you go through the department on the app it's still not there. Website it is.

It's okay if you're going to purchase things at the moment that you are using the app. But it won't store things in your cart for a later purchase. You can't build up a shopping cart and purchase the items later. I recommend this app if you're making a purchase at that exact moment but if you need time to get a shopping list together, the app doesn't work.

title: Photo Print - Free Same Day Photo Prints App
description:
Walgreens photo print: Printing photos at Walgreens just got easy: download our app for free and start photo printing your mobile photos today! 
Choose your photos, your print size (4x6, 5x7, square …), and quantity.
Select your nearest Walgreens store for 1 hour pickup, or enter a U.S. postal address to receive them in the mail ($2.99 flat fee).
Glossy and matte prints available

THE EASIEST AND FASTEST WAY TO WALGREENS PHOTO PRINT PHOTOS
Order prints on your phone in seconds, pick up and pay at Walgreens photo in 1 hour*! Turn your great moments and unforgettable memories into fabulous photo prints and gifts with walgreens photo print
HOW TO PRINT PHOTOS FROM YOUR PHONE
1. Select walgreens photos from your Android
2. Select the size & quantity of each walgreens photo, or create custom magnets, cards or a photobook
3. Crop & zoom each picture easily in app
4. Enter a delivery address or select your walgreens photo print / Duane Reade store
5. Follow your walgreens photos order status in real time and pick your order up in store in less than one hour at walgreens photo print

PRODUCTS & FEATURES
- Professional-quality photo printing services, printed on Kodak walgreens photos paper in multiple sizes: choose from 4x6 walgreens photos, 5x7 prints, or 8x10 enlargements Also available, square prints in 4x4 or 8x8 (perfect for Instagram photos)
- Create & print a photo collage in 4 different layouts, each with 4 of your favorite moments, special for walgreens photo print
- Personalized walgreens photos gifts for all occasions: Magnets, Posters, Canvas, Photobooks, Greetings cards, Christmas cards & invitations
- Fast & safe photo transfer with walgreens photo print
- A walgreens photos gallery that organizes your mobile walgreens photos by date taken
- Free order pickup or $2.99 flat-rate shipping
- Our walgreens photos products are manufactured exclusively in the United States

WHERE CAN YOU PRINT WALGREENS PHOTOS ?
PRINT PHOTOS AT WALGREENS PHOTO PRINT or Duane Reade using our enhanced Walgreens store locator. Choose your local Walgreens photos store or your friends & family one can enjoy your prints in 1hr. No need to wait in store to upload your photos at the walgreens app kiosk anymore or use your home photo printer. Plus when you pickup your photos in-store, you will benefit from Walgreens’ unique service and only pay in store if you are satisfied! Check the quality in store and ask for a free reprint if not 100% satisfied

SPECIAL DEALS
Receive Pictarine coupons and deals, exclusively for walgreens photos app users. If you have a walgreens photos coupon code, a cvs photo print coupon code, a rite aid photo coupon or a good walmart photo print coupon code, shoot us an email we’ll see what we can do

ABOUT WALGREENS
We are dedicated to changing the way you are printing your photos with this walgreens photo app. If you have any questions about this photo printing app, about family photo prints or walgreens photos coupon codes, contact us at photo.print@pictarine.com.
Our photo printing app is one of the best apps in the US among walgreens photo app, cvs photo app and walmart photo app
*Estimated order pickup times will be displayed at Walgreens photo app checkout. Most of the time photo printing is less than an hour.

Pharmacy & Health
- Refill prescriptions in seconds by scanning your barcode
- Manage your medications with Pill Reminder*
- Set friendly Rx Alerts for refills and pickups
- Skip the waiting room with a video chat via Live Doctor Consultation**
- Easily refill and check prescription status for you and your family

Savings & Rewards
- Browse the Weekly Ad anytime, anywhere
- Clip coupons and save instantly at checkout with Balance® Rewards
- Track your Balance® Rewards points*** and save at the register
- Earn Balance Rewards for healthy choices®

Shopping
- Shop products at home or on the go 
- Find your nearest Walgreens with Store Locator
- Use in store to save while you shop

recentChanges:
Hey photo lovers!

Good news! You can now order posters to be delivered at home!

We hope you'll love it and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any feedback.

Print you later ;)
comments: I took some pictures on my phone of my family and wanted to print them.I went to Walgreens and they told me how to set up everything through this Walgreens app. It was very easy to set up, and my pictures were ready in one hour as advertised. I was also able to choose the Walgreens I wanted to pick up my photos at..I give this app and Wagreens 5 stars.. Awesome !!! Yes, I would tell family and friends Thank You
Awesome. Love this app and quality of pictures. Easy. Pickup or delivery. Love this app. The only one I use. Been using this app for years with no problems. 😊
Just ordered, WOW! One of the easiest, smoothest process ever. Not one little glitch. Basic info, clear selections. Now can get my granddaughter's current pictures from home. Very pleased!
It's not an hour for any prints, FYI. Also, it doesn't connect to your Walgreen's photo account. This last one I probably assumed. Otherwise, it does the job.

This app was very user friendly and easy to use, it even showed any photos that would have a low quality and ask if I wanted to print or not.. a great app to collect memories from your phones photo gallery.

title: Receipt Pal: Shop, Earn Paid Rewards & Gift Cards
description:
Don't just throw out your receipts, earn great rewards for them! ReceiptPal offers valuable gift cards from retailers like Amazon, Visa, Walmart, Target, Home Depot, Lowes, and many others just for submitting everyday receipts for market research.

Every receipt will also earn you chances to win cash prizes in our weekly sweepstakes. Three winners will be announced every week. As long as you keep submitting receipts, you'll be entered automatically! 

EARNING REWARDS IS EASY
• Snap photos of your receipts from grocery stores, restaurants, and local retailers
• Earn points for every valid receipt
• Redeem your points for great rewards
• Automatically enter weekly sweepstakes for cash prizes


MORE WAYS TO EARN POINTS
• Connect your email and Amazon accounts to submit e-receipts automatically and earn points faster
• Earn bonus points and sweepstakes entries with fun new mini-games  


The more receipts you submit, the more points you earn, so get started today!

Don't just throw out your receipts, earn great rewards for them! ReceiptPal offers valuable gift cards from retailers like Amazon, Visa, Walmart, Target, Home Depot, Lowes, and many others just for submitting everyday receipts for market research.

The more receipts you submit, the more points you earn, so get started today!
summary: Earn cash, rewards, and game plays by submitting your receipts to ReceiptPal.
recentChanges:
Welcome to ReceiptPal 5.4. We've changed one of our monitoring tools to be even more responsive in case of any technical issue with the application!
And, as always, we've made some general app improvements.

We're always trying to make it more fun to turn receipts into rewards. If you're feeling the love, please rate/review this version and spread the word! Thanks for being a part of the ReceiptPal community!
comments: Good app, but needs improvements. I have my Amazon account connected and for the month of April 2020—none of my online receipts are accounted for. This is not the first time this has happened. I've uninstalled and reinstalled app, reconnected my accounts, but nothing works. There should be an option to reach customer service but this information is not available in the app. It takes a long time to accumulate points as well and a short period of time to upload receipts unlike some others.

Great idea earning points for taking pictures of your receipts. It just takes so long to actually gain the points even if you shop everyday to earn a gift card. I've been using it for three months now. Hopefully soon I'll have enough points for a gift card. 🙂 May 2020 Update....... I finally racked up enough points to get a $10 Amazon gift card. So happy, you all are awesome.

Challenging! I have successfully used this app for a while. I've had to update my connection for Amazon and email regularly as it doesn't seem to stay connected. Now it wont allow me to connect email anymore so that I am unable to cash out. Now I checked and neither Amazon or Google have any issues with my signing info but for quite some time this app says they do! I'm super irritated. I used to love and gave this app good ratings . I'm no longer supporting it!

I'd like to keep using this app but there's too many problems. I have a stack of receipts that I have been waiting to upload for about a week now. I can not upload because there haven't been any cards to upload them to. I have asked for new cards and was told that hardly anyone at ReceiptPal will be at work for 2 weeks. So what do i do when this stack of receipts expire? The point of this app is to upload receipts, not hold on to them. I'll find another app that is consistent. Thanks

I LOVE this app. Sure there are restrictions ans rules but its a great rewards service with an easy-to-use interface. Redemption is seamless and immediate. You can choose from "Amazon" or "Retail" (Walmart, Target, Best Buy, Visa, Starbucks, Lowe's, Home Depot, Fandango, and iTunes/App Store). Receipt photos are logged for reference and no personal data is stored/used from any uploads.I highly recommend this app, you won't be disappointed.

title: IKEA Store
description:
The IKEA Store app is here to make shopping in store smooth and simple. From planning your visit to finding and remembering everything when you get there, this is the perfect shopping companion. 
 
GET ORGANISED
Browse and search the IKEA range, then add products to a shopping list. Already made a shopping list on the IKEA website? Simply log in to access it in the app*.
 
PLAN YOUR TRIP
Find the nearest IKEA store based on your location and check opening hours and driving directions. See if products are in stock at your selected store so you can plan the best time to shop.  
 
VISIT IKEA
See where products on your shopping list are located in store and get helpful hints so you don't forget anything. Scan barcodes, QR-codes and article numbers to get product information and add products to your list. Then swipe right on product to mark it as collected and left to remove it from the list.
 
STAY INFORMED AND SAVE 
There’s always something going on at your local IKEA store. The app keeps you up to date with events, offers and new products. Sign up or log in to your IKEA FAMILY account so you can keep a digital IKEA FAMILY card to hand and make great savings.
 
— — 
* Currently the app will only synchronise with the most recently saved shopping list on the website.
Some features may not be available in all countries and all IKEA stores.
Your use of this app is governed by the Application License Agreement.

recentChanges: We’re always working on ways to improve our Store app’s performance, just as we’re always working to improve the everyday life for the many people. This release runs faster, performs better and is generally a notch better than earlier releases. Update today!
comments: 1) Why can't I complete online shopping from the app? Instead, I must go to website and complete the process there. (Well, at least I can find my lists there.) 2) Links to PDF manuals are not clickable. 3) Sometimes when I scroll through the search results and reach the end of page, I suddenly get an empty list and message 'no results'.

It became so frustrating using this app as well the website. Why did you split the buying process like this? It will be awesome at least having the shopping list from the app loaded on website. I spent a lot of time adding the same items on website and 30 minutes later the shopping list was empty. Even if the account its stored it keeps asking for authentication. IKEA I love your products but I hate your app and website. Please focus on one of them and make it work properly.

SO frustrating and cannot buy anything because of this badly designed app! Every single time I have to log in & my IKEA family card is not automatically connected. Half of my screen is always covered by store information & a cookies disclaimer and they *cannot* be removed. They pop back again after being closed. I save items in Favorites & on my shopping list and they're gone when I start another search. The pricing criteria is useless too: do you want to sort it ascending or ascending?

2/2002: Not updating it, current reviews sound worse. Old: Well, unlike some folks I can login, see my Ikea card, and do basic search type stuff. That said, the app lacks a bunch of really basic stuff (search history etc.) and is quirky... My current problems are (unlike the website) you can't download manuals... There's what looks like a link, but it does nothing. And I can't find store layout maps. It's probably for me more of a 3 * app... But I give it extra since Ikea is pretty great.

Two complaints: 1) When you scroll to the end of a results list, it refreshes and says there are no results at all. 2) It does not load different Shopping Lists when you select them. It gets stuck in the loading phase or says that it has finished loading but is still on the previous Shopping List. Please fix these bugs.

title: ALDI USA
description:
ALDI is your home for incredibly low prices on all your grocery needs. Now, you can stay up-to-date on our latest offers with the ALDI app.

Features:

* Weekly ALDI Finds Updates: With just one click you can get each week's ALDI Finds right at your fingertips.

* Create a Shopping List: Easily use our shopping list tool to create your list of must-have items.

* Store Locator: Find nearby ALDI stores from your current location – all with their address, directions, map and store hours.

* QR Code Reader: Use our QR Code Reader to view special content on some of your favorite items.


----


Permissions

* Network communication: This permission is used for the retrieval of the current Special Buys and the most recent store data. Information on the user is not transmitted, except for when using the e-mail reminder service. Please refer to our data protection policy for further information.

* Network communication: Before the most recent information is retrieved, a check will be carried out to determine whether a data connection is actually available. If this is not the case, a corresponding notification message will be displayed.

* System boot: Up until now, any reminders set via this app were deleted when rebooting the smartphone. This error did not affect e-mail reminders. With this new permission, the reminders will be reregistered in the system upon each reboot.

* Access to protected storage: This will enable the ALDI USA app to allow Google Maps to cache the map. The ALDI USA app will not directly access your external storage media.

* Approximate location: Using GPS requires a comparably high level of performance. Therefore, the ALDI USA app will initially try to determine your location for the Store Locator functionality by other means.

* Your location: The GPS location is required for the Store Locator functionality.

* Hardware controls (pictures/videos, vibration alarm, flash/light): The nearest stores can be displayed by means of augmented reality functionality. In addition, many of the QR codes printed on our product packages can be scanned via the “QR Code Reader.”

developerAddress:
Mintarder Str. 36-40
45481 Mülheim an der Ruhr
Germany
recentChanges:
You can look forward to the following new features and improvements:

- Integration of push notifications
- Support of devices with iOS 13
- Improvement of the general image quality in the app
- User interface troubleshooting and optimization
comments: App is easy to use. I would like to see food labels pictured for those of us who rely on them to guide our healthy lifestyle. Order early. Please select a date/time, I picked First Available. Everyday that date gets pushed back. So much time has passed I keep adding food to the cart but it won't let me increase the tip. I have now picked a date hoping it will be on schedule. I wish you provided curbside pick up like the app say but that service is not available in our store. Be patient at home.

I liked this app until the past 2-3 weeks. Or seems to have some glitches going on. 1. The zoom in messes up or won't work at all when trying to get a better look at something. (It's not my phone) 2. When looking at each category the list doesn't go to the top right away, but goes very slow and jerky to the top. It will not let you scroll up. It will pop back down and do it's slow jerky scrolling itself. It's very frustrating. Will give 5☆'s when fixed.

Useless. You can't search by product (ie - mayonnaise), when you do find an item, majority are listed without price but rather "see price in store." I want to be able to search all items on my list and have a good idea how much the total is before I go. Check out the Ralph's app for how it should be done. I love Aldi and am so disappointed with this "app" About the only functionality was to be able to look at the weekly ad.

This app is pretty good for making a list of the special finds you want to purchase. Previously, you could see the finds sorted in your list by which date they were released. Then you could see them sorted by release, though there was no date attached. Now it seems they are all piling together in one mixed up list, which is not useful. You can't delete items based on how old they are.

Not very helpful. I use this app to see what the special buys will be every week, but it no longer separates the list of saved items by date. It's a pain to try to remember which week everything I'm interested in is on sale. The grocery list feature is not user friendly. It would be nice to see what's available or not at my local Aldi. I love shopping at Aldi, but I wish their app was more than just a weekly ad.

title: JCPenney
description:
Find the best online shopping deals, rewards and coupons on your phone - it’s easy! Find exclusive discounts and shop women's clothes, shoes, home and much more with JCPenney.

So whether you’re searching for discounts on women's clothes, housewares or even a gift card for someone special, at JCPenney you’re guaranteed to find offers you want, at prices you love. This is online shopping made easy!

Deals on clothes, fun rewards and more! 
5 ways JCPenney will help you find the products you love for less!

1. Online shopping deals - browse discounts on women's clothes, shoes, bedding & more.
2. Rewards & offers - You can use our FREE rewards program via the app.
3. Coupons - Save coupons to your wallet and use in-app or in-store.
4. Gift card - Got a JCPenney gift card? Apply it to your purchase in just a few steps.
5. Shop & Collect - Buy items in the app and pick them up the same day from a nearby store.

SHOP & SAVE
Don’t miss out on our amazing shopping deals! Save coupons to your wallet and use the coupons when shopping in-app or show the barcodes to any JCPenney associate to apply them to your order. Easy!

ONLINE SHOPPING
Our Price Check feature lets you scan barcodes in store to learn more. You can also use our Snap to Shop feature to take a picture of your favorite items and we’ll find similar products that you can shop instantly via the app.

GIFT CARD, REWARDS & OFFERS
Not only are your coupons and offers just a swipe or tap away but now you can also save them to your wallet! Manage your gift card or access offers straight from your phone.

CLOTHES, SHOES & MORE
Find all the women's clothes, shoes, makeup, and housewares you want easily with our modern design. You can even buy products directly in the app and then pick them up in store.

HOME, FURNITURE & BEDDING
Shop home decór, beautiful bedding and stunning furniture right here, at JCPenney. Whether you’re looking for new statement furniture or want to redecorate your home, you can find the perfect accessories in home, furniture and bedding. 

Want to stay up to date with the hottest deals? Don’t worry, we’ve got you! Opt-in to be one of the first customers to get notified via push notifications or the in-app inbox of the latest promotions, discounts, offers, and shopping events going on at JCPenney. From clothes to jewelry to home goods we’ll make sure you don’t miss discounts and deals!

JCPenney Credit Card
Managing your JCPenney credit card is now easier than ever with our app! Now you can easily view your balance, pay your bill, and see offers just for JCPenney credit cardholders.

We love feedback! Love the JCPenney App? Please consider leaving us a 5-star rating! Questions or comments? Please use the App Feedback section in the app. We’d love to hear about your experience.

Download the JCPenney app today to get the latest offers on clothes, makeup, home goods, and more!

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Find all the women's clothes, shoes, makeup, and housewares you want easily with our modern design. You can even buy products directly in the app and then pick them up in store.

HOME, FURNITURE & BEDDING
Shop home decór, beautiful bedding and stunning furniture right here, at JCPenney. Whether you’re looking for new statement furniture or want to redecorate your home, you can find the perfect accessories in home, furniture and bedding.

Want to stay up to date with the hottest deals? Don’t worry, we’ve got you! Opt-in to be one of the first customers to get notified via push notifications or the in-app inbox of the latest promotions, discounts, offers, and shopping events going on at JCPenney. From clothes to jewelry to home goods we’ll make sure you don’t miss discounts and deals!

JCPenney Credit Card
Managing your JCPenney credit card is now easier than ever with our app! Now you can easily view your balance, pay your bill, and see offers just for JCPenney credit cardholders.

We love feedback! Love the JCPenney App? Please consider leaving us a 5-star rating! Questions or comments? Please use the App Feedback section in the app. We’d love to hear about your experience.

Download the JCPenney app today to get the latest offers on clothes, makeup, home goods, and more!

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
summary: Shop clothes, shoes, bedding, home & more. Save with exclusive deals & rewards!
recentChanges:
We are expanding our primary navigation test that makes access to the wallet section easy. Don’t forget to give us your feedback, especially if you are seeing this new experience.
Made additional product and sales images tappable.
Fixed several bugs reported by our app users.
Improved app performance & security.
comments: I love shopping online. There is a larger variety of sizes, colors, styles and discounts than in the store but the app is super slow it gets frustrating browsing around. Pages take forever to load, pushing the back button takes forever, lags, glitches just frustrating. If you already know what you want its fine for the most part. I like being able to see my rewards status but I've also had issues with the rewards as well and have missed out on several $10 rewards.

I am over the Moon that I can finally pay my credit card bill on my app! It's so easy! It use to be such a hassle. The only Star missing in my JCP Life is if I could get the option to receive my Rewards notice by text instead of email. I hardly check my emails and I have a ton so it would be perfect to get them in a text so I have it right there. Plus my store has bad signal. So when Im at the register, I have to go outside to find my email and then come back in. I hope you guy's can fix this.

App is great to get the coupons and extra discounts that are always available but using the price check scanner is extremely hit or miss, mostly miss. I've tried it on 3 separate devices running 3 different versions of Android and the problem is always the same... Open the scanner and the camera view is solid black so it can't "see" the tag to scan for a price. Clearing app and systems cache doesn't work nor does restarting app or device. Other than this issue the app is great.

This app sucks so bad. I have uninstalled and reinstalled 4x now. I don't know why I keep trying to use it. I have a total of approximately $819.00 worth of stuff in my cart and cant even open it up. This has happened numerous times.....so sick of it. Gonna uninstall again, finish paying my account balance. Guess what jcpenney goodbye...sick of trying. An app is supposed to make things easier.....NOT!!!

Any ease of signing up for an account is negated by that stupid birthday date method. If a person was not born in the 2000s its a pain in the ass. This should be obliterated. Just let a person type in their birth date OR have the drop down option. If someone knows how to use this annoying feature without FLIPPING through decades please let me know in your comments.

title: Newegg Mobile
description:
Upgrade your online shopping with Newegg! We are the largest electronics e-retailer in North America and we sell millions of products in 50 countries like the USA, Canada, Saudi Arabia, Australia, United Kingdom and more. Browse through our products and read through the 4M+ reviews we have collected from customers like you. Our app puts Newegg’s award winning marketplace in your hands and makes it convenient to shop.

Features & Functionality
We have taken everything you love about Newegg.com and put it in our app. Whether you are a new or existing customer, we make it easy for you to buy. With our app, you can easily log into an existing account if you are a previous customer. If you are new to the Newegg family, we welcome you! Feel free to shop as a guest or create an account today so you do not miss out on our amazing deals.

You can check an order’s status, scan barcodes, give feedback, write reviews, check or adjust your account’s settings, create wish lists, read product reviews, chat with Newegg, personalize your homepage and so much more. You can even do a side-by-side comparison of products’ features and pricing from categories like:

1. Computer Systems
2. Computer Components
3. Electronics
4. Gaming
5. Networking
6. Office Solutions
7. Software & Services

Discounts & Deals
At Newegg, we are proud to offer our customers the highest quality merchandise at a great price. You can be sure that all of our products will be competitively priced, and you may find yourself constantly watching for our killer sales. Activate notifications on your phone so you can be the first to know about Newegg’s promotions or get pricing alerts about your favorite products. With Newegg's app you can follow our Daily Deals, Shell Shocker, or Newegg Flash sales.

recentChanges:
- Dark mode is finally here!
- Improved the way to communicate with our customer service.
- Also includes some bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Pro: Pretty easy navigation around the store, simple to use filters to help find the item you want. Con: The app seems to freeze when it's in the background too long. When trying to come back to it, you get an unending loading screen. Closing and reopening the app fixes it, but it's a fairly common occurrence.
Pretty good. Much better experience then the mobile site. Need to get used to using the apps back button rather than my phone's.

I have been using New Egg for years, this app makes their shopping experience super easy, especially when it comes to my custom PC builds. I am on my third build with them, they always have the latest technology in stock, and I have always been able to build so far ahead of the curve with premium components where builds have lasted me a good 6 to 10 years. My last build was Win 7 is still going strong today, even though Win 7 as an OS is not.

I enjoy the mobil app for new egg alot. The compare options for checking items is nice. Customer service seams to reply within a day, as well as the filter options and site search are reliable when you know what your looking for. Plus who doesn't love to open up an app to see the egg buster deal and its apart you've been eyeing for a while.

The app is fairly easy and straightforward to understand. Most of the time the portals are well designed for mobile use and are easy to navigate. The only gripe I have is that the app can get really slow at times, usually when viewing a product.

title: Five Guys Burgers & Fries
description:
Skip the line! Find the closest Five Guys Burgers & Fries restaurant, place your order, and pick up your food today.

1) Launch the app and find your Five Guys.

2) The first time you'll sign in or create a new account it links up with our online ordering site at http://www.gofiveguys.com

3) Order your food - don't forget to save your order as a Favorite for next time.

4) Go pick it up!  Skip the line and head straight to the order pickup counter at the store, tell them your name and get your food.
descriptionHTML:
Skip the line! Find the closest Five Guys Burgers & Fries restaurant, place your order, and pick up your food today.

1) Launch the app and find your Five Guys.

2) The first time you'll sign in or create a new account it links up with our online ordering site at http://www.gofiveguys.com

3) Order your food - don't forget to save your order as a Favorite for next time.

4) Go pick it up! Skip the line and head straight to the order pickup counter at the store, tell them your name and get your food.
summary: Now taking orders from your Android!
recentChanges: Implemented a workaround for Google Maps crash
comments: Gets the job done for online orders, but could still use some QoL improvements. Intead of going up to the counter to say im there, it would be nice if I could just tap an "I'm here" button in the app.
While the app allows customization of burgers, I feel like the fries are left out. Personally, I love well done fries, but in this case it's not an option. Nor is a option to ask for condiments
Won't let me login. Says email or password is wrong, but I can login on a computer. 1 star until fixed.
App shuts down as soon as I tap on anything.
Credit card scanner doesn't work.

title: Ralphs
description:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Ralphs app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Ralphs Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:

- Shop Pickup or Delivery right from the app!

- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your online order.

- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.

- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.

- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.

- Refill your Ralphs Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.

- Check your fuel points.

- Use our locator to find the closest Ralphs store or fuel center.

- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.

- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.

To use the Ralphs app, you'll need a Ralphs digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!

summary: Save with Ralphs! Coupons, ads, rewards, find stores & shopping list in one app!
recentChanges:
We’re working around the clock to ensure our services and products are available to you. Here are some release highlights:

- March fuel points extended until May 31!
- Log in to your account with your Apple ID.
- Get paid to shop with Cash Back, our newest Way to Save!
- Temporary quantity restrictions displayed for certain high-demand products.

We value your feedback. If you need help or have a suggestion, please contact our Customer Service Center at 1-800-576-4377.
comments: This app has serious problem with log-in and finger print. I have uninstalled and reinstalled several times just to access my shopping list. I guess Kroger has hired some very incompetent people to create this app. It's a shame it could have been a great tool for groceries shopping. I will reinstall one last time, hopefully it works, if not, it will end up in trash folder

Everytime I open the app to sign in it keeps telling me to change my password for my security. Just for today I changed my password 4x. So irritating. It still does it. I uninstalled and reinstalled and it's still doing it.

As others have said, items don't appear in the cart. I noticed they do show up later on after you've given up and used Pavilion's instead. Can't imagine how much money Ralph's is losing over this bug. Delivery charge for about 2 bags of groceries was $10 which is also too much when you add a tip.

Bad experience. No search capability. After spending an hour searching and adding items to shopping cart the app says "something went wrong" upon checkout! Does not save the shopping cart upon return! Wow! Not wasting time anymore with this.
Update to previous review. They fixed the password issue and now am able to log in without having to reset.

title: Route - Package Tracker for Your Online Orders
description:
The Route App brings package tracking and delivery to life. No more wondering where your package is—has it been shipped? Is it stuck in transit? Delivered? Now you can visually track your package’s journey from checkout to doorstep, review previous online orders and handle delivery issues (lost, stolen, damaged) all in one place.
 
Route connects with millions of online stores and over 600 shipping carriers worldwide, including Amazon, FedEx, UPS, USPS, DHL and more. 
 
“Shopping made simpler” - HYPEBEAST
“Your go-to package tracker” - NBC News

Route is the premier package and order tracker for online shoppers. 

WHY YOU’LL LOVE ROUTE

Visual Tracking™- Hate searching for tracking numbers? Us too. Route seamlessly connects to every online order and makes package tracking a breeze. 

Real-time push notifications - Route syncs in real-time with shipping carriers like FedEx, UPS and USPS to provide shipping updates that keep you informed from the minute you checkout until your package arrives safely on your doorstep. 

Universal order history - Gone are the days of digging through emails to find old online purchases. Route automatically stores and organizes every order (including Amazon) for quick review and reorders.

Unrivaled privacy - Don’t worry, the Route Bot pulls only the necessary information to track your packages, and never shares it.
 
Questions? Contact us at feedback@route.com.

summary: Track all of your packages and online orders in one app - Amazon, FedEx, & USPS
recentChanges: Squashed some bugs and improved the app's performance.
comments: Doesn't track in real time. It just looks at your order update emails and then transfers that data to the app. There is no need for this app because USPS just does it better and actually works. The "report a bug" section isn't even developed! It literally says "sub-category 1, 2, and 3" when you tap on it! Waste of time and space!

This has been awful. It tells me I need a code. I go back to my email account and get the code and then u say its unvalid. I have been dealing with this repeatedly for over a half an hour This is useless! I can't set up the app. It keep s sending me new codes but when I get back to the screen to enter the code, they have invalidated it.

This app gives no idea what is going on. The map seems to never change. I've seen the same set up I saw day one, except new icons keep popping up. Apperently there is two packages instead of one now. This morning a random icon appeared in a new state with no explanation why. It does not feel live at all except for the normal notifications of where your package was checked into once a day.

Wont let me log-in through google... Then it asked for my email address to create a new account, I should already have an account because in order to even purchase anything i had to provide my email and password... but it rejected it... I just wanna track my package!! Why does it have to be such an irdeal??? Edit: I understand that..however, its not accepting my email address..plus I paid for 2 day delivery and its been 3days so far with no package..idk about this....
Love seeing all the orders in one place. Super intuitive and easy to work. But hands down the best part is not needing to scan through my email to find tracking numbers anymore.

title: Depop - Streetwear & Vintage Fashion Marketplace
description:
Buy and sell your clothes, sneakers, streetwear and more on the fashion community’s ultimate streetwear & vintage fashion marketplace, Depop. Shop streetwear brands, rare vintage pieces and discover the latest trends, all from your phone.

Mobile fashion marketplace ⎼ How does it work?
• Buying and selling ⎼ Browse listing from +18M users or create your own in just a few steps
• Streetwear brands ⎼ Yeezy, adidas, Supreme, Champion, Off-White... find all your favorites
• Vintage fashion ⎼ Buy and sell rare and one-off vintage pieces
• Sneakers galore ⎼ Nike Air Jordans, adidas Ultraboosts, Vans and more; buy and sell your kicks here
• Fashion community ⎼ Connect with people who are buying and selling from across the globe

Find fashion inspiration, follow friends and connect with people who inspire you. From vintage pieces or the hottest streetwear brands, Depop has them all. Whether you’re buying the latest Yeezy trainers or selling accessories from Urban Outfitters, our fashion marketplace makes everything easy for you.

CLOTHES SHOPPING
Use in-depth filters to find the clothes you’re looking for; search by item, brand, size, price range, and more. You can also view the clothes or accessories we’ve chosen for you based on your interests. So if you’re a lover of brands like Urban Outfitters or you prefer Yeezy or Supreme, we’ll find pieces you love.

STREETWEAR BRANDS
From Nike and adidas to Supreme, Off-White, Champion and more ⎼ buying or selling your streetwear couldn’t be easier. Get creative with your look or let others inspire you. Before the trends hit the streets, they land on Depop.

SNEAKERS
Find an amazing collection of new and vintage sneakers. Sneakerheads will love our vast collection of kicks and sellers. With everything from Off-White, Yeezy to Nike, come on in and take a look ⎼ your grail sneakers might be closer than you think.

BRANDS & LABELS
Our fashion marketplace, lets you find the brands you love ⎼ at the best prices. Whether you’re casually clothes shopping for pieces from Urban Outfitters or looking for your sneaker grail, we’ve got you covered. Buy and sell popular brands like:

Champion
Adidas
Nike
Champion
Off-White
Supreme
Vans
Urban Outfitters
Yeezy
...and many more

DEPOP COMMUNITY
Depop also hosts a range of events like local meetups, Lunch & Lists, and Depop parties across the globe, so you can meet and chat with sellers, artists, and influencers.

Join the Depop community and connect with +18M stylists, designers, artists, collectors, vintage sellers, sneakerheads and more. Follow up-and-coming fashion influencers and be the first to discover the latest trends.

Download Depop now! See you on the Explore page.

summary: Buy and sell clothes, sneakers & more. Streetwear & vintage fashion marketplace.
recentChanges:
We've been working hard to squash some pesky bugs for you.

Love Depop? Don't forget to leave us a review
comments: I love Depop but come on guys...your app is constantly glitching, buttons aren't responding, windows are exiting randomly, draft posts are saving duplicates and the word count keeps jittering up and down even when I'm not typing!! It's a beautifully simple app and well designed, but the mechanics of it are incredibly poor and cause me a lot of frustration and wasted time as a seller. It has been this way for a long time...time for change!

I honestly am not sure what other users are complaining about.. only times I've had "glitches" was from poor cell service.. Any issues I've ever had on the app were with buyers trying to get everything for nothing.. All I know is, Depop has ALWAYS had my back or so I've felt. I'm not a top seller, and never have been so don't think that's why, like whether you've sold 1 item or 100, Depop makes you feel welcome, feel proud and feel free to be yourself and sell the way you want. xo

Still love the app, but now I have to wait until the word counter finishes tallying each character before I can do anything with a drafted post. And if I back out before the tallying is done, my post gets deleted and to have to restart from the beginning. edit: Now posts I make are deleted and a notification pops up saying "not found" so that's pretty cool :(

Very glitchy, when trying to upload an item after uploading the images the page will freeze, have to save it to drafts (it also creates multiple drafts of the one item) and continue writing the text where it will then freeze again, so I have to close and open the app, hoping it saved the description for the item to drafts so I can fill out the category, size, price ect. Drafts wouldn't show so I reinstalled the app, it just deleted all 20 of my saved drafts. Hate this app.

Im experiencing glitching. Would get 5 stars otherwise. When creating a post the post and save to drafts buttons do not work. It then starts scrolling down endlessly and eventually will crash. It doesnt matter how many times you close it and open it again, it does the same thing. And yes it is updated and I've tried uninstalling it. 🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄

title: 5miles: Buy and Sell Used Stuff Locally
description:
5miles opened a new channel called 5miles Dash. It is a new auction feature that allows you to bid on brand new items.
- Auctions last 90 seconds and bids start at $1.
- Only pay when you win.
- Items are shipped directly to your door.
- If user is unsatisfied with a product, we offer buyer protection so you can request a refund.
- Claim up $5 in credits towards your first purchase.

5miles is the top-rated buy and sell app: local shopping made easy, safe, and fun. Discover great classifieds in your area or far away. Buy & sell your stuff, find a place to live, hire local services, or get a new job all from the comfort of your smartphone. FREE to list. FREE to discover. Buy and sell within 5 miles.

FREE to list. FREE to discover. FREE to boost. All within 5 miles.

Easy
• Snap a photo and offer up your items in seconds
• Use GPS and zip code to find thousands of listings nearby
• Make an offer by sending an in app chat message
• Free to boost your post to send it to the top of the feed
• Easy registration via Facebook or email
• Share your listings via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, and Email

Safe
• Email, phone, and Facebook verifications
• Rate and read reviews of buyers and sellers
• Use our Safe Area Exchange Locator (SEAL) feature to find a secure meetup spot 
• 5miles team constantly monitors listings and chats to keep fraud away
• 5miles doesn't share your information with anyone
• Don't want to meetup? Choose shipping for your exchange method

Fun
• Discover great stuff near and far by browsing photos
• Search and filter to find relevant listing
• Like items and follow sellers
• Make offers and get the best deals
• Chat to share more details, photos, and meeting spots
• Share listings to Facebook and Twitter to sell faster

What makes 5miles different from other buy and sell apps?
1. Phone number verification to reduce spam and fraud
2. Access to SEAL (Safe Exchange Area Locators)
3. Boost, a feature to move your listings to the top of the feed, free of charge
4. User reviews
6. Includes Services, Jobs, and Housing categories
6. Tools to help sellers sell faster
7. Shipping and online payment features
8. Find or post Deals & Events in your area. Everything from restaurant deals to estate sales.

5miles is like having your own online garage sale without the hassle. You can search for products like furniture, household goods, electronics, cell phones, cars, auto parts, jewelry, purses, clothing, shoes, and more....

Find a cleaning service, handyman, plumber, babysitter, mover, creative professionals and more. Make sure to check their reviews first to find one you can trust.

Looking for housing? Find apartments, houses, and condos for rent or sale. Landlords, list your real estate in a snap!

Looking for work? Find jobs near you! Full-time, part-time, freelance jobs, or short gigs. 

Looking for your next happy hour, hair cut, massage, car repair deal, and more? Check out our Deals & Events. Find or post everything from garage sales to service deals to automotive deals and many more.

How to use 5miles:

Buying

1) Browse listings
2) Make an offer or chat with the seller
3) Have the item shipped or meet up with the seller

Selling

1) Snap a photo, set the price and add a description
2) Communicate with buyers through the in app chat feature
3) Ship or meet up with a buyer

FREE for everyone. No service or transaction fees to buy or sell.

Download now and discover great things from the 5miles community. Enjoy the experience of selling and buying locally. Are you ready to go shopping?

Want to find out more about us? 
https://www.5miles.com/

More ways to connect with 5miles:
http://facebook.com/5milesapp
http://twitter.com/5milesapp
http://instagram.com/5milesapp
Email: hello@5milesapp.com
