5miles is the top-rated buy and sell app: local shopping made easy, safe, and fun. Discover great classifieds in your area or far away. Buy & sell your stuff, find a place to live, hire local services, or get a new job all from the comfort of your smartphone. FREE to list. FREE to discover. Buy and sell within 5 miles.

FREE to list. FREE to discover. FREE to boost. All within 5 miles.

Easy
• Snap a photo and offer up your items in seconds
• Use GPS and zip code to find thousands of listings nearby
• Make an offer by sending an in app chat message
• Free to boost your post to send it to the top of the feed
• Easy registration via Facebook or email
• Share your listings via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, and Email

Safe
• Email, phone, and Facebook verifications
• Rate and read reviews of buyers and sellers
• Use our Safe Area Exchange Locator (SEAL) feature to find a secure meetup spot
• 5miles team constantly monitors listings and chats to keep fraud away
• 5miles doesn't share your information with anyone
• Don't want to meetup? Choose shipping for your exchange method

Fun
• Discover great stuff near and far by browsing photos
• Search and filter to find relevant listing
• Like items and follow sellers
• Make offers and get the best deals
• Chat to share more details, photos, and meeting spots
• Share listings to Facebook and Twitter to sell faster

What makes 5miles different from other buy and sell apps?
1. Phone number verification to reduce spam and fraud
2. Access to SEAL (Safe Exchange Area Locators)
3. Boost, a feature to move your listings to the top of the feed, free of charge
4. User reviews
6. Includes Services, Jobs, and Housing categories
6. Tools to help sellers sell faster
7. Shipping and online payment features
8. Find or post Deals & Events in your area. Everything from restaurant deals to estate sales.

5miles is like having your own online garage sale without the hassle. You can search for products like furniture, household goods, electronics, cell phones, cars, auto parts, jewelry, purses, clothing, shoes, and more....

Find a cleaning service, handyman, plumber, babysitter, mover, creative professionals and more. Make sure to check their reviews first to find one you can trust.

Looking for housing? Find apartments, houses, and condos for rent or sale. Landlords, list your real estate in a snap!

Looking for work? Find jobs near you! Full-time, part-time, freelance jobs, or short gigs.

Looking for your next happy hour, hair cut, massage, car repair deal, and more? Check out our Deals & Events. Find or post everything from garage sales to service deals to automotive deals and many more.

How to use 5miles:

Buying

1) Browse listings
2) Make an offer or chat with the seller
3) Have the item shipped or meet up with the seller

Selling

1) Snap a photo, set the price and add a description
2) Communicate with buyers through the in app chat feature
3) Ship or meet up with a buyer

FREE for everyone. No service or transaction fees to buy or sell.

Download now and discover great things from the 5miles community. Enjoy the experience of selling and buying locally. Are you ready to go shopping?

Want to find out more about us?
https://www.5miles.com/

More ways to connect with 5miles:
http://facebook.com/5milesapp
http://twitter.com/5milesapp
http://instagram.com/5milesapp
Email: hello@5milesapp.com
summary: 5miles isn't just a buying selling app. It’s a way to become a better neighbor.
recentChanges:
5miles opened a new channel called 5miles Dash. It is a new auction feature that allows you to bid on brand new items.- Auctions last 90 seconds and bids start at $1.
- Only pay when you win.
- Items are shipped directly to your door.
- If user is unsatisfied with a product, we offer buyer protection so you can request a refund.
- Claim up $5 in credits towards your first purchase.
comments: Use to be good. I bought something from an "auction" just to try it out. The app sent it to my old address and I was out the money from May(purchase date) until almost January this year. Having to write(email) over and over. Done with the app. I have things posted for sale. This is the ONLY reason I have the app. I DO NOT buy anything on 5mile anymore, I use offer up.

App has changed so much, it's just not the same. Pitiful views, no boost option except with coin rewards which are just a waste of time to complete, and why is this app using over 1G of my storage space? That's un heard of. The Dash feature needs to be monitored unless this is no longer a family friendly app, I mean items range from crotchless lingerie to bondage looking items and barely nude models showcasing these? Seriously guys, not family friendly at all

find anything you need on this app at awesome prices!!! EDITED: I live in the United States but for some reason when I try to share the link to friends or share the app for them to download, it says "sorry this is not available in your country" ??? So exactly what countries actually get the rewards for sharing the app with their friends? I will change my review back to 5 stars when I get a good reason for this. Other than is issue, I have loved the app so please let me know why.
It's been great so far. Easy to find what you're looking for, not many ads. Haven't sold anything yet but it hasn't been that long and I already received messages from people trying to buy my stuff.
I've noticed the app is filled with lots of scammers. The app design is actually very easy to use, but it's not worth sifting through the months old listings and trying to avoid all the fake listings

title: The Children's Place
description:
The Children’s Place new mobile app is here with a brand-new look and user-friendly features. 
•    Get instant access to all the on-trend fashions for kids of all ages including babies, toddlers and tweens. 
•    Stay logged in at all times to quickly place orders on the go. 
•    Be the first to know about the latest sales and special events via push notifications. 
•    Manage your My Place Rewards account and redeem rewards on your purchases.
•    Easy access to your My Place Rewards and PLACE cash coupons. 
•    Find locations near you and check store hours.
•    Save time and check if the styles, colors and sizes you need are available in your nearest location before you go. 
The Children’s Place app is an easier, faster and overall better way to shop our PLACE!

As America's leading store for kids fashion (sizes newborn – 16), The Children's Place is the affordable kids clothing brand you can trust.  Download our new mobile app today for access to all the latest clothing you (and your kids!) will love.

recentChanges: You mentioned, we listened! The latest iOS update includes a fix that resolves the login issue you might have encountered. Happy shopping!
comments: Love the app but one recommendation I would give is to be able to select multiple size to the bag at one time selection. For example I have a 7 and 9 year old so it would be easier to select a shirt size for a 7 and a 10/12 at the same time. Instead of adding one item, clicking out of the pop up box and then making the next selection. Also, the favorites list should be next to the 'my bag' icon for faster access. I forget that option exist and mainly rely on the 'saved for later'. Overall great!

The lag is BEYOND frustrating. I spent at least 2 hours (not exaggerating) trying to scroll through the girls selection (filtered was about 678 items) and I know that I didn't even get to see everything because it kept crashing. And every time after it crashed, I'd have to filter again and scroll to where I'd last viewed items. And every time, I'd have to wait to scroll because of how terrible the lag is. It's AWFUL

Not sure how this update makes anything faster. It took me a few hours just to make an order of 15 items... I'm shopping for 4 kids and while the older version could get laggy, it definitely was more user friendly There's no more easy access to the favorites list, and searching and filtering is horrible. Editing your bag takes forever, now that you're prompted to save everything for later. Honestly, it's enough that I might look for another store for my kid's clothing.

APP is GREAT!! I have been having problems lately trying to check-out online. The system would not let me check-out. Message "TRY LATER" I saw this app, decided to download it, and I checked out in less than 5 minutes. Thanks for the UPDATE! I tried ordering earlier during the day and the site was jumping around. Came back later, saw the update, and downloaded it. 🎉 Placed my order. 😊 Sheila 🐝

🤦‍♀️The new update has made the app even worse and completely unusable. It won't let me check out AT ALL. It used to work but was just very tedious. Not to mention ha, yesterday I had 2 place bucks, and now today suddenly I only have one?! Wth lol? I even still have the physical copies of the TWO!. Come on guys, for real?? , I'll just spend my money elsewhere then...-_-

title: Pampers Club: Gifts for Babies & Parents
description:
Join millions of experienced & new parents and turn your Pampers baby products into useful and fun reward points. Download the Pampers Club app and scan the codes on the inside of your diaper packs to get reward points. Plus, win guaranteed Instant Shopping Rewards for every 3 scans! Redeem your points for hundreds of rewards like baby gear, baby gifts, coupons for diapers, diaper deals, home products, gift cards, electronics, and more!
Parenting tips
Access a wealth of trusted pregnancy articles & baby articles. Explore subjects like: baby shower games, baby names, baby health, potty training, baby essentials, baby feeding, and more.  
Get rewards for the cash you spend on Pampers diapers, wipes and baby essentials! Collect reward points with every baby care product purchase and get pampered! There are tons of exciting shopping rewards waiting for you:

- Health and beauty gifts for mom & dad
- Baby toys and other baby items for fun times with your little one
- Home and living products
- Donations to various children’s charities that make an impact
- Big sweepstakes, amazing gift cards and free baby diapers
- Browse the gift catalog to find baby gifts, gifts for moms and dads and gifts for the family!
- Rewards coupons to turn your baby diapers and baby essentials into savings

Getting started:

• Download the Pampers Club app and create your Rewards Program account. Already registered with Pampers Rewards Program? Great! Then all you’ll need to do is sign in. Racking up reward points is quick and easy!
• Every time you buy Pampers diapers or baby wipes, add the product code with the app and get reward points and club deals.
• Redeem points and choose rewards! Discover a wide selection of shopping rewards including electronics, gift cards, baby gear, diaper coupons, club discounts on baby products, home and living items, and much more!

Terms and conditions: https://www.pampers.com/en-us/rewards-terms-conditions
Website: https://www.pampers.com/en-us/rewards

recentChanges: We made a couple of tech improvements so things flow better for you.
comments: I truly loved this app in the beginning!, but with all of the overwhelming amount of updates, and the point system which has seemed to gradually diminish and not equal to the amount of money spent, I am having second thoughts. The app itself is usually unresponsive, but the points are getting harder to earn & doesn't seem fair to redeem for anything worth $10 you could buy elsewhere. Pampers diapers, however is of true quality! But the rewards, eh. You could live with or without them. 😀

Update is garbage. I used to be able to actually see the rewards. With the update (they force you to download because previous versions are not accessible) I can't even view the rewards page. It's terrible glitchy. I used to love this app. It's sad bc I've used this app for four years and now it's basically useless to us.

Change for the worse - new points system is completely unattainable. I had been saving for one year to get nice rewards, like a photo album - now after the update all I can afford is a 5 dollar gift card. For a full year plus of buying diapers, I get 5 dollars. Now they don't offer any promos either. It's a waste unless you like shutterfly. *edit 4/19/20 - still garbage - no offers. Never any cash back options, why even have that in that on here?

app keeps crashing. when its working it is great and well designed. Update: 2/8/20 i havent been able to open the app for 2 months now. It is now completely un-usable. I had a lot of points on my account so this is extremely frustrating. Update: 4/10/20 app was updated and would open for about 2 weeks. Now will not even open again after last update. 5/5/20- attempted suggested fix. deleted app, restarted phone, reinstalled. app still will not work. will reach out to support for further help.

This app is sluggish, laggy, and frequently unresponsive. It doesn't always respond when I tap on a category in the rewards section. There's no haptic response to tapping on something, so you end up tapping repeatedly or tapping something else because you don't know if it's doing anything (a haptic response would be something like a click noise or the button lighting up to indicate you hit it). The only way I can see all the rewards I qualify for at once is apparently on the home screen because there's no convenient way to sort the rewards screen that way. To add to that frustration, the actual website changed the entire rewards section to just push the app on you, rather than let you view the rewards conveniently in a browser window. If I hadn't got a smartphone last year, I'd be unable to use my points at all because "obviously everyone and their dog has a smartphone now, so why would you NOT want to use the app?" I will say it was nice being able to scan diaper codes. Less so that there still wasn't a better way to enter the sometimes difficult-to-read wipes codes than manually typing them in. Overall, though, my experience with the app (and all its push notifications I couldn't figure out how to turn off) has been not great. Good riddance now that my youngest is potty-trained.

title: QVC Mobile Shopping (US)
description:
* The minimum version supported by QVC is v5.x and above for optimal usage.

MORE NEW FEATURES
• PayPal and PayPal Express payment methods.
• Predictive Search recognizes popular brands and keywords to help you get to your favorites faster. 
• Template-Driven Pages offer a sort and refine feature so users can filter results.
• Pinch & zoom on the product detail page to get a closer look at details.
• Voice Search—just tap on the microphone in the search bar and say the keyword or item number you’re looking for. You can even speak to launch Live TV, Program Guide, Item On Air, Items Recently On Air, and My Account.
• Persistent Login—added based on customer feedback! If you are signed in once, your sign-in credentials will be carried over to other screens within the app.
• Items in your cart are now accessible across all QVC platforms (iOS, Android, and QVC.com).
• For “Do Not Sell My Personal Information” rights under California law please refer to the Right to Opt-Out of Sales section of the QVC Privacy Policy.

EXISTING FEATURES
• Watch our full 16:9 HD live stream and purchase the current Item On Air.
• See customer ratings & reviews on our product detail pages and product listings. Plus on our enhanced product detail pages, view product images, information, sizing, color swatches, availability, and delivery date estimates.
• Find exactly what you're looking for with our full-search capability—search over 50,000 items by category, item number, product description, brand, phrase, or word. From there, you have the ability to narrow those search results.
• Easily navigate our enhanced homepage. Find our Today's Special Value® offer, One Day Only Price™ offers, and current Item On Air, plus Items Recently On Air and featured promotions.
• Narrow Items Recently On Air by show.
• Share items via Facebook or Twitter. Email an item to your friend or to yourself as a reminder to view later.
• Speed Buy® to purchase items quickly and confidently! New customers can easily create an account—anytime, anywhere. Our app can save your email address for faster future purchases.
• Get unlimited access to over 500 recipes from David Venable, host of QVC’s most-popular show, In the Kitchen with David®. Plus, watch recipe how-to videos; view backstage photos; and shop kitchen & food innovations.
QVC wants you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not satisfied for any reason, our return policy allows you to send back the merchandise within 30 days of the date you received the package for an exchange or a refund of the purchase price, minus the full shipping & handling and Q Return Label fees. QVC will refund any paid S&H fees and Q Return Label fees if an item is defective or we were in error. Purchases from QVC and the use of QVC services are subject to our General Terms and Conditions of Use and our Privacy Policy, which can be found at the bottom of the QVC.com homepage.
Award-winning Service: We've been honored multiple times with BizRate's "Circle of Excellence" distinction. We've also received Shopping.com's "Trusted Store" Seal, a prestigious vote of customer confidence awarded to online merchants.
QVC is committed to giving you quality service and treating your information responsibly. For details, please see our Privacy Statement.
QVC is VeriSign Secured, so you can feel confident while shopping with us. We participate in the VeriSign Secured Seal Program. All of your personal information is encrypted by Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) software when it's transmitted to us during the checkout process, just as it is on QVC.com. Also, your QVC PIN is never stored on your device.
Watching QVC's video stream may significantly increase the data usage amount of your mobile device and may incur additional fees. Contact your carrier for more information.
Android is a trademark of Google, Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.

recentChanges:
We’ve been hard at work on some enhancements to bring you the best mobile shopping experience possible.
In addition to some bug fixes, we’ve integrated the design across our website and apps for a more consistent experience across all our online platforms.
Loving what you find? Or have some improvements to suggest?. Please share your thoughts so we can continue to improve your performance.
comments: Ive had it! No trouble getting in. After closed and reopened a few hrs later I check order status and find them randomly duplicated!! Imagine opening the app and finding out you have 6 Clarisonics coming! This has happened MANY TIMES.Theres never less than 2! Q said to uninstall/install which Ive done 4 times. If I hadnt have caught it today I would have 4 Bose systems coming. Really??? Bottom line: NOT a good app for Android! Iphone sis has no probs!

I have had nothing but problems with this app. I used to be so fast and easy, but now it won't even accept my long time password. I have missed out on ordering items, because it doesn't recognize it's me. I have shopped here for 30+ years. Come on already!. Don't you know how frustrating this is!!?? I have uninstalled app, changed password and still have problems with this app. It is now Feb 29, 2020 and NOTHING IS FIXED. IT STILL HAS GLITCHES OF NOT BEING ABLE TO SIGN IN

When it allows you to sign in, everything goes smoothly,...but this signing in is a daily battle! If I want to check on today's deal or orders, maybe surf for deals, or items to be used in a story, it's like rolling dice to get in.
The app doesn't let me sign in to place my orders or to check order status place on a computer. It keeps telling me I need to reset my password if though it works fine on the computer.

I have shopped QVC thru ebates. Rakuten for years!! Was the easiest thing ever. Now I can't get it to work. Hubby is a Computer Engineer and has tried everything. Nothing works. I mean come on Rakuten get rid of this update and make it useable again!!! Geez they only do 1%. Disgusting.

comments: There were no ads, all other qr code scanners as soon as I hit scan, an ad would come up, not this one and it brought me to the URL, and I clicked the button go to webpage, it was very slick!
First time ever used it, on a new cream for cuts, burns and abrasions. Gave a quick scan took me to the internet for the new product info page. Great job.👍 Will see how it works out.

Tried it on our pet dog's QR Code ID tag and it worked instantly. Then a Barcode on a food item and again it worked instantly. First tried a higher rated app and that one did not work at all. Thank you!

First scan went well, then it started to communicate in Chinese.... couldn't progress. The shortest lived app ever, deleted immediately, how can you expect people to use something that's is in Chinese ?
No picture or audio after I've scanned the QR code. And the scanner screen is smaller than the bar code, so it doesn't scan it.

title: Fingerhut Mobile
description:
Manage your Fingerhut account anytime, from anywhere! View your account information, pay your bill and more.

Sign in with your existing Fingerhut.com username and password, or use a 4-Digit Pin if you prefer. 

Once you’re in, start managing your Fingerhut account with some of these exciting features:
• View your current available credit
• View your current balance
• View past orders and payments
• View scheduled payments
• Stay up to date on special deals and promotions.
• With push notifications, receive payment reminders and more
• Simple sign in using a 4-Digit Pin

We hope you enjoy the Fingerhut app!

recentChanges: This is a stability release for Fingerhut mobile.
comments: App works, but personal pin login glitches. The company itself has gone downhill. Their "Safe Line" service is a joke and they have been adding multiple fees so you can't catch up on your account. I was told when I paid on Safe Line it would go onto my account. It was just to keep the account "in the green" as they tacked extra charges on for the 9 months I was on it. Plan on paying 2x the fee payment to get ahead on your account or the fees will be a month payment for a continual payment loop.

I've been using this app after looking at the books I get in the mail and when I need to get presents for the grandchildren and or family members! My fiance has also become a member of the Fingerhut family! If ever you are in need of building your credit, I encourage you to use Fingerhut and make sure you set up an automated payment for at least $5 more than minimum payment so that you don't miss a payment! Plus take advantage of the deferred payments that several times a year are made available

Great way to rebuild your credit. Prices should be considered gouging but again they approve you when no1 else will. Which I never got, if you have issues with ur credit you clearly are having money problems, whater the reasons, so let's charge those type of people stupid high interest rates so they can afford it even less than they could before!? Makes no sense to me. Should work with the people who are trying 2 fix their mistakes and give them discounts to draw them back I 2 using credit again

Good for rebuilding credit but not much else. Expect prices similar to places like Rent-A-Center. TV on amazon costs $110. Same one on Fingerhut will cost $170 but you get to pay $20 a month. Shipping is outrageous unless you spend $200 or more in one transaction.

Acc. Is easy to access. Low payments. I can search what I am looking for so I don't have to brouse through everything. I just wish that the promo code was already on the check out page. I had to go back and find it and then I had to start over with review cart. Otherwise I am very happy.

title: GiveAway — buy nothing
description:
GiveAway allows you to quickly give away things you don’t need, and quickly get things that you do. Pretty fulfilling, right? Not only is it sustainable and smart, it also provides endless hours of entertainment via browsing through other people’s stuff. Try it and you might discover something great that you didn’t even know you needed! 

To make things easier, we show you stuff that’s nearby, while our unique auction system determines the winner through a fair and easy bidding system

Giving items away is much easier than trying to sell them elsewhere. On GiveAway, you can add an item in just a few taps. Only the automatically selected auction winner can send a message to the giver, so you only have to coordinate with one person. Then, the winner will come and pick up the item!

To keep things fair, every user on GiveAway is awarded what we call Karma. Karma is your GiveAway currency to use for bids. Users earn Karma by giving away items and can spend it on items they covet. Using Karma, you can claim interesting items in the app. The more interesting your item is, the more Karma other users will spend to make it theirs - and thus the “bidding” part of GiveAway.

That’s how items are given away: the giver adds the item and just waits for the bid to take place. Other participants from the area see the item in their feed marked as “No bids”. The first person who wants it offers 0 Karma. A countdown begins, and so does the bidding. Other participants can offer more Karma if they want. The winner is the person who offers the most Karma before the timer expires. The more interesting the item is, the greater the amount of Karma that the giver will receive for it — and the more you’ll have to offer for an item you want!

The item is available in the feed as long as the timer is still running. The timer starts when the first person who wants the item taps “Want it” on the app. The duration of the timer is dynamically calculated, depending on the urgency that was specified when the item was added, as well as the time of day. For convenience, the timer never expires during the night (in the giver’s time zone). If an item receives a bid within the last 10 minutes of the timer, then the countdown starts from 9 minutes 59 seconds once again, so that anyone who wants to re-bid could do so.

When participants offer Karma for an item, the amount of Karma offered remains frozen until the end of the timer, regardless of if they win the bid or not. If someone wins the item, their Karma is transferred to the giver when the item is handed over. If an agreement was not reached, the winner can refuse to pick up the item, or the giver can cancel the trade. The person who posted the previous bid will become the winner, and everyone else’s Karma will unfreeze.

Items can be claimed for free, without Karma. But only if there is no one else who is willing to bid Karma to claim these items.

You can raise your Karma by giving items away, by bringing new participants to the app, and by supporting the project. Share items in personal messages and on your social networks, and also use the “Invite friends” function. You will receive bonus +1 Karma for every new participant that follows your link as soon as they log in to the app. For convenience, you can get started by using the “Raise Karma” button in your profile.

We are launching in San Francisco!

developerAddress: Belarus, Minsk, Platonova 20b, 220005
recentChanges:
Hello! Once again we have improved GiveAway:

1. Get Karma for interesting stories about things that were taken or given in the application.
2. Read stories of people and support authors. Get thanks from them!
3. Mark that you give the thing away contactless. Take care of yourself and others.
4. Share your food. We have opened a special category for it!
5. Use the min bid on the new terms.
6. Enjoy other improvements

With love,
GiveAway team

title: Belk
description:
Reimagine department store shopping with the Belk app.

More Styles, More Sizes

The Belk app offers a wide variety of fits, sizes and styles in every category – from men’s, women’s and kids’ clothing and shoes to handbags, dresses and home. Plus, shop a larger selection of designer fashion, beauty, accessories & fragrance. You can even save your favorite products to purchase later.

Brands You Love

Shop the newest men’s & women’s fashion and shoes from brands & designers like:

· Levi’s

· Polo Ralph Lauren

· Michael Kors

· Free People

· Vans

· Tommy Hilfiger

· Vince Camuto

· UGG®

Plus, find designer watches from brands like Movado, Bulova & Skagen, and the best in beauty from Estée Lauder, Urban Decay, Clinique, Lancôme & more.

Registry Love

Create and manage your wedding registry easily inside the Belk app. Browse and add items from your favorite home brands, or scan and add items to your registry right from your smart phone. You can also maintain multiple registries and quickly update your gift list.

Never Miss a Deal

Get push notifications on your phone to be the first to know about great deals and our latest coupons. You can earn and redeem Belk Bucks when you shop in the app, too!

Manage Your Rewards

Manage your Belk Rewards credit card account easily from the app. Plus, see how many Belk Reward Dollars you have available to spend and apply them easily at checkout.

Effortless Gifting

Check out our Gift Guide to shop by gifts by recipient, interest, occasion and more! We’ve picked out the most-wanted products for everyone on your list and every event on your calendar.

Quick & Easy Checkout

We’ll save your check out information so all you have to do is enter your security code to complete your purchase. You can also pay with PayPal!

Free Store Pickup

If you have to have it today, you can! Shop in the app, add products to your bag and choose the “Free Store Pickup” option for eligible items. Your purchase will be available at your local store within a few hours – for free!

Welcome to the new way to shop Belk, whenever & wherever you want!

comments: During the Coronavirus Pandemic and having to "shelter at home" this app worked great! Easy to find selections and checkout was a breeze! Thank you for such a great shopping experience! Stay safe, stay healthy and wear your mask!
Love this app,make shopping simple & easy,first time I have ever shopped on line,only because of the virus did I use this app,but it won't be the last time.
I love this app. Very easy to shop and keep up with my credit card bill. I can access it anywhere and rarely has glitches.

The app always freezes and then a message pops up that it has stopped. Then, when editing the cart, it freezes and a little round circle spins. It did it AGAIN today. I got curious as to how long the page would get stuck and that circle was going to spin after trying to delete stuff. Well, it spun for 1 hr. I ended up deleting the app and installing it again. I get tired of doing that! I've had to uninstall and reinstall this app about 10X's in 6 weeks. Unacceptable!

For once I was able to edit my cart & make a purchase. Have had continuous issues with editing my cart which would result in not being able to make purchase. Your response was as if you hadn't even read what I had written & after that didn't get response. Keeping my fingers crossed that it continues to work Another suggestion to improve the app, would be to allow you to move items from your cart into your favorites for a later purchase. JCPenny's app let's you do that & it's very convenient!

title: Petco
description:
The Petco app is the Pet Parent's Partner. Use it to expertly pamper your pet both online and in our stores.

PERSONALIZED TO YOUR PETS
Set up your pet and the app becomes your partner, helping you find and access all that you need for your pet.

Manage and track your pet’s complete health and needs. Look across your purchase history online and in-store to make sure your pets are covered in all care categories so they can live a happy and healthy life. 

GET IT TODAY
You can buy in the app then pick it up at over 1,000 locations across the US.

BOOK GROOMING APPOINTMENTS AND GET REWARDED
Did you know grooming is an essential part of your pet's health and wellness? Schedule an appointment to meet your new groomer - a skilled stylist who understands the care and attention your pet needs based on their age, breed, hair and skin. Plus, join the Petco Spa Club and get rewarded for making your pet's health a habit. 

BOOK WALKING, SITTING, & BOARDING SERVICES by WAG!
Petco has teamed up with Wag! to help keep your pup happy and healthy by offering convenient on-demand access to walking, sitting and boarding services, right from the Petco app!

PERSONALIZED SHOP
Setting your pets up with Repeat Delivery, quickly buying something again, and finding the best nutrition and supplies has never been easier.

PALS
5% back and a lifetime of love. With the app it's easy to track and redeem your Pals rewards.

comments: A "Meh" type of app. Hard to search for specific toys as the search function isnt too intuitive. Also, I cannot edit shipping info or my wallet. I can only add addresses and payments. I cant even delete an old (no longer used card) that is still set as my default payment. Also there is no way to filter out store only vs online only until you open the item which sometimes takes a long while to load.

Very good app, the ONLY note I would have is that it'd be cool if you could favorite items that you don't want to buy immediately but want to be able to find quickly later on (I have lots of pets so some type of wishlist would be very useful since I can't buy everything all at once for all of them)

Great for ordering supplies but now having issues booking grooming appointments. The option to select a service only shows a bath description only & therefore there is no way to select which service I want to book. Updating has not resolved this ongoing issue & is extremely frustrating as I cannot even check for available appointments before having to call.

Search function and filters is utterly unusable, which is the primary purpose for the app. Its not any better on the website. Adding pets is neat, but as far as I can tell it doesn't really do anything with the pets you add.

It's okay, not great It too me 10 minutes, including a specific weird search, for a feeling prescription cat food. If you type the brand name, it should NOT give 300+ results, most of which are NOT the brand i specifically searched for in the first place. Sloppy execution.

title: NCPMobile: Shopping Rewards
description:
NCPMobile is the exclusive grocery shopping app of National Consumer Panel that lets you earn gift cards and other shopping rewards for telling us about the items you purchase.

As our newest panel member, you'll scan the UPC barcodes of the items you buy (or tell us a little bit about non-barcoded items), and in turn you'll earn reward points to redeem for gift cards and other rewards.

You can also take surveys, play games and more -- all while telling us about what you buy and earning rewards, directly through our grocery shopping app!  But don't limit yourself to groceries: tell us about all your purchases, from gas to prescriptions, and earn your shopping rewards!

What are you waiting for?  Download NCPMobile, tell us a little about you and your household and start earning your rewards today!

recentChanges: - Bug fixes and optimizations
comments: Very easy to use. Have had no issues with the app at all. Within a 3 week time span I have already earned enough for a $10 gift card. Which I will be saving :) There are a lot of incentives and you aren't having to spend more money that you are going to anyways when making a trip to the store. So I'm not having to "buy into" a program for rewards. My kids have fun scanning the groceries, we sometimes play grocery store with the non cold items, before I put them up. Great for the whole family!

I just downloaded this app. My first experience was fun. I used yesterday's purchases to try this out. I found that going over the cost of each item helped to remind me to take care with the purchases I made. (I bought dog treats. I tend to give him too many in a day. Now I'm breaking them into smaller pieces) * I would appreciate it if you could add the larger keypad everywhere you expect us to put in a date or year etc. The scrolling up and down is tedious.

So far so good. It does take a little more time then I expected to earn points which makes it take even more time to earn rewards. I do alot of shopping each week & I enter each item I buy each time I go shopping, but from what I can tell I've only received points for one shopping trip each week which seems unfair to me. I feel like I should have way more points then I do. I think it's stupid that y'all only view shopping trips once a week (which is Sunday) & I only receive points for one.

This app has given me the hope of actually being able to make a couple extra bucks without the nitpickyness of all the other so called cash makers which never quite let you make a dime. I have already gotten a $10 amazon gift card and am half way to another in the first 6weeks but it is alot of work scanning every bar code for all your shopping.

I've been this for years. You scan what you buy and do short surveys and get points to buy things or gift cards. It takes time to accumulate the points. I've cashed in a total of $300 or more over the past years. Money is money. Just saying. Simple way to make a few $.

title: Bed Bath & Beyond: Home Essentials + Gift Registry
description:
Beyond Any App of its Kind!®

With 24/7 access to our extensive inventory, the Bed Bath & Beyond app makes it easy to stock up and spruce up your home on the go. Find your favorite furniture and decor brands, pick up all of your household essentials (bedding, bath towels, cookware and more) and save big every time. 

Shop faster and smarter with these sanity-saving features:

• Coupon wallet. Organize all of your offers in one easy-to-access spot so you’ll never miss out on savings.

• Easy-to-update gift registry. Use your mobile phone to scan barcodes of in-store items and add them instantly to your registry. Need to give a gift? Shop any Bed Bath & Beyond registry from your device.

• In-store pickup. Reserve items right on your phone and pick them up at your convenience at the Bed Bath & Beyond store of your choice.

• Store locator. Need a Bed Bath & Beyond store on the fly? Find the nearest one—whenever you want it, wherever you are. (Map and directions included.)

Bed Bath & Beyond is a member of the Bed Bath & Beyond affiliated companies.

comments: APP NOT WORKING! Anyone having trouble checking out? Have made many attempts & keep getting error msg. Have tried chat, email, sent msgs thru the app & called cust serv - no one has answered. Tried uninstalling & reinstalling. App used to work great. Update: was finally able to submit order via regular website, but the app is, clearly, not working. Hope it gets fixed.

I was loving this app, but worry about the legitimacy of the reviews. Every product I have clicked on so far, has multiple reviews from a person named Harry Poptter, who gives a 4-5 star and all it says is "Love this." I counted this review over 15 times on one product. I now worry about buying anything on the app due to not being able to trust the reviews.

This was a pretty decent e-commerce app (on par with Amazon, just less performant) until the latest update made it spy on me consistently -even when the app was inactive- via location tracking, probably for additional income through advertising. Now there's no way I'll keep it installed as this behavior makes it spyware.
Very easy to find the things I'm looking for, apply coupons and checkout fast. No issues.
Pictures won't load with new update. My phone got VERY HOT after I updated. Takes forever to get a page to load

comments: Love the app for what it is. But I'm so tired of certain items up but always out of stock. Literally scrolling and everything is out of stock that is good but is always there to click on and waste your time.
Oh well, unless you're a greedy reseller with a server that can jam up the app during good releases forget about the new shoes. Errors, log outs...waste of an hour.

App sucks. Bought 3 pairs of shoes last night. 1 was sold out and it didnt tell me. Just defaulted and purchased a completely different pair. And the app shows no history. Like wth is the point if nothing but my address is saved? Negative 10 stars.
I made an account and its saying invalid email or password. So it wont let me sign in I have to be a guest.
App isn't working. I even uninstalled it, re-installed it and nothing. Please fix, and I'll rate-up.

This is most likely as there is no login button after you initially set up the app. This would remedy this issue as the errors are happening because it does not have our login info. The worst app ever! Constantly gets stuck and logs you out of your account. The developers really need to do some work on it, like ASAP!

It worked well prior to the last update. Now, whenever I try to add a pair of shoes to my shopping cart, it constantly gives a :Hook Error". I've uninstalled, erased all files, and reinstalled. Its still the same issues over and over. It's useless if I can't order through it.
This app worked fine until an update. Now, it says customer not found and I can't purchase ANYTHING. It's terrible now.
Super easy to use but somehow the app deleted all my favorites that I saved so I had to go back and resave every item

title: CarGurus
description:
WHY TRY THE CARGURUS APP?
 
● The best car deals shown first
● Deals are rated based on market value + dealer reviews
● We tell you if a deal is great, good, fair or overpriced
● Powerful search and advanced filtering options 
● Saved searches make it simple to run frequent searches based on your criteria 
● Saved listings give you quick, easy access to vehicles you save from all your devices
● Insider Insights including time on market, price history and vehicle history help you negotiate
● Custom alerts for price drops and new listings that match your search
● More than 5 million cars for sale (approximately 2 million used and 3 million new) 
● More than 300,000 new used cars added weekly (30% more than other car shopping sites)
● Sell your car with security and dedicated assistance

recentChanges: Wait longer for connection to server.
comments: I like this app, save for one GLARING shortcoming: I can't see the cars that I've saved to my list that have been sold, so for example I have 34 saved cars, yet only 21 pull up. I want to be able to see even the ones that sold, so I can look for similar cars/features in the future. Currently, I have no idea which items were sold or taken down of the 13 missing saved cars on my list, and THAT'S frustrating.

This app is VERY BAD when you try using it on a tablet device. The whole design is way off and makes you want to zoom out even more than the maximum amount you are allowed to on the app. Makes it very difficult to look around for cars, I would rather recommend using the website. Not worth the time to download.

This use to be my favorite auto sale app. I've used it for along time. And have bought several cars I found on here. But the filters have become useless. Showing cars way above my price range. Or hundreds of miles outside my distance settings. And before Cargurus responds, I know how to use the filters. And have been for a few years.

This app does not show cars that are in the filters I have selected. I specified a range from 4-8k with a manual transmission and all this app does is keep showing me cars that are way over that price and are automatics. This app is beyond frustrating and I will not use until it is fixed. Also, please remove the zoom button in the bottom right hand corner. I can't save my search since it is in the way. In my opinion this app is completely useless.

Whoever does their coding is no guru! Price and Distance are seperate search tools from the rest of the drop down menu. You cant use all of the available search options in a single search. When you click on price or distance you are not given all of the regular search options from the initial drop down menu making specific searches useless. Geeze!!! I cant believe this company has been in business over a decade and overlooked something so simple!!!!!!!!

title: Coupons.com – Grocery Coupons & Cash Back Savings
description:
Save $100s with free grocery coupons and deals at your favorite stores like Walmart, Target, Kroger and Dollar General. You’ll have access to hundreds of coupons on the brands you love, making saving money effortless. Best of all, you can manage all your grocery shopping and coupons right from your phone, in one single app, without ever relying on a printer or shuffling between multiple store apps.

Join the millions of shoppers who use the Coupons.com app to shop and save easily at your favorite grocery stores. Enjoy two ways to save: One, simply link your store loyalty cards to your Coupons.com account, then add coupons with a tap to save seamlessly at the register. The dollars fall off at purchase.

Two, if your store doesn’t have a loyalty card, get cash back after purchase. Just choose the coupons you like and add them to the stores you want to redeem them at–all in the app– then submit a picture of your receipt after purchase. After your purchase is verified, you’ll get cash back in your PapPal account. So easy! 

No printing, no paper, no hassle—it’s a cinch now to save on food, baby and toddler items, pet food, medicine and personal care. We have coupons from all your favorite brands like Tide, Bounty, Cheerios, Kraft, Kellogg’s, General Mills, Campbell’s, Dole, Betty Crocker, M&M’s, Perdue, Crest, Pantene and more.

Here’s how it works:

1) After you download the free app, sign in to your Coupons.com account (or sign up if you’re new—it’s quick and easy).

2) Link your store loyalty cards to your Coupons.com account.  If your store doesn’t have a loyalty card, you can still save by using cash back grocery coupons—we’ll tell you how in a second.

3) Next, browse through 100s of free grocery coupons by store and add them with just a tap.

4) Load up your cart at the store and follow your shopping list in the app to make sure you’re using all the grocery coupons you’ve chosen. 

5) Then save one of two ways: Instantly at checkout or after your purchase. Stores with loyalty cards give you instant savings, while other stores require a quick picture of your receipt. Simply send us the photo, we’ll verify your purchase, then put cash into your PayPal account as soon as possible. The best part: You won’t have to wait to reach a minimum amount in order to get your money.

What you’ll love:

• Easily save $100s on your favorite brands with offers that are added daily. Plus, watch for Coupons.com-exclusive offers that you can redeem for free items, like bananas, coffee, or potatoes.

• Tap-and-save simplicity with 100s of verified digital grocery, drug and discount store coupons from your favorite brands that you can use on your mobile device.

• Add all your store loyalty cards to just one app! No need to juggle several cards or accounts. Once you link them to your Coupons.com app, all your grocery coupons will be in one spot, making grocery planning, shopping, and saving easier than ever.

• No loyalty card at your store? No problem. Get cash back after purchase by simply adding coupons, making your purchase, then sending us a photo of your receipt after checkout. The best part: There’s no minimum purchase required to get cash back! 

• Put away your scissors and never worry about forgetting your coupons. All your grocery savings will be digital, making the shopping and saving process easier and more organized for you.  However, don’t fret: If you still prefer to print your coupons, you can do so directly from the app.

If you’re looking for grocery savings at stores like Target, Walmart, Albertsons, Safeway, Winn-Dixe, Meijer, Food Lion and more, the Coupons.com app is the one-stop shop for all your grocery coupons, deals and savings.

Awards Won:
Appy, May 2017
Best Mobile App Awards, April 2017

We love our customers.
Having trouble with the app?
Contact our friendly support team and we'll get you back to saving in a snap: 
androidapp-support@coupons.com. 

Coupons.com is a Quotient brand.

comments: I love this app! They give you cash back after they confirmed you made a purchase, usually the next day & you don't have to wait till your account reaches a minimum amount like with other rebate apps. I linked my PayPal to them. Some stores you just add digital coupons to your account, others you just take a pic of your receipt.

Love this app! 1.Great quality clothes 2. Good prices and frequent sales 3. A playlist for you when you shop! 4.Fast deliveries Would definitely recommend!!

Its only being doing this recently..

I have found this app verry helpful because I love Hollister and this allows me to keep track of my club cali points and order things without the hassle of doing it on the web. At first the app wouldn't keep me signed in, but after deleting it and reinstalling it, I have stayed logged in and its working smoothly. I would definitely recommend this!

comments: Smooth, clean, easy to use! If you haven't checked out Redbubble you are missing out on the greatest thing in history. And I can browse all the best designs on an easy-to-use app now?! Heck yes. Only get my stickers, Art, phone cases, tote bags, t-shirts, and more from Redbubble.

The app refuses to login, it just keeps saying that something went wrong and to try again. I love redbubble but this app is useless to me if i can't get past the login.

Incredible unique designs that you won't find anywhere else with very reasonable prices!! Amazing!! 💗💗💗

title: Mercado Libre: compra fácil y rápido
description:
¡Compra y vende todo lo que quieras en la app de Mercado Libre! 

Descubre la mejor experiencia de comprar y vender cosas por internet desde la aplicación oficial que reúne a millones de productos de tus marcas favoritas.

COMPRAR ONLINE

¡Buscar precios y ahorrar dinero con nuestro buscador de productos es súper fácil! 

Encuentra miles de marcas a precios increíbles en nuestra tienda online: ropa, vestidos, juegos, libros, juguetes, fundas para móviles, herramientas, zapatos, instrumentos, spinners, muebles, decoración del hogar, moda ¡y mucho más! Incluso podrás  comprar por internet productos de segunda mano.

En nuestros clasificados encontrarás coches, autos usados y motos de segunda mano. 

- Guarda los productos que más te gustan en favoritos para no perderlos de vista. 📌
- Podrás buscar productos con filtros específicos para el precio, ubicación, envío gratis y más. 🔍
- Tenemos una enorme vidriera de productos por categoría para que puedas comparar precios y leer opiniones de otros compradores.
- Mira con zoom las fotos de cada producto.
- Ahorra dinero con nuestros descuentos en tiendas oficiales online. 💸
- Haz todas las preguntas que necesites antes de comprar. ❓
- Paga en cuotas con tu tarjeta de crédito y en efectivo con múltiples medios de pago. 💳
- Recibe lo que compres sin moverte de tu casa, te lo enviamos a donde quieras. 🚚
- Trackea tu compra con el seguimiento de paquetes.
- Comunícate de forma segura con tu vendedor con nuestro servicio de mensajería.
- Gestiona tus compras en línea.

- Podrás ofertar y comprar todo lo que necesites!

VENDER ONLINE

En nuestra app podrás vender en línea y ganar dinero (¡incluso con tus cosas usadas!): ropa, vestidos, juegos, libros, juguetes, herramientas, tecnología, deportes, zapatos, y más.

- Vende productos nuevos y usados, publica anuncios gratis!. 🔖
- Podrás publicar gratis en 4 sencillos pasos y empezar a hacer ventas en línea.
- Gestiona tus compras y ventas desde tu cuenta. 📱
- Comunícate con tu comprador o vendedor con nuestra herramienta de mensajería instantánea. 📨

¡La e commerce app de Mercado Libre es mucho más que una app para comprar y vender cosas usadas! Descubrirás que comprar en línea barato y vender cosas usadas es sencillo! Hacer compras en internet es fácil y divertido!

#NuncaDejesDeBuscar

Aplicación disponible para: Brasil, México, Argentina, Colombia, Chile, Venezuela, Perú, Ecuador, Uruguay, Costa Rica, República Dominicana, Bolivia, Panamá, Paraguay, Guatemala, Honduras, El Salvador, Nicaragua, y Puerto Rico. 

Visita nuestro sitio web: https://www.mercadolibre.com/
Visita nuestro blog: http://ideas.mercadolibre.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MercadoLibre/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ml_argentina
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/mercadolibre

Ante cualquier pregunta, envíanos un correo a android.market@mercadolibre.com

title: Vova
description:
Get great deals, discounts and free shipping on millions of high-quality products! 🛒

We have a 100% satisfaction guarantee policy so you can enjoy shopping for millions of low priced top quality products including clothes, bags, cosmetics, electronics, home decor & more, with peace of mind. We love to make shopping fun and rewarding! Let Vova help you figure out what to pack in your suitcase. Let Vova help you make big savings!

App Highlights:
★ Clothes, bags, cosmetics, electronics, home decor & more: Shop all you want online
★ Millions of featured and quality goods provided by reputable retailers
★ Free shipping worldwide on all products
★ Enjoy massive discounts every day in Flash Sales
★ 100% guaranteed payment security
★ Didn’t meet your expectations? Easy return and refund policy 
★ Support Facebook and Google account login, making shopping more convenient!

Safe shopping environment:
✅ Shop safely with VOVA Guarantee - Receive orders or get your money back
✅ Guarantee your transaction with your preferred payment method - Pay via Paypal or credit card

Language Support:
VOVA supports multiple languages. Including 19 languages such as English, German, Spanish, French, Swedish, Norwegian, Italian, Portuguese, Danish, Finnish, Russian, Dutch, Arabic, Hebrew, Polish, Czech, Slovak, Turkish and Traditional Chinese.

Currency Support:
VOVA supports multiple currencies. Including 37 currencies such as US dollar, Hong Kong Dollar, Canadian Dollar, Australian Dollar, Euro, British Pound, New Zealand Dollar, Swiss Franc, Swedish Krona, Norwegian Krona, Danish Krona, Russian Ruble, Brazilian Real, Argentine Peso, Chilean Peso, Mexican Peso, Singapore Dollar, Kuwaiti Dinar, Bahrain Dinar, Qatar Riyal, Saudi Riyal, UAE Dirham, Polish Zloty, Japanese Yen, Colombian Peso, Czech Republic Koruna, Nigeria Naira, South African Rand, Israel Shekel, Jordan Dinar, Egyptian Pound, New Taiwan Dollar, Turkish Lira, Indonesian Rupiah, Thai Baht, Peruvian Sol, Kenya Shilling.

Our Mission:
Vova is on a mission to provide high-quality products from the most trusted companies worldwide. You came to the right place to discover the latest and greatest high-quality products at affordable prices.

Follow us:
Follow us to get the latest info on our great deals & discounts and to leave your precious feedback & suggestions.

title: My H-E-B
description:
Get a whole lot of Texas, right in your pocket. Order curbside pickup or delivery, browse digital coupons, create shopping lists of your favorite products, and so much more.

It’s never been easier to shop online with H-E-B. Enjoy the convenience of curbside pickup or home delivery with in-app shopping and ordering. Plan your shop with shopping lists and coupons. No matter how you shop, the My H-E-B app offers new ways to save time and money.

With the My H-E-B app, you can:
• Easily order curbside pickup or delivery
• Clip and redeem digital coupons online and in-store
• Create and manage shopping lists
• Quickly browse products and coupons
• Find where items are located in your store
• Keep track of your order progress
• Browse and reorder your past purchases

Questions about the app? Reach out to customer support at 1-800-432-3113.

recentChanges: You asked, we listened! In this release, we’ve added shopping lists! You can now make a list for any occasion and check items off as you shop. Your shopping lists will show an item’s in-store location, and can be easily added to your cart. We’ve made it easier to find items in your store and also fixed a few bugs.

title: Amazon Prime Now
description:
You have better things to do than go to the store. Skip the trip and shop for tens of thousands of daily essentials and gift items through the Amazon Prime Now app. In addition to the daily essentials available on Amazon Prime Now, you can shop from local stores and restaurants in select cities. 

Choose from three ultra-fast delivery options for orders fulfilled by Amazon Prime Now: delivery in a two-hour window, delivery in a one-hour window, or delivery within an hour. Delivery within an hour and one-hour delivery windows are available in most ZIP Codes serviced by Amazon Prime Now. 

•Prime Now is available from morning to night, seven days a week. Currently available in select areas including: 
- Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Berkeley, Boston, Brooklyn, Charlotte, Chicago, Cincinnati, Columbus, Dallas & Fort Worth, Denver, Houston, Indianapolis, Las Vegas, Los Angeles & Orange County, Manhattan, Miami, Milwaukee, Minneapolis & St. Paul, Nashville, Orlando, Phoenix, Portland, Raleigh, Richmond, Sacramento, San Antonio, San Diego, San Francisco Bay Area, Seattle & Eastside, Tampa, Virginia Beach, and Washington, DC Metro

• Shop for groceries, gifts, goodies and more from your favorite local stores:
- Chicago: Fresh Thyme
- Dallas: Sally Beauty
- Indianapolis: Fresh Thyme
- Los Angeles: Bristol Farms, and Mission Wine & Spirits
- New York City: Westside Market, Gourmet Garage, Union Square Wine & Spirits and Vintage Grape Wine & Spirits
- Milwaukee: Fresh Thyme
- Minneapolis: Surdyk's Liquor & Cheese Shop
- Phoenix: Tops Liquors
- Portland: New Seasons Market
- Sacramento: Pet Food Express
- San Diego: Bristol Farms and Keg N Bottle
- San Francisco Bay Area: Pet Food Express, Sousa's Wines & Liquor and Tony's Market & Liquor
- Seattle: PCC Community Markets, New Seasons Market, Bartell Drugs and All The Best Pet Care

The Prime Now app also lets you order the food you love from top-rated restaurants. Get delivery from popular local restaurants as well as familiar favorites, including P.F. Chang’s, Red Robin, Applebee’s, Bucca di Beppo, Five Guys, and Red Lobster. Amazon Restaurants is available in select cities across the U.S.

developerAddress:
Amazon Mobile LLC
500 9th Avenue N,
Seattle, WA 98109
recentChanges: • Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: Confusing, ticked to shop via morrisons, adding things to basket but some things appeared on Amazon shop and others in Morrison. Both have delivery charges and minimum orders which would add to cost. Seems to randomly add items to Amazon even though I was browsing Morrison store. DUnable to see delivery options until AFTER shop is complete. Ended up by abandoning whole shop. Confusing waste of time and nowhere to query with Amazon. Will stick with Asda, Tesco or Sainsbury.

The service is great, the app is dismal. Like so many other Amazon apps it takes a long time to load, and regularly freezes or doesn't load content below the header. Frustrating. Checking out often involves several minutes of clicking around and restarting the app just to persuade it to load the basket contents. I don't know why this affects so many Amazon apps. Maybe they're packed with unnecessary tracking code.

Fine if you enjoy shopping, and never getting your items. App needs the ability to reserve a spot for delivery, then give you a timer to complete your cart. More often than not you spend an hour picking out shopping items, only to find out there's no delivery available day after day. Buggy slow crashes and freezes a LOT. Be careful! there's no way to change a payment after you've submitted an order and no way to just directly rerun an order. You have to manually select each item again

Yes, this app is buggy as Hell and I have experienced several issues other users have described. The very worst for me was the random removal of items from my cart. I say random because in my case they were not all items that were out of stock because I could re-add them to my cart. Very annoyed after I placed my order I realised that something I really wanted had been removed and of course once the order had been placed no chance to add to it. And it was in stock! Please sort your app out.

The only positive experience is that I get whole foods delivered. Every single experience within the app is frustrating, unintuitive, and lacking. There is no list features, or the ability to star anything, so each time you need to go through to find what you are looking for. You can see your previous purchases, but lists or stars would be much easier. Reviews can only have 500 characters, so I can't go into every terrible experience I have with this, but it's terrible

title: Grocery Shopping List - Listonic
description:
Listonic, the smart grocery shopping List is a free app that improves the quality of your grocery shopping by making it easier, faster, and most importantly smarter. It is all you would want out of a shopping list and more. All for free!
 
Why use Listonic

- We know you appreciate your free time, we know you want to make grocery shopping as fast as possible. And we know that about 70% of products on your shopping lists are repetitive. That’s why your grocery list now suggests your favorite products first. And you’re able to add quantities with one simple tap at the same time now!  
- It makes shopping with family and friends much easier. Your lists are synced, so any changes are instantaneously seen by others. Also, it's easy to share your shopping list with a friend who doesn’t use Listonic app via email or a text message!
- Need a change? Not in the mood for your fav zucchini pasta? Stop crying and start organizing your weekly menu with Listonic. Browse our catalogue: you will find many product inspirations categorized by aisle order. Easy swipe, easy choice!
- Now Listonic can recognize units! Write a number and a product, and you’ll get suggestions immediately!
- What’s bought and what’s not? Now you will clearly see! You will see how much you’ve already spent as well as how much you’re going to spend on missing products. 
- Your grocery list provides hundreds of useful tips and hacks on buying, preserving, and cooking to help you make healthy grocery list.
- Enjoy all our features for free!

Listonic for Android Wear is a smart shopping list app - exactly where it’s most handy - right on your wrist. Check off items without taking out your phone, get just-in-time notifications and use smart voice input.

Listonic supports all Android smartphones, tablets, Android Wear devices and is always available in your browser.
 
People all over the world are already enjoying the convenience of our grocery list – with over 8 000 000 products added to lists each month.
 
If you see anything we can improve, please, let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful to make our app better and smarter! Contact us via Twitter (@listonic) or at support@listonic.com.

Listonic

comments: The app itself is probably the best grocery shopping list in the Play Store. However, the customer service experience is abysmal. I had been corresponding with their Customer Service rep, Michał Borowiec, and at the beginning he was very pleasant and eager to help me resolve my sync issue. The last response I received from him was on the 27th of March. I replied to him on the 29th of March, then after hearing nothing from him after several days, I followed up on the 9th of April politely requesting an update. After several weeks of waiting, I followed up yet again on the 25th of April with still no response. On the 29th of April I sent another email voicing my displeasure of being ignored, but still nothing. I was going to purchase the full version of this app, but after the terrible customer service experience I find this highly unlikely.

Had an app similar to this before but this one I absolutely love!!! I use it every time I go to the store because it is WAY better than having to keep up with a paper list and a pen to mark the things off of the list..I am a type of person who has to have a list or I forget something every single time...So, definitely 5 stars for this app and I even told my family about It!

Fantastic app for groceries! Able to share with my energetic husband and he can mark things off the list in real time. I don't have to ask if we got everything on the list, I can see in a glance what we are missing. Also great for organizing by category (what else do we need from dairy?). Also a great app for trip packing, remember to bring charging cords! Very customizable and easy to use. Love it!!!

Perfect for doing shopping lists, I always leave my list at home but take my phone with me so this is the perfect app. The only critical point is that when you use it off line it keeps alerting you to put your wi fi on, which can be quite annoying. And I like the fact you can move items from list to list so if you don't get what you want in one place you can pop it in another list. The other point is the add at the bottom of the screan cover the bottom item on your list.

I have used several over the years. This seems to be one of the better ones. Really like that there is an online account and list access. Many do not have that. The GUI and options/setting could be better in several ways. Not very intuitive for the creation of new categories online, better in the app. Dark mode would be great. Also, how the heck do I make the rices show by default for all lists? I keep having to turn this on as all lists default back to hiding the prices.

With the Nordstrom app, you get current trends, latest essentials and more. All from the comfort of wherever you and your phone might be!

•	See what's in stock at your favorite store right in the app.

comments: Wishlist still a problem! Selecting an item from it will only take you to a preview. When selecting 'see details' for more details nothing happens! I cannot even access items on my wishlist! What's the point?!! Needs a lot of improvements, really slow! Wishlist needs to be native to the app, NOT a website shortcut, but is better now that we can actually edit it.
When you save items to yourwish list and want to see full details, the link is broken. This version is as slow as the last one.

When switching away from your app and returning to it, it reverts back to the main screen, which is incredibly frustrating. Also when sharing to other apps, like wishlist apps, it doesn't pass the name of the item or any images to it. Try having your app developers share an item to the Wish Explorer app and you'll see what I mean. Your app needs to "play nice" with other Android apps, like the Amazon app does, in order to impress me and earn a higher rating or better review.

Just awful interface when you actially go to checkout. Items will disappear, samples will be in your cart one minute and then gone the next. Had to re-enter my shipping address even though it's already saved in my address book. Shipping option was stuck on express shipping and wouldn't let me click on free standard. Overall this was a horrible experience and it made me give up on making an order all together!

App asked if it can send a code to my email, which is fine, however it lacks the ability to hit send. If you exit the screen you can't sign in. I appreciate the security, but please fix it so I can get the code and log in..

title: Food Lion
description:
Shopping easy, fresh, and affordable just got easier. With our mobile app, we put convenience in the palm of your hand! Sign up for an MVP card or register your existing one and save time and money when you take advantage of features like:
 
View weekly ads - Conveniently browse weekly ads for your preferred store, search for items using keywords, and add them to your shopping list.
 
Load coupons - MVP Savings Hub lets you search for and load digital coupons directly onto your MVP Card. You can also add them to your shopping list.
 
Create shopping lists - Add items from recipe ingredients, the weekly flyer, or manually enter items to multiple shopping lists. Items can be conveniently organized by aisle and category and checked off as you shop. Also, email your list to anyone, anytime.
 
Find recipes - Meal planning is simple with Recipe Finder. Simply type in your ingredient and find easy and affordable meal ideas. Add ingredients to your shopping list and "favorite" recipes for future access.
 
Access with no log in - Log in once and stay that way— even when the app is closed! Just tap the app to open and start organizing.
 
Scan digitally - Now, your MVP card bar code is digital! Your MVP Loyalty Card bar code can be scanned right from your phone at check out.
 
Track it all - Track your loaded coupons and your shopping history for the past 12 months. Also, easily add items from previous trips to your shopping list.
 
Find locations - Conveniently find your nearest store, their phone number, store hours, and directions. 
 
Location Services - We ask permission to use GPS/location services to support local offers, promotions, and the store locator.
 
Download the app to start savings, today!

title: Meijer
description:
Save even more at Meijer with the Meijer Mobile App. Earn rewards, find exclusive digital coupons, track savings and much more…

REWARDS WITHOUT THE WORK
Rewards now start themselves
•	There's no more manual picking and choosing to start your rewards. You'll start earning available rewards as soon as you buy a qualifying item and enter your mPerks ID at checkout.
Get alerts and track your progress
•	You'll always be able to see how close you are to earning your next reward. And, when you enable notifications in the app, you'll be alerted whenever you start and earn rewards.
Earned rewards are immediately ready for use
•	Continue to enter your mPerks ID each time you check out and you'll automatically be notified at the register when rewards are ready to redeem. Just claim them right there - no manual clipping.

DIGITAL COUPONS 
Easily find and redeem coupons.

WEEKLY AD & SHOPPING LIST
Add Weekly Ad items to your Shopping List.
Items easily viewable on Shopping List to make your trips go faster in store. 
View this week’s sales on your phone + find a Meijer closest to you.

FINGERPRINT
A fast and easy way to log-in.
The Meijer Mobile App is everything you need for your shopping trip at your fingertips.

PHOTO PRINTING
Easily order photo prints from your phone and pick them up in store.

comments: Used to be good until you switched who processes the credit cards and now how the credit cars portion is setup. It's NOT user friendly, it doesn't show the info I need on the main page and it's infuriatingly obnoxious with making me change my password every time I log in. I'm hoping that's just a glitch because if it's not it's literally maddening enough to make me want to get rid of my meijer card!
Not the most user friendly app. Searching products, finding coupons and making purchases could be a much smoother process as is the case with other retail apps.
great coupons and rewards. love the grocery list too. I use it all the time Just did a pick up and wanted to tip and rate my shopper and I dont know how. Found it yay:)

I love the shop and scan feature. I use it a lot. Today though, it really sucked up the battery life on my phone. Started shopping at 65% battery, after only 30 minutes my battery said 15%. I almost didnt make it to the kiosk. It scanned at the kiosk at 3% battery. This has never happened before. I have shopped a lot longer than that too. If anyone has tips to save battery life please feel free to share. I had to skip items on my list. Why did it suck up my battery so fast?

I've always liked this app; however, lately, when creating a list for delivery/pickup, I have had problems. Since only a (2) 12-hours days of time slots are available at a time, it's very difficult at any time to fine slots available; i.e., I have made attempts numerous times last evening until 1 am and almost hourly today to no avail. Plus, when I go back to my cart to try again, I find either my items to be delivered to/picked up by a person in another state OR my cart is empty again!

title: Touch of Modern: Shopping
description:
Touch of Modern is THE Shopping App for Men to discover the world's most interesting products and at amazing prices. With dozens of new sales added each day, TOMO will be the Shopping App you lust to check every day. 

Join millions of men discovering new designer products at up to 70% off retail. Touch of Modern is the #1 app in the U.S. to shop conveniently for unique electronics, watches, furniture, gadgets, fashion and accessories. We source internationally to bring you modern products at unbeatable prices delivered straight to your door.
 
1. Shop with more than 13 million Touch of Modern users to instantly view daily sales of up to 70% off top designer products!

2. Touch of Modern is your one-stop-shop for all things stylish- from watches, home decor, tech accessories, gadgets, to all things fashion.

3. Discover a better way to shop. TOMO gives you curated sales and first access to limited-time only deals selected by our in-house experts.

The Touch of Modern app provides you with a FREE, fast, and exclusive membership to:
 - Dozens of hand-picked items and deals added daily 
- Sales of these highly coveted items are up to 70% OFF and last ONLY 5 days
 - Discover the most fascinating and well-designed products in the world at the BEST possible price
 - Shop on the Go! Have some spare time while commuting or just waiting for your friends? Check out our app, discover, browse, shop select and check out within seconds. Put your spare time to use, and own the cool gadgets, fashion, phone accessories or wallets that you’ve always wanted.

comments: LOVE THIS APP AND THE INTERESTING ITEMS THEY HAVE AND THE PRICES ARE ACTUALLY REASONABLE , HAVE YET TO ORDER ANYTHING ,BUT I HAVE A LARGE FAVORITES LIST ,IN TIME I WILL. WILL UPDATE ON THE ACTUAL PURCHASE EXPIEIENCE ETC. BUT I TOTALLY RECOMMEND THIS APP AND THE ITEMS THEY SELL , ESPECIALLY IF YOU WANT SOMETHING UNIQUE AND NOT LIKELY TO BE OWNED BY YOUR NEIGHBOR OR FRIENDS!!!!

Would love to give this app 5 stars. But there isn't a way to search for something. And when I go to my favorites section and click on an item to view it, it pulls up a completely different item. If those two things got fixed. I would change this to 5 stars easy

Data mining scheme - can't access anything on the app...or even on their website, without giving them your info. I sure would like to browse based on the commercial, but I'm not giving you my info just for access.

The new sharper image is now Known as Touch of modern they care for the clients reasonable prices and hell way cheaper then sharper image and If you a affirm account download that app it kicks ass and you can find what you want from any store including Touch of Modern
Fascinating products but the lack of a search bar or even a category selector along with the over the top prices is a little off putting.

title: AE + Aerie: Jeans, Dresses, Swimsuits & Bralettes
description:
Style is in the doing. How do you wear yours?
  
In the store or on the go, the AEO app is here to give you a seamless shopping experience. So you can focus more on discovering the looks that express YOUR individual style. Get all the latest AEO and Aerie at your fingertips, including your favorite jeans, shoes, accessories, bras, undies, sleepwear and more.
  
But that's not all! Check out some of the perks:
 
• Buy online and pick up your order in-store! It’s free, fast, easy, and now available in select cities.
• Shopping from outside the U.S.? You can now select the Canadian or international version of the app in App Settings to see pricing, sales, and promotions tailored to your location! Plus, Canadian customers can translate the app into French.
• Link your AEO Connected® account to earn awesome rewards like free jeans, bras & more while you shop!
• Love it so much that you just CAN'T WAIT? See whether an item is in stock at an AE or Aerie store near you
• Use Favorites to save the styles you love in one place. Shop them later or share with friends and fam!
• Snap & Scan uses your phone's camera to scan barcodes in stores and to show you styles similar to anything you see and love with the snap of a picture!
• Find tons of #OOTD inspo, trends and more under the Inspiration tab
• Get instant notifications about sales and other awesome events
• Use Voice Search to find exactly what you’re looking for
• Tune in to our in-store AE + Aerie playlists, curated just for you!
• Get up close and personal with our latest styles thanks to full-screen photos
• Use Siri Shortcuts to check an order status or access your AEO Connected® account

Thoughts? Feedback? Awkward family photos you'd like to share with us? Go on, pour your heart out to AEOMobile@ae.com. And be sure to keep an eye out for app improvements, new features and more.
