recentChanges: In this version of the app we fixed some critical issues and bugs for the best possible app shopping experience.
comments: this app was great until the update on 4/19/20. now, when trying to check my credit card balance and make a payment, it essentially opens up a new window where it takes me to a new page for the credit card which is much uglier and harder to navigate than the old page. before this update, I could just go to the credit card section, log in with my finger print, and the page to navigate between my balance and payments was incredibly simple and easy to understand and use. this new page is horrible.
I wish the credit card was easier to link to the account (it pops up as an error) but the app is overall great! And after playing around with it for a little bit, I got the credit card issue fixed!
Easy to navigate. Not buggy at all. Quick searching for and finding things. The only drawback I can find is that I buy too much stuff from their app!

Makes shopping super easy! I can see all my rewards points and coupons, and the wishlist is super easy to access and add to. I also love the feature where you can easily see reviews and photos of how people styled the clothes.
Easy to use and love all the clothes...the website has been having problems with loading pictures and other things. But other than that it's all good.

title: Adore Me – Designer Lingerie
description:
Oh, hey there! Looking for the latest lingerie or just reeeally want that new comfy pair
of PJs? You’ve come to the right place.

No matter what mood you’re in, we’ve got you covered all year long in matching bra & panty sets, lingerie, sleepwear, swimwear, activewear, maternity & nursing essentials, mastectomy bras & SO much more…

More importantly, we’re proud to support women of all body types through carefully
crafted, high-quality designs that everyone can fit in—and at prices everyone can afford.
With styles made to fit women of all shapes and sizes, we’re here to celebrate every
body’s natural beauty and inner confidence. No matter who you are, who you dream of
being, or what you’re doing in our clothes, you can trust us to be right by your side.

Take a look at what’s inside…

BROWSE SEAMLESSLY
With hundreds of styles to choose from, you’ll probably want one of everything!
Discover bras in sizes 30A–46G, intimates in XS–4X, and more, right at your fingertips.
Plus, add your faves to your wishlist.

SHOP ‘TIL YOU DROP
We drop brand-new collections every month (!), and as a VIP member, you can score
your faves for even less.

EXCLUSIVE ACCESS
Get sneak peeks at new collections on the go + shop app-only sales!

FREE SHIPPING
Always! No matter what and when you order, we’re committed to making
shopping—and shipping—easier for you.

GET NOTIFIED
We’ll send you push notifications about fresh arrivals, more sales & more.

CHAT WITH US!
Need help? We’re here for you. Give us a call or email us through the app!

LET’S GET SOCIAL!

http://facebook.com/adoremeofficial
http://instagram.com/adoreme
http://twitter.com/adoreme
http://pinterest.com/adoremeofficial
http://youtube.com/user/AdoreMeTV

recentChanges:
What’s New

Psst: Our app just got a brand-new look! Check it out: new logo, new app experience & fresh updates for easier shopping. Enjoy!
comments: Extremely disappointed. I have emailed their customer support 3 times on the same issue, using their customer contact system on the website, and have heard nothing back. I am STILL experiencing the same issue with my Elite membership. I was charged for my first box in April, and was told it would arrive April 25-30th. It still hasnt arrived. I wanted to 1) make sure it was still coming and 2) make sure I wouldnt be charged again in May for the same box. First impression is not good at all.
I like this app - but the draw back is that there isn't a way to save a wishlist or select items you may want to purchase but aren't sure of yet
Love that y'all carry plus sizes and so many choices. I really love all that you have for us plus size women only thing I wish you carried better selection of swimsuits

I love the adore me app! It's so easy to navigate and find what you are looking for. The bra/panty options are always either super cute or super sexy, i have a hard time picking because i love them all! They are also comfy and fit perfectly! The sleepwear is cute and comfy and the lingerie is always on point. I cant say enough great things about this app and company! Girls if you are looking for a great place to shop for bras, panties, pajamas, and lingerie look no further than Adore Me!

I love the Adore Me product line! The best part? How you get to pick and choose sizes (and often styles) when purchasing their bra & panty sets! While they do carry a huge range of bra sizes, it seems like the more uncommon ones are almost always sold out, which is even more of an annoyance when you actually realize just how small of a selection they offer regarding non-standard sizes . . . If i didnt encounter "sold out" as often as i do, it'd definately be a 5-star rating.

title: HSN Phone Shop App
description:
The award winning HSN Shop App for Android is everything you know and love about HSN, right on your mobile phone or tablet! Check out the most popular brands that will keep you fabulous from head to toe and everywhere in between.
 
** HSN Shop App is available on Google Play (US only) Supporting Android OS 5.0 and above

Key Features:
 
Watch HSN Live: Never miss a show, while you’re on the go!  Watch the live show and shop the items on air. Use the Program Guide to check out upcoming shows featuring your fave brands.
 
Shop The Show- Ever looked at an HSN show and said “I want everything that I see?”-well now you can Shop The Show! Like what a host is wearing? Put the item in your cart and now you’re the star.
 
Direct Call to Customer Service- Call our Customer Service line and speak to a representative
 
FlexPay Manager- Ever wanted to keep track of your ongoing FlexPays all at once? Our FlexPay Manager allows you to see all payments at the same time right from the palm of your hand.
 
Do you have any comments or an idea to make our app sexy?
 
Send feedback to:HSNShopApp_Feedback@hsn.net- We want to hear from you!

recentChanges: Thank you for shopping with HSN using our Android phone app! Our engineering team has been working on some bug fixes to improve your shopping experience. Love the HSN app? Please leave us a rating or review. Have a suggestion for how we can improve? Email us at hsnshopapp_feedback@hsn.net.
comments: I love HSN but this app is extremely frustrating! It takes forever to load (when it actually does) and more often than not I will get an error message. I like to shop from the convenience of my phone but this app doesn't make it possible!!! Please address these issues HSN. I have the app for QVC and have zero issues so it's not my device.

I HATE having to sign in every single time I want to view my orders. And they dont do fingerprint or other sign in either, so it's especially frustrating. The app is generally clunky and not very user-friendly. All the same goes for the desktop website too, but that's not the focus of this post. Apps should be simpler to use, this one is not.
I Love this app some times I just log on to window shop, great deals and great host, in every department the host is so great.I haven't had any problems with this app.
Love it!!! I can view live broadcast from the t.v. right on my app. I'm able to create a wish list, place my order, manage my pay plans
great no hassle. the phone operators are nice. I DO NOT THINK I HAVE EVER RECEIVED A WRONG PACKAGE DUE TO PHONE OPERATORS OR PACKAGERS.

title: Copart – Salvage Car Auctions
description:
Access to Thousands of Vehicles

Browse over 175,000 cars, trucks, SUVs and more with the Copart App. Scan barcodes at a Copart location to quickly find details for any vehicle. Add vehicles to your Watchlist and place bids in Copart’s online auto auctions. Use the Vehicle Finder tool to quickly find vehicles or search our online inventory by type, year, make, model, location and more from any mobile device. The Copart App gives you access to thousands of salvage and clean title cars in vehicle auctions every day.

Bid and Buy from Anywhere

Log in using your existing Copart account or register through the app and quickly upload IDs and licenses directly to your account. Create and manage Watchlists and Saved Searches. Get notified about the results of your auctions and stay informed about vehicles on your Watchlist. The Copart App gives you full access to participate in our online auto auctions to bid and win your next vehicle!

Global App

Select your country to view vehicles on Copart.com, Copart.ca, Copart.co.uk, Copart.de, copart.com.br, Copartmea.com, Copart.es or Copart.ie all on one app. Find the vehicle auctions closest to you from anywhere in the world.

Features:

• Search, bid and buy with the tap of a finger
• Receive instant activity notifications
• Manage your Watchlist, Saved Searches and Pre-Bids on the go
• Find Recommended Vehicles based on your location, or on specific vehicles characteristics (Recommendations Engine available in the app for US & UK only)
• Use Voice Search by simply speaking your search criteria
• Get quick access to Today’s Auctions, Vehicle Finder, Locations and Last Searches from the enhanced dashboard
• Search for auctions by location and date
• Quickly search our global inventory for any type of vehicle by make, model, year, location and more
• View AutoCheck vehicle history reports (when available) and Copart Condition Reports
• Receive notifications about counterbid offers, lots won, lots lost and Watchlist vehicles up for auction
• View Payments Due and Payment History
• Pay through the app via personal credit or debit card (domestic accounts only)
• Access the QR code for the gate pass – with the Copart Mobile App, printing the gate pass is no longer necessary
• Learn more about the app with the Welcome Tour

14185 Dallas Pkwy
Ste 300

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Latest update won't let me add a vehicle to my watchlist anymore; says error occured when processing my request. Last update worked fine
It takes a little getting use too since the information is in a different spot then on the website but after you get use to everything it works better and faster then the website!
Crashes atimes. Aside from that. It's above average

Horrible. Do NOT sign up for their membership! They took $600 from me then told me they never did. After showing them the receipts they sent me, the website that showed my completed payment and my bank account showing a completed transaction they informed me I would have to wait anywhere from 2 days to who knows when to talk to the 1 (yes that's right 1) person who handles credit cards for all of the company!!!! No service for the customer in their customer service department.

Horrible, horrible experience with this app. This app has now make me lose on so many cars that I wanted to buy. It just shuts down for no good reason. Keep saying it has send the error message and you expect that something will be done about it but its been months that it is happening and nothing is done about it. The developer need to be taken to task and be asked for a refund. The app is clearly not designed to deal with a lot of traffic, hence in busy times the app will pack up and shut down

title: Sports for Academy
description:
Buy the best sports + outdoor products, from Tents and Camping Equipment to Walking Boots and Rucksacks, all from top brands with Academy Sports + Outdoors. Fast Shipping. 

Sports Equipment
We have all your sports related needs covered! No matter the sport, we've the kits, equipment, and accessories you need to take your skills to the next level. 

Clothing
Kit yourself out in women's sports clothing & footwear. Browse a range of running, training & gym wear from top name brands.

Tents & Camping
Shop big brand outdoor clothing, tents & camping, cycling and more. Found something we sell cheaper? We'll beat it!

comments: I've installed over and over. Always says access denied.
I cant check prices, blank page!
Great app and place to get sporting gear, supplies, and apparel for almost everything at really nice prices.
The service I received was first-rate. I made an order and within 2 days it was at my door. I was kept informed of the progress of the order throughout. Great app and shop!
Great quality clothing, quick delivery, excellent price!! Very impressed and will use again.. 5*

title: Postings (Craigslist Search App)
description:
Postings (formerly CLapp) attempts to be the easiest to use and the most visually appealing Craigslist search application in the Marketplace and is written by a Craigslist addict for Craigslist addicts.

Note: We no longer are able to show listings from the Personals section of Craigslist since the content violates the Play Store's terms of service and we can no longer risk being pulled from the Store (we have been twice now as a result).
descriptionHTML:
Postings (formerly CLapp) attempts to be the easiest to use and the most visually appealing Craigslist search application in the Marketplace and is written by a Craigslist addict for Craigslist addicts.

Note: We no longer are able to show listings from the Personals section of Craigslist since the content violates the Play Store's terms of service and we can no longer risk being pulled from the Store (we have been twice now as a result).
summary: A clean and simple search app for Craigslist postings.
developerAddress: Mendota Heights, MN 55118
recentChanges:
Returned Year range query in the Car and Truck categories
Added posting support for Garage and Moving Sales
Fixed posting to Tickets categories and a few others
comments: Going on a year with no reply or fix. Now half the categories show no results. last two updates I am no longer able to obtain contact info or reply to ads posted. I get an error that states I need to open ad in the browser in order to view or reply. The saving photos to the gallery however was fixed in the previous update. Will check back in.. A month later still no reply or fix/update.. Was beta tester.. Uninstalled beta, but still an issue. USED TO BE FAVORITE APP

I'll give it to you, it's a great app and easy to use. I've never had issues, and I've been using it for years. So why the 2 stars instead of 5? Started charging people to post vehicles, plain and simple. There used to be hundreds of vehicles if not thousands for sale by owners, now you're lucky if you get a handful sometimes. Why pay money to post something you're trying to sale? Does that help guarantee a sale? Does that stop car dealers from posting the same vehicle multiple times, no.

I've used this app exclusively for the past few years and love it!! But recent updates broke a few things like search filters. Now something as simple as min and max price don't work. It's extremely frustrating and I've emailed the developer multiple times providing debug info, but never getting a response. I have to use other apps in the meantime, no filters make it useless.

Your app is really pretty useless my photos dont show up there is just a cloud where the photo should be I have to guess which image I want and if I get the wrong one I have to delete and start over because you can't edit photos once its posted. And you can't manage your account within the app you have to do everything through email which is a pain having to go back and forth.

An incredibly well-designed app, but it is missing a critical feature. It needs the ability to reduce the search radius to truly local postings. Other apps allow toy to filter searches to those within X miles of a specific zip code.

title: Geek - Smarter Shopping
description: Get trending products at 50-80% OFF what you would pay at your local stores. Get the smartest deals on headphones, watches, speakers, phone upgrades, car accessories, and electronics directly on your phone. We go directly to the manufacturers to get you the best deals on stuff you want. So don't get up, keep sitting and shop smart and we'll take care of the rest.

Get the smartest deals on headphones, watches, speakers, phone upgrades, car accessories, and electronics directly on your phone. We go directly to the manufacturers to get you the best deals on stuff you want. So don't get up, keep sitting and shop smart and we'll take care of the rest.
summary: Trending products at 50-80% OFF what you would pay at your local stores
recentChanges: New features and improvements.
comments: The app itself is fine, but you may find deals that are too good to be true. I had selected 7-.50 cent items and one $1.00 item, all with free shipping. The order looked fine and then my bank tried to process the order charging $81.73. When I go to look at the order they let me know that none of the items that i purchased are left available at that price. My question is why do they advertise at that price? This is a classic bait and switch.... you may find some deals but the ones that are too good to be true, because they are. They WILL NOT ship anything for only .50 cents. They will continue to to exercise this business practice because there is no penalty for it.

PLEASE READ: This app is funny, it will say that the Item original price was $250 and they're selling it for $13 or something, the stuff you're looking at will say "Original price" and then "Our price" and they exaggerate so much. Careful.what you buy though, a lot of this stuff is junk, stick with Amazon or AliExpress

Great app! I "Wish" they had more functionality and filters and product comparison. But hey, you get what you pay for. Good for little chinky stuff. Advice - Never but first item you see if you want it. Keep scrolling and more times than none, you will find the same exact product cheaper.

The prices that it shows when you're first looking at it is totally different than when you go to buy it this is so wrong the price that it shows should be the same price when you go to check out but the price when you check out is so much more and if it says free just pay shipping and handling that is total b******* to

Wish freezes your account for no reason. Then they want a bank statement with Wish last transaction. Problem is if you pay with CC it will never show as a bank transaction. Also Wish has only automated emails and agents send you response after about 5th request in another language! So i switched to GEEK and i havent had any problems.

title: Schwan's Home Delivery
description:
Get high-quality frozen foods delivered to your door. Earn rewards for shopping on our app. With Schwan’s, you’ll have everything you need to make a quality meal in minutes.

Features:
• Shop hundreds of high-quality, premium frozen meals, meats and seafood, sides, snacks 
  and apps, ice cream, desserts and more.
• Easily manage orders and deliveries from your phone or tablet – whenever, wherever.
• Convenient delivery reminder notices.
• Save money with exclusive online-only deals and coupons.
• Earn Schwan’s Rewards™ points and save money at checkout.
• Browse hundreds of easy mealtime recipes that go from freezer to table in minutes.

About Us:
Schwan’s™ Home Delivery is the original frozen food delivery company. For nearly 70 years, we have been doing the hard work so you can spend more time enjoying meals with your family and less time preparing them. No contracts. No subscriptions. Just high-quality food fast. That’s Homemade Easy. Discover all Schwan’s has to offer today. Don’t have an account on Schwans.com? Create one now in the app!

115 W College Dr
Marshall, MN 56258
recentChanges: We regularly update our app to make it better for you. Download the latest version which includes a few bug fixes.
comments: Love Schwan's! But this app is damn near unusable. It's slow and clunky, and even if you know what you want to order, it's gonna take you 20 minutes to complete it. You have to hit buttons multiple times for actions to take, and often, things you put in your cart don't actually end up there. The delivery fee is worth it to not have to use this terrible app.

Help! App says security certificate has expired. Also, can not log in via internet page. I hope this is a temporary issue. 1☆ at the moment. 4☆ for overall experience. Typically a great app. Quick and easy way to place orders. Get push notices and reminders. Oh, yeah, and the foods great too!!!
Completely useless. Can't even enter username or email address. It says, "The page you requested was not found. The address may have been typed incorrectly, or the page may no longer exist."

Cant use the App anymore. Just crashes. Not sure what happen or if anybody else is experiencing this also. Have to get in the actual website to pre-order. Other than that, it's easy to use, food is great, driver is awesome!

After update can't order anymore or log in. Uninstalled/installed app, changed password but still can't log in. Couldn't order on the main site either. Gets stuck on the 2nd submit order page. Please fix.

title: Zappos: Shoes, clothes, boots, coats, & more!
description:
Zappos makes shopping easier! Shop all the top brands and latest trends of shoes, clothing, accessories & more!

Zappos.com offers an unrivaled selection of shoes, clothing, bags, accessories & more, along with FREE next-day delivery* and FREE returns, making shopping from your computer or smart device that much easier!

Looking for some sweet-new kicks? Zappos has you(r feet) covered!
Boots & flats from Birkenstock, Clarks, Sorel & more.
Sneakers from Nike, Brooks, Vans & many more.
Heels & pumps from Sam Edelman, UGG, Steve Madden & yup! Much, much more.

Seasons change, along with the trends. Stay ahead of the fashion game with exclusive brands, available at your fingertips!

Find the perfect fit! On-trend women's, men's, and kid's styles from the latest & best, clothing & footwear brands.

Fashion-forward clothing, high-performance apparel, outerwear, bags, accessories & more, all on the Zappos app!

Bad at or skeptical about making decisions online? Don't stress!

Shop with confidence on the Zappos app!
High-resolution images and videos.
Save your searches so you can mull it over and quickly pick-up where you left off!
Share your favorite styles and trends on social media
And as always, FREE & easy returns.
World-class customer service, from the Zappos Customer Loyalty Team, available by phone call (24 hours a day / 365 days a year), text, live chat, and e-mail.

*Free Next Business Day shipping when and where possible

comments: The selection of the items are better than others sites are offering, so I like it when you are ready to check out and everything is fine and it seemed to be easy to get to the purchase of the items. Thank you so much for updating the website.
Love the ease of shopping, even several years later. Love the quick delivery and returns.
Filter & sort fail. Ask for platform shoes & got sneakers & pants. Very difficult to use. Not worth effort.
Runs smooth, great filters, quick easy shopping experience.
Easy to use, great interactive videos that display the shoes.

title: RetailMeNot: Coupons, Deals & Discounts
description:
With everything going on in the world, saving money is now more important than ever. And the RetailMeNot app has got your back. 

We will continue to bring you the everyday savings you've come to expect with updates on deals for things like dining and curbside pickup, assembling a makeshift home office and saving on the toys and games that keep your kiddos (four-legged included) entertained, thriving and happy.

--SAVE MONEY & TIME --
The award-winning RetailMeNot app makes it easy to save money with over 200,000+ offers for more than 15,000+ brands to choose from. Find deals and special savings on essentials, meals, pick-me-ups and everything in between. The app is also home to 100s of cash back offers that can be used right from your phone.

Over 35 categories to find the perfect coupon:
Food deals - Dominos, Papa John’s, McDonald’s, IHOP 
Fashion coupon - Macy’s, Target, Kohl’s, Amazon
Beauty product offers - Ulta, Sephora, Bath & Body Works
Home Good deals - Hobby Lobby, Jo-Ann, Home Depot 
Travel including airfare, hotels and more - Hotels.com, Enterprise
And many more like sporting goods, designer clothing and handbags!

-- EARN MONEY WITH CASH BACK --
* RetailMeNot pays its app members $175,000+ every month on average.
* Our members earn up to 20% cash back just for shopping at their favorite stores and you could too.
 
--EASILY SAVE WITH SHOPPING & DINING DISCOUNTS --
* Enjoy 24,000+ food offers at local and national restaurants.
* Redeem coupons: Scan barcodes & upload receipts right from your phone so you can shop on the go.
* Enable notifications so you never miss a deal again.
 
--PEOPLE LOVE RETAILMENOT --
“I consult RetailMeNot every time I make a purchase ... especially online purchases. This app has saved me lots of money over the years!”

“I’ve been using RetailMeNot for several years and I never check out without first checking for a coupon. The codes always work and the savings are real!”

“Great app! Easy to use. I pull it up every time I'm in a store or ordering online! It’s so convenient not having to carry coupons around!”

-- SEE WHAT RETAILMENOT IS UP TO--
Blog: https://www.retailmenot.com/blog/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RetailMeNot/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/RetailMeot
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RetailMeNot
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/retailmenot/

comments: This is a great resource for saving money. Sometimes the cores don't work but either because they've expired or items in your cart don't qualify for a discount. Any improvement would be for either the developer make it so either them or the public make edits on what code does or doesn't not work, why it may not work, etc. :) I'd definitely help contribute ♡
This app is incredible! It would be impossible for me to even say how much I've saved! Thank all of you! **At times information is outdated but I always take the time to let you know!
The app and customer service are both first rate. This is definitely a great money saving tool. Do yourself a favor and get this app

I have many apps for deals, but this is the one I turn to for quick reliable answers. I also like the specials articles like for "national something" days - ice cream, hot dogs, etc. where the article gives you a one-stop shop for specials. They even had an article about places that give you something special for your birthday!
they used to have the current store ads u could look thru. Now...there r none at all and everything is different. HORRIBLE.

title: WICShopper
description:
PLEASE READ! WICShopper CURRENTLY SUPPORTS THE WIC PROGRAMS IN THE FOLLOWING STATES:

Alaska
Arkansas (Verification only)
Connecticut 
Colorado
DC (Verification only)
Florida
Hawaii
Idaho
Iowa
ITC Arizona
Kansas
Kentucky
Maine (Verification Only)
Massachusetts
Missouri 
Montana
Nebraska
Nevada
Nevada ITC
New Hampshire 
New Jersey (Verification only)
New Mexico (Verification only)
Ohio (Verification only)
Oregon
Pennsylvania (Verification only)
Puerto Rico (Verification only)
Rhode Island
Utah (Verification Only)
Vermont (Verification only)
Washington
West Virginia
Wyoming (Verification only)

COMING SOON - 
Oklahoma




WICShopper WILL NOT WORK IN OTHER STATES.  We are adding new states all the time, so please check back soon if you participate in another WIC program!

Grocery shopping for foods allowed by your WIC* program can be confusing.  Much of the problem is from not knowing exactly what products you can purchase with your WIC benefits. WICShopper is here to help you shop with confidence. Using WICShopper, you can check the WIC eligibility of products while you shop! In all of our supported WIC programs, you can use your phone to scan products to check their WIC eligibility. 

In most supported states, you may register your eWIC card, then automatically download your CURRENT benefits every time you shop! WICShopper doesn’t just tell you if the product is WIC eligible… it tells you if you have enough WIC benefits left to purchase the product! 

In states that use "smart cards" such as Texas, New Mexico and Wyoming it is not possible to load your prescription because it is stored on your card.  In these states, you can use the app to capture and store an image of your benefits to use the next time you shop.

We are adding new states as quickly as possible, so if your state isn't listed please check back soon! To learn more about WICShopper, please visit our website @ www.ebtshopper.com. 

* Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants, and Children

summary: WICShopper delivers the tools necessary to help participants succeed in WIC.
developerAddress: Denver, Colorado
recentChanges:
Minor bug fixes
Improvements to formatting in appointment reminder details page
Additional support for offline states to view benefits within app
comments: Absolutely so helpful when wic shopping! I constantly was forgetting my WIC food list, or either one of my toddlers would find it in my bag and chew on or rip it! 😫 this allows me to be able to quickly access the benefits that we can get if I'm confused, and also to even scan a barcode or enter a UPC to check that way! Not to mention the recipes or tips you can find! I'm just surprised my WIC office doesn't tell anyone about this, I found it by sheer luck! I plan on spreading the word!

This App is a life saver! I used to dread using the checks & shopping guide. It would take me forever & I'd never seem to get it right. This app makes WIC a dream come true. So easy & if there is ever a doubt on what groceries u qualify for you can always use the bar code scanner. No more embarrassing check outs! Thank you WIC we are so very grateful
When I go into the app it says loading and it has been taking forever and nothing else happens. 😡 it just keeps saying loading. I even let it sit for about 15 mins and still nothing.

I tried using my card at the hood canal grocery and it was saying everything was invalid. I even used the app to scan each barcode before going to checkout. I know it's not my card cause I used it the next day at a Walmart. Other than that the app is really useful when your not sure on an item.
So far I have found this app to be extremely helpful. Love the scan feature especially, as well as it keeping track of benefits.

title: Barcode Scanner For Walmart
description:
Save money on in-store items and find the same product at a discount on Walmart! 

With Barcode Reader for Walmart, you’ll be able to access and compare ratings and reviews for products you see in-store, find deals and discounts on Walmart, make smart purchases and save more of your hard-earned cash!

★ EASY TO USE
Simply find a product you like, scan the barcode with the reader and find the same product on Walmart to compare the price, reviews and ratings. 

★ FIND DEALS & DISCOUNTS ON Walmart
Seen a product you like in a store? We’d wager that you could find it cheaper on Walmart. Using our barcode scanner, you’ll be able to check to see if the item is stocked on Walmart and how much it costs, potentially saving you lots of money.

★ COMPARE RATINGS & REVIEWS
We all want to know whether a product is worth the money or not, don’t we? With our barcode reader for Walmart, you’ll be able to instantly access the reviews and ratings for that particular product. Save yourself the hassle of purchasing a poor quality item – check the reviews first! 

★ SEARCH Walmart
If have no barcodes to scan and you just want to shop on Walmart – we have that covered, too. With a convenient search bar, you’ll be able to browse for products on Walmart United States from within the app and have products delivered directly to your door. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
BARCODE SCANNER FOR Walmart – HIGHLIGHTS
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
⦁ Scan barcodes and view the product on Walmart in seconds
⦁ Find deals, discounts and savings on Walmart
⦁ Use the barcode scanner as a price comparison tool
⦁ Search and shop for items on Walmart directly from the app
⦁ Compare ratings and reviews for items

★ SHOP SMART – DOWNLOAD FOR FREE TODAY! ★

---
This app was not created or endorsed by Walmart.
“Walmart”, the Spark, “Save money. Live better.” are trademarks of Walmart Stores Inc.

comments: When I scanned an item, it said it was not available then opened an ad playing a full screen video disabling the back and home buttons so I had to use the power button to get out of it If you're going to put ads, use banners, not full screen videos that disable the back and home button on something that's meant to scan items in the store.
Love the Walmart app and scanner when you need to know a price you can scan the product. Great app!
It is most helpful to have a scanner for price checks without asking someone for help.
What a joke! Im in walmart right now. Scanned 3 diff items and all 3 times said product not found! THERE REALLY NEEDS TO BE SOME KIND OF WAY GOOGLE PLAY CAN CHECK AND DELETE APPS SUCH AS THIS!!
Loveeee this department store. Relaxed and comfortable environment. Everything you need and more

title: PatPat: Kids, Baby Clothing – Daily Deals for Moms

1. Allowed to login with SMS in middle east countries

comments: I love all the matching outfits they have! There in all sizes!! The app is so simple to navigate and there are so many discounts! The only reason im giving it a 4 star is because it take forever to ship 🥺

This is such an amazing company!! I was so surprised how quickly I received my items. Then when I opened them, I was very impressed with the shipping and quality of the items I've purchased!! I will definitely continue to use this company! Plus whenever you download the app, you get even more discounts!! I'll definitely be using y'all again soon!!
Excellent shopping app...very reasonable prices. Takes about 3 weeks to get your items but I always shop in advance. Plus,they have clothes that aren't offered in the stores...cute,cute,cute!!!

Outfits are absolutely adorable! Ordered them for my niece and stepdaughter who will soon be first time momma's. Delivery time a little longer than expected but considering what's going on I understand. Love! love! love! the clothes!!

False advertising. When you click on an item to view it and pick the size to add to your cart the items at minimum double in price from the browsing screen. As per their "reply", I am not confused I literally click into the item I havnt even had the chance to select a size I also went back and double checked and even if I select the smallest size its still at least double. Perhaps instead of blaming your potential customers and insinuating incompetence you should actually review your app.

title: Sezzle - Buy Now, Pay Later
description:
Sezzle is a digital payment platform that enables everyone to take control of their financial futures, spend responsibly and achieve financial freedom. With Sezzle, you can shop with thousands of stores, receive your order right away, and pay for it over 6 weeks, completely interest-free.
 
Use the app to discover new stores, manage existing orders, reschedule future payments, change your payment methods, and get notifications ahead of your next payment.
descriptionHTML:
Sezzle is a digital payment platform that enables everyone to take control of their financial futures, spend responsibly and achieve financial freedom. With Sezzle, you can shop with thousands of stores, receive your order right away, and pay for it over 6 weeks, completely interest-free.

Use the app to discover new stores, manage existing orders, reschedule future payments, change your payment methods, and get notifications ahead of your next payment.
summary: Buy now & Pay Later with Sezzle Payments
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: This is seriously a great resource. I already have bought two items from two stores. If you pay on time or early, they will make the payments more easy and even allow you to reschedule payments.
Great app and useful if you dont have the money to pay for a large order all at once! Also useful that it gets split evenly, and that theres no interest. Definitely worth using it!

I love Sezzle. The app is EXTREMELY convenient and easy to use and navigate. Text reminders are wonderful. I love that if pay periods fall on awkward days you have the ability to reschedule if needed (first time is free!). I know it is expensive for businesses to make available for customers due to the fees they have to pay. That makes me sad as I wish more businesses had it available for customers who don't want to bust out their interest rate credit cards.

So far purchasing items through Sezzle has been so much easier on me. And the fact that there isn't interest involved puts my mind further at ease when buying collectibles. And what's more out of the 3 "by installment payment" Apps that I have downloaded, this is the only one that offers the option of rescheduling future payments in case I can't make the deadline. That type of perk is why I'd recommend this one highly for its flexibility.

Great app. Gives payment reminders for date, amount, and for which product. App is super easy to navigate. Also allows payment date rescheduling for a small fee BUT first time is free. Helps keep you organized and pay on time. Love this! Thank you Sezzle. Interest free...so much better then a credit card for online shopping

title: Fry’s
description:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Fry’s app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Fry’s Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:

- Shop Pickup or Delivery right from the app!

- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your online order.

- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.

- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.

- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.

- Refill your Fry’s Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.

- Check your fuel points.

- Use our locator to find the closest Fry’s store or fuel center.

- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.

- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.

To use the Fry’s app, you'll need a Fry’s digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!

summary: Save with Fry's! Coupons, ads, rewards, find stores & shopping list in one app!
recentChanges:
We’re working around the clock to ensure our services and products are available to you. Here are some release highlights:

- March fuel points extended until May 31!
- Log in to your account with your Apple ID.
- Get paid to shop with Cash Back, our newest Way to Save!
- Temporary quantity restrictions displayed for certain high-demand products.

We value your feedback. If you need help or have a suggestion, please contact our Customer Service Center at 1-800-576-4377.
comments: Use it a lot but with every update it gets less intuitive and more cumbersome. I used to get to coupons directly, now it needs several clicks. And why do I need a need a pop up screen that tells me in which store I am when I open the app? I know where I am, just more useless clicking around to get to where I want to go. Also, it keeps opening the keyboard after I close in-app notifications or pop up screens but it keeps the keyboard closed when I click into the search bar. Why?

Edit: I posted my 2-star review yesterday due to some errors I received when logging in to the app. Today, the problem I had was fixed. I actually use the app and Clicklist often so this is a huge relief. Awesome job, Fry's! Old Review: I like the app when it works and use it often. After the update yesterday, it won't accept my password. I can log into the website fine so I know it's not operator error.

It's slow when you're at the checkout line. 1. Look for and open app 2. If app was recently updated be prepared to have to log in at checkout. No rush, I'm sure no one minds waiting for you. 3. Wait for it to load 4. Scroll through app to find the pay option 5. Put PIN number in 6. Hold over scanner and wait for it to read. 7. Grab your stuff and go

4/24/20 Changed my rating. The update fixed my issues. Thank you! Fix the app. It's not working. I haven't been able to use in over a week. Seen other reviews and I'm not having password issues. I can't get into the app. Error message says app stopped. And this message randomly comes up when I'm on my phone. PLEASE fix the issue.

Since your latest update, this app will not allow me to log in. Gives me an error message every time. Changed my password, still cannot log in. Receive same error. My wife can log in no problem on the Fry's app on her iPhone with the new password. I can log into the Fry's website no problem with the new password. The developer fixed this for a short period of time but now it is not working once again.

title: Albertsons Deals & Rewards
description:
Maximize your savings with the Safeway app and our just for U program! Register to find over $300 in weekly savings and earn fuel rewards. Easily get weekly coupons and sale information on groceries and more. Download and register to start savings now.
 
Find your Savings: 
·         Register to clip your digital coupons in just for U® to be used at checkout
·         Sort offers by aisle, category, purchase history, recently added, and about to expire
·         Register to Earn Gas Rewards and redeem at participating stations. See program details inside the app.
·         View your Weekly Ad
 
Build your Shopping List:
·         Using your purchase history

Other Features you will find:

recentChanges: Bug fixes and minor improvements.
comments: The app works like it should. I like having the rewards feature so easily available and easy to use. Decent coupons. Can update your phone number & everything within the app. But you have to call automated customer service to reset your password if you forget it which is a good security measure but a little inconvenient.
Everytime there is an update I have to uninstall and reinstall this app a few times. It usually takes a few hrs for this app to finally work for me. Its really annoying to have to do this everytime.
It would be so much easier to just have ONE bar code to scan at the time of purchase. Inconvienient to have to get ones phone out while shopping and scan sale products to get get the coupon.
Not happy with the selection or prices. So the app uses the high prices and you cant get near the selection that the store has. It's better to shop in store yourself sadly.
The app is easy to use. Simply scan with the bar code function and it will let you know if there are coupons or special pricing on the item.

title: Wawa
description:
The Wawa App, making your next Wawa run easier than ever to order, pay and earn delicious rewards!

Easier to Order…..with simplified mobile ordering, it’s a breeze to browse our full menu, reorder your favorites or try out something new!

Easier to Pay……you can pay for your mobile order with your Wawa Gift Card right in the app before you get to the store!

Easier to Earn…..Now you can pay ANY way and earn Wawa Rewards! Just scan your new Rewards barcode from your Wawa App at checkout, pay for your order any way you like (cash, credit, debit, Wawa gift card) and start earning your Wawa Rewards!

For every $50 you spend on qualifying items using the app, you earn a delicious reward! Plus you will receive bonus rewards throughout the year for just being a Rewards member!
descriptionHTML:
The Wawa App, making your next Wawa run easier than ever to order, pay and earn delicious rewards!

Easier to Order…..with simplified mobile ordering, it’s a breeze to browse our full menu, reorder your favorites or try out something new!

Easier to Pay……you can pay for your mobile order with your Wawa Gift Card right in the app before you get to the store!

Easier to Earn…..Now you can pay ANY way and earn Wawa Rewards! Just scan your new Rewards barcode from your Wawa App at checkout, pay for your order any way you like (cash, credit, debit, Wawa gift card) and start earning your Wawa Rewards!

For every $50 you spend on qualifying items using the app, you earn a delicious reward! Plus you will receive bonus rewards throughout the year for just being a Rewards member!
summary: Now it's easier than ever to order, pay and earn delicious rewards.
developerAddress:
260 W. Baltimore Pike
Wawa, PA 19063
recentChanges: In this release, we have introduced a spotlight feature highlighting areas within the app and resolved minor bug fixes that you may have experienced when mobile ordering.
comments: The app is functional, but it doesn't contain many of the drink options that are available in the store. It also only allows me to pay through gift cards, which is just ridiculous! This is the only app I am aware of where I can't pay with a credit/debit card, PayPal, or Google pay. At least one of those options should be available. iPhones can use Apple Pay in addition to gift cards, but that's still ridiculously limited.

The credit card auto-reload never works properly. Whenever I try to add funds I get an error message... only to find out later that it actually had deducted funds from my credit card and created a NEW gift card for each attempt. This happened twice. I spent 30 mins on hold to speak with a VERY RUDE customer service agent to get them to merge all of the unwanted gift cards. I was told this isn't a known issue. The other reviews here say otherwise! Ill deleting the app once my balance is used up.

First, you have to battle with Xfinity wifi in the Wawa store asking you to sign in when trying to open the app. Once you get the app to open it takes another 30 seconds to load your information. Then another 30 seconds to pull up your rewards card and then another 30 seconds to pull up the gift card. Meanwhile, you have 10 people behind you cursing and rolling their eyes. FIX IT!

Every attempt of clicking reload on a digital gift card produces a new digital gift card. There is no ability to use multiple digital gift cards to complete a purchase. So to use the last $2 or less on each card I had to go to a cashier to buy a new gift card for the exact amount of the total of all balances. What a hassle. The app saves my credit card, but doesn't allow me to just pay with the credit card. I have to buy a gift card with the credit card first. Rewards can't be used in app.

Wawa, great food, lousy app. I tried ordering in the app but my gift card didn't have enough of a balance, so I tried to reload it but instead of adding the funds to my existing card, it gave me an entirely new card. Moral of the story, the convenience the app could bring you is outweighed by the frustration it will bring you.

title: Barcode Scanner
description:
Scan barcodes on products, or Data Matrix and QR Codes containing URLs, contact info, etc.

Note that this app can no longer be updated on Google Play, and there will be no further releases.

Almost every question and negative review comment is addressed by one of the following. Please save everyone time by reading these first:

Nobody is stealing your information. The app allows you to share contacts, apps, and bookmarks in a QR Code. This is why contacts permissions are needed. See "Visit Developer Website" below ( https://github.com/zxing/zxing/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions ).

If your device is not scanning, first try workarounds for device bugs in Settings. Enable all of them, and then try disabling one at a time to determine which is necessary. If this does not help, try clearing the device cache and settings from Android settings.

Scan barcodes on products, or Data Matrix and QR Codes containing URLs, contact info, etc.

Note that this app can no longer be updated on Google Play, and there will be no further releases.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I haven't used these apps except for once. It is not on my phone now for the same reason Jason. I. Can almost assure the hijacking may have come THRU the app, but I have been hijacked for 2 1/2 yes, by the same group, tracking still. The reason you couldn't find the source is bkz a Linux PC is used, once access to your device all info like IMEI, ICCID, etc is mirrored and your device is monitored always. It is by the way, AOSP. I was hijacked 2 yes to the month befor google"s article was release

Simply the best barcode scanner. Users scanning random suspicious codes and blaming the scanner is ridiculous! You F up, you own it. Do not blame app for your mistakes! This scanner does exactly its job and it is one, if not the best in its area. Thumbs up for the ZXing Team from me!

I've Had A Contract, For 5 Or 6 Years, For Online Banking, & Stores. For Online Legal Transfers, Transactions, & Electronic Signatures, Or Equivalent. So I Had Used The BarCode Scanner, & The QR Reader A Few Times. They Seemed To Work Good, & At The Time, I Knew Nothing About AnyKind Of Computer Technology's. So It Interested Me. I've Been Chasing The Dream Ever Since! I Hope Life Is Turned, For The Good For Once. God Has Put-Me_In-My_Place, So-To_Speak. It Seems I Was Set Down, & Made TDT!!!
I've scanned numerous items ranging from old diaries to newly bought things. The app picks up the barcode quickly and gives you a web search option. Comes up with relevant information. Nice!

I have been using this app for many years, and it has always performed flawlessly. Never had a single ad or misbehavior. There are, unfortunately, apps with the exact same name (different developer) that are malware as recently reported by Ars Technica. I urge caution when choosing these types of apps. This one is solid.

title: DICK'S Sporting Goods, Fitness

DICK’S Sporting Goods gives you exclusive access to personalized coupons and offers, ScoreCard tracking, rewards, and access to all the gear you need. You’ll find all the sporting goods and sporting apparel you need for football, baseball, soccer, lacrosse and more, plus the latest workout, fitness and exercise gear.

Every Season Starts at DICK’S.

Features

MOVE: Earn ScoreCard points for achieving your activity goals each day by integrating with fitness apps and fitness trackers like Apple Health, Garmin, Fitbit and MapMyRun. Hit daily exercise and health and fitness goals just by walking/moving!

Get Rewards: Manage your ScoreCard, scan Rewards and track your points

Offers: Get custom offers and coupons

Shop: Shop anytime, anywhere. Make shopping for sporting and health and fitness apparel and gear simple from anywhere. Receive personalized coupons and offers and find a store near you. See what makes DICK’S Sporting Goods compare with the best shopping apps and fitness apps!

comments: The app is cool. I just wish with MOVE that Dick's would update the system to where I can use Samsung Health to sync my walks. I shouldn't have to download this app to download another app to sync the two apps together in order for my steps and mileage to be accounted for. With the technology we have now not only should you have Fitbit, you should also have Samsung and Apple. Not everyone has a Fitbit nor does everyone want to download extra apps.

Well it works part of time. I usually get my points only once I awhile I dont All this week I got my points but shows no activity which is confusing. And my sister does it and she has a 15 day challenge to earn extra rewards I dont. I hope because it doesn't think I'm doing any activity
The shopping experience is good but the extra feature lack range. The inability to sync Androidwear devices or to Samsung health is a big minus.
Great if it actually works 😑 ; thank you for the follow up, the issue was with my Fitbit syncing with the app adding my steps it was great motivation until it stop counting my steps...

I have no problem with the app itself. My grievance is with using my scorerewards card. Its absolutely ridiculous that you can't use it online to buy anything. All I want to do is buy a club, golf balls or gloves. Have them sent to my home instead of having to drive an hour to closest store. I've done my homework and decided to say screw it and buy a new 3w. But with stores closed I can't right now. Won't be able to get reward points using a cc instead of a store card. This needs to change ASAP.

title: Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up
description:
Download the Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Albertsons. Sign in with your existing Albertsons account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.
 
Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up App is convenient, easy and will save you time with these features:
- Delivery - Choose a time when you want your groceries delivered to your doorstep
- Drive Up & Go (Pick Up) - Drive up to your Albertsons store, park, call and we'll bring your groceries to you
- Flexible delivery and pick up times – groceries on your schedule
- Shop fast from your previous in-store and online purchases
- Make special requests to your Personal Shopper (e.g. pick green bananas)
- Save money with hundreds of clippable coupons
- Exclusive online savings – easily find new weekly deals that matter most to you

Letting all the negative people know , its very easy if tou follow directuons and not be in a licky split motion . Most probably didnt read everything , or dida typo. It happens i can admit to that . title: Shoe Carnival
description:
Shoe Carnival is one of the nation's largest, fastest growing and most exciting family footwear retailers. title: T.J.Maxx
description:

title: QuadPay
description:
SHOP ONLINE NOW. PAY OVER TIME.
At QuadPay, we’re creating a movement to empower shoppers to buy what they want, when they want. We split the purchase into 4 interest-free payments, spread over 6 weeks.

SHOP DIRECTORY.
View a full directory of brands where you can shop interest-free online with QuadPay. Choose QuadPay in the checkout to split your payment in 4.

MANAGE ORDERS.
Never miss a payment with the QuadPay app. Make early payments and manage all of your QuadPay orders from the palm of your hand.

MANAGE PAYMENT CARDS.
Manage the payment cards you have on file.

Google Pay coming soon.

Join the #sQuad and start using QuadPay today!

recentChanges: Bug fixes!
comments: I love Quadpay!! It makes it easier to make purchases and divide the payments up into 4 payments. Without Quadpay, I wouldn't be able to make some of my purchases all at once. The only thing I don't like about Quadpay is that even though I have had many orders thru them and paid all of them off early, they lower your limit instead of increasing it. I just wish that, with good solid payment history with them, they would gradually increase your limit, not lower it. Otherwise, all orders great!!

I love this app and the ability to split some purchases into 4 payments. So far, I have paid off one purchase and my spending limit increased. I don't know if it will increase again. One thing I noticed is that when you go to browse the sites on the app, a few of them did not work, like Amazon. I tried to add certain things to my cart and it would freeze up or it would not add the product at all. Also, my husband was denied when signing up but we aren't sure why as all you put is your phone #.

Amazing app. I love being able to cut my cost into 4 easy payments. Helps out alot especially when I schedule it for my pay week lol. I only have 2 issues. 1: I can't ask for an increase which sucks cuz I spend money lol and I'll spend more if I had more credit. 2: I can't purchase from more than one store at a time even with having credit to spend. That's just wack. But the app is convenient, easy and flexible. I can't really hate it at all. Love it!!!

Since the endless looping has been fixed I love this app. It has saved me so much interest instead of using loans and credit cards and I can get everything I want or NEED in four payments. I do not mind the dollar fee with each payment because this app unlike it's competition gives you a credit line and doesn't change your limit or block you randomly Everytime you re-enter your information. You have a limit. You use it. You pay. You have your limit back. I love you quadpay.

This is my second time using Quad pay, and my first time using the app. I used it to buy an item I've been watching for about a year and I waited for it to go on sale. The app was easy to use. I was only given a certain amount to borrow which was less than I needed. There wasn't a way for me to spit the payment when checking out in the online store, so that made it confusing. Thank God I was in the physical store I was shopping online at, so I bought a gift card to cover the difference..

title: Smith's
description:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Smith’s app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Smith’s Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:

- Shop Pickup or Delivery right from the app!

- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your online order.

- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.

- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.

- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.

- Refill your Smith’s Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.

- Check your fuel points.

- Use our locator to find the closest Smith’s store or fuel center.

- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.

- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.

To use the Smith’s app, you'll need a Smith’s digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Smith’s app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Smith’s Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:

- Shop Pickup or Delivery right from the app!

- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your online order.

- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.

- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.

- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.

- Refill your Smith’s Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.

summary: Save with Smiths! Coupons, ads, rewards, find stores & shopping list in one app!
recentChanges:
We’re working around the clock to ensure our services and products are available to you. Here are some release highlights:

- March fuel points extended until May 31!
- Log in to your account with your Apple ID.
- Get paid to shop with Cash Back, our newest Way to Save!
- Temporary quantity restrictions displayed for certain high-demand products.

We value your feedback. If you need help or have a suggestion, please contact our Customer Service Center at 1-800-576-4377.
comments: This has been an issue ever since I started using pick up when they unrolled it at the new location. Items mysteriously vanish from the cart or don't get put into it at all. It never gets fixed either, this has been going on for years. Less of a problem when I can go through the store and grab what I need myself. It's a much bigger issue when you can't due to a global pandemic.

Smith's finally got this right. The latest update is finally useable with better layout. The Google Assistant integration is excellent and the command list is well organized. This is now a well crafted and useable application unlike the order version which were user hostile. Latest update is garbage. Forces unwanted password reset. The reset does not work. Application is now totally useless.

The only part if the app that seems to be ordered right is search. You should search everything from the home screen. If you try to find things using the guided menus you wont find what your looking for unless you just want to skim through all the stuff the should have in store. Took me 5 minutes to find noodles. Also you cannot add to a shopping list so you're stuck just looking everything up in store. Smith's, go use the Home Depot app and either mirror it or pay them to make yours.

App crashes constantly, won't let me sign in, says email or password is incorrect but yet I use the same email and password on my PC, works every time on my PC. Won't let me link to my Google account to sign in either. Says error accessing link for Google. Very frustrated with this app. UPDATE, now it wants me to change my password. I do not want to change my password, there is no need to reset my password. I don't want to log in as a guest I want to log in with my own password

Love that I can choose my coupons and it's all done digitally without having to actually clip coupons. Seeing my purchase history is very helpful. I've saved so much money over the yrs with the coupons. Never really had an issue with the app minus it saying that the store has an item but yet I can't find it and this was pre lockdown. My issue now though, why it's not 5 stars, is the nutrition label tab on the items is blank, nothing under it, been like that for at least a couple of weeks now.

comments: I really like this app but, when I open the app, it just stays on the page with the black background and the logo for a long time when you first open the app. I can't get in because it just sits on this page forever. Can you please fix this? I really want to use this app.🙂😂

Very well made app. Have had no issues since using this app. I like how organized everything is and if you can't find something usually it's as easy as generalizing your search more and it just works.
Absolutely love Under Armour and buy their products a lot! The app is so easy to use and your even able to track your orders. Waiting on an order to arrive as we speak. 🛍😊 Very pleased!
Love the app! It saves my size preference and everything else makes shopping that much quicker and easier.

Under armour is my clothing choice. This review couldn't be more honest. I love the app I never have trouble finding any and I always can find deals. I have all alerts set and get information on the new drops. I love these clothes and this will always be my brand!

title: Hollar - The Online Dollar Store
description:
Bring the fun and addicting dollar store experience straight to your phone! Find thousands of amazing deals across our wide selection of categories with 50-90% off retail! Join our growing user base of over 5 million savvy shoppers and start saving today!

Reasons to Download:

App-Exclusive Deals 
Get instant access to app-only promotions and deals on thousands of top brands starting at $1—the lowest online prices, guaranteed!

Browsing Made Simple
Enjoy infinite scrolling for an effortless browsing experience. Looking for something specific? Quick search to find what you need, when you need it. 

Buy with Confidence
Securely check out with your credit card or PayPal and experience fast domestic shipping—straight from our fulfillment center in Los Angeles, CA.


What We Offer:

Endless Variety
Shop popular products in Home, Kitchen, Toys, Beauty, Office, Apparel, Household, Health, Grocery, Baby, Party, Pet, Electronics, and so much more!

All Your Favorite Brands
So many products from Disney, Nickelodeon, Star Wars, Marvel, Minions, Shopkins, My Little Pony, TONYMOLY, e.l.f., Nivea, Neutrogena, O.P.I., Crayola, Mega Bloks, Play-Doh, Cotton On, Hanes, Fruit of the Loom, Zak!—to name a few.

New Products Daily
Get them before they’re gone! New products are available daily at low, LOW prices. Check back daily to find something new.

Fast Shopping with Bundles
Easily add related products to your cart with our bundles. It’s a simpler, more streamlined way to shop and discover.

comments: Love this app! Hollar has a huge selection of items in several categories. The majority of them are high quality & absolutely EVERYTHING they sale is priced low. I've ordered from Hollar several times & my items always arrive within a couple of days & in perfect condition too. I'm sure I'll continue to order from them, again & again.

Absolutely love this app. They have good discounts on great products and fast delivery. they can't be beat. 6 months later and still loving it. I order at least once a month. They have anything you could need at an affordable price. Free shipping is offered once you spend a certai amount. If not it's only 3.99. What else could you ask for?Trust me when i say try it, you will love it. I need VIP status guys. Maybe a special discount. I have every person that I know and encoun wl

I really enjoy shopping & browsing this app. It's always different stuff daily. Prices are great and so far everything I have ordered has been good quality for the price. It does usually take a couple weeks for shipments to arrive and you can't pay to have rush delivery, but the prices make up for that, in my opinion.

Edit* app stopped working. It won't load at all and says my email and password is incorrect the one time it did load to that step. I enjoy the things. Shipping is high and takes forever, in my opinion. It's better to order more than one thing with the shipping cost and time it takes to ship. Other than that I enjoy it. Lots of fun things.
So easy to use. Items came packaged so neatly and with great care. Would definitely recommend.

title: Reverb.com: Buy & Sell Music Gear
description:
Find great deals on best-selling music gear, hunt for a one-of-a-kind vintage finds, or post your own gear for sale. Shop a huge selection of new, used, and vintage guitars, pedals, synths, drums, microphones, and more from top brands, retailers, boutique builders, and musicians from all over the world. Easily get your unused instruments in front of a global community of musicians and make money to fund your next purchase. Plus, learn and get inspired through gear demos, artist interviews, video lessons, and more.

Buy
• Watch listings to get notified when prices drop.
• Follow searches in your Feed (like "Fender electric guitars before 1965" or "Korg • synths under $300") to get updates on the gear you want.
• Make offers to find the best deal.
• Message sellers for more details on any listing.

Sell
• List gear for free. Create a listing in minutes: simply take photos, write a description, and set your price.
• Respond to offers and messages from anywhere.
• Manage your shop—promote listings with Bump, update prices, and more.

Discover
• Watch gear demos, artist interviews, and how-to videos.
• Read about gear history, recording and production techniques, and more.
• Browse handpicked collections of gear curated by our expert staff.
• Learn about rare and unique gear and under-the-radar deals and steals.

comments: Most awesome place for your musical experience of vintage home audio .The latest technology in new home audio ,where you'll find your gear for any musical fix you could possibly have. If it's a old Macintosh tube amp ,a new bluetooth wireless Home Theater or MAYBE A Gibson Les Paul and a Marshall stack, or maybe a PAUL REED SMITH my favorite axe .You Will find it Here or you ain't going to find it. Check em out

Just keeps getting better, well designed website, great sellers, all good, thank you! Reverb has so much valuable info in gear and prices, its unbelievable, highly recommended. One very useful function of the app is watchlist and feeds, thank you!
Love Reverb. It's great for buying. Better than eBay for selling in terms of fees, but make sure you don't get returned items that have been opened up or worked on. Stickers are your best friend.
Great app, lots of really good finds on here. Safe and reliable place to buy instruments and music gear.

Great BST app with a great community of musicians and stores. Only thing I wish they'd do differently is to have a "home" option or the main menu visible from every page; after going down a rabbit hole of search results and related items, it can -no joke- take a dozen taps of the "back" arrow to get back to the main feed, search and other options.

title: Hot Topic
description:
Can't get enough of Hot Topic? Bring Hot Topic around in your pocket with the new Hot Topic App! Hot Topic is your destination for music and pop culture-inspired clothes and accessories, plus fashion apparel for girls and guys. Looking for t-shirts and merch from the bands you love? We have 'em. Need a pair of jeans to go with that t-shirt? We got you covered. How about Funko figures from your favorite characters? We have those, too. Be inspired every day with the Hot Topic App.

Exclusive App Features Include:
o   Browse and shop on the go for accessories and clothes from Hot Topic
o   Check out our newest and hottest clothing in an instant
o   Show off your favorite TV, movie and band merch through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and more
o   Find the closest Hot Topic store for the latest music-inspired clothing quickly
o   Take advantage of the latest promotions, deals and discounts
o   Follow your order status with just a few taps

We'd love to hear from you! Email your feedback about our app or any questions to appsupport@hottopic.com.

comments: It was okay until I couldn't remember my password. This app is pretty basic. But I couldn't reset my password because your website for mobile is garbage. I don't have a computer so I can only do it by phone. I would like to see you implement things like resetting your password using the app instead of just sending me to your crappy browser website. Any customer service or help you need directs you straight to the browser site. It basically doesn't run on your phone right, slow, lag, random ads.

When I first got the app last year it was great! Did ALOT of ordering but now it wont let me order anything. I've gone through the checkout thing 5 times and just keeps saying the items are still in my cart. I know it's not an issue with my card balance because I pay it off everytime I use it. Very aggravating when trying to get stuff for my daughter!

Extremely difficult to use and won't let you sign in or create an account. Even if the password field is entered, it says, "minimum password 8 characters" or something very close to that. I don't recommend the website either. I ran into the same problem. Same thing for Box Lunch. When I tried to get help it just kept redirecting me on the app and website.

Can't even create an account. When I tried to sign up, once I checked the signed up in store tab, the app continued to tell me "password is a required field". However there is only fields for your number, email, and zip code. I tried just signing up but because my email is already registered in the store itself it won't allow me to make an account.

every time i open it, it says "there was a problem connecting to the internet" when i clearly have wifi and it's working like it usually is. I'm honestly disappointed... please fix the issue, I really want to browse hot topic through my phone

title: Whole Foods Market
description:
Get the most out of every shopping trip with the Whole Foods Market app.
 
SAVE MORE
• Browse weekly sales at your favorite location to find the latest deals on the products you love
• Prime members receive special savings on select items, plus an extra 10% off Whole Foods Market weekly sales prices. Sign in with your Amazon account, then show the QR code in the app at checkout
 
STAY ORGANIZED
• View and edit your shopping list on the go with the integrated Alexa Shopping List
• Quickly tap items on the Savings tab, type products in directly, or use your voice with an Alexa-enabled device to add to your list

recentChanges: We found a couple of unwelcome bugs that we had to kindly show the door. Well, maybe not kindly, but they are gone. Please continue to save on great deals as we continue to refine our app.
comments: Looking at sale items is fine, but the shopping list is useless. There's a check box for when items are in cart, but to delete from list I have to select each item. Why is there no "Delete checked items"?

I assumed the app would be like the Walmart or QFC apps which...do things. Search items, shipping cart, show you the location in store where to find Items, etc. This app doesn't actually have real functionally besides getting your QR Code which the regular Amazon App already does.

Nope... no bueno this app only shows you the foods they want you to see. There's no option to see the inventory that is available. I think I'll stick with my local grocery store apps instead at least there I can shop around and know what their inventory is plus there deals are a lot more fair

Where are the hot soups, hot food 🍲 to deliver it? I don't see on the app. This is not a true shopping lists. Takes forever to scroll to look for....I would like to go for a walking to do shopping than online which I see I like.
This app is extremely limiting. How coupons work, how vague this app is, and how a mobile version is less optional than the desktop version.

title: Edible Arrangements
description:
Finding the perfect gift has never been easier than now with the Edible Arrangements Android app! Send your favorite Edible gifts with just a few simple taps. From delicious chocolate covered strawberries, fruit bouquets and gift baskets overflowing with gourmet chocolate dipped fruit, the Edible app is the perfect gifting solution.
Leave the flowers behind and choose something truly original! Our local Edible stores are able to deliver gifts for any occasion, expressing everything from love and sympathy to celebrating a birthday, anniversary or simply saying thank you. Edible Arrangement’s uniquely hand-crafted fruit bouquets delivers beyond expectations every time.
Let us pick the best arrangements and chocolate covered fruit boxes for you! Introducing our new Gift Finder feature- just tell us the occasion, price range and what fruits (or chocolate) you know should be in it and we’ll take it from there!

comments: Never gave an opportunity to enter coupons or redeem free rewards. I was just overcharged $20 and didn't get my free birthday gift. I would have to enter a whole new order to redeem my "free" gift, now. Limits searching ability and is difficult to order more than 1 item in a total order.
Extremely slow. Too much to deal with.

app is fine but my experience wasn't good at all. I went to pick up 45 munites after but my order still wasn't ready so I actually picked up my order after one hour the pick up time and they didn't put in my bag all of my order so I've seen poor business representative and hospitality.

When we are limited on resources to shop for family and friends in these uncertain times of the Covid-19 pendemic, whether it be for holidays, Birthdays or just to let them know you care and love them, Edible Arrangements app will show you step by step what beautiful gifts you can send and have delivered to their doorstep. The easiest way to say Thank you! or I love you! or Happy day! Its perfect!!

UX for navigation and UI with adding items to shopping cart leave a lot to be desired. Spending 30 dollars on dipped strawberries you'd think investments in improving shopping experience on mobile (m.dot) site and dedicated app would make it easy to add products to my shopping cart. the whole checkout flow needs to be reworked, for instance dont force a user to go through entire shipping process before they're done adding items to shopping cart. think Amazon.

title: Wikibuy - Save Money.
description:
Wikibuy helps you save money and is used by more than 1 million people.

With Wikibuy you can:

- Compare prices on millions of products. 
- Get notified automatically when prices drop on products you view.
- Earn credit on purchases from more than 10,000 stores and restaurants - both instore and online.
- Search for the best coupons and offers shared by all Wikibuyers.

Featured on Forbes, Fortune, USA Today, ABC News, New York Magazine, Mashable, Nerd Wallet, Apple Insider, and More.

Wikibuy is made with love in Austin, Texas.
