comments: I was told to get this app after downloading Amazon (which I've only bought 1 item from them) and I can find items faster and a lot less money on Google shopping. This app shows absolutely nothing that I use on a daily basis. I'd give 0 stars if that was an option. Sadly it isn't. 👎👎👎👎👎

I was actually able to find cheaper prices on the items I was searching for thru the app but the problem is, the app hardly works. I was able to get on it twice but now it's just stuck on the loading screen. I uninstalled and reinstalled it but it still doesn't work.

Useless they either don't direct you to (or) only have 1, of the item you're looking for. Maybe after it's been around awhile. I signed up the app did not pop up with better offers in Amazon as written.

Honestly, I don't see the purpose of this app. I had searched for a turtle beach 700 xbox one gaming headset. It told me I could buy it from a site and save $9. I select to view other offers. This app displayed the wrong pricing for various websites like Amazon, and Walmart. This app is useless. You are simply better off checking the individual sites for proper information.

Not as good as the desktop version- first off it took multiple tries to let me to log in (I keep getting a JSON error whatever that is) but I can login fine with the same credentials on my laptop. I make most of my purchases on my Amazon app and it doesn't automatically search the promo codes like it does on the laptop so I miss out on many deals.

title: Barcode Scanner Pro
description:
- Professional Edition  barcode scanner, more  fast and accurate.
- Scanning, decoding, create, share the QR code or barcode.
- Create your own QR coding: e-mail addresses, application, phone numbers, contact information, bookmarks.
- Share your QR codes via social networking(WhatsApp, Facebook，Twitter, Gmail, WeChat, Line, E-mail, SMS) to your friends.
- Open the web address or search page of the decoding results by Google.
- Show you scan history.

Disclaimer:
- This application is based on the open source project ZXing barcode scanner. Apache License 2.0.

developerAddress: AnNingZhuang West Road No.15, Haidian District, Beijing, China
comments: When scanning any QR code witn this app, I'm rarely successful at it actually pulling up the correct info/item/site/video. I can truly say it has only correctly and accurately redirected me 2x out of the 10's, 20's times I've used it. Standing so still, having item w/ QR code in position ready for the photo to be taken, none of that matters, I've trouble-shooted so many ways and so many times but got some results each time for each coded item.

This has been a good scanner for me. It helps store barcodes I've scanned to recount items. People are stupid, but on the other hand, perhaps this feature if explained it's function, ppl might not get butt hurt when it has feature to access storage it creates or your camera does. Not many apps like it. You can limit access to many of the feats. Has access to led in gen settings, can select individual country, copy text, make new codes. Fkk I forgot how useful this app was. Oh yeah trackers..-
This scanner seems to scan all. When I click the app on the screen to open up it scans a few seconds later scanning my pants or what ever my phone is facing. Otherwise it works pretty good.

You can control the app through the options in the settings cog wheel,, scans quickly and I used the Google go app that provided me with various web sites to compare pricing and information about the product I scanned.
Works perfectly out of the box. Easily exports the history in comma delimited format. Perfect!

title: Stadium Goods
description:
Built and staffed by industry experts with a deep passion for sneakers and streetwear, Stadium Goods combines the world’s greatest collection of sneakers with best-in-class customer service to provide the premier app shopping experience on Android.

Casual buyers and dedicated sneakerheads alike will find much to choose from in our 200,000+ product inventory, featuring the best from Nike, adidas, Yeezy, Jordan, Supreme, and more. All of the products we sell are hand-inspected by our expert staff and are guaranteed authentic and new. In addition, all of our inventory is kept on hand, ensuring that every item you see on the app is in stock and ready to ship.

Welcome! We hope you stay a while. From SG, with love.

comments: Smooth and clean had small issue adding my card because I didn't know you had to put full year in on expectation date. Above all I'll be back smooth checkout and definitely nice selection of pieces.
Great selection of footwear especially the Jordan collection.
Annoying because every time I try to purchase something it keeps saying something went wrong. Stadium goods fix your app

title: ASOS
description:
Here’s the situation: fresh pieces dropping daily, exclusive ranges you can't get anywhere else and new brands being added all the time – plus free delivery and returns. Wherever and whoever you are, exploring your style never felt so good.

With the ASOS app for Android, you can: 

- FIND & SAVE WHAT YOU WANT 
You can still shop every piece you'll find on ASOS. Search by type, size, brand, price and color, or browse and buy our trend and occasion edits. Plus, your Saved Items and Shopping Bag sync between your devices, too – genius.

- ENJOY SUPER-EASY CHECKOUT 
Add a new credit card with our camera card scanner (#techy) for our quickest checkout ever. 

- GET HANDY SALE ALERTS 
Our push notifications can alert you as soon as sales start and remind you when they're ending, so you’ll never miss a bargain. Sweet!

- SHARE YOUR PICKS 
In two minds? Seen something your bestie would like? Involve your friends via WhatsApp, Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest, Google+ and email.

- SEE THE CLOTHES ON THE CATWALK
Check out the fit and cut – our signature catwalk videos for clothes, shoes and accessories are also in the app. 
Order on the app for deliveries to 242 countries worldwide including Denmark, Netherlands, Singapore and Sweden. We’re always improving and genuinely love hearing your feedback, so email us at androiddev@asos.com or follow us on Twitter @ASOS_Heretohelp

Beta it! Want to help us test out our newest, coolest app features? Become a beta tester: https://goo.gl/aHs7zy

title: DSW
description:
The new DSW Designer Shoe Warehouse app delivers a full shopping experience with fast, easy checkout. DSW Rewards members can easily access account information including available Rewards certificates and points balance. 
 
DSW is the destination for shoe lovers everywhere.  DSW has thousands of shoes and handbags for women, men and kids and now the whole selection is at your fingertips! Download the free DSW Designer Shoe Warehouse app to:
 
- Shop: Discover the hottest shoe trends for women and men. Shop and purchase your favorite shoes with our new streamlined checkout process.
 
- View DSW Rewards: Track your Rewards certificates and points all in one place. Access and scan your Rewards card and other offers right from the app when in store, or use them online.
 
- In-Store Pick Up: See if the shoe you want is available before visiting DSW! Buy online and pick up in store to save time right from the app.
 
- Store Locator: Traveling? Check out the DSW store locator for instant directions and store hours.
 
- Clearance Calculator:  Use the clearance calculator in store to determine the exact price you'll pay and ensure you don't walk away from a fabulous deal!
 
- Product Scan: Can't find your size or color in a DSW store? Scan the barcode to find it on dsw.com and read reviews and product information.

comments: I love shopping at DSW! They have a wide variety great shoes! Shopping on their app is easy, but the 30 item max for your "Favorites", limits customer's shopping experience. Usually stores do not limit how many items you can favorite when shopping online. The DSW app would be so much better with out that limit! PLEASE get rid of the limit on how many items you can favorite!

This app makes shopping with DSW so much easier. I even love how whatever sales or points accumulated show up for you to click on if you want to apply them to your purchase, so you never have to "remember" what codes to use.
The app is not optimized for tablets and can only be used in a portrait orientation. Would love it if it could be used in a landscape orientation too for easier shopping experience on a tablet.
Easy to use. Everything is in one place. You are able to click on your rewards and codes and it applies. Love it! Absolutely one of the best shopping apps I have ever used!
I struggle with the app often. Can't filter will enough for clearance items. I get options that are not on clearance in my feed. Also struggle to get brands I type in that I know they carry.

title: PayRange
description:
Pay with a simple swipe on your phone screen.

Use PayRange to pay at thousands of vending, laundry, arcade, parking, coffee and other supported machines with a simple swipe of your finger.

    Swipe left or right on the phone app screen to select the machine.
    Swipe up on your phone screen and payment will be sent to the machine.

It is that SIMPLE.  

 

QUICK AND SIMPLE

NO MORE COINS, NO MORE BILLS. PayRange takes the hassle out of your life. To guarantee the highest level of convenience, we designed our app for a quick and secure payment experience. Your experience is as simple as swiping your finger on your phone screen. You do not need to worry about having the right amount of change, small bills, or bill accepter issues. 

 

SAFE AND SECURE

Safety and security of your payment information is our first priority. We accept a range of payment options including all major credit cards and Android Pay. We use a secure PCI compliant processor to guarantee that your PayRange payments are protected. At any time, we do not send any personal information to the machine. 

 

EVERYWHERE AND GROWING 

Look for the PayRange icon on the machine to determine if it accepts PayRange payments. As soon as you enter the range of a PayRange supported machine, the app will automatically detect the enabled machines. No pairing or configuration is required. All you need to do is swipe on your phone screen to select the machine you want to pay at. PayRange is enabled on machines in a broad range of industries such as vending, laundry, amusement, coffee etc.

Get the app today! Simplify your payment experience with PayRange.

------------------------

*** NOTE: The machine must be PayRange enabled ***

This app will not work if the machine is not equipped with PayRange hardware.

------------------------

Visit http://payrange.com for a video demonstration.

If you’d like your machine at work or school to be PayRange enabled, have the operator of your machines contact us at info@payrange.com

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: I like this app, because I dont have any place to get coins easily. However, this app never picks up the machines, never. I always have to restart my phone twice before any machines are picked up even if I'm right in front of them and then I have to fight the app saying that they're out of range. I'm so sick of it, at this point it's easier to get the coins.

Being able to do laundry without coins is wonderful, but that's all that's good about this app. For starters, it heavily advertises the California lottery, with in-app popups, and outside notifications. Among other UI issues, the machine selector screen scales badly, often leaving much of the screen unusable. Every time I exit the app, it resets my default launcher, which is a bug I've never seen elsewhere. I haven't looked at the other features, because I haven't absolutely needed to.

Now advertising spam about lottery tickets via push notification. It was formerly just a helpful, albeit somewhat buggy, app that was better than quarters, but I don't want my laundry app trying to sell me lottery tickets via push notifications. It doesn't implement notification channels at the system level to disable these from the notification, they just group them all together in one category. I've disabled the play tab, let's see if that stops it (but that option's not discoverable at all).

I love the convenience of never having to go get change. After 6 months the app has kept accurate track of payments made and over-all has saved me a ton of time. My only complaint is that the machines I use at my apartment vary the charge based on cold-warm-hot & light-medium-heavy but the app doesn't take this into account. It's up to you to put in the correct amount.

I love that I'm no longer burdened by carrying around rolls of quarters. However, that being said, I have a few criticisms. The app disconnects every so often, and you can't transfer funds from one phone to another; so when I updated my phone the PayRange balance I had was stuck on the old phone, so I'm kind of SOL with the remaining $1 or so that's on there. It would be nice to implement an option to use up the balance you have before adding more.

title: LightInTheBox Online Shopping
description:
The latest LightInTheBox App can easily take you through a fantastic shopping journey. We offer more than a million trending items. We have incredibly low prices. Every day, we add new products to our vast inventory. Also, we often have sales promotion with great discounts. Over 10+ million people from 200+ countries have already made satisfactory orders from us. 

Come join us! LightInTheBox is the official App for LightInTheBox.com, a listed New York Stock Exchange global online shopping platform company (NYSE: LITB). With the LightInTheBox App’s intuitive interface, you can tap into our amazing line of products to purchase items on the go.

Hard to navigate, especially when items are in cart.
I am not ablie to log in. LITB sends a password, then rejects it when use it. You can't contact customer service without logging in. Please fix this.

Terrible app. Useless. It keeps asking for access to my files/location etc. When I deny permission, the app doesn't function. The search function doesn't even work. One star is too high a rating. Don't waste your time.

title: Famous Footwear - Shop Shoes
description:
The Famous Footwear App is the only place to get exclusive deals on all your favorite brand-name shoes! Shop the latest shoes from brands like Nike, adidas, Birkenstock, Vans, Sperry, Converse and Skechers.

EARN WITH FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS
•	Collect $5 Reward Cash for every 100 points – up to $250 a year. 1 point = $1 spent. Plus redeem any time on the app!
•	Rewards members enjoy FREE SHIPPING on all orders!
•	Celebrate your birthday with $5 Reward Cash and 2x points per dollar spent for your entire birth month.
•	Stack coupons on top of sales for the biggest savings.
•	Access your Rewards card, current points balance and available Rewards Cash all on the home screen.
•	NEW! EXTRAS WHEN YOU WANT: Activate your Extra BOGO 1/2 Off purchase and 2X Bonus Points Day when you want.
  
SHOP YOUR FAVORITE BRANDS
•	Easily shop for shoes and enjoy Free Standard Shipping on orders of $75 or more.
•	View current order status, past purchase history and account activity in the account center.
•	Check out faster with PayPal and Google Pay integration.
 
BUY ONLINE, PICK UP IN STORE
•	Shop your local store’s selection, checkout online, then pick up your new shoes (usually ready within 2 business hours).
•	Get FREE In-store Pickup when ordering online.
•	Receive a text message when your order is ready for pickup at the store (opt-in)!
•	Plus, Rewards members earn 50 bonus points (that’s halfway to a reward) after picking up your order!
 
MAXIMIZE YOUR SHOE SHOPPING EXPERIENCE
•	With nearly 1,000 stores across the country, quickly locate the shoe store nearest you.
•	Use the app barcode scanner on any shoe box in the store to see all available colors, read reviews and get additional product details.
•	Find the best shoe size and width for you with TrueFit® profiling technology.
•	Stay up-to-date on the latest footwear trends each season with Trend Shops – featuring fashionable sneakers, sandals, boots and more.

Famous Footwear features athletic and casual shoes from hundreds of nationally recognized brands for women, men and kids! With stores nationwide and even more selection online, Famous Footwear is your place for the shoe styles that help you put your best foot forward every day.

summary: New members receive 50 bonus points for downloading the App!
recentChanges:
- Introducing FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS, the new rewards program that celebrates YOU! As a STAR member you’ll enjoy exclusive rewards, get the inside track on offers, exciting savings, and new benefits, including FREE SHIPPING
- Includes minor improvements and bug fixes

title: Fred Meyer
description:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Fred Meyer app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Fred Meyer Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:

- Shop Pickup or Delivery right from the app!

- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your online order.

- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.

- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.

- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.

- Refill your Fred Meyer Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.

- Check your fuel points.

- Use our locator to find the closest Fred Meyer store or fuel center.

- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.

- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.

To use the Fred Meyer app, you'll need a Fred Meyer digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!

summary: Save with us! Coupons, ads, rewards, find stores & shopping list in one app!
recentChanges:
We’re working around the clock to ensure our services and products are available to you. Here are some release highlights:

- March fuel points extended until May 31!
- Log in to your account with your Apple ID.
- Get paid to shop with Cash Back, our newest Way to Save!
- Temporary quantity restrictions displayed for certain high-demand products.

We value your feedback. If you need help or have a suggestion, please contact our Customer Service Center at 1-800-576-4377.
comments: Okay! There was a password glitch, but the developer fixed it quickly and all is well! I've used this app for the past few years; really helpful, and I'd hate to have to shop without it! My favorite features are having product in-store locations listed, digital coupons being shown along with each item, and online ordering. Thanks for a great app!

Generally a nice app however since the last update I am not able to stay logged in, and when I try to log in it makes me change my password every time. I hope they will update soon because I can't keep this up! I have seen they are saying they have fixed the app but I'm still having problems, even after uninstalling and reinstalling. It was working a bit earlier but now is making me reset my password again. Please please please fix it, I depend on this app for shopping for 3 families.

As of a few days ago, I have been having issues with signing in. It doesn't recognize my password. I would then get locked out and asked to reset my password. Once my password is reset, I can log in then it signs me off. When I try to sign in, it tells me that my password is invalid and I have to through the whole process of resetting my password again. This is my third time doing it and I am now uninstalling my app. It's such a shame because I loved it when it was working.

The app is poorly designed without the user in mind. The lists are a "crib toy". When an item is added to the cart the app does not remember the user's place, returning to beginning rather than to where the user was. Confirming changes to an order does not show the changes, requiring the user to bail out of the confirmation to see the changes. Allowing substitutions applies to the entire purchase rather than individual items. Modifications sometimes delete the original order. They hate us.

This app told me everything in my cart was available, but my husband decided to just go inside the store and he could only find two items. So frustrating. I can understand an item or two, but almost the entire list? I guess I'll go back to using the Walmart app for pick up.

title: Cash Back & Rewards for Online Shopping: Shopkick
description:
Earn rewards and get FREE gift cards with Shopkick! Use the Shopkick app to earn rewards & get cash back on the shopping you already do at the stores you love. Earning free deals & discounts has never been easier! Add pizzazz to your shopping and start earning free cash back, coupons & discounts. 

Save & redeem your points to the store of your choice: Amazon, Target, Walmart, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, Sephora, Nike, Best Buy, plus many more. Discover exclusive deals, get shopping rewards and turn them into gift cards or cashback. Sound too good to be true? Simply download now to earn rewards (we call them ’kicks’). 

With Shopkick, earn shopping rewards, get cash back & FREE Gift Cards: 

How to get started:
⭐️ Deals & rewards await! Download the app today (it’s FREE).
🛒 Shopping at Target, Walmart, Sephora or Best Buy? Open the app when you’re in stores to earn rewards. You don’t even need to buy anything!
✅ Shopping made fun - Find select items to scan or purchase & rack up kicks to earn your gift cards.
💰 Purchase the items & scan your receipt to earn even more kicks. Shop with a linked card to earn more kicks.
🎁 Gift Cards & cashback - Redeem your kicks for amazing rewards.

Shopping online? No problem! You can earn cashback, discounts, free coupons and shopping rewards online as well, at stores like Amazon, Target, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, eBay, Hotels.com, Groupon & and many more. Earn cash back from the comfort of your couch. Don’t want to buy anything? Discover our exclusive deals and promo codes by watching videos in the app and earn your more kicks!

Download Shopkick for a fun & guilt-free shopping experience: invite your friends and enjoy free cash backs together. Easily walk in stores, scan products & receipts to get your kicks. Once you have enough, discover our exclusive deals & partnerships with your favorites retails! Save on all your favorite stores and get cash back.

Join the millions of Shopkickers who have earned over $85 million that they use to redeem FREE Gift Cards to shop at Starbucks, Amazon, Walmart, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, Sephora, Target & more. Download the app to discover all the ways to earn free cashback.

No more need for rummaging for coupons and cutting each coupon individually: enjoy having all your rewards & coupons on your phone so you can collect on the go! Have 30 spare minutes? Quickly hop in a store to get more kicks. Want to relax on your couch? Watch videos online to watch your kicks add up. Getting free gift cards has never been easier. Download our app to explore your options of redeeming your rewards: Sephora, Lush, Nike, Starbucks, Target, etc.

The savings you earn will help keep your grocery, dining, or shopping budget healthy. With Shopkick, you can indulge in your shopping: no more need to feel guilty every time you shop. Earn your free deals & Gift Cards from your everyday shopping & save now. You can even earn bonus kicks if you purchase products & submit your receipt! 

🛍 Use your shopping rewards to earn FREE Gift Cards to shop at stores & retails including:
Amazon
Target
Walmart
Starbucks 
Best Buy
Nike
Sephora 
Uber 
TJ Maxx 
Marshalls
Lowe’s 
Nike
GameStop
& Many More!

Download the app now to start getting your kicks! Redeem your kicks for free gift cards, exclusive deals and jaw-dropping discounts! Shopping has never been this guilt-free. 

⭐️The buzz about Shopkick: “This app is addictive.” – Oprah.com

summary: Shop at home & get free gift cards: Nike, Walmart, Gap, Walgreens & Sam's Club
recentChanges: With this release were focusing on Online Stores. We've made the store pages easier to read, and added some tutorial messages for new users. We're also adding new online stores, so open the app and find out what's new.
comments: Long time user. I loved the app until recently. You did an update, making it so when we get a kick in the discover section it now vibrates. You've made this vibration unstoppable. No setting in the phone or with the app will stop it from vibrating. I've tried it all. I hate vibrate, I don't use it for anything. We have enough things that kill the phones battery, I use it for work & have kids, I need it to last without using a portable charger as long as possible. It's very unnecessary!

*EDIT: I appreciate the response. I'll add your stars back...but I'm watching you Shopkick ;)* 2 star: Oh No! I used to LOVE this app! But political ads? No-freaking-thank-you! The app itself is cool. I love the concept and I use it when applicable. But, forcing me to watch biased political ads for points...WRONG! This is a grocery/shopping app...no room for pushing your mess in my face. Nope. Wow!

Great tool to earn credits to apply to gift cards. Sometimes have issues with walk ins or scanning a product, especially scanning at Best Buy. Not sure why but scanning the product at BB will comeback with the error wrong item yet it matches the description on ShopKicks. But other than that it's easy to use

Ok...I'm sure my shopkick points have been taken from me by now...I'm so done with this app...I've tried resetting my password...I have the correct email...tried verifying my device and I'm still not able to log into my account to redeem my gift card...I've tried emailing at the help desk but all it tells me is page can not be found 404...what gives shopkick team...this is slack

I purchased a new phone and wanted to use shopkick on it. Couldn't pass the first step. Always asked me to verify my new device. When I clicked the link sent to my email and filled out the username and password, the sign in button DIDN'T WORK. Tried 7+ times and give up. Deleting it.

title: Nordstrom Rack
description:
The all-new Nordstrom Rack App for Android puts the brands you love at up to 70% off right at your fingertips. Plus, it gives you instant access to HauteLook’s exclusive, limited-time sale events—all from the same app! Now you can shop and browse the latest looks from both stores wherever you are. 

App Features:
* 2 Stores, 1 Cart: Shop the best of Nordstrom Rack and HauteLook using one shared account.
* Quick Search: Convenient search and filter features help you find what you want fast.
* Easy Checkout: One simple checkout makes it effortless to shop and buy.


And, enjoy free shipping on orders over $100 and easy 45-day returns by mail or to any Nordstrom Rack store. Download the app now!

ABOUT NORDSTROM RACK: 
Nordstrom Rack is where style meets savings. We offer the most current trends and brands you love for 30-70% off original prices—each and every day. Whether you prefer the convenience of online shopping or crave the thrill of treasure hunting at one of our many stores, we’ve got you covered.

summary: Nordstrom Rack App for Android puts the brands you love at your fingertips
recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance updates
comments: Very good with a few glitches. I like the overall ease of use. Much better way to shop, I've improved my wardrobe a ton using this! Delivery takes a long time, so can't use if you are in a hurry. Only problem: when I try to view my prior orders, I can only open one. Then, the others will never load. The only way for me to view them is to exit out of the app and then open the orders screen again. I have a Samsung Galaxy android phone. I wish this could be fixed. Other than that, great app!

Nordstrom has serious technical errors that haven't been fixed in years. It will have items listed for sale that are apparently not for sale but they will keep them up for sale for months. I would say about 1 out of 10 items you will purchase are actually available. You will eventually get refunded but its honestly not even worth shopping here anymore. I used to shop at Nordstrom Rack online all the time but its just too frustrating and I am not giving them another penny until they fix this.

Warning: it is easy to spend a LOT of money here! So many pretty things! The app is easy to use, and there are frequent deals and coupon codes. You can also pay your credit card bill from the app, I believe. Easy and fun. And dangerous... 😉
STOP DISPLAYING SOLD OUT OR UNAVAILABLE ITEMS! SUPER ANNOYING! I really dislike how the items in my cart "expire" every few minutes...is this a necessary feature?
The app was good, but now when i tried to add items to my cart it wouldn't allow me to checkout. Grr! I am missing out on great sales.

title: ShopRite
description:
Grocery shopping made easy! 

Imagine everything you need for savings, recipes, and coupons for both in-store and online shopping, in one single app. Search, scan, save lists and notes, get deals, and order pick up or delivery—just like that.

Our redesigned app makes it easier to plan and shop while saving you time with these benefits:

* Easily purchase off of one unified shopping cart - order for pickup or home delivery or use as an in-store checklist
* Create and save your shopping lists for future use
* Scan products for quick finding and adding to your list
* Quickly add notes to your list that can be shopped for later
* Load digital coupons to your Price Plus Card, including exclusive offers just for you
* See and manage all of your digital coupons
* Directly access your Price Plus Card with wallet support
* Search for products, recipes and coupons
* Order Cold Cuts and more from our Deli (where available)
* Manage your prescriptions linked to our Pharmacy App
* Browse and shop from our weekly circular* 
* View recipes and add recipes ingredients to your cart
* View personalized offers and recommended items on sale each week

Shop Easy. Just Like That.

summary: Grocery shopping just got easier with the New ShopRite App.
recentChanges: The New ShopRite App is updated regularly so we can make it even easier for you to shop for groceries. In this update we have added an option to opt in for text alerts on the settings page and updated messaging for orders in progress within Order History. Plus fixed some minor bugs and made general updates to improve your experience.
comments: Very buggy app. Poorly designed interface. Sometimes when you're in the "my ShopRite" menu and press the back button, it will go to the "more" section inexplicably. It's as if the people who designed this app never used it or tested it out. Very frustrating. Please work on this app, because the other features are pretty useful, especially being able to load digital coupons. That, and being able to make a shopping list with real-time prices so I can budget before I even go to the store.

This app is ridiculous. I have downloaded it on an iPad... only for it to stop functioning all together. It will open to title page, then force itself to shut down. Next... I tried to download on an Android mobile phone. The app worked briefly, but will no longer load digital coupons. Now that I am on a PC from home... the site will display the digital coupons, but is unable to "load" them to my account. The whole experience of shopping at ShopRite AS A WHOLE has become ridiculous thanks to their efforts at failed technology. If you shop on a budget... like most... you really need to take advantage of weekly sales to keep it affordable. Unfortunately, many of those "sales" are linked to digital coupons. If the coupon is not loaded to your account... no discount. It is beginning to feel almost as though I am held hostage by this technology, hoping for the site/app to function properly so I can load my coupons, do my shopping, and then go about my day. Dare I say... this experience has turned my loyalties towards WalMart where everything is reasonably priced EVERYDAY (no digital BS required!)

Great except very hard to get a delivery slot. Could there be a que, shoppers account would identify desired day and time. System would match next shopper in que with next slot that matched their desire for delivery. Could have separated que for pickup or delivery; small order or large. Shopper with small order pickup should be able to get faster service. This may reduce need for very large orders made because it takes too long to get slot. Ed

Used to be able to get pick-up or delivery slots without any problem. Now impossible as when slot open up for pick-up or delivery they are all sold out before the New day is even displayed. I suspect that the company's Shipt and Instacart are somehow locking up all the reserve slots making it impossible for regular customers to get in. This is gone on for a week now and I can't get a slot and shopping order filled by you because of it. I am now locked out of being able to use your store services

I am not happy with the app. The categories are not simple. You have to look through the whole circular instead all on one page. The digital coupons are difficult to find. Trying to set the location of the store is ridiculous. It never seen to accomplish at all. You give the zip code and click on the store you want to shop and nothing happens.

title: Shop Disney
description:
The shopDisney app is the destination for the largest selection of authentic and exclusive Disney, Pixar, Marvel and Star Wars products. Discover, experience, and shop - whenever you want and wherever you are. 
 
- The most extensive assortment of exclusive Disney, Pixar, Marvel and Star Wars products available. Anywhere.
- Explore a curated selection of the best products from Disney store, licensing partners, global collections and collaborations, and Disney Parks and Resorts.
- Shop authentic Limited Editions.
- Easily locate your nearest Disney store.
- Use the in-app scanner to access additional product information while visiting a Disney store.

Note:  Some features in this app will require your full name, country, birthdate and email address, as well as access to your location data.  To facilitate the sign-in process, the app will also require access to your email address, stored within your Disney Account. 
  
This app includes the ability to make purchases and will require a Wi-Fi or mobile carrier data connection.  Guests must be 18 years or older to make purchases. 
  
This app provides you with the option to receive push notifications, which may include information about products and offers.  This app also provides you with the option to enable location services, which will enable certain features, provide you with information and offers, and improve guest experience.  This app will request access to your camera to scan product barcodes and credit cards for purchases.
  
This app is only available in the U.S. 
 
Terms of Use:  https://disneytermsofuse.com 
Privacy Policy:  https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/
Your California Privacy Rights: https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell My Information:  https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi/

summary: Magical Gifts for All
developerAddress:
500 South Buena Vista Street
Burbank, CA 91521-0105
United States
recentChanges: With this release we are introducing a Wish List to help you save all of your favorites and share them with family and friends! We have also improved performance to help ensure a magical experience.
comments: Takes forever to even load the app. Organization of the app is horrible. I can't find things as easily as the web site. The drop down menu should reflect the website's menu. It doesn't load my saved payment method and requires me to add it again. It should add a feature where you can store your gift cards so you can use it as payment. Though I don't even think the app allows you to use gift cards as a payment method.

Welp, I'm about done with Disney. First the fiasco with the Minnie monthly series, then you couldn't access your bag to check out, now we have a queue where you sit and wait for LITERALLY hours. What I don't understand is, with a major conglomeration like Disney, how on Earth is it that we can't even place a simple order just because a lot of people want to do it at the same time? Other large corporations can do this. Why hasn't Disney figured it out?

This app(if we can called it that) doesn't even work when a collection or something important is on sale...it sucks...you people are Disney...this app is supposed to work better than a bank app... because you are bigger than that... please fix all the bugs and the bad things in this app
Just updated. Doesn't work. Keeps saying can't connect to server and bombs out. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling, still doesn't work.

This app has horrible performance. It is laggy and gives odd errors. It let me put material in my cart that was out of stock, but then would not let my transaction complete without removing the item. It wouldn't tell me which of my five items needed to be removed! The sad thing is that I buy less. I used to use the shopParks app which performed beautifully. It was so easy to use, I bought items more often.

title: Flipp - Weekly Shopping
description:
Flipp helps you save up to 50% on your weekly shopping. Simple! This essential app brings you the latest weekly ads, deals, and coupons from more than 2000 of your favorite retailers including Walmart, Aldi, and CVS to help you save money. You’ll also find a variety of online offers to stay on budget. Best of all, it’s completely FREE!

This all-in-one app helps you along every step of your shopping journey, from planning to checkout, and everything in between. Find your ads, saved offers, shopping list, and loyalty cards in one place, so you don’t have to scramble at the checkout. 

Wave goodbye to inconvenient paper circulars and junk mail, and take your deal hunting on-the-go with Flipp!

Here’s why Flipp is more than just a weekly ads app:

 - Find relevant deals and circulars from stores near you.

 - Explore up-to-date circulars and offers from over 2000 of your favorite retailers.

 - Instantly search and find sales for items you want with our powerful search feature.

 - “Clip” or save deals to your shopping list, so you can have them on hand at all times.

 - Find value at a large variety of retailers including grocery, pharmacy, electronics, general merchandise, fashion, and pets.
 
 - Discover in-ad and online deals by categories like electronics, home & garden, apparel and more.

 - Add your store loyalty or rewards cards so you don’t forget to use them at checkout, and take advantage of all your rewards points.

 - Save with digital coupons that you can load to your loyalty card, or save with printable coupons.

 - Create your shopping list right on Flipp. Have your list, deals, and saved offers all in one place.

We’re always adding new stores! Discover value and savings at popular stores including:

 - ALDI
 - Walmart
 - CVS
 - Walgreens
 - Target
 - Family Dollar
 - Dollar General
 - Meijer
 - Big Lots
 - Rite Aid

Once you try Flipp, you’ll never want to shop without it. But don’t take it from us! 

Here’s what the experts are saying about Flipp:

The app provides savings of up to 50 percent off your weekly essentials. On top of that, it’s easy to use...discover deals for each item on your shopping list and receive reminders about expiring deals, new offers, and updates from local stores. –  Jenny McCoy, CookingLight

If you don't want to store stacks of retail ads, utilize Flipp to eliminate clutter...maximizing savings in a few taps on your phone – Andrea Woroch, U.S. News & World Report

Love Flipp too? Leave us a review!

Have any questions or suggestions? Contact us at flipp.force.com

recentChanges:
Flipp has made it easier than ever to share coupon savings found on the app! Simply tap the coupon you want to share and tap the ‘Share coupon’ button to send it to your friends and family.
Keep an eye out for more great ways to share weekly ads and more coming soon.
comments: Simple, up to date ads delivered to my phone. I force my boyfriend to download it too. He was hesitant but now loves the app. We look at ads and clip coupons together. With just one touch your coupons are clipped and sent to a folder making them easy to locate when needed. All of my favorite local stores are on here. It's easy enough for my elderly parents to use. (They have a hard time using a computer mouse!) This app has more features than I thought. Im glad I gave it a try.

I used to really enjoy this app, especially the list feature, which I used to be able to open the app and just look at my list without turning my data on. Since my last update, I now have to turn my data on, plus enter my postal code and wait forever for it to "find my local flyers" before I can even select to just look at my list. It's pretty annoying and I will probably be deleting the app all together. I used to recommend it, but not anymore. Very disappointing, hope it can be changed.

I don't go grocery or any kind of shopping without a visit to flipp. No need to lug ads around. You will find them all right here in this one App. My husband will say, who has Coke products on sale. I go to the magnifying glass, click it, enter Coke, instantly a list of which stores have it at best deal. We Love Bilos 5 for $10.00. You will Love this Ap. Try it!!

At this time when flyers are becoming rarer, Flipp has helped me to keep shopping the way I am used to shopping and saving me money as a result. I love the fact that I can click on an item and it goes into my shopping list.

I've saved a lot of money with this app. I like the search feature to find sales. I clip the item and some stores price match so that saves time and money. It's great to have all the flyers handy too.

title: Office Depot®- Rewards & Deals on Office Supplies
description:
The Office Depot® app ​offers you a smarter way to shop for office supplies and technology while sav​ing​ time and​ money​.

Shopping 
- Purchase items FAST with our mobile optimized checkout. 
- Log-In to your account and the app will automatically sync your shopping cart, order history and account information to provide you the best shopping experience. 
- Opt-In to push notifications and get app exclusive deals sent right to your phone. Stay up to date on all our deals and order updates. 
- Find the nearest store location, store hours, click to call and get map directions. 

In Store Pickup 
- Get your items conveniently with Office Depot’s Buy Online Pickup In Store. Place an order through the app and pick it up in 1 hour at the store of your choice! 

Deals  
- Shop deals by category on thousands of items anytime, anywhere 
- Browse and save coupons for both store and online 
- Stay up to date on the best offers with the weekly ad  

Rewards 
- Track your rewards and certificates all in one place! Access and scan your member ID card and certificates right from the app when you are in store or use them online.  

Store Assistant 
- Turn on your location services and activate our Store Mode to access our best deals and tools to shop while visiting your favorite store. 

Join the Line 
- Enjoy the convenience not standing in line for your Print & Copy order. 
- Make your appointment to meet with a Tech Service technician. 

Print & Copy
- Print copies and flyers on the go 
- Customize business cards and pick them up the same day 

Never run out of ink again! 
- Find nearby printers and automatically display the right ink cartridge to buy.  
- Turn on ink monitoring so you know when you’re running low.

recentChanges: We update our app regularly to provide exceptional experience to the users. This version contains enhancements to the existing app features and bug fixes to keep our app up and running.
comments: I think it's a good app. It wouldn't allow me to transfer my rewards for some reason since it only gives you the option to sign up. Otherwise it's a good app. I won't be purchasing from it though because I want to use my rewards. But it is a good app for looking up items.
I love the app. I wish that when reviewing a product it would save a draft if you leave the app for a few seconds. I had to start writing reviews all over again.

Glitchy. Installed app as I could not print from Google Drive. I could from the app, but after downloading each file and choosing "print another document" it went to a blank page. I had to leave the printing area of the app and re-enter it to upload and print the next document. Every. Time. But as far as I know, I will be able to pick up the documents tomorrow which I could not accomplish online.
Great amount of product and service information for shopping via app. [ok, upgrading to 5 star just for responding]

If I could give this app no stars I would! They cancelled my order because the printer was on backorder. Customer service rep told me that I would see my funds in my account the following day and that purchasing another printer was safe. I went through another company that had the printer I wanted. That was 6 days ago. I have called customer service daily trying to get them to release my funds to no avail. My cc company can not because the order is left in the processing stage of the transaction

App don't work since update

title: Minute Photo Print : 1 hour photo
description:
Minute photo: CVS Printing photos at CVS just got easy: download our app for free and start photo printing your mobile photos today! 
Choose your photos, your print size (4x6, 5x7, square …), and quantity.
Order prints directly on your phone and select your nearest CVS store for same-day pickup.
THE EASIEST AND FASTEST WAY TO CVS PHOTO PRINT PHOTOS
Order prints on your phone in seconds, pick up and pay at CVS photo in 1 hour*! Turn your great moments and unforgettable memories into fabulous photo prints and gifts with minute photo print
HOW TO PRINT PHOTOS FROM YOUR PHONE
1. Select minute photo from your Android
2. Select the size & quantity of each cvs photo, or create custom magnets or cards
3. Crop & zoom each picture easily in app
4. select your cvs photo print store
5. Follow your cvs photos order status in real time and pick your order up in store in less than one hour at cvs photo print
PRODUCTS & FEATURES
- Professional-quality photo printing services, printed on glossy photo paper in multiple sizes: choose from 4x6 cvs photos, 5x7 prints, or 8x10 enlargements Also available, square prints in 6x6 or 8x8 (perfect for Instagram photos)
- Personalized cvs photos gifts for all occasions: Magnets, Greetings cards, Christmas cards & invitations
- Fast & safe photo transfer with cvs minute photo print
- A cvs photos gallery that organizes your mobile cvs photos by date taken
- Our cvs photos products are manufactured exclusively in the United States
WHERE CAN YOU PRINT CVS PHOTOS ?
PRINT PHOTOS AT CVS PHOTO PRINT using our enhanced CVS store locator. Choose your local CVS photos store or your friends & family one can enjoy your prints in 1hr. No need to wait in store to upload your photos at the cvs photo center anymore or use your home photo printer. Plus when you pickup your photos in-store, you will benefit from CVS' unique service and only pay in store! 
ABOUT CVS
We are dedicated to changing the way you are printing your photos with this cvs minute photo app. If you have any questions about this photo printing app or about family photo prints, contact us at minute-photo@pictarine.com.
Our photo printing app is one of the best apps in the US among cvs photo app, walgreens photo app and walmart photo app
*Estimated order pickup times will be displayed at CVS photo app checkout. Most of the time photo printing is less than an hour.

Running errands. Easier.
• Pay for your prescriptions in app and choose to have them delivered once they're ready at the pharmacy.

Saving money. Easier.
• Get app-only deals and access all of your offers when you link your ExtraCare card.
• Opt in to notifications so you never miss a deal. Receive photo and Rx updates too.
• Pre-shop local store sales with myWeekly Ad.
• Enjoy free 2-day shipping on app orders (restrictions apply).

Refilling and picking up prescriptions. Easier.
• Order refills and track them on the go.
• Scan a barcode in the app for easier, private pickup. Turn landscape to sign.
• View your prescription history.
• Check for drug interactions and information.

Printing photos. Easier.
• Order prints from your phone or Facebook for same-day pickup (select stores and products).

Family health care. Easier.
• Find a nearby MinuteClinic® walk-in clinic.
• View wait times and hold a place in line (restrictions apply).
• Check services and insurance.

Hey photo lovers!

Good news, you're now able to turn your beautiful pictures to black and white straight from the cart!

comments: So far so good! The app was extremely easy to use (far easier than Walmart) though I haven't received my photos yet to know if any heads have been chopped off but as far as the app goes, I recommend it 100 percent!

I'm only giving 3 stars... this app is convenient and not convenient at the same time. Its 4/14/2020. Middle of Quarantine, I want to send over a large amount of pictures and it wont let me... Meaning I have to leave the house 2x to get all my pics... It also converts all my pics to 6×6. Not only does this make it more time consuming, but it cuts off features on my pics when I adjust it to a more affordable and appropriate size.
There is no options to edit and the prints were more expensive than in store.

It's been so long since I printed photos I didnt even know if they could do stuff from a phone in the store anymore. Did a little bit of research and this program popped up. Cool thing is it even let's you know if the resolution of a picture is too low for it to look good. Definitely a cool and super easy to use app
Easy and quick way to print photos from your gallery !

title: boohoo – Clothing & Fashion
description:
We are boohoo, the brand behind the clothes helping you to #DOYOURTHING. We are 24/7 fashion at its best. With our brand new app you’ve got the hottest styles, latest trends and exclusive promotional offers at your fingertips.
Shop what’s hot and just landed straight from your phone, with hundreds of new sizzling styles landing on the app daily.

Not got the time to bag yourself a hot new outfit right now? Whether you’re looking for new dresses, accessories, heels, men’s shirts or something completely different – we’ve got you covered. Simply add items to your lust list to shop later on the app. 

Get your latest obsessions with speed and ease with our brand new checkout. 

The boohoo app hot list:
• Visual Search – seen something you like? Snap it and we’ll do the rest.
• Fast and secure checkout - shop your latest obsessions with speed and ease.
• Track your order – track it to your door.
• Wishlist – when you’re in a rush and want to bag that hot new outfit later.
• Notifications – hear about exclusive offers and the latest collaborations before anyone else.

recentChanges: We've been busy fixing bugs and making improvements to our app. Need new? We've got you covered, babe! Love, boohoo x
comments: I like the app its easy to use but ive been waiting over 2 weeks for my stuff to ship and it hasnt i needed my dress by tommorrow ... Wont be using it again after this will be deleting and sticking to my other stores a friend told me try it i did

The app has lots of nice clothes but, finding things in your size can be a bit of a nightmare. As it primarily relies on the pictures it is rather disheartening to see something you like the look of but to find it is petite/tall/maternity, a filter to select/deselect these options would be a fantastic addition to the app.

I love the Bohoo app. I'm always lucky to find what I need and with lovely images of all shape and size models. However why I haven't given it a 5 star is there could be more in depth details about the clothes including the height of the model who is wearing it.

The app won't let me log in, it won't send me an email to me so I can reset my password. It's just saying to try again later. I uninstalled and installed the app so many times in a week and it still won't bloody work.

The boohoo app itself is good and easy to use but when I recieved the clothes I ordered in size 6 everything was way to big as if it was size 10 and the material of my flares were extremely see through. Not only that but one of the tops I ordered had a big hole in the sleeve. So with all this I will not be ordering again and am very disappointed as I spent 50 or more and cant use anything I bought apart from a necklace.

title: Akulaku — Shop On Installment Without Credit Card
description:
Tired of seeing expensive price tags on things you want to buy? Do you want to purchase something on installment but you don't have a credit card? Worry no more. Akulaku is here for you!

Akulaku provides you the most affordable, easiest and secure online installment shopping experience.

Get started today in just 3 easy steps:
1. Download the Akulaku app
2. Register for an account
3. Apply for a Credit Limit 

SERVICE FEATURES

Akulaku offers a wide range of product categories and top brands tailored to meet the interest of every shopper.

✔ Affordable and Friendly Payment Terms
With Akulaku, you can easily afford any product and services you want with a worry-free installment plan and low down payment. Choose your preferred payment term of 3, 6, 9 or 12 months.

✔ Buy Now, Pay Later
Buy the things you want, pay later using your Credit Limit! Terms & Conditions apply.

✔ Secure and Convenient Payment
Experience a hassle-free payment process on Akulaku. Settle your payment through multiple online and offline payment channels.

✔ Free Delivery
We deliver your items at your doorsteps for FREE without minimum purchase required.

✔ Bills Payment
Settle your bills on time in just a few taps using the available credit limit on your account.

✔ Mobile Top-Up on Installment
Stay connected whenever and wherever you are. Top up your mobile with SMS, Call, and Mobile Data package on installment.

✔ Game Credits on Installment
Stay ahead and level up your game! Get game credits on Installment for more than 30 game outlets.

descriptionHTML:
Tired of seeing expensive price tags on things you want to buy? Do you want to purchase something on installment but you don't have a credit card? Worry no more. Akulaku is here for you!

Akulaku provides you the most affordable, easiest and secure online installment shopping experience.

Get started today in just 3 easy steps:
1. Download the Akulaku app
2. Register for an account
3. Apply for a Credit Limit

SERVICE FEATURES
✔ Shop online on installment. No credit card required.
Akulaku offers a wide range of product categories and top brands tailored to meet the interest of every shopper.

✔ Affordable and Friendly Payment Terms
With Akulaku, you can easily afford any product and services you want with a worry-free installment plan and low down payment. Choose your preferred payment term of 3, 6, 9 or 12 months.

✔ Buy Now, Pay Later
Buy the things you want, pay later using your Credit Limit! Terms & Conditions apply.

✔ Secure and Convenient Payment
Experience a hassle-free payment process on Akulaku. Settle your payment through multiple online and offline payment channels.

✔ Free Delivery
We deliver your items at your doorsteps for FREE without minimum purchase required.

✔ Bills Payment
Settle your bills on time in just a few taps using the available credit limit on your account.

✔ Mobile Top-Up on Installment
Stay connected whenever and wherever you are. Top up your mobile with SMS, Call, and Mobile Data package on installment.

✔ Game Credits on Installment
Stay ahead and level up your game! Get game credits on Installment for more than 30 game outlets.

About Us:
Streetcorner Lending Corp.
(SEC Registration No.: CS201606603; Certificate of Authority No.: 1830)

Please read carefully the terms and conditions before proceeding with a loan transaction.

Got a question or feedback? We’d be happy to hear from you!
Email: cs.ph@akulaku.com
Website: www.akulaku.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/AkulakuPhilippines
summary: 24/7 Online Installment Shopping In Just A Few Taps
recentChanges: Known bug fixed and user experience improved.
comments: Did trouble shooting per your agent advise but it hasn't done anything. I don't get the idea of having a credit limit yet you can't use. - all fixed now but I'm giving it 4 stars, why not five? After paying on time for 3500php, my cash loan went down to 1500php, I mean seriously? - EDIT! - They shut down the cash loan saying it's under upgrade, and it's been over two weeks now. lol! funny! Your service should be seen in this moment specially in this time of need!

What's wrong with your application? Everytime I access the app using wifi it's not loading and always saying poor network connection even though my internet speed is fast. Can you fix this? I keep to re-install the app all over again just to use it. I also tried force stop, clear cache and data but nothing works. Disappointing

I uninstalled Akulaku after 2 years actively using it. Recently I'm unable to use the instalment and fail to get a loan. I have contacted customer service and told to raise the credit point by spending cash in Akulaku retail. But prices is crazy in there. So forget it, Akulaku needs to improve management or else no one should install it at the first place. Uninstall aja, aplikasi gak bermanfaat.

I am using akulaku since 3 years ago & always ontime on payment but since april can't apply loan again and always rejected, must be complete the data and the data have been completed but still rejected, really weird. Until installment transaction have been rejected too, can't because my transaction suspicious. Please akulaku be honest if the aplication can't be used again. It's useless having limit & the limit instead rises. Have been call to contact center & they said keep in try ?!#&? Very bad

I've been using akulaku since march 2019, and never missing due date until last month finaly covid-19 impact me. Now i can't get a loan with reason under maintenance and upgrade. What kind upgrade took almost a month? My suggesting are, better you honestly tell your client that they cannot make a loan for a while, come on guys, in this covid-19 situation like this some people need financial help, and some of them including me count on akulaku. Be honest to your client.

title: Love's Connect
description:
Find your favorite Love’s Travel Stops, check your My Love Rewards account, secure the next shower with Mobile Shower Check In, activate commercial fuel pumps with Love’s Mobile Pay, view transaction and loyalty receipts, map your route, view real-time fuel prices, request Truck Tire Care roadside assistance and connect with our customer service team using the Love’s Connect mobile app. It’s the ultimate travel app for professional drivers, and your mobile guide to our Love’s Travel Stops & Country Stores.

Location, Location, Location
No matter where you are in the country, Love’s Connect finds the nearest truck stop or country store location based upon your location, city, state or zip code. Also view distances in road miles, and in just a few more taps, get driving directions too. You can search by highway, on-site restaurants, fuel type, shower facilities and other store amenities.

Professional Driver Rewards
The more you fuel, the more you earn. Check your My Love Rewards points, quickly access your My Love Rewards digital card via the in-app barcode and view your free shower and drink refill credits.

View & Share Digital Receipts
Receive digital receipts for all Pay at the Pump, In-Store and Mobile Pay transactions within minutes of your purchase. All you have to do is scan your My Love Rewards card with every transaction.

Mobile Shower Check-In for Commercial Drivers
Bypass the fuel desk with shower check in at your favorite Love’s Travel Stop with showers. First, be onsite at a location with showers. Then, tap the blue Shower Check In button on the Home or Store Details screen. Once your location has been confirmed, complete the transaction with your My Love Rewards shower credits and/or points. You can also plan ahead by checking busy times at other locations.

Love’s Mobile Pay for Commercial Drivers
Activate the pump from the comfort and safety of your cab with Love’s Pay. Select your pump and fuel, and then answer the prompts as you do at the pump today. Once authorized, lift the nozzle and fuel. You may also add and manage commercial fuel cards in your wallet, as well as view and share transaction and loyalty receipts.

Real-Time Fuel Prices
Love’s Connect features real-time fuel prices for every single one of our travel stops. Watch fuel prices along your planned route to help you make better fueling decisions along the way.

Clean Places & Friendly Faces
At Love’s we know your time is valuable. We want to know when we have done a great job and when we haven’t. Use our feedback section to help us improve your Love’s experience.

developer.devId: Love's Travel Stops and Country Stores, Inc.

recentChanges:
“Thank you.” Professional truck drivers keep the country moving and for that, we thank you. Today’s app update helps you stay informed with detailed COVID-19 updates from the Love’s Family of Companies.

We continually update and improve this app for drivers like you.
comments: Wow, major improvements. Works great! I don't see a column for keeping track of def fuel purchases though. The loves pays a tiny bonus if you hit def fuel objectives. To keep track yourself go to your old online fuel receipt and add it up by hand. It's a chore, but the objectives for diamond status and def fuel bonuses always seem to come down to the last day and the last hour. :), it would really blow to miss by a few gallons.

Before last update had no problems. But right after, when I hit option "Stores" app shutting down. Customer service rep said, "you need a software 7.1.2. And you can take it from Google play store". OK. Came to Google store and what I see? Software 7.1.1 which is installed already. I don't have a habit to write long complaints, but I'm Love's loyal customer since they started to run first truckstops. Please fix above described problem. It really makes inconvenient route and fuel planning.

Please fix the app: Usually a great app with all the features I need including the ability to reserve a shower before I walk in. But as of yesterday, the app keeps crashing every time my wife or I try to look at the site map or store list. This is happening on my Samsung A50 and her Samsung S8+. Both phones are completely updated and so are the apps.

It's a handy app with one draw back. It has a notification every day for something. It seems that you can only turn it off in Android. That seems like a hack. They're should be an option in the app if you don't want to be bothered every single day. Especially for "deals" that are no longer available.

No support. I'm just send request via app about recept and answer:  thank you for the inquiry. In order for us to best assist, please provide additional details regarding your concern as we are unable to view the attachment provided. If you are needing you file a dispute, please provide the transaction date, location, and amount of points used for each transaction disputed and we will be more than happy to look further into the points used. Attachment? Date? Location? Amount? Love's already hav

title: Shop for Dollar Tree $
description:
Shop for bulk products at small prices with Dollar Tree. Perfect for restaurants, businesses, schools, churches, party planners & anyone looking for quality supplies in bulk. Fast Shipping! 

Kitchen & Dining Products
Serve up spectacular cuisine or whip up some classic cocktails with our selection of kitchen & dining essentials. Whether you run a busy commercial kitchen or you like to cook at home, we have you covered with $1 kitchen tools, commercial-quality drinkware, glasses, kitchen linens and much more.

Food, Candy & Drinks
Stock your pantries, breakrooms, or fill your shelves for resale with our wide selection of affordable food, candy, snacks, and drinks. Whether you’re making dinner for the family, munching between meals, or looking for the perfect party snack, we have everything you need.

Health & Beauty Supplies
It pays to save with us when you shop our huge $1 selection of health and beauty products. We carry everything you need to keep yourself healthy and looking stylish for a price that can’t be beat. Stock up on vitamins, medicine, chic accessories, skin care products, beauty supplies and cosmetics, shaving essentials, deodorants, and more!

comments: The app itself works okay, is kinda glitchy. I was excited to be able to order things online from dollar tree until I seen the shipping costs. They charge 3x more for shipping then any store I've ever seen. You pay more in shipping then your actual purchase. Its unfortunate, will never be ordering from dollar tree online.
I had to give it one star because it wouldnt allow me to give no stars. Downloaded the app and all i get is a blank screen. Uninstaling.
Doesn't work. Only start screen. Nothing clickable to continue on anywhere else in the app. 😓
Not working at all? It's all a blank screen & I tried everything, but its not worth wasting ur time.
Love this app it has all your essentials plus more. Easy to order and shipping to my local store.

title: Jewel-Osco Delivery & Pick Up
description:
Download the Jewel-Osco Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Jewel-Osco. Sign in with your existing Jewel-Osco account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.
 
Jewel-Osco Delivery & Pick Up App is convenient, easy and will save you time with these features:
- Delivery - Choose a time when you want your groceries delivered to your doorstep
- Drive Up & Go (Pick Up) - Drive up to your Jewel-Osco store, park, call and we'll bring your groceries to you
- Flexible delivery and pick up times – groceries on your schedule
- Shop fast from your previous in-store and online purchases
- Make special requests to your Personal Shopper (e.g. pick green bananas)
- Save money with hundreds of clippable coupons
- Exclusive online savings – easily find new weekly deals that matter most to you

title: Target Registry
description:
Make the most of your most-special occasions with the Target Registry app.
 
Celebrate any milestone
Choose from popular registry types like baby, wedding, college and housewarming. You can create your own, too!
 
Build your registry fast
Add items to your registry anytime, anywhere. Mark items as most wanted to inspire your gift givers. Share your registry with friends and family, and check to see what’s been purchased.

Scan, add, repeat
Quickly add multiple items while you’re at the store with our improved barcode scanner.
 
See everything at a glance
Use the handy checklist so you don’t forget anything. We’ve highlighted the most popular items for wedding, baby and more.
descriptionHTML:
Make the most of your most-special occasions with the Target Registry app.

Celebrate any milestone
Choose from popular registry types like baby, wedding, college and housewarming. You can create your own, too!

Build your registry fast
Add items to your registry anytime, anywhere. Mark items as most wanted to inspire your gift givers. Share your registry with friends and family, and check to see what’s been purchased.

Scan, add, repeat
Quickly add multiple items while you’re at the store with our improved barcode scanner.

See everything at a glance
Use the handy checklist so you don’t forget anything. We’ve highlighted the most popular items for wedding, baby and more.
summary: Create or manage your registry, find and add items, or scan in stores.
recentChanges: We made several small improvements and bug fixes.
comments: App worked fine for months since I downloaded it. Within the last few days, regardless of if I'm on wifi or data, the app fails to load into the registry at all. Came to the play store to write the review, saw there was an update. Update still did nothing, the app still won't load at all. Scanning is hit and miss, it seems this app does not sync into Target's main inventory like the Circle app does.
Suddenly says it can't retrieve my registry. Came on here to check it out and there was an update, but it didn't change anything.
Easy to use and so much fun

I personally do not like this app. It was better when it was all in the Target app itself. You have to remove items that are no longer for sale manually because it doesn't do it automatically. There are tons of items listed in the app that aren't actually available through Target. There's even times when I try to add items while in the store and it tells me the items don't exist. I wish they would have just left this in the original Target app so we could add items to our registries from there.

App truly and honestly sucks which is really a slap in the face because i love target so much and thought the app would be really convinient for me shopping from home. Ill go to click on the bigger picture to get more details and nothing will show up. In other words the images for anything wont show up sometimes at all and its really frustrating. I thought maybe it was just my phone so i tried a tablet, my boyfriends phone, and a couple of my friends phones as well and still had the same problem

title: Sprouts
description:
Good-for-you grocery shopping has never been easier, more affordable and fun with the Sprouts Farmers Market app! Browse your store’s amazing array of products and view the latest specials to build a personalized shopping list. Then, clip, scan and save even more with digital coupons and Checkout Challenges. 

See What’s on Sale
Save big with Weekly Ad savings, exclusive digital coupons and Checkout Challenges.

Clip, Scan & Save More
Redeem “clipped” coupons and Checkout Challenges instantly with one simple scan of your barcode at the register. With product look-up, find out if there’s a qualifying digital coupon or add it to your list. 

Plan Ahead
Build your personalized shopping list from our complete product catalog, weekly specials, digital coupons—you can even add products to your list from recipes! 

Get Inspired
Enjoy thousands of recipes and experience the convenience of a step-by-step recipe cooking mode. Plus, discover hundreds of educational resources to support your healthy living journey.

title: cPro: USED and FREE Stuff
description:
BUYING:
• Millions of items nearby. Cars, electronics, household items and much more.

SELLING:
• Post in less than a minute from your phone, tablet, or computer.
• Make money by getting rid of your unwanted items fast.

FREE STUFF:

comments: App sucks. I downloaded and non stop ads. The app is no different than the internet explorer. Can't navigate it to where I need it to. It continuously does not set my store. It takes me back through the same step or to the direction. Very pointless to download the app. I would not recommend it. Just a waste of space on your phone. Just use the internet explorer. You'll get the same experience.

The app is very slow. It does what it wants. When I tried customizing party supplies it kept exiting the app and I'd have to do it all over again. When I tried to upload my daughter's pictures it kicks me out and none of my progress was saved. Needs a lot of work party city. I am disappointed! It's very frustrating.

App crashed on me when I was adding additional suggested items to my cart at the botton of the page. App keeps dumping my cart if I close it and when it crashes and I have to start over. I went from internet (chrome) to app and I had to start my cart over. My my chrome is even smart enough to keep my cart even after I've closed chrome.... party city app deletes the whole cart. Stick with web browser.

A lot of times, the app closes by itself when I'm not trying to leave the app. Also, I can do a search for a particular item, and it will return 100 items, but I'm only allowed to view a portion of the 100. I would actually have to log on to my laptop in order to see the full results.
It sucked!! Can't get on to place order! Finally able to get on only for me to order than the screen goes comletely blank. So this totally SUCKED!

title: Dillons
description:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Dillons app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Dillons Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:

- Shop Pickup or Delivery right from the app!

- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your online order.

- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.

- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.

- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.

- Refill your Dillons Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.

- Check your fuel points.

- Use our locator to find the closest Dillons store or fuel center.

- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.

- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.

To use the Dillons app, you'll need a Dillons digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!

comments: The "Savings" menu is utterly pointless. It consists of coupons and ads. Why do we need the ad in there? We have a tab specifically for the ad. Why make us take an extra step to see the coupons? Especially when each page takes a long time to load. Just change the tab back to coupons only. Every time I am forced to update this app, it gets worse.

I use for Kroger pay. Super convenient for the plus card and payment in one, but a little less that ideal in some ways. For starters, you can almost never search for coupons that are there, sometimes it doesn't show any entirely. **Also strongly recommend that you allow each payment method to be named!** I use multiple accounts. There's multiple people using the app - one joint, as well as individual cards on there. Redundant when I have to read cards numbers to know what is what

today the app won't take the ebt snap card for pick up. Which it's supposed to. There's no way to enter it as payment and you can't place an order without a card. It says enter valid visa or mastercard. It's also sending me to Rolla Mo. I've changed it multiple times and it keeps going back to that address for pickup. Thanks for nothing. Oh...fyi..Chase pay ISN'T EBT.

I hate the new app. It is not user friendly anymore. I can't find anything. I know you have an item, but yet the app says you don't have it. Like it don't exist. On common items. Very frustrating. Ugh!!

Used to be great, now it doesn't work at all. I've changed my password 3 times and the app keeps saying it's wrong? Help!!!!! Update: they fixed it!!!! Back to being awesome!!! Thanks for the quick response!!!!!

title: LIKEtoKNOW.it
description:
Search and discover millions of real products styled by, on, and for real people on the LIKEtoKNOW.it app. All you find is 100% shoppable, so you can instantly shop whatever catches your eye.


HOW IT WORKS
Download the LIKEtoKNOW.it app and create your profile to instantly access real, shoppable content from bloggers, influencers, and celebrities who are in the LIKEtoKNOW.it community. Find and follow your favorite influencers so you never miss their posts or search for something specific to see it styled in all different ways on all different people. Search sweater dresses, over-the-knee boots, strollers — whatever it is you’re really looking for, you’ll get real answers from real people here.


SEARCH
Find what product you’re in search of via thousands of instantly shoppable and stylized results.


FOLLOW
Create your perfect, shoppable feed by finding and following your favorite influencers.


SAVE
Save items that catch your eye to your Wish List, then organize them into Collection folders to easily browse later.


SCREENSHOT
Across social media, screenshot LIKEtoKNOW.it-enabled pictures to get instant details in the app.


SHARE
Share your customized Collections folders with friends via social media, text, or email so they can see and shop what you’re loving.

title: Receipt Hog - Receipts to Cash
description:
Receipt Hog is a fun and easy way to turn your everyday receipts into real cash and rewards!

HOW IT WORKS:
1) Take pictures of your receipts from any store, restaurant or cafe...
2) Earn Receipt Hog rewards like coins, spins at the virtual slot machine, and sweepstakes prizes...
3) Cash out with PayPal or Amazon gift cards. Cha-ching! 

Receipt Hog is an exclusive opportunity to join a diverse community of people who get paid for uploading pictures of their receipts for market research. We’ve had so many people join our panel of shoppers (we’ve already paid out over $2.5 million!) that spaces are now limited.


FEATURES:
- Watch your Hog grow fatter as you feed him more receipts - a fatter Hog means a fatter payout for you! 

- You'll love playing the Hog Slot machine where you can win extra coins, an instant $100, or even have your last shopping trip paid for. 

- Earn more when you level up, win sweepstakes prizes, and complete short surveys! 

- Enjoy a totally uncluttered wallet - Receipt Hog allows you to access a digital copy of your receipts in one secure place. 

Request to join Receipt Hog today when you download the app!
