comments: Money for taking photos, what's not to love. I have used the photos of a receipt to get my money back on an item because I had thrown the receipt away. I am up to my 3rd cash in point. £15 for snapping some photos. Brilliant app. Tried others but I was restricted to certain outlets, receipt hog gives you a reward for every receipt, something's it's a few pulls on the slots game but at least it's something.

Can't make anything. I have had this app for 2 years. In that amount of time you would think that I would have enough to cash out but no such luck. If im lucky I make $.02 If the slots were worth it I would consider staying but if things don't change I will uninstall it. I've tried reconnecting my Amazon and it keeps telling me that I have already connected an account but I only have one Amazon account and it isn't connected. It hasn't been for a couple of months now

Receipt Hog is a great app where you can earn rewards like an Amazon gift card just by scanning your receipts from food shopping, gas, clothes, quick meals at Wawa and Quick Chek. You can also win prizes with the slot machine including the largest receipt you scan. I just redeemed my points for an Amazon gift card. Try it. You'll like it.

Love the fact that you get points or sweepstakes entries for all receipts scanned. No more only getting points for certain items and brands like other receipt apps. It's a fair point system and doesn't take long to get a gift card. I also like the fact there are other ways to earn points as well. This is one of best receipt apps to download.

It's alright. There's times when it won't give me reward points for local restaurant receipts and that's annoying. But I have managed to get Amazon gift cards. Yes, it take a lot of points to even get a $5.00 Gift card but it's really the same number of points as any of app that does the same thing.

title: Vons Delivery & Pick Up
description:
Download the Vons Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Vons. Sign in with your existing Vons account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.
 
Vons Delivery & Pick Up App is convenient, easy and will save you time with these features:
- Delivery - Choose a time when you want your groceries delivered to your doorstep
- Drive Up & Go (Pick Up) - Drive up to your Vons store, park, call and we'll bring your groceries to you
- Flexible delivery and pick up times – groceries on your schedule
- Shop fast from your previous in-store and online purchases
- Make special requests to your Personal Shopper (e.g. pick green bananas)
- Save money with hundreds of clippable coupons
- Exclusive online savings – easily find new weekly deals that matter most to you

comments: Bad update! You not only can't edit your order (when your delivery isn't scheduled for 3-4 days from now? Come on!), you can't even view your current order. And of course, they force you to update, you can't use an older version of the app.

Up until the update on 4/4, the app was easy to use and useful. Now, you cannot edit an order once placed, which I sort of get, but was a great feature. Worse though, you cannot even see what you ordered, making it hard to know what you still need to buy from other services, leading to food waste.
Not user friendly. You cannot see what you ordered. Other grocery delivery apps you can edit until a certain time. Disappointed in app.
Just installed and keep getting log in errors everytime I click on an item. I was only able to add 2 items. Extremely frustrating. Please fix.
Unable to register for an account. I keep getting a server error when I add all my info. The most annoying part is I can't even add things to the cart because I'm not registered. Worthless.

title: Ashley HomeStore
description:
INTRODUCING VISUAL SEARCH
Try our exciting new visual search feature today.  Simply tap the camera icon located in the search bar and this amazing shopping feature will allow you to capture images of products you see anywhere.  Within seconds, we'll display the closest matching or exact matching Ashley Furniture product. This makes shopping for comparison products a breeze.

VIEW ASHLEY FURNITURE IN YOUR HOME WITH AUGMENTED REALITY
The Ashley HomeStore app features a streamlined shopping experience along with Augmented Reality (AR) that allows you to view select Ashley Furniture items in your own home. You’ll also be able to search, browse and shop thousands of home decor, bedding, mattresses, mattress in a box, outdoor, living room, bedroom, home office, media storage, dining, kids furniture, lighting, wall accents, and much more.  

ASHLEY IN-HOME DELIVERY WITH WHITE GLOVE SERVICE, FREE UPS SHIPPING, ONLINE DELIVERY TRACKING (select markets)
Ashley HomeStore offers convenience and flexibility when ordering and purchasing items for your home.  Depending upon size and weight, your products will be delivered by Ashley In-Home Delivery or FREE UPS Shipping.  With Ashley In-Home delivery, you choose the day you would like to have your items delivered and we’ll take care of the rest.  Ashley will place Ashley In-Home Delivered items in room of choice, assemble, setup, and will remove all packing material so you spend more time enjoying your new purchase.  In select markets, we offer real time delivery tracking.  The interactive map shows where your Ashley Delivery Truck is located along with your delivery window (not currently available in all markets).
  
STORE LOCATOR
Find the closest Ashley HomeStore by using our store locator.  Get directions, store phone number, hours of operation, and more.

title: Google Shopping: Discover, compare prices & buy
description:
The Google Shopping app enables you to shop millions of items across thousands of stores with confidence. Buy directly on Google with an easy and secure checkout, using your Google account.  When you buy on Google, your order is backed by a Google guarantee - with simple returns and customer support 7 days a week.

Easier shopping, all from one spot, no membership required
Whether you’re shopping for an everyday necessity, a gift, or something new and unique, you’ll find it easy to browse departments and products with the Google Shopping app. Google Shopping is free and doesn’t require a paid membership to enjoy all its benefits.

Thoughtful recommendations
Get deals and product recommendations just for you, inspired by your Google activity. 

Compare stores, prices, and more
The Google Shopping app brings thousands of stores together in one place, so you can shop your favorite places or try somewhere new. Quickly compare prices, reviews, brands, and store availability to find the best option for you - both online and nearby.

Exclusive deals and free shipping
Save time and money on the go, with app-exclusive deals and promo codes from stores. Get free shipping on qualifying orders, with most items arriving within 3-5 days. Save even more with daily deals and frequent flash sales.

Download the app now to start shopping millions of items across thousands more stores - all in one convenient place.

• Expand your search with a direct link to shopping.google.com on the web to find even more prices and places to buy across online and local stores.
• A new name and a new look.
comments: There's some really bad programming in this app. It's nice to use it with Google Home, but the programming has major issues. It'll delete your list when you ask to delete an item. It'll create redundancy of an item already on your list. It'll also add an item to your shopping list that is on the already purchased list. It's a bad user experience. It also has no functionality to do home deliveries with the other home delivery apps, so if you want to shop for pricing from home, don't use this.

The app has had problems in the past that I did not expect from Google, but it seems that it's solved now. Now I find it even easier than Amazon to browse. Still shipping takes longer than Amazon, but I can find many items like pet supplies cheaper here. "The app was working fine, but now as soon as I choose my cart, the app shuts down and closes itself everytime. Completely useless. The problem has been going on for 3 days now, even after I reinstalled the app."

Got to love this! The prices are pretty fair. They have a nice selection of Google everything. I got a sweet deal on my Pixel phone and also love and I do mean love my Google Fi as myself provider! I love the Pixel phone because you don't have to touch it to do anything it does everything for you. I'll probably get lazy but it's a fun lazy😉🌞❣️

The main draw for Google Shopping is that you can just throw things in your cart from different stores and buy them automatically through Google. You don't have to keep creating accounts at every different store and adding your payment and address information constantly over and over. Unfortunately, that's about where the benefit ends. Google chooses a retailer for you automatically. If you select a different one, you have to go to their website, which then defeats the purpose of the app.

Works sometimes. Can't access the list if there's no cell or wifi. Even if the list is on the screen before I enter the store. Interface is a bit clunky, can't exit the app with the < key sometimes. Not being able to access the list offline is becoming a disqualifier.

title: ShopSavvy - Barcode Scanner & Price Comparison
description:
The best price comparison, barcode scanning and product search app. 

The original Barcode Scanner and price checker.  Find stores near you with the product in stock and at the best price.  Coverage of all top retailers so you can find the lowest price fast, easy and free.
  
With ShopSavvy Barcode Scanner and QR Code reader you can:

-- Search for any product via UPC code, barcode and keyword.  
-- Barcode Scan any product and compare all the best prices on the Internet and at nearby, local stores.  
-- Save money with price comparison and product search for any product or retailer.
--  Price Match- we'll even help you drop the price at the register using the store's own price match policy.
-- Scan QR codes.  
-- First and Best Barcode Scanner

With ShopSavvy you will save you money and never miss a deal! You can search by product name or barcode scan any item. Lighting fast barcode scanner and product search.  

Price comparison or QR Code Scan and Save!

We have the largest database of retailers, products and prices including Amazon, Best Buy, Target, and Walmart.  Great for price checking at Walmart, Best Buy and Kohls!

"In the past I've relied mostly on the ShopSavvy app"
- New York Times

"ShopSavvy has become a secret weapon of sorts for bargain hunters"
- The Washington Post

"A must-have for professional bargain hunters"
- Time

"In addition to comparing prices, ShopSavvy makes it easy to purchase items from select websites"
- The Wall Street Journal

"ShopSavvy was one of the best early Android applications"
- TechCrunch

recentChanges: Crash fixes.  Added more stores.  Working hard on making the ads that we must show far more relevant, useful and contextual.  Expect to see gradual improvements here over the next 5 releases...
comments: I have used this to save $10 on a small reptile heat mat and then again on a larger heat mat I saved $30! It alerted me when the car seat I wanted was on sale for $100 off!!! It works great for everyday items like dog food and it keeps you from having to spend all the time researching or driving all over town. You will not regret getting this app, even if you only use it once it is worth it!
Has definitely saved me alot of money by scanning the barcode before I buy so that I can find the better deals

Seriously why make an app that is available to all of Canada that doesn't support Canadian currency.you can only view the prices in American and there is no option to configure it to view it in Canadian dollars.
It keeps giving me wrong item, everytime it scans the barcode. Waste of time, uninstalled.
Good app because you get to see all the item price...😊👍 but think it's only scan item that made in USA

title: VarageSale: Sell simply, buy safely.
description:
VarageSale is your virtual garage sale buy and sell app. We are the only app based on 100% real identity--everyone goes through a manual review process before they’re allowed to buy or sell. See member ratings and average response times to get to know people before a sale. Messaging members and scheduling meetups are a breeze through our app.

Browse local classifieds listings on the feed or filter out categories you aren’t interested in for a personalized shopping experience. Easily search for stuff like baby gear, furniture, household items, electronics, jewelry, purses, clothing, shoes, and more! 
 
Got stuff to sell? Take a photo and list it in seconds. Earn extra cash. Let go of items you no longer want or need. 
 
Completely free to buy, sell, browse and bump your stuff to the top of the listings feed. 
 
Skip yard sales. VarageSale instead! Sell simply, buy safely.

recentChanges: * Performance improvements and various bug fixes.
comments: After last update App wouldnt open at all, but issue was fixed by uninstalling and installing again. Would be nice if app had filters for pricing and some way to delete old ads when the seller doesnt login for a certain length of time. People waste a lot of time trying to contact sellers who are no longer active but their posts are still showing available

The AP works most of the time, but does quit working occasionally or can become super slow during peak use hours. I wish items sold would disappear in a week but some don't. People who have posted items for sale a year to two years ago still have them posted. Yet they no longer use the app. I wish these items would be removed by the site.

Won't open anymore and keeps crashing/closing when I don't even have the app open. Will stick with web version even though not as good. App is tough to figure out who is replying to which ad I have posted. Tough to figure out the strings of replies.
Excellent app. Reliable speedy access use and replies. Notifications received in a timely manner. Powerful platform with excellent quality.
I love this app. But since the last update a couple days ago, it will not open, keeps stopping. Please fix ASAP.

title: PrettyLittleThing
description:
Need your fashion fix on the move? We got you girl. Shop using the PrettyLittleThing app for fierce trend-lead, affordable fashion at your fingertips. The ultimate in fast fashion, with the freshest looks in the latest on-trend styles hitting the site daily, there's no excuse not to keep your #OOTD on-point. With our app in your pocket, we make browsing hundreds of wardrobe must-haves easy as clicking "download".  
•	Buy straight from our app to get essential new season garms delivered straight to your door. 
•	Don't have time right now? No worries, add those garms you're going heart eyed over to your wishlist to add to bag later. 
•	Just in need some inspo for the weekend? Browse our new in collections.
•	While you're on your phone - join our squad and share your selfie with the hashtag #PLTSTYLE.

Whatever your shopping needs, get in the know with 24/7 fast fashion on the go.

recentChanges: Bug Fixes & Improvements
comments: It's a good app, but it would be nice if we could login to our accounts, I get that a lot of people using this app would have iPhones because that's the age range they're targeting, but it's just a pain when I have to go to a separate app to complete the transaction.

App sucks! It doesn't sync and everytime I try to checkout it lags and takes me to an internal error page. Also took me through a ton of verification steps..for nothing because I ended up deleting the app anyway. Fix the bugs! The last update was back in October!

I love the clothes and easier to use than the site but I can't log in on it like the site so details like order history and royalty don't alwsys go through. It seems to crash every 5 mins so I have to constantly start again. Please fix that
Easier to use than website, However it freezes every single time i use it causing me to have to reload and sometimes search for items i had just been looking at, frustrating.
Can't log in to your account on the app so any favorites or items in the cart aren't there if you look on another device. You cant look at order history either. Other than that the app runs well.

title: Vipon - Deals & Coupons
description:
With millions of monthly shoppers, Vipon is one of the largest Amazon deal sites, providing the best coupons, deals and much more. The Vipon App is your one stop shop when browsing Amazon. Never pay full price again! 
 
Browse the Vipon App for deals, discounts & coupons on Amazon products. Most offers range from 50-99% off, even during the holiday sales!
 
Discover more than 40,000 daily deals in home, clothing, beauty, electronics, tech, kids, books, pets and many other categories. 
 
Best of all it’s completely free – no upfront purchase, no in-app purchases, only great deals and exclusive discounts for Vipon users.
 
All items are sold through Amazon, and with your Amazon Prime account, the shipping is free. Simply claim a voucher and redeem through Amazon.
 
Warning: can be addictive, hot deals updated daily! 
 
FEATURES:
Get Today’s Best Deals – Quickly review the Featured Deals, Editors’ Picks, Instant Deals and Upcoming Deals. 
Deal Alerts - Have your eye on a particular item, but the coupons of it have run out? Simply save the item to your Favorites and you will receive alert when it becomes available. 
Leave Comments - Share your opinions on any Vipon deals.
Earn Points – As Vipon shopper, you can earn Points via multiple methods, and those points can then be redeemed for cash or products in the future.
Download Vipon and start saving now!

comments: I love this app ive bought losts of things at a great value price its a great app for buy gifts for cheap.
Incredible Amazon deals! I always check Vipon before I purchase directly on Amazon because chances are I will find a better deal or like 20.
Have tried using the codes but keeps asking for me to verify my email, to yet I haven't recieved an email to verify. Have emailed vipon directly with no reply....

I love this app! Great deals and a variety of them. Easy to use no complaints from me. Request- would it be possible to have more musical instruments and equipment such as dj, stage equipment etc? Thanks!
Love everything I have ordered from this site so far and their shipping time is amazing.

title: Checkout 51: Gas Rewards & Grocery Cash Back
description:
Checkout 51 is a Cash Back app where you can get gas rewards and cash back that saves you tons of money on your favorite brands, groceries, and necessities. New fuel rewards where smart drivers can get their gas cash back and grocery offers on everything you buy.

Find grocery offers and fuel rewards and start saving money with coupons and Cash Back! New deals are available on everyday items from all your favorite stores. Grocery offers and cash rewards are updated every Thursday!

Gas cash back? Now, members will be able to earn up to 25¢/gallon on gas purchases. Earn Cash Back at gas stations like Shell, Chevron, BP, Exxon, Mobile and more. Earn Cash Back on Gas every time you fuel up, every week!

Grocery offers and cash back rewards are right at your fingertips. Get grocery promo savings, cash back offers and more right from your phone. Grocery offers are easy to redeem, just snap a photo of your receipt and earn cash back rewards.

Save money with these simple steps:
1. Browse grocery offers that are updated every Thursday
2. Buy groceries and other products from any store
3. Take a photo of your receipt to redeem your offer
4. Earn cash rewards!

Get the savings app that gives cash back on everyday items today with Checkout 51!

Savings apps mean no more:
- Couponing books that waste paper
- Grocery offer apps that don’t have the brands you love
- Clipping in store coupons before shopping
- Arguing with the cashier and holding up the rest of the line

Checkout 51 Features:

Store Coupon App:
- Grocery offers are updated every Thursday to find the coupons you need!
- Save money at your favorite stores like Target, Walmart, and CVS!
- We have coupons in every category for money saving opportunities

Earn Cash Back Instantly from Your Receipt:
- Save your receipt, take a picture of it and earn Cash Back
- Send your receipt for money back and you can cash out once you reach $20 in savings
- View your savings balance any time!

Gas Rewards
- Earn cash back rewards when you fill up your tank
- Fuel rewards at the gas stations you frequent
- Gas rebates to save at the pump
- Gas prices comparison to help you find the best deal on gasoline
- You have 4 hours from the time you add the offer to fill up your tank, so try to only add offers when you’re ready to head to the gas station. Note: all gas offers must be purchased with a debit or credit card.
- Upload your receipt within 24 hours.
- Wait and watch the savings roll in!

Grocery Offers at Your Favorite Stores:
- Rewards and money back from your favorite stores
- Cash Back savings! Earn from: Walmart, Target, CVS, Kroger, Safeway, Walgreens, HEB,
Publix, Costco, Whole Foods, Sam’s Club, Babies R Us and more!
- Sort grocery offers by store and category to make shopping easy

Savings on Your Favorite Products:
- Shop and save on grocery items like: Mountain Dew, Coca Cola, Gatorade, milk, cheese, bread and more
- Savings on household items like: Huggies, Pampers, Charmin, Bounty, Tide, Glade and more
- Save the offers that interest you to help quickly find them later

Search for Deals:
- Search items you’ll need this week and save money!
- Checkout 51’s new Search Bar lets you instantly find deals without scrolling

Stop coupon hunting and earn Cash Back on everything from grocery to household items. Save money and time with Checkout 51 to put more savings in your wallet!

Checkout 51 uses your location minimally while in the background to deliver in-store offers to you at the right time. Note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

If you need any support, please contact us at: https://www.checkout51.com/contact

For California Residents - Please follow this link to exercise your right to opt out of the sale of your personal information under the California Consumer Privacy Act - "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" [www.checkout51.com/CCPA-do-not-sell.]

recentChanges:
- Introducing Online Offers: earn Cash Back on e-commerce purchases!
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.
comments: Easy way to earn a little cash back after you've gone grocery shopping! 🙂 Free app. Install and check it out for yourself. Different cash back options every week. Since I buy a lot when I go to the store, I do wish they had more cash back options than what is offered but there is probably a process to get permission do to so.

The app works great. I like that they send your rebate balance in a check. I haven't used the gas rebates because there are no participating gas stations near me. There is not a whole lot of rebate offers that are relevant to me, so really I'm not getting a whole lot back... but when I do, I'm happy!

I've been using this app for maybe five six hours and it seems limited and it's ability to save on any money like this limits in it I might not be sure let me just be new to the app my girlfriend told me to get it and download it I think it might be a waste of space I'm hoping it saves me money on gas who knows so that's why I'm going to give it three stars out of five... kind of like seems like there should be an app that has a lot more savings options & faster cash back
Easy app. I really like the idea of not having to "pre select" what you will purchase. Shop as normal THEN see if there's anything you can claim.
Nice way to make a little extra cash. Only downfall is that you have to wait until you earn $20 in rewards to cash out and it takes a while since there are not many well known brands or items.

title: Guitar Center: Shop Music Gear
description:
Introducing the Guitar Center mobile app. You can shop on the go, get personalized notifications, explore product reviews while in the store and much more. All the gear you can ever imagine is right in the palm of your hand. For access to your favorite brands and gear, anytime and anywhere, download our free app and find your sound.

Features:
• Save Searches to get notified when new items arrive that match your specific search criteria.
• Set Product Alerts to find out immediately about price drops, item availability and special sales.
• Browse the Used Gear section to easily locate exactly what you’re looking for, at the right price.
• The Barcode Scanner scans products in the store to bring up reviews and view additional content.
• Wish List allows you to build your dream gear list or scan a product in the store to add it directly.
• Shop our entire selection from acoustic and electric guitars, ukuleles, basses, drums and keyboards, to microphones, speakers, amps and headphones.
• Music gear from all of your favorite brands including Yamaha, Fender, Livewire, Taylor, Shure, Martin, Gibson, PRS, Pioneer, Epiphone, Ibanez, JBL and more.

5795 Lindero Canyon Rd.
Westlake Village, CA 91362
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: This app is very useful and has a pleasing layout. However.. It's beyond bugged. The app crashes constantly, the keyboard continues to pop up after I've hit "search" a million times, and when I finally get it to go away, the recent searches stays up so I cant even see the search results. Please fix this app guys. I love guitar center so much. 😔

Decent app, but could use some speed optimization and general improvements. A better user interface would be welcome as well, with a more refined way to shop by category. But the most important and much needed update would be to optimize it and get the app working faster. Occasionally it glitches and freezes when trying to view product photos too. Some improvements in these areas and it would be a great shopping app!

Like MANY USERS have pointed out, latest App update does not work! My experience is that the App opens once after the install or update, and never works again until the App is removed and reinstalled. Then it opens the first time, but never a second time. Come on, can't you app developers get this fixed? Updated App 12/10. Uninstalled, rebooted, reinstalled. Same problems. Updated App 2/27. Uninstalled, rebooted, reinstalled. Same problems. Very frustrated. The App is useless.

I love this app, because it shows me what Guitar Center has in their store, and it also keeps me up to date on the guitars and Banjos like the 6 strings that are very hard to find in other stores a round the country. Plus if I see something that I like, I can always get a hold of someone to talk to about the instrument.

You guys really dont want anyone to browse your merchandise huh? The website is slower than my 92 year old great grandmother and the app doesnt even work at all. It works when you first install it for a minute then it just keeps crashing. I'm sticking to reverb. Sorry but you lost out on a customer. If I could give you negative stars trust and believe I would.

title: SKECHERS - Lifestyle Footwear
description:
The Skechers mobile app allows you to shop your favorite Skechers styles for men, women and kids anywhere whenever the need for footwear strikes you! It’s an entire Skechers store in your pocket and the easiest way to shop for Skechers on the go! Browse the latest cool and comfortable collections and find your perfect casual or dress lifestyle shoes, sneakers, boots, slip-ons and sandals. Plus, check out the innovative and award-winning performance athletic styles for walking, running, training and golf. 

FEATURES INCLUDE:
● Instant Search to quickly locate your perfect style, color and size!
● Skechers Elite™ account access to track your points and earn rewards.
● Barcode Search to help you find your size and additional colors when in store.
● Shop Instagram lets you check out how Skechers fans everywhere are styling their favorite shoes on Instagram and shop the look with direct links to the style for easy purchase!
● Social Media Sharing allows you to show off your favorite styles to all your friends on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and more.
● Receive special offers from Skechers in your app Inbox.
● Save your favorite items to your Wishlist.
● Store Locator helps you find your neighborhood Skechers retail store.

descriptionHTML:
The Skechers mobile app allows you to shop your favorite Skechers styles for men, women and kids anywhere whenever the need for footwear strikes you! It’s an entire Skechers store in your pocket and the easiest way to shop for Skechers on the go! Browse the latest cool and comfortable collections and find your perfect casual or dress lifestyle shoes, sneakers, boots, slip-ons and sandals. Plus, check out the innovative and award-winning performance athletic styles for walking, running, training and golf.

FEATURES INCLUDE:
● Instant Search to quickly locate your perfect style, color and size!
● Skechers Elite™ account access to track your points and earn rewards.
● Barcode Search to help you find your size and additional colors when in store.
● Shop Instagram lets you check out how Skechers fans everywhere are styling their favorite shoes on Instagram and shop the look with direct links to the style for easy purchase!
● Social Media Sharing allows you to show off your favorite styles to all your friends on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and more.
● Receive special offers from Skechers in your app Inbox.
● Save your favorite items to your Wishlist.
● Store Locator helps you find your neighborhood Skechers retail store.
● Proximity Notifications give you a heads up on news and offers when you’re near a Skechers retail store.
● Easy Checkout with Android Pay.
summary: SKECHERS -- Lifestyle & Performance Footwear

Better to shop with the app than me online mobile store I love the biometric options makes it easier to log in and out

title: Stitch Fix - Personal Stylist & Fashion Shopping
description:
Stitch Fix is a Personal Stylist & shopping service. Discover clothing, accessories & shoes for women, men & kids and get your fashion delivered. 

Plus size, Maternity or Petite - Your Personal Stylist has outfit ideas for every wardrobe. From elegant midi dresses to on-trend white denim, get your fashion shopping fix with our hand-selected pieces.

Personal Stylist - How does it work?
✭ Style, size & price point - Share your preferences with your Personal Stylist.
✭ Fashion shopping - Receive clothing & accessories to try on at home.
✭ Fashion for you - Keep what you like, send back what you don’t. 
✭ Plus size, Petite & Maternity - We’ve got stylish fashion for everyone.
✭ Women's clothing, Men's clothing & Kid's clothing available.

FREE shipping and no subscription required. If you don’t like what you get, simply send it back. And if you choose to keep all items, we’ll give you 25% off your entire order.

WOMEN'S CLOTHING, MEN'S CLOTHING & KID'S CLOTHING
Shopping for clothes doesn’t need to be stressful. Save time with our personal styling and fashion shopping service for women's clothing (0-24W/XS-3X) and men's clothing (28-48W/XS-3X) - now also available for kids from 2T-14! Tell us about their personality and style, we’ll take care of the rest. We also carry Plus Size, Petite and Maternity wear.

CLOTHES & SHOES FOR EVERY STYLE
Clothing tailored to your taste - your Personal Stylist finds new pieces and sends outfit ideas that will make you look good and feel great. We deliver pants, skirts, shorts, dresses, sweaters, shirts, outerwear, scarves, jewelry, shoes, accessories and bags. 

FASHION FOR EVERY SIZE
Plus size, Petite or Maternity. We’ve got clothes for every body. Our Stylists know fit is everything and hand-select the best pieces just for you.

FASHION SHOPPING SERVICE, SUBSCRIPTION-FREE
Free shipping, returns & exchanges, plus no subscription! Sound good? Opt-in to receive packages regularly or schedule whenever you want.

FASHION BRANDS
Stitch Fix now carries top fashion brands like Free People, Madewell, AG, Michael Michael Kors, DVF , Calvin Klein & many more - choose from all your favorite fashion brands.

BUDGET-FRIENDLY
Select your spending preferences, and your Personal Stylist will choose clothing, shoes and accessories based on your price-range. 

OUTFIT STYLING ADVICE
Get helpful advice on how to style pieces or put together an outfit using style suggestions included on Style Cards in each delivery. 

Whether you're building your dream wardrobe, want to explore new fashion brands or are just looking for a new way to shop for clothes, download Stitch Fix now for a great way to look good, without being tied to a subscription. 

Thank you for the 5-star reviews! Your feedback helps make the app even better. If you have feedback or questions, email us at hello@stitchfix.com

comments: The service is great. I love watching the stylists learn your style and select things for you they think you'd like. The app on the other hand could use some work. The section where you swipe through and decide which outfit or article of clothing is your style is very limited. The clothing is all kinda same same, what you'd find in a department store and it only goes through three cards before it's done and then you have to wait for the next day. Be much better if you got to swipe through more.

The app could be more intuitive. The loading image & time to navigate from one page to another are annoying. Redeeming a promo code is difficult depending on the origin. I used a referral code from a friend & the app didn't take it, so I had to contact customer support. The service itself is ok. I specified typed of items I wanted and, out of 4 boxes, MOST items did not meet my requests. I will try again now both parties have a better idea of how the other works/thinks.

Style shuffle has become super inconsistent. Attempting to get it to show up has become a chore. This is the thing I do the most in the app, so it's furustrating that it rarely shows up on initial load. When it does work, there's usually a point where shuffle looks like it's showing you the same thing 3-5 times in a row. It's not. You have to click the image to try to force it to refresh the image and you'll see that it's a totally different item.

I was really excited to try stitch fix as I have a unique style and sometimes its hard to find clothing. So I filled out the style quiz, added reference photos to what I like and everything. But when I recieved the pictures of what items were being sent I was beyond disappointed. It was evident that the stylist hadn't even considered what I had said, it didn't match me at all. Not worth the 20 dollar styling fee.

Don't even bother. They say the items are starting at $25, and you get to let them know a price point you'd be comfortable with. I selected the lowest cost for everything and every single item I received was over $50. Half of the items in my box were not even remotely my style or were things I had asked specifically not to get (blouses). I also asked for color and fun prints or designs or unique items and literally all 5 items were black & white and so plain. A complete waste of $20.
